
1a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs mdor byas pa 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi mdzad pa bzhugs/
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ da N+Di d+hi kri ta sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon
1b2(rgyud 'grel): nu ra gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum spyed pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam gyur dngos po'i ngo po nyid/ /dag cing
1b3(rgyud 'grel): zhi la rnam dben mchog zhi rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa nyid yul/ /rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la bdag gzhan rab phan
1b4(rgyud 'grel): khyab cing mtshan ma med/ /rgyal ba'i bde ba mnyam med mnyam sku mi rtogs tshul gcig la phyag 'tshal/ /dpal ldan
2a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi ni/ /don bsdus rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /sems can kun la phan skyed pa'i/ /mdor bsdus
2a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bshad par bya/ /rnam rtog bag chags nyes pa yis/ /'gro ba gsum po rnam rmongs la/ /blo dang ldan pas legs
2a3(rgyud 'grel): bltas te/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyis spyad par bya/ /'dod pa lnga ni yongs spangs nas/ /dka' thub kyis ni gdung med par/ /rnal
2a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs la/ /bde bas byang chub bsgrub par bya/ /des na 'di na sdom gnas yin/ /rtag tu mi phyed brtul
2b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs gang/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /sgrub pa dag kyang brtsam par bya/ /mgon po chen po'i sa phyogs ni/ /me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis
2b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /ri bo dben pa dag tu ni/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa bsgrub/ /'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /sems dpa' i dkyil krung legs
2b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas te/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /gnas bsrung ba ni bsam par bya/ /'bar ba'i 'od 'phro 'jigs par byed/ /nyi ma la gnas hUM las
2b4(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /g.yon brkyad pa yi gnas pas gnas/ /khro bo bcu ni spro bar bya/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rtse mo ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bsam par
2b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /bgegs kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /gnod mjos bka' stsal phur bus gdab/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ grih+na grih+na hUM/ grih+NA pa
3a1(rgyud 'grel): ya grih+NA la ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAn bidyA ra dza hUM phaT/ khro bo'i gzugs can 'di yis ni/ /bgegs kyi dbang po nyid bkug
3a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /blo dang ldan pas sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga bzhin du phur bus gdab/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che/ /utpal sngon po 'dab ma'i mdog /'bar phreng
3a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom/ /lte ba'i phyogs nas smad kyi cha/ /rtse mo lta bur rnam par bsam/ /stong ni khro bo'i dbyibs
3a4(rgyud 'grel): can te/ /zhal gsum phyag drug lta bur bsgom/ /de yi gsang sngags legs brjod la/ /bgegs kyi tshogs la 'og gzigs pas/ /rdo rje phur
3a5(rgyud 'grel): bu des btab na/ /bgegs kyi lus ni mi g.yo 'gyur/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TaM phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT
3b1(rgyud 'grel): phaT hUM hUM hUM/ badzra ki lA ya/ badzra d+ha ro adz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba big+hA nan/ kA ya bAka tsit+ta/ kI la ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rdo rje tho ba phyag bsnams pa'i/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po rnam par
3b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /rdo rje me yis kun tu ni/ /rnam par 'phro bas nges par bsgom/ /gdug pa tshig pa phan tshun du/ /'bros par gyur pa rnam par bsam/ /phyogs bcu phur bus btab
3b3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /steng 'og yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /dam pa'i don du dngos po rnams/ /srid gsum dngos po med par bsgom/ /dngos po med la bsgom pa'i dngos/ /bsgom par bya ba bsgom
3b4(rgyud 'grel): pa min/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/ /bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis rgyu mi rgyu'i/ /bdag nyid can rnams stong par bsgom/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis
3b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /ye shes sa gzhir byin gyis brlab/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /hUM gnyis sa bon yaM las byung/ /rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor
3b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /hUM gnyis sa bon raM las byung/ /rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /me yi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang ni/ /de yi steng du rnam par bsam/ /hUM gnyis sa bon paM las byung/ /rdo rje
4a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang ni/ /de yi steng du rnam par bsam/ /hUM gnyis sa bon laM las byung/ /rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang ni/ /de yi
4a2(rgyud 'grel): steng du rnam par bsam/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po yang dag bsdu/ /rdo rje sa yi dkyil 'khor la/ /der ni b+h+ruM las byung ba yi/ /gzhal yas khang ni rnam par bsgom/ /zur bzhi dang ni sgo bzhi dang/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes byas
4a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /ka ba brgyad kyis yang dag mdzes/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang/ /rdo rje nor bu zla phyed brgyan/ /grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad dang/ /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras//
4a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /bum pa ka pa rdo rje che/ /brel bya ni rim bzhin gnas/ /ba dan dril bu mdzes byas la/ /rnga yab sogs kyis rnam par brgyan/ /bdag nyid phyag rgyar ldan pa ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam
4a5(rgyud 'grel): pa can/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'ong mnyam pa/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen dang/ /'od dpag med dang las kyi rgyal/ /zhal gsum phyag drug lta bur ni/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su
4a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /gti mug dga' sogs lha mo rnams/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can/ /me'i phyogs nas brtsams nas su/ /rim pa ji bzhin nges par dgod/ /de bzhin gzuD rdo rje la sogs/ /phyi yi mtshams ni rnam pa bzhag/ /deg bya rdo rje nyid kyang ni/
4b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' dang ldan gnas/ /byams pas yi snying po dang/ shar gyi snam bu re dgod par bya/ /phyag na rdo rje mkha' snying po/ /brtul zhugs can gyi lho ru dgong/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'jaM pa'i dbyangs/ /nub tu yang ni dgod par bya/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel
4b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /kun tu bzang po byang phyogs su/ /gshin rje gshed ni shar gyi sgor/ /gzhan gyis mi thub lho phyogs su/ /nub phyogs su ni rta mgrin te/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa byang du'o/ /mi g.yo 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang/ /dbyug sngon dang ni stobs po che/ /shar lho mtshams sogs
4b3(rgyud 'grel): nas brtsams te/ /rim pa ji bzhin bsgom par bya/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po khro bo che/ /de yi 'og tu rnam par bsam/ /gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur rgyal yang/ /de bzhin steng du rnam par bsgom/ /cho ga ji bzhin dkyil 'khor pa/ /de ltar lhag par mos bsam naS//
4b4(rgyud 'grel): slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi lus la de rnams gzhug/ lus kyi 'khor lo rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rim pa ji bzhin yang dag bsam/ /don dam pa yi rdo rje yis/ /de bzhin nyid la gzhug bya bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na/ /dngos
4b5(rgyud 'grel): grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur/ /'di don rdo rje phreng ba las/ /gsal par ji bzhin rnam phye ste/ /gzugs bud? gtogs dang me long dang/ /sa khams mig gi dbang po dang/ /gzugs dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste/ /khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /tsher bI phur
4b6(rgyud 'grel): po mnyam nyid dang/ /chu la mas rna ba'i dbang po dang/ /sgra dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste/ /khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /'du shes so sor rtog pa dang/ /byin za sna yi dbang po dang/ /dri dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste/ /khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /'du byed bya ba grub
4b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /rlung khams lce yi dbang po dang/ /ro dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste/ /khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /steng 'og khro bo shin tu bcas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni snang ba nyid/ /rnam shes phung por zhugs pa ste/ /rnam shes kyang ni 'od gsal ba'o/ /mya ngan 'das?
5a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas kun stong dang/ /chos kyi skur yang bshad pa yin/ /brtan par bya ba'i don du ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA nA? na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ 'di ni don dam dkyil 'khor te/ /snang ba med cing mtshan nyid ced//
5a2(rgyud 'grel): don dam bden pa zhes bya ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /'od gsal par ni rab zhugs nas/ /ldang ba yang ni bstan par bya/ /sngags kyi sku yi sbyong ba yis/ /lha yi gzugs la dmigs par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//
5a3(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sngags pas de yi steng du yang/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam/ /der ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /kha dog dmar po bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma'i steng du sngags chen po/ /yi ge gsum ni de nas bsam/ /sngags dang pad+ma nyi
5a4(rgyud 'grel): ma dag /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs gyur/ /byang chub sems su rnam par brtag/ rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad kyang/ /de nyid du ni rnam bsam zhing/ /brtan par bya ba'i don du ni/ /gsang sngagS 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM
5a5(rgyud 'grel): d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba at+ma konyahaM/ /de ltar sbyor ba dmigs nas su/ /rjes su sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi yig gsum yang/ /zla ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam/ /de nas yig gsum las byung ba/ /kun da zla ba dkar dang mtshungs/ /dang po mgon po
5a6(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas kyang/ /shin tu sbyor ba yang dag brtsam/ /mi skyod pas ni rjes zhugs pas/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'bar ba dang/ /iNdra nI la'i 'od mnyam pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag tu rnam
5a7(rgyud 'grel): par bsam/ /dril bu rin chen ral gri ni/ /g.yon pa'i phyag tu bsam par bya/ /de nas phung po la sogs pa'i/ /dbye ba shes pas snang mdzad sogs/ /gnod mdzes par du sa bon gyis/ /dgong pas yang dag nyid du dgong/ /rnam snang mdzad 'di sa bon ni/ /kha
5b1(rgyud 'grel): dog dkar po yi ge oM/ /gzugs phung ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /sngags shes pas ni spyi bor dgong/ /a ni mgon po 'od dpag med/ /'du shes phung po'i ngo bo nyid/ /mdog dmar kha la bsams nas ni/ /dag gi dbang phyug nyid thob 'gyur/ /mi skyod pa yi yi ge
5b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ /rab tu bzang po'i mthing shing mdog/ rnam shes phung po'i ngo bo nyid sngags pas snying gar rnam par bsgom/ /rin chen mgon po'i yi ge swA/ /tshor ba'i phung po'i ngo bo nyid/ /tshor ba dag gi rgyu can ni/ /kha dog ser po lte bar dgod/ /rkang pa gnyis
5b3(rgyud 'grel): la yi ge hA/ /'du byed phung po'i ngo bo nyid/ /las kyi mgon po de nyid ni/ /sngags pas kha dog ljang gur dgod/ /gti mug dga' sogs sngags kyis ni/ /sa la sogs la rab tu gzhug/ sra dang gsher dang dro ba dang/ /rlung sogs der ni rim pa bzhin/ /thliM?
5b4(rgyud 'grel): mig tu bkod nas ni/ /sa yi snying po rnam par bsgom/ /oM ni rna ba dag la dgong/ /phyag na rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /oM ni snal rab dkod de/ /nam mkha' i snying po rab tu bsgom/ /oM ni lce la bkod nas ni/ /'jig rten dbang po brtag par bya/ /yid la hUM ni bsam nas su/ /
5b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jaM dpal dbyangs ni rab tu bsgoM/ /yi ge oM ni lus kun la/ /bsgoM naS sgrib sel dran par bya/ /yi ge me ni rtsar bzhag ste/ /byams pa nyid du yongs su brtag /tshig kun la ni sa bkod de/ /kun tu bzang po bsam par bya/ /lag pa g.yas par gshin rje gshed/ /g.yon par gzhan
5b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi thub pa/ /rta mgrin kha la bsam par bya/ /rdo rje la ni bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /dpung ba g.yas par mi g.yo mgon/ /g.yon par 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /pus mo g.yas par bsam pa ni/ /dbyug pa sngon po cher 'bar ba/ /pus mo g.yon par stobs po che/ /spyi
5b7(rgyud 'grel): por gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po bsam pa ni/ /rkang pa gnyis la dgod par bya/ /dgod byas de nas sngags pa yis/ /phung po la sogs cho ga bzhin/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs gyur nas/ /sbyor ba chen po yang dag brtsam/ /zla ba'i
6a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor yang dag rdzogs/ /spyi bo'i dbus su rnam par bsam/ /de ni yi ge oM dkar po/ /'od zer lnga ni rab 'phro ba'o/ /de las lha mo dbyung ba ni/ /bdag po dang ni rab sbyor ba/ /spyan ni bum bsam nas ni/ /nam mkha' thams cad rab tu
6a2(rgyud 'grel): dgang/ /de nas sku yi rdo rje ni/ /nam mkha' gang bar legs gnas pa/ /de dbus bdag po bsgom pa ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan chang zhing/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/ /bdag kyang de yi mdun gnas la/ /de nas sngags pas tshig bcad
6a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di/ /gnyis brjod nas ni gsol ba gdab/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pas/ /ded bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje sku ni mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed
6a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje skur ni mdzad du gsol/ /spyan dang lhan cig ldan pa yi/ /rnam par snang mdzad bsams nas su/ /de bcug nas ni byin brlabs te/ /sku yi byin gyis brlab pa brtsam/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis
6a5(rgyud 'grel): sku gang yin/ /phung po lnga yis rab gang ba/ /sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ A ni kha dog dmar ldan pa/ /lce yi pad+mar rnam bsams te/ /gos dkar zhes bya nam mkha' 
6a6(rgyud 'grel): ru/ /spros nas nam mkha' i khams rnams dgang/ /gsung gi rdo rje sngags pa ni/ /nam mkha' i dbus na bzhugs pa la/ /de nas sngags pas tshigs bcad 'di/ /gnyis brjod nas ni gsol ba gdab/ /chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum
6a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje gsung du mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje gsung du mdzad du gsol/ /gos dkar
6b1(rgyud 'grel): mo dang lhan cig nyid/ /rang gi gtso bor yang dag ldan/ /lce la zhugs par rab bsams te/ gsung gis byin gyis brlab pa brtsam/ /rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin/ /nges pa'i tshig ni phun sum tshogs/ /bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra zhing/ /chos 'dzin pa
6b2(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra bar shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma konyahaM/ sngags pas snying gar nyi ma yi/ /gzugs brnyan 'bar ba bsam bya ste/ /der ni mthing shing lta bu yi/ /'od zer lngar ldan hUM dgod do/ /de las lha mo mA ma kI/ tshigs dang bcas pa
6b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyung bar bya/ /de bzhin thugs kyi rdo rje bsgom/ /de la sngon bzhin gsol ba gdab/ /dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs
6b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol/ /mA ma kI tshogs ma lus pa/ /rdo rje thugs dang yang dag ldan/ /snying gar yang ni bcug nas su/ /thugs gyi byin gyis brlabs pa brtsam/ /kun
6b5(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin/ /gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra gyur cig /rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ de ltar rigs gsum dbye ba yis/ /so sor byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /blo dang
6b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas gsang sngags 'dis/ /slar yang thams cad bdag nyid bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /mtshan ma drug dang yang dag ldan/ /dam tshig
6b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /snying ga'i dbus su phra mo yi/ /ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i/ /yi ge hUM ni de ru dgod/ /sems dpa' gsum gyis bdag nyid can/ /de ltar sbyor ba cher bskyed nas/ /
7a1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya/ /gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa ni/ /sme sha can ni bdag nyid che/ /bu mo utpal mthing ga'i mdog/ mig yangs dam brnyed nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag cing legs par
7a2(rgyud 'grel): bslab/ /sgrub pa po la shin tu mos/ /oM ni sbyi bor bsam par bya/ /A:ni dag gi lam la dgod/ /hUM ni snying gar bsam bya zhing/ /lte bar swA dang rkang gnyis hA/ /spyan dang mA ma kI dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni gos dkar mo/ /sgrol ma dang ni sngags pa yiS//
7a3(rgyud 'grel): sa la sogs la rnam par dgod/ /lha mo rdo rje gzugs la sogs/ /de nyid la ni rnam bsams la/ /sa snying la sogs de rnams dang/ /snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom par bya/ /lag g.yas rdo rje ro langs ma/ /g.yon la gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /de yi ngar?
7a4(rgyud 'grel): ni khro gnyer ma/ /gsang bar ral pa gcig ma'o/ /gzhan yang dpung ba g.yas par ni/ /de bzhin gshegs yum rdo rje ma/ /g.yon du sna tshogs rin chen gyi/ /phyag rgya dag ni bsgom par bya/ /pus mo g.yas la gnas par yang/ /sna tshogs
7a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma de bzhin gshegs/ /g.yon pa las ni sna tshogs las/ /spyi bor nam mkha' i rdo rje ma/ /rkang pa gnyis las yi ni/ /sa 'dzin lha mo bzhag par bya/ /de ltar 'dus byas rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje pad+ma yang dag brtsam/ /hUM gi sngags skyes rdo rje na/
7a6(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo lnga ba bsam par bya/ /de tshe de yi rtse dbus su/ /oM ni rnam par bsam par bya/ /de bzhin a las byung ba yi/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ni/ /'od zer lnga yis khyab bsam la/ /de 'od sgrub pa brtsam bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta enu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA bar
7a7(rgyud 'grel): at+ma konyahaM/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal legs 'chang ste/ /hUM gi glu yis kyang ni bskyod bya zhing/ /rang gi byang chub sems nyid phyung ba'i tshe/ /des ni phaT kyis gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /phyung nas slar yang sngags pas ni/ /phyogs bcur bzhugS
7b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /byang chub sems kyis mchod nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ rang sngags yi ge las dbyung ba/ /rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs pa dag /pad+ma'i dbus su
7b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed nas ni/ /slar yang zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur/ /badzra d+h+ri ka sngags kyiS dbyung ba/ /mi bskyod rdo rjer bsam pa yang/ /mgon? bor pa? pa thor tshugs can/ /mi bskyod pas ni dbu brgyan byas/ /mthing zhing bzang po'i mdog ltar snang/ /sdo nag dkar dang dmar ba'i
7b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag du bsam bya zhing/ /dril bu rin chen ral gri ni/ /de yi g.yon la bsam par bya/ /'di ni thugs ka las byung nas/ /phyogs bcu
7b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams su gzigs nas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa kun mdzad de/ sems can ma lus kun sbyangs nas/ /zhe sdang rdo rje gnas la 'jog/ slar byon rdo rje mgon po ni/ /spyan snga ru ni 'dug par gyur/ /sngags pas de yi snying ga ru/ /rjes zhugs
7b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rnam sgom pas/ /snga ma'i gzugs ni yongs gyur nas/ /zhe sdang rdo rje gnas su zhugs/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs/ /dpa' bo rang gi phyag rgyas 'khyud/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /drag po zhi
7b6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dod chags cho/ /zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par mdzes/ /zhe sdang rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spro bar mdzad/ /dzi na dzi ka sngags kyis dbyung ba/ /gtso po rnam par snang mdzad dbyung/ ma bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /ston ka'i zla
7b7(rgyud 'grel): zer ltar snang zhing/ /thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /dgar dang gnag dang dmar pa'i zhal/ /phyag drug zhi ba'i gzugs can te/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dag /g.yas pa la ni rnam par bsam/ /dril bu rin chen ral gri ni/ /'di yi g.yon du rnam
8a1(rgyud 'grel): par sgom/ /de bzhin thugs ka las byung ste/ /gti mug sbyod nas sems can rnams/ /yang dag sbyangs te slar byon nas/ /shar phyogs kyi ni zla bar bzhugs/ /radna d+h+rika sngags kyis dbyung ba/ /rin chen tog ni sngags pas dbyung/ /zhi
8a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thor tshugs cod pan 'chang/ /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /mgon po ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ /ser dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal/ /phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom/ /yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang/ /'khor lo de yi g.yas su bsgom/ /dril bu pad+ma ser
8a3(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ /ral gri g.yon du bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin thugs ka nas phyung ste/ /nga rgyal gnas la gnas pa rnams/ /yang dag sbyangs nas lho yi char/ /rin chen dbus su bzhugs par gsungs/ /a ro lik sngags kyis dbyung ba/ /mdza' yas rdo rje can ?
8a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyung ste/ /zhi ba pad+ma rA ga'i 'o/ /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /mgon po ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ /dmar dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal/ /sgeg pa'i nyams dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gi dril bu dang/ /pad+ma sdong
8a5(rgyud 'grel): bu 'dzin par mdzad/ /pad+ma thugs ka'i phyogs gnas pa/ /g.yas pa yis ni 'byed par mdzad/ /rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas nyid la/ /rin chen ral gri g.yon gnyis la/ /sngon bzhin 'dod chags can sbyangs nas/ /rgyab kyi pad+ma la bzhugs 'gyur/ /pradz+nyA
8a6(rgyud 'grel): d+h+rika sngags kyis dbyung/ /sngags pas don yod rdo rje can/ /mgon po sku mdog ljang khur dbyung/ /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal/ /phyag drug 'od zer rnam par 'phro/ /ral
8a7(rgyud 'grel): gri sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ /'khor lo g.yas su bsgoms par bya/ /phyag g.yon na ni dril bu dang/ /de bzhin par ljang nor bu'o/ /log pa'i ngang can sems can rnams/ /rnam par sbyangs nas slar byon te/ /de bzhin byang gi phyogs su ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dag la
8b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/ /yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste/ /rigs ni lnga po 'di dag nyid/ /'dod dang thar par rab bsgrub pa'o/ /mo ha ra ti sngags kyis dbyung/ /lha mo can ni dbyung bar bya/ /dkar zhing zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan/ /rnam snang mdzad kyis spyi
8b2(rgyud 'grel): bor mtshan/ /dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom/ /'khor lo rdo rje de bzhin du/ /utpal dkar po g.yas su bsam/ /dril bu de bzhin rin chen dang/ /ral gri g.yon du bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste/ /phyogs bcu
8b3(rgyud 'grel): dag tu gzigs nas ni/ /gdon dang nad gdungs 'jigs pa rnams/ /thugs rje chen pos zhi mdzad de/ /slar byon nas ni zla dkyil du/ /shar gyi mtshams su bzhugs par bya/ /dwe Sha ra ta'i sngags kyis dbyung/ /lha mo mA ma kI dbyung ste/ /utpal sngon po'i 'dab
8b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar sngo/ /bzhin bzang shin tu yid du 'ong/ /gnag dang dkar dang dmar pa ste/ /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /'khor lo rdo rje de bzhin du/ /utpal sdod mar g.yas pa la/ /dril bu rin chen ral gri ni/ /g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /bgegs chen 'jigs
8b5(rgyud 'grel): pas gzir ba rnams/ /thugs rje chen pos bsrung bar mdzad/ /byung nas slar ni byon nas su/ /lho nub tu ni bzhugs par gyur/ /rA ga ra ta'i sngags kyis dbyung/ /gos dkar mo ni dbyung bya ste/ /zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar/ /pad+ma rA ga'i 'od dang ldan/ /'od dpag
8b6(rgyud 'grel): med bcas ral ba'i tshogs/ /phyag drug pa ni rnam bsgoms te/ /g.yon pa dril bur bcas pa yis/ /utpal sdong bu 'dzin mdzad la/ /thugs kar gnas pa'i utpa la/ /dmar po g.yas kyis 'byed par mdzad/ /rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas dag la/ /nor bu rin
8b7(rgyud 'grel): chen ral gri g.yon/ /bsnams par mdzad pa phyung nas ni/ /gdon gyis nyen ba zhi mdzad de/ /slar byon pad+ma'i dbus nyid du/ /nub byang mtshams su bzhugs par 'gyur/ /badzra ra ti'i sngags kyis dbyung/ /yid 'ong sgrol ma dbyung bya ste/ /ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal
9a1(rgyud 'grel): dur ba'i lo ma'i mdangs dang ldan/ /don yod pas ni gtsug tor byas/ /phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang/ /utpal dkar po g.yas pa na/ /dril bu rin chen ral gri ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis g.yon du bsam/ /sems
9a2(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad dbang mdzad de/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan la yang/ /byung nas slar ni byon nas su/ /byang shar mtshams su bzhugs par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor bas ni rim gnyis par/ /gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa byung/ /me yi mtshams su dgod bya ba/ /rdo rje gzugs ni
9a3(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong ba/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dkar ba ste/ /dbu rgyan rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ /gnyis kyis me long 'dzin mdzad de/ /lhag ma gti mug dga' dang mtshungs/ /bden bral phyogs dgod lha mo ni/ /rdo rje dgra sta phyag drug pa/ /zhal gsum sku mdog ser mo ste/ /
9a4(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan yin/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni pi baM? bsnams/ /lhag ma mA ma kI dang mtshungs/ /rlung gi phyogs dgod lha mo ni/ /rdo rje dri ste phyag drug pa/ /zhal gsum sku mdog dmar mo ste/ /snang mdza' yas kyi thor tshugs can/ /phyag gnyis kyis
9a5(rgyud 'grel): ni dung bsnams te/ /lhag ma gos dkar can dang mtshungs/ /dbang ldan phyogs dgod lha mo ni/ /rdo rje ro ste phyag drug pa/ /zhal gsum sku mdog ljang gu ste/ /dbu rgyan la ni rnga sgra bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis la ni ro yi snod/ /lhag ma sgrol ma lta bu yin/ /rdo
9a6(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' legs 'khyud de/ /'khor lo dbus na rang bzhugs par/ /rdo rje reg bya bsam bya ste/ /zhal sogs bdag po lta bu'o/ /rim pa gsum pa shar gyi ni/ /snam bur brtul zhugs can gyis dbyung/ /meM thil sa bon las byung ba/ /byams pa sa yi snying po
9a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /oM gyi sa bon las byung ba/ /phyag na rdo rje mkha' snying po/ /lho yi phyogs kyi snam bu la/ /go rim bzhin du dgod par bya/ /oM dang hUM las yang dag byung/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /'di dag nub tu dbyung bar bya/ /byang gi phyogs su dbyung ba ni/
9b1(rgyud 'grel): oM dang saM gi? sa bon skyes/ /sgrib sel kun tu bzang por bcas/ /'di dag dbu rgyan rang gi mgom /sku mdog sogs pa de dang mtshungs/ /phyag dang mtshon cha dag kyang ni/ /rang rang gi ni bdag por mtshungs/ /byams pa 'ba' zhig g.yas pha na/ /klu shing me tog bsnams thar ?
9b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /'di dag skye mched rnam sbyong zhing/ /lha yi mig sogs stsol ba po/ /sems can skye mched sbyangs nas su/ /slar byon nas ni stan la bzhugs/ /ma nAn+ta krita sngags kyis ni/ /sngags pas gshin rje gshed du byung ba/ /rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan can/ /zhal ni
9b3(rgyud 'grel): gnag dang dkar dang dmar/ /'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs/ /dbyug pa rdo rje 'khor lo rnams/ /phyag g.yas na ni rnam par mdzad/ /thugs kar sdig mdzub zhags pa dang/ /dril bu dgra sta g.yon pa na/ /dbang po la sogs tshogs bcas dang/ /mi bzad bgegs
9b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang skrag par mdzad/ /pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// shar gyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /pradz+nyAn+ta krita sngags kyi ni/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan can/ /sku mdog dkar zhing nor bus brgyan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub sngags kyis dbyung/ /gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum
9b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /mche ba gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur/ /'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs/ /rdo rje dbyug pa ral gri ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /snying gar sdig mdzub zhags pa dang/ /dril bu dgra sta g.yon
9b6(rgyud 'grel): pa na/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas pa yi/ /mi bzad bgegs ni skrag par mdzad/ /pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/ /lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /pad+man+ta krita sngags kyis ni brtul zhugs can gyi rta mgrin du byung/ /spyan gsum pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ zhal ni dmar dang gnag
9b7(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar/ /zhal gdangs gsus khyim che ba dang/ /'od dpag med pa'i cod pan can/ /dpa' bo g.yon brkyang pa yis gnas/ /'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam par 'khrugs/ /pad+ma ral gri gtun shing ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /bsnyems dang bcas
10a1(rgyud 'grel): pas dril bu dang/ /dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na bsnams/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te/ /phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni/ /klu rnams skrag par mdzad nas su/ /nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par 'gyur/ /big+h+nAn+ta krita sngags kyis ni/ /rnga
10a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra'i cod pan yang dag ldan/ /utpal sngon po'i 'dab ltar sngo/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil la byung bar bya/ /zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar/ /zhal gdangs pa ni rnam par 'gyur/ /gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa/ /'bar ba'i 'od kyi rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs
10a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'khor lo dang/ /gtun shing rnams ni g.yas pa na/ /sdigs mdzub zhags par bces pa dang/ /dril bu dgra sta g.yon na bsnams/ /g.yon rkyang pa yis gnas pa yis/ /pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/ /byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /rang gi sngaD
10a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskyed pa yis/ /mi g.yo ba yang dbyung bar bya/ /spyan gsum in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ dbu rgyan rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar/ /mi zad ha ha zhes bzhad sgra/ /gsus khyim che zhing
10a5(rgyud 'grel): stobs po che/ /ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo rnams/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /sdigs mdzub dang ni dgra sta dang/ /zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag na bsnams/ /rims sogs 'jigs pa'i gdon 'joms te/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas
10a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas nas/ /shar lho mtshams su bzhugs par gyur/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis 'dod rgyal dbyung/ /drag po in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan can/ /zhal ni gnag dang
10a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang dkar/ /spyan gsum mche ba 'jigs su rung/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis/ /phyag rgya dag ni 'ching bar mdzad/ /rdo rje ral gri g.yas dag na/ /g.yon na zhags pa lcags kyu'o/ /bden bral bgegs ni 'joms pa'o/ /g.yon
10b1(rgyud 'grel): brkyang gnas pas nyi mar bzhugs/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis dbyug sngon bskyed/ /spyan gsum sprin sngon lta bu ste/ /'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /zhal ni sngo dang dkar dang dmar/ /gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs
10b2(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad/ /dbyug pa ral gri 'khor lo ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /snying gar sdig mdzub zhags pa dang/ /dgra sta rnams ni g.yon na bsnams/ /yams kyi 'jigs pa bsal nas ni/ /gtum po g.yon rgyang gnas pa yis/ /pad+ma nyi
10b3(rgyud 'grel): ma la gnas te/ /nub byang mtshams su bzhugs par 'gyur/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis/ /rnga sgra yi ni dbu rgyan can/ /stobs po che ni sngags pas dbyung/ /utpal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar/ /spyan gsuM
10b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i dgra dang ldan/ /yan lag thams cad sprul gyis brgyan/ /gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs par byed/ /dbyug pa ral gri 'khor lo ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /snying gar sdigs mdzub ral gri dang/ /zhags pa dgra sta g.yon
10b5(rgyud 'grel): na bsnams/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro la sogs 'jigs pa 'joms/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te/ /byang shar mtshams su bzhugs par gyur/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi/ /gtsug tor 'khor lo bsgyur ba dbyung// mkha' 
10b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar sngo bsangs 'jigs pa po/ /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar/ /gtso bo spyan gsum gsus pa 'phyang/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi phyag gnyis kyis/ /spyi bor gtsug tor 'dzin par mdzad/ /rdo rje pad+ma g.yas dag na/ /sdig
10b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzub ral gri g.yon na bsnams/ /'tshe ba thams cad rnam 'jig cing/ /gtum po g.yon brkyang gnas pa yi shes/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su de bzhugs pa'o/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi/ /brtul zhugs can gyis gnod mdzes dbyung/ /spyan gsuM
11a1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lta bu'i mdog/ zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar/ /gsus khyim che? zhing 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na 'dzin par mdzad/ /snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang/ /
11a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ral gri g.yon na bsnams/ /rgyu ba dang ni gnas pa'i dug /ka la ku ta sogs kun dang/ /bgegs kyi bdag po kun bcom ste/ /thams cad zhi bar mdzad nas ni/ /ma lus ka ni rdzogs byas la/ /g.yon brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te/ /sa yi
11a3(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu de bzhugs so/ /lha ni sum cu gnyis rang bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bskyed nas ni/ /'khor lo'i dbus su gnas gyur na/ /de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam/ /sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam/ /'gra dang mi 'gro yungs kar la/ /gsang ba'i sngags kyis
11a4(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa yi/ /ye shes mchog gi gnas bsgom mo/ /rin chen kha dog sna lnga la/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam/ /sna yi rtse mor nan tan du/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/ /rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro/ /brtan par ma gyur de mi spro/ /sangs
11a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od mnyam pa/ /rab mchog sprin ni spro bar bya/ /slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te/ /ma slangs pa la chags mi bya/ /'dod pa kun las longs spyod cing/ /sngags kyis yan lag ma nyams 'das/ /brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni/ /rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar
11a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /don dam pa yi bzlas par bshad/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor bzlas pa yang/ /ci 'dod par ni rnam gnyis bya/ /slar yang sngags pas bdag nyid ni/ /de bzhin nyid la gzhug par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gnas pa 'di/ /lha
11a7(rgyud 'grel): mos bdag po me mthong bas/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di bzhi yis/ /bde ba chen po bskul par byed/ /sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab du gsol/ /mgon po gal te de ring
11b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni gson bar mchis bzhed na/ /sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la bgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan/ /sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog bsgrub rab tu phan par gzigs/ /mgon po gal te de ring
11b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /'dod chags dam tshig chags pad bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba/ /'jig rten dag gi dgongs pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson/ /mgon po gal te de ring?
11b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /spyod pa dri med kun tu bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs te dam tshig mchog gi phan don che/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa/ /mgon po gal te de rang bdag
11b4(rgyud 'grel): ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /de ltar yang dag yon tan ni/ brjod pas mgon po de bskul nas/ /mi bskyod la sogs ngo bo yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bstod par mdzad/ /mi bskyod pa ni
11b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag /rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen rgyal
11b6(rgyud 'grel): po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /dngos nyid dag pa gos med pa/ /gsang ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mi mchi 'dod chags che/ /mi rtogs nam mkha' i rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo
11b7(rgyud 'grel): rje dga' ba gdon mi za?/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyis bstod gsol/ /mchog tu gsang ba ji bzhin don spyad nas/ /rang gi 'khor lo la
12a1(rgyud 'grel): ni 'khor lo gzhug /mgon po bde ba chen po gcig po bzhugs/ /nga ltar rnal 'byor bzhi byed rnal 'byor pa/ /hUM gi snying pos 'jig rten rab tu bsgom/ /de byung 'gro kun rdo rje sems dpar bsam/ /langs nas 'gro la bltas
12a2(rgyud 'grel): ta? ji bzhin spyad par bya/ /sngags pas ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa'i tshe/ /gang tshe lus ni bskams gyur na/ /lus ngag yid ni tshim byed pa'i/ /sbyor ba 'di ni bsgom par bya/ /mtho gang tsam gyis spags pa ru/ /spyi bor dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /
12a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi lnga ni nges 'bebs pa'i/ /oM ni de ru bsam par bya/ /rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur/ /lus ngag yid ni bde ba dag/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de ltar slob pa'i sngags pa yis/ /sbyangs dang de bzhin rtogs
12a4(rgyud 'grel): sbar bya/ /lkog ma snying ga legs sbyangs shing/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams tshim par bya/ /hUM gis legs par sbyangs byas la/ /yi ge a yis rtogs byas te/ /oM gyis mnan nas sbar bar bya/ /'di ni kha zas sbyang bya'o/ /dang po mgrin pa'i
12a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bsam pa/ /der ni h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba yi/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom/ /lte ba'i nang du yi ge hUM/ /hUM las skyes pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsam /rtse mo dbu ma'i steng du ni/ /oM bsam lkog ma sbyang ba'o/ /sprin gyi sgra ni snying gar
12a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /rtse gsum mi ni de la spro/ /der ni bza' bsreg pa dag/ 'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg yin/ /rlung gis me ni sbar byed pa/ /der ni chu gang 'ched par byed/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor gnas su ni/ /gang du me ni rgyu ba dang/ /bza' ba dang ni btung ba
12a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /gang ci yang rung ba chu dkyil 'khor/ /bza' ba kha yi pad+ma las/ /snying ga'i pad+mar yang dag bzhag/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor byin 'og tu/ /kha sbyar ba yi sbyor ba yi/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma las byung ba/ /thal ba'i mthar ni rnam par brtaD?//
12b1(rgyud 'grel): rims nad med cing nad kyang med/ /dug la sogs pas mi mchi la/ /de ni dus min 'chi mi 'gyur/ /'tshe ba thams cad rnam 'joms pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng ba dpal mchog srub shing gis/ /gsang 'dus sbas chu'i rgya mtsho bsrub pa las/ /sgrub pa'i yan
12b2(rgyud 'grel): lag bdud rtsi gang thob des/ /'di rten ma lus 'chi med myur thob shog /sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsarya sh+rAd+d+ha ka ra wa rma dang/ /zhus chen gyi? lo tsA ba bande rin chen
12b3(rgyud 'grel): bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa'i thabs mdo dang bsres pa slob dpon klu sgrubs kyis mdzad pa'o// */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI guhya sa mA dza ma hA yo ga tan+t+ra utpa te kra ma sA d+ha
12b4(rgyud 'grel): naM sya sU tre me ba la ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa'i thabs mdo dang bsres pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la rdo rje 'chang
12b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po la sogs pa'i sgrub pa la rab tu 'jug pa rnams kyi bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin nges par bya ba'i phyir mdo dang bsres pa zhes bya ba le'u bcu bdun pa las btus te bsdu bar bya'o/ /de la sgrub pa pos ji skad du le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ dgon pa chen po'i sa
12b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs ni/ /me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan/ /ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa 'grub ces bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig gi tshul gyis rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su sems dpa' i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la snying
12b7(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po'i sems bskyed de le'u gsum pa las/ nam mkha' i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni/ /'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan/ 'od zer sna lngas kun tu khyab/ /kun nas yongs su zlum po ste 
13a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis brgyan/ /mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa/ /mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su/ /gzugs ni dbus su sgom par bya zhes mdor bsdus te gsungs pa de la dang po kho nar byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i gzugs can? zhes bya ba skyed par bya ba ste/ le'u bco lnga? laS/
13a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam bar snang mdzad 'ong 'dra zhing/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum 'dzin 'gyur zhes gsungs pa 'dis rdo rje 'chang chen po sku mdog dkar por bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin mos par bya'o/ /de nas le'u dang po las/ ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
13a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i tshul gyis mi bskyod pa bskyed pas rjes su zhugs pas zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur nas le'u bcu gsum pa las/ khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes/ /gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag/ sgrub pa mchog gi chos can la/ /gsod pa'i don gyis 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs pas yi ge hUM ring po las khro rgyal
13a4(rgyud 'grel): po bcu phyung la/ /le'u bcu bzhi pa las/ oM suM b+ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes la bka' bsgo bas phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs bkug nas le'u bcu gsum pa las/ yi dam bcas brdzogs nas kyang/ /sngags kyi gnas ni bsrung bar bya/ /bsam gtan
13a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba 'di la ni/ /gnas nas sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal chen po/ /rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom/ /me stag 'bar ba 'dra ba yis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gdab par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis khro bo bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi phur bu rnams kyis oM g+ha g+ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis
13a6(rgyud 'grel): gnod mdzes la bka' bsgo ste phur bu gdab bo/ /de nas 'dod ba'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis rdo rje rab bsam pa dang/ hUM mdzad kyis rdo rje'i dra ba yi ge hUM gis sa'i cha rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsam zhing yi ge gsum gyis go cha la sogs pa bya'o/ /de ltar phyogs dang mtshams bcing ba dang rab la sogs pa'i cho ga
13a7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba'i khor lo bsgoms la le'u gnyis pa las/ dngos po med pa sgom pa'i dngos/ bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med pa/ /bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o zhes tshigs su bcad pa'i don gyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du sgom mo/ /de nas le'u bcu gcig pa las/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes//
13b1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su sgom zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ gsungs pas/ rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bskyed nas/ bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya zhes bya ba la sogs pas sa'i cha bskyed la/ le'u bcu gcig pa las yi ge b+h+ruM gyi gnas bsgom ste zhes bya bas gzhal yas khang bsams la/ der le'u dang po las/ gsal
13b2(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gnas zhes gsungs pa 'dis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba la sogs pa'i gdan gyis brgyan la le'u brgyad pa las dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam la/ /gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yis/ /mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa/ /gsal zhing rang
13b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dri ma med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs paS/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bzhugs nas ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom mo/ /gnas ni bskyed ba sngon 'gro bas/ /rdo rje gsum bskyed bsgom par bya zhes gsungs pas lhag par mos pa can gyi sems kyis bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang nyid du gyur nas/
13b4(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi gdan la seMs pa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas par bsams nas le'u dang po las/ gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun tu khyab/ /sangs rgyas tshogs kyis kun tu rgyas/ /'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug ces gsungs pa 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod pa'i ting 'dzin gyis dbang du byas te
13b5(rgyud 'grel): lhag par mos pa la dmigs pa bstan pa yin no/ /da ni rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim pa tsam par bya ste de la le'u bdun pa las dam tshig khu phyur cho ga bzhin/ 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad naS/ /dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa 'dis lhag par mos pa'i ting 'dzin
13b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phung po la sogs par bsdus te/ /gzugs phung rtogs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs la/ le'u gsum pa las/ oM shUn+ya tA zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis
13b7(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa'o/ /le'u brgyad pa las/ nam mkha' dbyings kyis dbus gnas par/ ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya zhes gsungs pa 'dis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i gzugs yongs su gyur nas/ de nas ldang bar gyur pa ni ye shes rgya mtsho las nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang de'i steng du pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma
14a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa pad+ma'i steng du yi ge gsum bkod de /de thams cad bsdus te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar yongs su gyur par ltas la/ de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi phro ba sems can gyi khams rnams ye shes kyi bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
14a2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid du rjes su bcug la le'u gsum pa las/ oM d+harmA d+hA tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis brtan par bya ba 'di ni rnal 'byor te/ /de bas na ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa/ /rnal 'byor yin par shes par bya zhes gsungs pa yin no//
14a3(rgyud 'grel): de? la le'u bcu gcig pa las/ /rdo rje mchog gsum yi ge sngags/ /phyag rgya chen por rnam bsgom pa/ /byang chub thams cad thob bya'i phyir/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gi bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge
14a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum bkod la/ /rdo rje nga rgyal de las byung ba/ rdo rje 'chang chen por bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin bsgom pa ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro/ /de nas le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i rig pa'i skyes bu gzugs can ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi don bya bar
14a5(rgyud 'grel): mi nus bas na le'u brgyad pa las/ nu ma'i bar nas klad pa'i rgyas par du/ /cho ga shes pas rkang mthil bar du dgod/ /lte bsked? pa gsang ba rgyal ba'i sras/ /rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags
14a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis brlabs pas phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye shes kyi rang bzhin lus la rjes su zhugs par bya'o/ /de bsan le'u bcu bdun pa las/ phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na/ /sangs rgyas lngar
14a7(rgyud 'grel): ni rab tu bsgrags/ /rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor mchog ces gsungs pa yin no/ /da ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la rjes su zhugs pas zhal gsum lta bus gdul bya rnams kyis don
14b1(rgyud 'grel): du rdo rje 'chang gi bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /don 'di nyid bstan pa ni le'u dang po las/ rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu
14b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsum pa lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs bar gyur to zhes gsungs pa ni shin tu rnal 'byor ro/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes
14b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rjes su zhugs pas sku la sogs pa'i rim pa 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de la rim pa ni 'di yin te le'u bcu pa las/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /hUM zhes bya ba rab tu bsgom/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor
14b4(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas par/ /yi ge oM ni rnam par bsam/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yi ge a zhes rnam par bsam/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis mgo bo dang lkog ma dang snying ga'i phyogs su yi ge gsum rnam par bkod la de las byung
14b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i spyan la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis sku rdo rje la sogs pa bkug la le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab la rjes su zhugs nas le'u bdun pa
14b6(rgyud 'grel): las/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis rigs gsum gyi bdag nyid can du nga rgyal bskyed la le'u drug pa las/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags
14b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis brlab bo/ /le'u dang po las// rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ni dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de nas le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ rnam pa mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i//
15a1(rgyud 'grel): snying gar ye shes dam tshig dang/ dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur ba/ /'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te/ dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog gi rab?
15a2(rgyud 'grel): tu bya zhes gsungs pa 'dis/ /dam tshig sems dpa' i snying gar ye shes sems dpa' i sa bon gyis/ dgug pa dang/ dbu rgyan la rang gi bdag po bsgom mo/ /de nas le'u bcu gcig pa las/ /snying gar yi ge hUM bsams nas semS
15a3(rgyud 'grel): ni thig ler gyur par bzhag / ces gsungs pa 'dis ye shes sems dpa' i snying gar yang snying po yi ge hUM ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom mo/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi go 'phang ni 'dod chags las skye bar 'gyur
15a4(rgyud 'grel): bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ le'u dang po las/ 'dod chags chen po'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad pa de bzhin du bskyed bzhin pa la gnas pas dang po'i sbyor ba bya ste/ 'dod chags la spyod
15a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'dod pas thar pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ le'u bcu bdun pa las/ 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes gsungs pa'i rim pa 'dis le'u
15a6(rgyud 'grel): bco lnga pa las gsungs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i gdol pa'i bu mo legs par bslabs pa 'am/ yang na rang gi snying ga nas phyung ste mdun du bzhag la le'u brgyad pa las/ nu ma'i bar nas klad pa'i rgyas kyi bar zhes bya ba la sogs
15a7(rgyud 'grel): pa gsungs pa'i rigs lnga dang bsre ba byas la rdo rje dang pad+ma mngon par 'dus byas pas dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par 'jug pa bya ste/ le'u bdun pa las ji skad du / bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba / lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la/
15b1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis/ /dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /
15b2(rgyud 'grel): oM zhes pa dang A(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas/ /hUM dang phaT du rnam par brtag/ 'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yi/ /pad+ma rdo rje bsgom par bya zhes gsungs pa 'dis/ tha mal pa'i nga rgyal spangs la/ chags shing chags pa'i lta bas lta/ /'di ni dam tshig dkyil
15b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ro zhes bya ba 'dis thabs kyi rdo rje mnyes par bya zhing/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas le'u drug pa las gsungs pa'i rjes su chags pa'i sngags brjod la 'khyud pa dang 'o bya ba dang/ gzhi ba pa la sogs pa byas la yi ge hUM gi glu/
15b4(rgyud 'grel): len cing las la gnas par bsgom mo/ /'byin pa'i skabs su phaT ces brjod la/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi rdul phra rab de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i 'byung gnas su bsgom la sngar bshad pa'i gzhal yas khang na gnas par bya'o/ /
15b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas don yod pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas le'u drug pa las gsungs pa'i mchod pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te gzhung 'di dag gis ni dkyil 'khor gsum sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can te/ bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang po'i
15b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i ye shes spron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i tshul gyis mi bskyod pa phyung la des zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems
15b7(rgyud 'grel): can rnams yang dag par sbyangs la de bkug nas rang gi lus la bcug na zhe sdang rdo rjer 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams phyung nas de rnams kyis gti mug la sogs pa la rjes su dga' ba'i
16a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams yang dag par sbyangs nas bsdus te/ ye shes kyi 'khor lo rjes su bcug la slar bkug ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod nas phyag brgya bzhis rgyas btab pa 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ces bya
16a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o/ /de nas le'u gsum pa las/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam/ /sna yi rtse mor nan tan du/ /rnal 'byor rigs pas rtag tu bsgom zhes bya ba la sogs pa phra me'i sbyor ba'o//
16a3(rgyud 'grel): le'u bdun pa las/ slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te/ ma slangs pa la chags mi bya/ /'dod pa kun las longs spyod cing/ /sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas/ zhes gsungs pa la sogs pas rdo rje bzlas pa dran par bya ste/ le'u bcu gsuM
16a4(rgyud 'grel): pa las rjod nas rdo rje'i spro ba ni/ rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya zhes bya bdag gi bzlas brjod byas la nye bar bsdu bar bya ste le'u bcu bdun pa las/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mo'i b+ha
16a5(rgyud 'grel): ga la bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la dga' bas bstod pas zhes bya ba 'di thams cad bya ste/ bdag po rang nyid don dam pa'i bden pa la
16a6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa la de nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis rab tu bskul ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis/ mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rnams kyi mngon par bstod pas yang dag par bsad par bya ste/ cho ga
16a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin legs par mchod nas rang gi sku la legs par gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas le'u bcu pa las/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus gnas yi ge hUM/ /rang gi gzugs
16b1(rgyud 'grel): su rab tu brtag /rdo rje 'od zer rab tu 'bar/ /rnam par 'phro bar bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung thugs/ /snying la de yis rnam bsgom la/ /de ma thag tu de 'gyur ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis
16b2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge hUM gis nam mkha' i khams yongs su gang ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin du rnam par bsam pa nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /de ltar las dang po pa rnams rab tu 'jug pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa dang/ dbang bskur ba thob pas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal
16b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bral bas/ thun bzhir lha'i rnal 'byor goms pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ las kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams kyang bya'o/ /rim pa 'di nyid kyis le'u bcu bdun pa las/ lus kyi rdo rje kha zas dang/ phyi rol rdo rje
16b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa dang/ rdo rje chos la rtag par ni/ /sngags ston cho ga spyad par bya zhes gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis sgrub pa'i thabs las bshad pa'i rim pas kha zas sbyang ba dang/ lkog ma sbyang ba dang / snying ga sbyang ba dag byas nas bdud rtsi lnga
16b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i zas kyi bya ba dag kyang bya'o/ /de nas le'u bcu pa las sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs/ /dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po thams cad brtag par bya zhes gsungs pa 'dis rdo rje dang? pad+ma yang
16b6(rgyud 'grel): dag par sbyar bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i yi ge gsum gyi sngags dang phreng ba'i sngags dang/ gsang sngags dang/ sman dang nang gi sbyin sreg gis kyang las thams cad rab tu bsgrub par bya ste/ 'di ni las kyi
16b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o/ /de ltar mdo dang bsres pa rgyas par bstan nas/ da ni mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya ste/ de la thog mar gnas nges pa dang/ snying rje chen po la dmigs pa dang/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / stong pa ny+di la dmig spa dang/ sa'i cha bskyed pa dang/ gzhal? yas khang dang/ dkyil 'khor dgod pa dang/ don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang/ ldang ba dang/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs
17a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ mthar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed pa dang/ sngags kyiS byin gyis brlabs pas / phung po la sogs pa dgang ba dang/ sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ ldan pa'i 'dus byas pa dang/ rdo
17a3(rgyud 'grel): rje dang pad+ma 'dus byas pa dang/ rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dkyil 'khor phyung ba dang/ phra mo'i sbyor ba dang/ rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang/ ngag gi bzlas pa dang/ don dam pa la zhugs pa dang/ rab tu bskul bas bslang pa
17a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bstod pa byed pa dang/ nye bar bsdu ba dang/ las kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams su shes par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i skyed rim gyis sgrub pa'i thabs mdo dang bsres pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi
17a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal nas/ mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA sh+rI b+h+ra? drA dang lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i
17a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o/ / */ /rgya gar skad du / sh+rI gu hya sa mA dza maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog
17a7(rgyud 'grel): ma dbus mdza' las grol ba'i/ /khyab bdag stong pa bzhi'i rang bzhin/ /mgon po rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /btud nas dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ji srid phreng ba chu la sogs/ /de srid bla ma'i man ngag mdza' / /
17b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba ni cho ga bzhin/ /bla ma'i rgyud rim las 'ongs pa/ /rnal 'byor rnam gnyis mthar thug pa'i/ /bla ma'i lung ni nas? thob pa/ /bshad rgyud bzhi'i dgongs pa shes/ /bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa yi/ /rim pa gnyis kyi don shes dang//
17b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang thun mong sgrub la gnas/ /dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ste/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba spangs dang ldan/ /bzod ldan drang la g.yo rgyu med/ /brtan bzhin dul ba blo gros ldan/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing/ /dkyil 'khor
17b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dri dang rab gnas mkhas/ /nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro min/ /pha rol phyin bcu'i tshul la gnas/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos la mos/ /bden gnyis la ni rnam par mkhas/ /bla med theg pa gtsor byed pa/ /'gro ba'i don spyod snying rje can/ /rin chen skyes
17b4(rgyud 'grel): bur gang gyur pas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas su/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /gang zhig yid 'ong gnas su ni/ /dri bzang tsandan sogs kyis byug /dri zhim me tog mchog dkram nas/ /shar phyogs su ni kha bltas la/ /sems dpa' i skyil mo
17b5(rgyud 'grel): krung gnas te/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba yi/ /'gor la phan dang bskyab pa'i phyir/ /snying rje chen pos dmis par bya/ /dka' yi 'khor lo sngon 'gro ba'i/ /bsnyen dang nyer sgrub sgrub pa dang/ /sgrub chen la ni mkhas pa yis/ /sbyor ba gsum gyi mthar
17b6(rgyud 'grel): thug pas/ /rdo rje bzlas dang rjes mthun par/ /ngag gi bzlas pa'i tshul nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo'i 'bum du bzlas/ /de las gzhan pa'i khri ru bzlas/ /mtshan mo nges par thob pa'am/ /yang na bsnyen pa'i sbyor goms pas/ /dkyil 'khor
17b7(rgyud 'grel): yongs su dri bar bya/ /de la dkyil 'khor cho ga ni/ /yan lag rnam phye nyi shu ste/ /sa gzhi sbyang dang byin brlab dang/ /yongs su bzung dang bsrung ba dang/ /sa yi lha dang dkyil 'khor dang/ /bum pa rnams dang slob ma dag /sta gon du ni gnas pa dang/ /thig?
18a1(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa yi cho ga dang/ /de bzhin rdul tshon dgye ba dang/ /dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /de la mched pa'i bye brag dang/ /slob dpon bdag nyid 'jug pa dang/ /de bzhin slob ma gzhug pa dang/ /bum pa'i dbang dang gsang ba
18a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /shes rab ye shes dbang dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni bzhi pa dang/ /rab gnas dang ni sbyin sreg ste/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yan lag mchog /'di dag cho ga nyi shu'o/ /de la re? zhig dang por dkyil 'khor bri bar mngon par 'dod pa'i sa'i cha'i dbus su maN+Dal gru
18a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi khru gang pa bya ste/ me tog sil ma bkram la lha'i gnas dang gdan ji lta ba bzhin bsam ste/ bla ma dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed la/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang/ mnyes par
18a4(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bskur ba'i mthar thug par bya zhing/ de la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod de/ bstod pa tshul bzhin byas la/ dgongs shig dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang/ /slob ma rnams la
18a5(rgyud 'grel): sman slad du/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ dkyil 'khor? 'bri bar 'tshal/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol lan gsum brjod de gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs skyong rnams rang rang gi
18a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas su ji lta ba bzhin bskyed la dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhis dgugs pa la sogs pa tshul bzhin du byas te/ mchod yon dang/ zhal bsil dang/ zhabs bsil dang/ spos dang/ me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lngas mchod de/ kha zas sbyang
18a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs te/ oM in+d+ra ye swAhA/ oM ya mA ye swAhA/ oM ba ru Na ye swAhA/ oM ku be ra ye swAhA/ oM agna ye swAhA/ oM ne re ti rAk+Sha ta b+hi ye swAhA/ oM ba ya be swAhA/ oM a'i shAn ye swAhA/ oM sUrya ye
18b1(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM tsan+d+ra di pya swAhA/ oM pri thwi b+ha ya swAhA /zhes pas gtor ma dbul lo/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Adya nutpa tan+na twa da oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas pas mnyes par bya ste/ khams gsum gnas pa'i lha dang klu/ /gnod sbyin dri za
18b2(rgyud 'grel): lha ma yin/ /gang dag rdzu 'phrul cher ldan rnams/ /rdo rje'i spyan dang snyan mnga' ba/ /sa la gnas pa'i 'byung po kun/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang/ /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /sa phyogs dge gnaS
18b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid du/ /dam pa'i dkyil 'khor cher 'byung ba/ /ji ltar bsams pa'i las byed na/ /khyed kyis bar chad ma byed par/ /dge ba'i grogs po nyid du mdzod/ /de ltar khyed la bdag gis ni/ /bzod pa gsol gyis ma slu bar/ /rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma
18b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /nyes legs ltas rnams bstan du gsol/ /zhes lan gsum brjod la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas lcogs na las thams cad pa'i thab khung der dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas mi rus kyi
18b5(rgyud 'grel): phye ma las gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyis bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin sreg bya'o/ /mi lcogs na las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi chus bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya'o/ /de nas ji ltar brtags pa'i dbus su las thams cad par byin gyis brlabs pa'i
18b6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rdo rje g.yas bskor du khru zabs su brko/ zhogs ma dang sol dum dang/ rus pa dang/ so phag la sogs pa'i skyon bsal la/ sman lnga dang ni rin po che lnga dang/ 'bru lnga blugs la dri zhim zhim bsnam? pa'i sas bkang la gru bzhi lha ma par sa gzhi 'thas
18b7(rgyud 'grel): par byas la ba ko tsam du ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas byug go/ dri zhim po'i chus kyang byug ste/ me tog sil ma dgram pa ni phyi'i spyang ba'o/ /de'i steng du sbyor ba gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par bsgoms pa'i mthar gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyis
19a1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad pa ni nang gi sa sbyang ba'o/ /'di dag ni sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas hUM khaM hUM zhes pas rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' bsam nas /de nas hUM suM hUM zhes pas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i rin po che sna bzhi'i ri'i rgyal po ring?
19a2(rgyud 'grel): rab bskyed la/ de'i steng du hUM laM hUM zhes pas gser gyi sa gzhi gru bzhi pa la rdo rje phreng bas brgyan par bsam mo/ /de'i steng du rdo rje thal mo bcings pas kha spub la/ oM badzra me di ni badzri b+ha ba band+ha hUM zhes pas de dag byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas sbyor
19a3(rgyud 'grel): ba gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa 'di ni sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas yang bdag nyid dang po'i sbyor bas zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgoms la/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gzhi phyogs bzhin
19a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i las kyi rdo rje bzhi dngos su 'am sems kyis bsams kyang rung ste /dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar gsol bar gdab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /
19a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mchog la
19a6(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur/ /dkyil
19a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum du gsol ba btab nas/ /bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje khro bo chen po bsgoms te/ mig g.yas g.yon du ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te/ de'i dbus su mig
19b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras hUM las gyur pa'i rdo rje nag po de las 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs bcur 'phros pas nam mkha' i dbyings thams cad tu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyis khyab par sprul par bya'o/ /rkang pa gnyis la a las sna tshogs rdo je 'od 'bar ba bsgom
19b2(rgyud 'grel): la lag pa g.yas g.yon du rdo rje dang dril bu 'gying bag can du 'dzin pas dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams te/ stang stabs kyis g.yas skor bar bya'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod cing bskor ro/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
19b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag la gson/ /bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor gyis/ /lha dang lha dbang gsang ba pa/ /brjed byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs/ /sa 'dir ma gnas gzhan du dengs/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /rdo rje khro bo bzhin 'bar ba'i
19b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /mgo ni tshal pa brgyar gshog cing/ /zhig par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /zhes brjod nas sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas seng ldeng gi phur pa la dri dmar pos byugs shing srad bu dmar po dang me
19b5(rgyud 'grel): tog gi phreng ba brtags pa stod zhal gsum phyag drug pa smad zung gsum rtse gcig par byin gyis brlab pa'am/ yang na bka' i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas phur bu gdab par bya'o/ /'di dag ni sa yongs su bzung ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas gnod
19b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes dang 'dod pa'i rgyal pos/ ra ba dang dra bas phyogs bsrung zhing bcing bar bya'o/ /'di dag ni sa bsrung ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya sa gnon du byas pas dkyil 'kho gyi sa la bzhag ste/ oM Tak+ki hUM dza:zhes brjod
19b7(rgyud 'grel): pas sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad kyis mtshan pa/ lag pa na gser gyi bum pa 'dzin pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus nas 'thon par bsams te/ de la 'di skad du/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas
20a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gi bdud kyi sde/ /pham par byas te dkyil 'khor
20a2(rgyud 'grel): bri/ /zhes lan gsum du gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang/ mchod pa phul te bzod par gsol to/ /de nyid du thim par bsam mo/ /de dag ni sa'i lha mo sta gnon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas bdud
20a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsi lnga dang dri zhim po'i chus lha'i grangs dang mthun pa'i rigs so so'i thig le byas la/ gdan dang gzhal yas khang ji lta ba bzhin bsams la/ phyag rgya dang gnyis su med pa'i khyad par las dam tshig gi 'khor lo rdzogs par bkod la/ ye shes
20a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du byas te/ ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa byas la/ /phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pam? mchod cing bstod pa byas te/ gsol ba lan gsum du gdab par bya'o/ /lag paS
20a5(rgyud 'grel): bdug spos blangs nas pus mo sa la btsugs te 'di skad du/ bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /rigs sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje bdag nyid can dag gi/ dkyil 'khor bdag nyid bri bar 'tshal/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba
20a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de ni snang bar mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas 'gro 'khor bya don rtsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang/ /gzhan yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang/ /
20a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang/ /gang yang rdo rje spyan mda' ba' i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /yo byad ci 'byor pas 'dri na//
20b1(rgyud 'grel): deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni rtsa bar dgongs nas su/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ de ltar lan gsum du gsol pa btab la mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas rang dang dra bas phyag? mtshangS?
20b2(rgyud 'grel): bcing pa byas te/ 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas gser la sogs pa 'am/ sa'i khams kyi rgyu las byas pa'i bum pa lto ba che ba mgrin pa ring ba kha khyer dang ldan zhing mchu 'phyang ba nag nog med pa lha'i grangs dang
20b3(rgyud 'grel): mthun par byas te/ tsandan dkar pos byugs shing pad+ma la sogs pa'i gdan la so so rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa bri/ ras kha tshar ma nyams pas mgul pa bcings la tsu ta la sogs pa'i 'bras bu can gyi shing gi kha brgyan pa sngags kyis btab pa dri zhim po'i
20b4(rgyud 'grel): chus gang ba/ gro dang nas dang til dang 'bras so ? mon sran dri'u ste 'bru lnga dang/ byu ru dang sa le sbram dang/ dung dang mu tig dang/ nor bu ste rin po che lnga dang/ saM hi dang/ byA gri dang/ ta sa dang/ ha sa de ba dang/ kar ni ka ste sman lnga blugs la/ me tog gi phreng bas bcings
20b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje khar bzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin la gnas la bzlas pa bya/ yi ge baM las gyur pa'i gser gyi bum pa bsgoms la /h+rI:las gyur pa'i pad+ma dang/ aM dang a las gyur pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan la rang rang gi sa bon yongs su
20b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las sku rdzogs pa la ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug la bstim par bya ste/ mchod yon dang/ mchod pa lnga phul la/ gtor ma yang kha zas sbyang ba'i ting nge 'dzin du byas la/ thun mtshams bzhi ru phul nas so so'i bzlas pas mnyes par bya'o/ /
20b7(rgyud 'grel): de yang g.yas su rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bzhag ste/ mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bya'o/ /g.yon du las thams cad pa'i bum pa bzhag la mchod pa dang/ bzlas pas mnyes par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bsal du gsol zhes
21a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las bcal lo/ /dkyil 'khor la mchod pa yang bya ste /snga ma bzhin du gsol ba gdab pa yang lan gsum du bya'o/ /'di dag ni bum pa sta gon la gnas ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas phyi rol tu byung nas rang gi slob ma brtags la bzung bar bya ste/
21a2(rgyud 'grel): blo dang ldan pa theg pa chen po la dgang ba bla ma la dad cing snying rje che ba/ bka' drin rjes su dran bar rgyal med pa bslab pa yid ches pa dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags bsgrub pa dang /slob dpon pa lhag par mos pa rigs dang ldan zhing sdom pa dang dam tshig la gnas
21a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni rin po che'i skyes bu zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ 'di ni brtan pas mchog tu bzung bar rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /de las gzhan pa'i slob ma ni dad? pa sngon du 'gro bas byang chub la dmigs nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang bla ma la dad pa rgya
21a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po byed pa yang ci rigs par bzung bar bya ste/ gang zag gi rim pa bzhin sbyar ro/ /de las gzhan pa ni slob ma dang tshogs pa'i bdag nyid gang dang yang mi ldan pa de ni 'dir mi snang zhing dgag par bya'o/ /de ltar snod dang snod ma yin pa rnamS
21a5(rgyud 'grel): brtags la slob dpon bdag nyid khang pa'i nang du 'jug go /de nas skal pa dang ldan ba'i slob mas kyang sgo drung du gnas te/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /
21a6(rgyud 'grel): mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon [ps
21a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /de ltar lan gsum gsol ba btab nas/ slob dpon 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas tshig 'dis gnang ba sbyin te/ bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod yul cho ga dag/ khyod la yang
21b1(rgyud 'grel): dag bstan par bya/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gsung thuD kyi ? can/ rdo rje gsang sngags bsgoms pa yis/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang
21b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug par rtogs nas/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya phyir/ /bu yis
21b3(rgyud 'grel): blo gros 'di byos shig ces smra'o/ /de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ yongs su bsngo ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ bdag nyid lus dpul ba dang/ sangs
21b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes sdom pa bzung ba dang/ smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogS
21b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni slob mas tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing bya'o/ /sdom pa bzung ba ni dang po slob dpon gyi bsgo ste/ 'di skad du /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje
21b6(rgyud 'grel): dril bu phyag rgya dag /blo chen khyod kyis bzung bar gyis/ /byang chub sems ga re rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes grangs so/ /slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar gyis/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /
21b7(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi dag tu sbyin/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos khyod kyis bzung bar gyis/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig
22a1(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bya/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/ /srog chags rnams ni bsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi sla'o/ /'dod chags dag kyang
22a2(rgyud 'grel): mi bya zhing/ /rdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spangs/ /dam pa nye bar brten bya zhing/ /rnal 'byor pa kun bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las
22a3(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam gsum bya/ /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus par yang rjes su bsrung/ /sems can don la mi phyogs dang/ /theg pa dman la dgod mi bya/ /'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spangs/ /rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags/ /
22a4(rgyud 'grel): lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /de la brnyas par mi bya zhing/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang/ /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ /de ltar dam tshig gsungs pa dag /blo ldan khyod kyis rtag tu bsrungs/ /de nas bla ma des gsungs pa'i/ /sdom pa legs par bzung
22a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /chagS 'gyur las/ /phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du /ji ltar dus
22a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pas/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi zer/ tshul khrims gyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag
22a7(rgyud 'grel): gis brtan por bzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ /sdom pa deng nas bzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /yang dag nyid du
22b1(rgyud 'grel): bzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong pa la/ nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la/ /phyi nang
22b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis
22b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can ma lus don gyi phyir/ /bdag gi sdom pa ma lus bzung/ /ma brgal ba dag bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol bdag bdag gi sgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs 'byung zhing/ /mya ngan 'das la dgod par bgyi/ /lus dang ngag
22b4(rgyud 'grel): dang yid dag gis/ /mi dge ba ni bcu po dag /bag med pa ni gnas gyur pa/ /chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /de bzhin lha dang lha min dang/ /gsang ba bdag brnyas pa dang/ /mtshan ma la sogs 'gom pa rnams/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji
22b5(rgyud 'grel): srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi/ /de ltar sdom pa bzung ba'i slob ma la snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar rdo? khu tshur gyis dri'i thig le gsum byas te/ nyi ma dang pad+ma dang/ zla ba la yi ge gsum so sor bkod la sku dang gsun dang thugs
22b6(rgyud 'grel): su byin gyis brlab cing/ /las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /de naS mchod pa byas te spyi bo me tog dang spos dang/ mar me dang dri ni snying gar ro/ /lta bshos ni mdun du'o/ /de re re la yang tshig 'di sngon du 'gro bas sbyin te/ dus 'di nyid nas bzung
22b7(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos par/ /mchod pa kun dang ldan pa ni/ /dus kun tu ni bde bar mnos zhes pas so/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis/ mngon par sngags pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa shing drang po'o ma can las
23a1(rgyud 'grel): byung ba srin bus ma zos pa/ bu ga dang mdzar? pa med pa drang por byas pa la dri zhim pos byugs shing rtse mo me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i slob ma shar phyogs su kha bltas te mi smra bar song zhing bca' o/ /'ja'? ba zin nas mdun dran por dar ro/ /
23a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas so shing gi rtse mo'i bltas lta ste/ phyogs mtshams kyi dbye bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i ltas brgyad 'grub pa'am/ yang na bdag la lta ba'am rtse mo gyen du 'greng na dngos grub mchog 'grub po/ /de bzhin du shar du bltas na dngos grub 'bring 'grub po//
23a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshams dang byang du bltas na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'grub po/ /thur du bltas nas 'og gis dngos grub 'grub po/ /de nas ngag gi nyes pa sbyangs pa'i phyir 'thor thung byas te/ kha bkrus nas hub gsum 'thung du gzhug pa'i sngags ni/ oM h+ri bi shud+d+hA? ya
23a4(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA ya sarba pA paM ni tsa syaM sho d+ha yA/ sarbba bi ka la baM a pa na ya hUM/ zhes bzlas la chu k yor ba gsum 'thung du bzhug go/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u du ba ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na rais 'ga' zhig yin/ /'byung 'gyur yang na?
23a5(rgyud 'grel): na mi 'byung ngo/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gis mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed bar nus/ /bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/ /sdig pa byas par gyur pa gang/ /de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra
23a6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /mthong bas 'byang bar 'gyur ba yin/ /grags pa mdza' yas sngags spyod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas pa smos cing gos/ /skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas nas ni/ /go 'phangs bla na med bar 'gyur/ /gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shing?
23a7(rgyud 'grel): tu mi g.yo ba/ de dag gi ni bde? 'gro'i rgyun?/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas la/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams
23b1(rgyud 'grel): kun?/ /yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la// /sang ni rab tu skyo bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /las mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyeb rnams der ni dong bas na/ /rang 'byung skal pa chen po la/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin
23b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs par 'gyur ba yin/ zhes bya ba'i chog 'di dag ni/ /theg pa chen po'i chos bshad pas spro ba yang dag par skyod par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i srung skad mdud pa gsum bor ba dpung pa g.yon pa la gdags so/ /de nas sngags kyis btab pa'i ku
23b3(rgyud 'grel): shal sngas dang/ stan byas te /rmi lam gyi bltas lta'o/ /rmi lam gyi bltas mthong ba dge ba'am mi dge ba nang bar dus su nga la bzlos shig ces bsgo'o/ /rmi lam mi dge kha na las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis gzhom mo/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/ nam mkha' i
23b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod la dra ba dbang bas kha sbyar gyi sbyor bas bsrungs te bzhag go /de dag ni sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas rang bzhin gyis dkyil 'khor bskul ba'i phyir nam mkha' 
23b5(rgyud 'grel): la gdab pa'i bskud pa dang tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir sa la gdab pa dang gnyis bya ste/ de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya ma bslab par 'byongs pa dang thig skud bkal te/ de nas tshon lnga so sor bcos nas bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim pos byugs shing
23b6(rgyud 'grel): gser la sogs pa'i snod gtsang mar bzhag la/ rigs re re la yang rang rang gi gtso? bor byas ba'i lnga lnga yod pas skud pa re re la yan lnga lnga ste nyi shu rtsa lnga bya'o/ /sngags pas bdag nyid kyi mig g.yas g.yon la dza dkar dmar las bskyed pa'i nyi
23b7(rgyud 'grel): zla bskyed la/ /de nyid la yang dzas so sor mtshon pa mig gis gzi ma 'dren par byed pa'i 'bar ba'i lta bas nam mkha' i dbyings thams cad du ltas te/ dza(rgyud 'grel): las 'phros ba'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka nas ye shes
24a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi skud? pa drangs te/ yi ge lngas drangs pa'i dam tshi gi skud pa la thim par byas nas/ las thams cad pa'i dri'i chus? bsang gtor byas pa'i dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul nas/ oM A:aoM hUM:aoM A:swAhA:aoM A:a'a:hUM/ oM a(rgyud 'grel): hA hUM/
24a2(rgyud 'grel): oM a(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM zhes bzlas/ /'khal? zhing sgril? ba'i dus su yang/ /oM a n+yO n+yO nu ga ta sarbba d+harmA? pa ra spar a nu ga ta sarbba d+harmmA:a tyan ta a nu ga ta sarbba d+harmma anu pra be sha ya sarbba d+harmma hUM zhes rjes su dran pas bzlas shing bsgril lo/ /de nas tshon? sna gcig ba'i
24a3(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad pa'i skud pa byas te/ dri zhim po dang bdud rtsi lnga dang/ las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i yungs? kar bsres pa spangs? te/ tsandan dkar po'i chus byug par bya'o/ /skud pa yi ge gsum gyi nang du chud par bya'o// //skud pa bsdogs shing bzung
24a4(rgyud 'grel): nas dzdza gsum gyis bton la rang rang gi phyag rgya ma la gtad par bya'o/ /shes rab med par bdag nyid gcig bu spyod na slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin la gnas la slob ma rnam par snang mdzad dam bdud rtsi thang sbyor du bsams te shar gyi sgor
24a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya'o/ /nub dang shar na gnas pa'i slob dpon slob mas khu tshur g.yon gyi bzung nas/ oM badzra sa ma ya sA tra mA ti kra ma hUM zhes brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gro
