24a6(rgyud 'grel): ba sems can don gyi phyir gshegs shig par thig gi sgras bskul bar bsam par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gnod sbyin gyi phyogs su kha bltas la slob ma gshin rje'i phyags su kha bltas te/ nam mkha' la thig gdab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du klu dang
24a7(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin gyi phyogs su kha bltas pa thig gnyis pa gdab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du grwa dang phyogs la sogs pa gdab par bya'o/ /de la dang po ni tshangs pa'i thig go /gnyis pa ni grwa'i thig go /gsum pa ni phyi rol gyi thig go /bzhi pa ni so sor
24b1(rgyud 'grel): cha rnam bar dbye ba'i theg go /de nas nam mkha' la btab pa bzhin dus la gdab? par bya ste/ tshangs thig gi g.yas g.yon du ri mo dgu dgu btab pas cha bcu bcur 'gyur te/ /spyir cha chen po nyi shur 'gyur ro/ /de re re'i nang du thib gsuM gsum?  btab pas snam bu bzhi bzhir 'gyur te /de tsha phran brgya
24b2(rgyud 'grel): cud? 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshangs thig gnyis pa'i g.yas g.yon yang gdab par shes par bya'o/ //de la lnga pa'i dang pos ni de ba'i tshon sna lnga yis bya'o/ /lnga pa bzhi pas ni 'bram gyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/ /drug pa'i gsum pas ni sgo'i steng logs kyi
24b3(rgyud 'grel): tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/ /dang po'i gsum pas ni sgo khyud kyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o/ /gnyis pa'i gnyis pas ni logs kyi tshon sna lnga'i sa bya'o// //dang po'i bzhi pa dang/ gnyis pa'i dang pos ni khyams kyis bya'o/ /lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa'i kha khyer
24b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis bya'o/ /lnga pa'i bzhi pas kha khyer gyi sa bya'o/ /drug pa'i dang po dang gnyis bas dra ba dang dra phyed kyi sa bya'o/ /de ni dkyil 'khor gyi gnas bsgrub pa'o/ /dang po'i bzhi pas ni rang gi ka ba'i sa bya'o/ /gnyis pa'i gsum pas ni phyi'i ka ba'i sa bya'o/ /de nas tsandan gyi phur
24b5(rgyud 'grel): bu la oM badzra ki li kI la ya baM hUM zhes lan bdun bzlas pas dbus kyi lte ba la btab la gsum pa'i gsum pa la rdo rjer ba'i sa'i ri mo gnyis su g.yas skor du zlum por bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas dgu pa'i dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa gsum
24b6(rgyud 'grel): ri mo gnyis kyis bslar ba khor yug ste/ pad+ma'i phreng pa'i sa bya'o/ /de'i 'og gi cha gsum la nang gi phyed dang gnyis kyis ni khor yug chen po ste/ phyi rol gyi rdo rjer pa'i sa bskor bar bya'o/ /de dag kyang dang po ri mo nang nas bskor ro/ /de nas phyi rol nas bskor te/
24b7(rgyud 'grel): de'i lhag ma phyed dang gnyis kyis ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /tha ma'i cha bran stong pa gnyis kyis ni dkyil 'k or gyi sa bya'o/ /de nas gsum pa'i bzhi pa la 'dod pa'i lha mo'i snam bu'o/ /bzhi pa'i dang po dang/ bzhi pa'i gnyis pa dang/ bzhi pa'i
25a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa'i bzhi pa rnams gcig tu byas pa ni sgo dang 'brel ba'i phyi'i snam bu'o/ /de nas mig gnyis la hI? las hwamli? pa'i khro bo'i lti? bas nang gi thig btab nas khro ba'i mig pa'i? star skyabs kyi/ 'od zer gyi bgegS?
25a2(rgyud 'grel): bsal la phyi'i thig gdab par bya ste/ sngar btab pa rnams ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la ra? ba'i tshon sna lnga sgo dang 'brel ba phyis pas sgo'i nang dang sgo khyung kyis bya'o/ /rta babs bzhi ni chur sgo'i bzhi 'gyur rnam phran bcu drug gi tshad do/ /de la chu srin gyi mgo mi sogS?
25a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i brgyan rnams dgod pa'i sa bya'o/ /? ba dang 'brel ba'i rnam phran dang po dang/ gnyis pa la gar? mkhan gyi lha mo mchod pas phyag 'brel pa rnams so/ /gsum pa la ni rin chen pa gu'i sa'o/ /bzhi pa dang lnga pa la ni dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang nyi zla'o/ /drug pa la rdo rje nor bu
25a4(rgyud 'grel): phyed pa'o/ /sgo'i logs dang 'gras rnams su rnga yab 'bar ba dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rlung gis bskyod pa'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i g.yas g.yon du ri dags kyi mtshan pa/ phyi rol gyi grwa bzhir gser gyi bum pa brgyad dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa ci
25a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs par bri rab? bya'o/ /de yang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /dra ba dri phyed rdo rje dang/ /nor bu zla bas brgyan pa'o/ /sgo da ?
25a6(rgyud 'grel): khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /bum pa ka ba rdo rje byed/ /bre yi 'phreng ni rim bzhin gnas/ /ba dan dril bus mdzes bya la/ /rnga yab rnams kyis rnam par brgyan/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ni/ /mchod pa rnams? lnga yis brgyan/ /khru ni
25a7(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis tshad dang ldan/ /tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /bum pa brgyad dang ldan pa bri/ /kun nas yongs su zlum por bya/ /de dag gi ni thig gi go cha'o// //de nas rdul tshon byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ kha dog lnga la hUM la sogs pa kha dog lnga dang ldan
25b1(rgyud 'grel): pa so sor bstims la/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba la sogs pa thig gi chog bzhin bya ste/ tshon rtsi 'od 'bar bar bsams te oM badzra tsitra sa ma ya mA ti kra ma hUM zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlabs te/ chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag/ sems can kham?
25b2(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam sgrol mdzad/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/ /rdul tshon mi phyed ngo bo nyid/ /ces pa'o/ /de nas slob mas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ sgo'i steng logs kyi tshad du bri par bya'o/ /de yang phyir la nas brtsams te thog mar de
25b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'o/ /de nas ni ser po'o/ /de nas ni dmar po'o/ /de nas ljang gu ste nang rol ni nag po'o/ /sgo dang sgo'i snam bu ni phyogs kyi snam bu'o/ /de nas rdul tshon gyi bgegs 'byung ba lnga las byung ba rnams ni sku'i dkyil 'khor la ni gshin rje bshed kyi sbyor bas gzhom
25b4(rgyud 'grel): mo/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor pa ni rta mgrin gyi sbyor bas so/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor bas sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gang la yang sbyar du rung ngo/ /'dir ni rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor yin pas na gnod mdzes kyi sbyor bas bgegs gzhom par bya ste/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ oM
25b5(rgyud 'grel): g+h+rih+Na g+h+rih+Na hUM phaT/ oM g+h+rih+NA pa ya g+h+rih+NA pa ya hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga ban bidyA ra dza hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing gnod mdzes kyi tsham dam srung zhing rnam par 'phrul pas bgegs kyi tshogs 'jigs par byed pa 'di la som nyi mi bya'o /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris
25b6(rgyud 'grel): nas phyag rgya dgod par bya ste/ hUM la? sogs pa gsung gi phyag rgya 'am/ rdo rje la sogs pa thugs kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya ste/ /de la 'dir re zhig thugs kyi mtshan ma'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa gsungs te/ dbus su ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du
25b7(rgyud 'grel): kha dog sngon po'i rdo rje chen po ? dgu pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhir sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba dang rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang rgya gram gyi gdan gyi steng du 'khor lo dang/ rin po che dang pad+ma dang/ ral gri kha dog so sor bri bar
26a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /me'i gral sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru ni pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i steng du utpal dkar po dang/ sngon po cung zad rtsa bar mar ba dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu ste/ spyan la sogs pa'i rdugs? kyi mtshan ma so sor dgod par bya'o/ /
26a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi snam bu'i grwa bzhir me long dang/ pi wang dang/ dri'i dung dang/ ro'i snod thod pa ste/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba gnas pa'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rim pa bzhin du dgod do/ /snam bu gsum pa la pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i
26a3(rgyud 'grel): byams pa'i klu shing dang gzhan dag gi gtso bo'i kha dog dang phyag mtshan du mthun par bri'o/ /khro bo rnams ni pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma la gnas pa'i shar sgor gshin rje gshed kyi dbyug to'o/ /lho'i sgor ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje'i dbyug to'o/ /nub sgor
26a4(rgyud 'grel): ni rta mgrin gyi pad+ma 'od rnon po dang bcas pa'o/ /byang sgor ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rdo rje rgya gram mo/ /shar lho mtshams su ni mi g.yo mgon gyi ral gri'o/ /lho nub mtshams su ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu'o/ /nub byang mtshams su ni dbyug sngon gyi rdo rje
26a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa'o/ /byang shar mtshams su ni stobs po che'i tri shul lo/ /shar stong du ni gtsug tor 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa gtsug tor gyis mtshan pa'o/ /nub smad du ni gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o/ /de yang rang gi sngags bzlas shing thun mtshamS
26a6(rgyud 'grel): su bri'o/ /de dag ni tshin dgye ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya ma legs par 'byongs pa dang/ dang po sbyor bas snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho ba bya'o/ /shes rab kyi chos 'byung ba nas badzra d+h+rika la sogs pa'i lha so so'i mtshan gyi sngags kyis bton nas so so'i
26a7(rgyud 'grel): gdan la rdzogs par bsgom zhing/ de nas ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' 'od zer las khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes 'phro bas phyogs bcu'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo dam tshig gi 'khor lo spyan drangs la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod de/ gshin rje gshed
26b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing pa dang/ dbang du byas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo la ni rnam par snang mdzad nas gnod mdzes kyi bar gyis spyi bo nas rkang pa'i bar du dgod pa'o/ /gnas gsum du sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsum po dgod pa dang/ sems
26b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' gsum gyi mthar thug pa dgod? cing byin gyis brlab po/ /'khor gyi lha rnams la ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje dang/ ye shes sems dpa' rang bzhi ste/ phyag rgya chen po dang/ chos dang/ las dang dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o/ /'di dag ni dkyil
26b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mnyes par bya ste/ me tog gi char gyi ni lha rnams kyi dbu la'o/ /dri dang bdug spos kyis ni shangs la'o/ /byug spos kyis dbul mar me ni spyan la'o/ /lha
26b4(rgyud 'grel): bshos ni ljags la'o/ /dril bu ni snyen la'o/ /yon chab dang zhabs bsil ni phyag dang zhabs la'o/ /de dag kyang mched pa rnam pa lnga mchog bstan pa'i zhes gsungs pas 'jig rten pa dang thun mong ma yin pa ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' i 'od zer las byung bas na nam mkha' i dbyings
26b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbus su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char byung bar bsam mo/ /de nas nang gi mchod pa bya ste/ phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pa las bla na med pa'i mchod pa btsam ste/ byang chub sems kyi phra rab bsags pa las nam mkha' i khamS
26b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas gang bar bsams la de dag kyang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i mchod pas mnyes pa 'di ni nang gi mchod pa'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga dang/ dpa' bo lnga kha zas sbyang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyangs la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
26b7(rgyud 'grel): la dbul par bya zhing bdag nyid kyang tshim par bya ba 'di nyid ni gsang ba'i mchod pa'o/ /de nas stong pa dang bzlas pas mnyes par byas te/ de'i rjes la phyir byung la gtor ma dang mchod pas phyogs skyongs so so rnams mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du?
27a1(rgyud 'grel): song ste/ stong g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang gtsug tor la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i hUM mdzad kyi skur bsgyur la dkyil 'khor gyi g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba la lan gsum bya ste/ phyag byas nas phreng ba sngon po dkyil 'khor
27a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi gtso bo la phul te/ slar bslabs nas bdag gi mgo bo la bcings nas lhas gnang bar bsams pa 'dis ni rdzas dang yo byang la sogs pa'i dri ma thams cad dag par 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni mchod pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas shar phyogs su kha
27a3(rgyud 'grel): bltas te/ rgyas pa'i las dang 'brel pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mnyes par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni 'og nas ston pas 'dir ma bstan no/ /de nas bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o/ /byang chub tu sems bskyed la me tog mthor ba'i bar gyis bzhugs pa la
27a4(rgyud 'grel): phreng pa nas rjes su gnang pa'i bar gyis bka' i gnang ba thob par byas la slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i ched du bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs brjod par bya ste/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje
27a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bdag grub mdzad/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po sde/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /'dod
27a6(rgyud 'grel): chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzed/ /shin tu ngag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi
27a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyems pa bdag mdzod cig/ sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing/ /sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs/ /sems can kun gyi yab gyur cing/ /'dod chags dam tshig mchog 
27b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'o/ /bden pa 'di yis ye shes mchog/ shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor yin/ /bden pa de yis mgon bdag la/ /khyod kyis 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing bsil la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing/
27b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung/ /de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/ /bden pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni/ /kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog/ ces lan gsum brjod do/ /'di dag ni slob dpon 'jug pa'i tshe
27b3(rgyud 'grel): ga'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po dang slob ma'i bar du yol bas bcad nas las thams cad pa'i chus bkrus pa'i ras dmar po'i gdong g.yogs kyis bka' la sdug pa khyod su yin zhes lan gsum dri'o/ /nges kyang sdug pa bdag ni
27b4(rgyud 'grel): skal pa bzang po'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas me tog gi phreng pa 'dzin pas sgo nga yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /de bzhin du yul 'khor khyim dang glang po rta/ /gser dang mu tig byu ru dang/ /nor bu dang ni khyad par rdzas/ /bu dang chud ma bdag nyid dang/ /bran pho
27b5(rgyud 'grel): bran mo bcas rnams kun/ /deng nas brtsams te dbul bar bgyi/ /zhes yon gyi bye brag dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas snying gar rdo rje bzhag la oM sarbba yo ga ci hta? utpa ta ya mi/ su ra ta sa ma ya stwaM ho zhes pas byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ /sid+d+hi badzra ya thA su khaM zhes
27b6(rgyud 'grel): bas 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ /khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig/ dang pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la
27b7(rgyud 'grel): yang ma yin no zhes par bya'o/ /de nas gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyis yol ba'i nang du bkug cing tshud par byas nas sam/ yang na a khaM bI ra hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga yis nang du chud par byas la de nas snga ma bzhin du sdom pa
28a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin du gzhug ste/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la? ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos te/ de lta bu'i ye
28a2(rgyud 'grel): shes bskyed par bya yis/ dngos grub 'di dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje gzhag la/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' dong khyed kyi/ /snying la yang dag tu?
28a3(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur/ /oM badzra satwa hUM/ gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu bral te gshegs zhes brjod do/ /de nas thod pa na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi 'thung du gzhug ste/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na bsreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs
28a4(rgyud 'grel): na dngos grub ster rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung shig /oM badzra u ra ka Tha:de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /ded phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje da yin gyis nges 'di byos shig/ ces brjod pa gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis pa la brnyas par ma
28a5(rgyud 'grel): byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur te ro zhes brjod do/ de nas de skad smras pa la/ slob mas 'di skad du /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs las rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur /
28a6(rgyud 'grel): cig ces gsol gdab par bya'o/ /de nas dbab snod slob ma de snang ba mdza' yas su bsams la/ /yan lag thams cad la yi ge lo yongs su gyur pa las dbang chen ser po gru bzhi grwa bzhi la rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa de'i dbus su yi ge hUM
28a7(rgyud 'grel): ngo/ /? yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po bum pas mtshan pa lto bar bsam/ /yaM yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra ba ba ngan gyis mtshan pa rkang pa'i 'og tu'o/ /raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'doms su
28b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /mgrin par a:spyi bor ta/ de nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i dztaiM ? mthil nas rkang gi bu gnas rlung gi me 'bar ba la sogs pa'o/ /badzra a bi sha ya staM b+ha ya ra ra ra ra/ tsa la ya tsa la ya/ hUM ha adzhaM zhes dril bu ri sgra dang bcas pas dbab par
28b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /phab pa dang tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pas brtan par bya ste/ de nas lce la yi ge lnga dmar po bsams la/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i gtam yongs su smros shig zhes dri'o 'dzin? me tog gi phreng pra tIts+tsha badzra ho zhes brjod la dkyil 'khor du dong ngo/ /me tog gang la
28b3(rgyud 'grel): bab pa de ni lha'i ri'u cha'i gnas las shes par bya'o/ /de yang sku stong dang spyi gtsug tu ? dngos grub mchog 'grub bo/ /zhal pa bab na sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub po/ /sku'i dbus su bab na dngos pa'i dngos grub bo/ /sku dang nye na ni dngos grub nye
28b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dngos grub bo/ /sku dang nye na ni dngos grub nye ba'o/ /ring na ni dngos grub ring ngo/ /gnyis kyi bar du lhung na ni gang nye ba'i rigs so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas las phyi rol tu brgal na dad pa chung ste/ dman pa'i dngos grub 'grub po/ /re khA?
28b5(rgyud 'grel): la phog na skyar la dor ro/ /snying po la phog na gang yang rung ba 'grub bo/ /bar mnyam po 'am bdag gi mdun du ltung na lan gsum spogs te dor ro/ /des kyang nang du ma phog na skal pa med pas slar gtang ngo/ /de dag ni slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga'o//
28b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas babs ? de rnams kyis phreng ba mgo la cing zhing/ /oM pra ti grihu twa mi maM sa mi ya sti zhes brjod pas phreng pas dbang skur ro/ /de nas mig gis ji ltar mthong zhes dri'o/ /dkar po mthong na dngos grub 'grub par bya'o/ /ser po mthong na rgyas
28b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes so/ /dmar po mthong na rjes su chags pa'i ye shes so/ /nag po mthong na mngon sbyor kyi ye shes so/ /sna tshogs pa mthong na gang yang rung ba'i dngos grub po/ /de na rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod gyis/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /mig ni/
29a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'byed mdzad pa/ /rdo rje mig ni bla na med/ /ces brjod la sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM badzra satwa sa man+ta/ tsak+Shu ga ta na twa da pa ra u da ka ta ya ti sarbba ak+Sho tsak+Shu a nut+ta ra zhes brjod la gdong g.yogs bkrol te/ de nas gnod mdzes
29a2(rgyud 'grel): nas brtsams te rdo rje 'chang chen po'i par du lha rnams bstan to/ /de nas phyag rgya ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer yungs kar lta bus nam mkha' i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la btab cing bskul te/ bum pa na gnas pa'i mi bskyod
29a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yab yum la thim nas de yongs su gyur pa'i chus spyi bor chu'i dbang bskur te tshigs bcad dang sngags 'dis sbyin no/ /gsang gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /lha'i chu yis dag pa yis/ /mi bskyod pa yi dbang bskur ro//
29a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra a darsha dz+nyA na a bi Shiny+tsa zhes pa'o/ /de bzhin du bris pas sam lugs ma'i dbu rgyan la dar gyi cod pan gyi mtshan pa la rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum bsgoms la/ /snga ma bzhin du nam mkha' i dbyings na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
29a5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad phab pa de yongs su gyur pa'i dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur ro/ /'di skad du sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid che/ /dbu rgyan rin chen dam pa ste/ /rin chen kun gyi mchog 'gro bas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra sa man+ta dz+nyA na ratna ma hA hu ti
29a6(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas so/ /rdo rje 'od dpag med pa yab yum gyi bskur bsgoms te/ snga ma'i cho gas ye shes sems dpa' phab ste/ de yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rjes dbang bskur ro/ /'di skad du/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /mi phyed rdo rje'i 'od gsal
29a7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /dam chos 'byung ba'i sgor gyur pas/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM pra ti a be sha dz+nyA na badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes pas so/ /dril bu la don yod grub pa yab yum rdzogs par bsgoms te/ snga ma bzhin du phab pa'i cho ga byas la de yongs su gyur pa'i dril
29b1(rgyud 'grel): bus rdo rje dang dril bu bsnol la bdag po'i dbang bskur 'di skad do/ thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/ /'gro don mnyam med byed pa dang/ /mchod pa'i las kun rdzogs byed pas/ /rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra kri ta a mu ti twa na dz+nyA na badzra ba te a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pa'o//
29b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas snga ma bzhin du me long gi gzugs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sku phab la/ /de yongs su gyur pa me long du byas te/ /me long gi gzugs slob ma la bstan te/ 'di skad du brjod do/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa'i/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma
29b3(rgyud 'grel): med/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /rang lha'i gzugs ni shes par gyis oM pra ti bi ma la a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas so/ /de bzhin du spyi bor rnaM par snang mdzad yab yum bsgoms la snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phab la de yongs su gyur pa las
29b4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo nas rkang pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du lus la khyab par bstims la babs pa'i lha'i cha las ming brtags te/ ming ni thog mar dpal tha mar rdo rje'o/ /de'i 'og tu snang ba'i phyir de ni kye'i bod pa'o/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas/ /byang chub snying bo'i bar du ni//
29b5(rgyud 'grel): ces kyang mi shes mi g.yo bas/ /rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags/ /oM bi shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes so/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig med par ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i snod ma yin pas/ rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi khyad par gyi dam
29b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig dpog ste/ hUM yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje lag tu gtang la 'di skad du / 'di nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung/ /thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag ces pa ni rdo
29b7(rgyud 'grel): rje'i dam tshig go/ de bzhin du A:? yongs su gyur pa las dril bu byin la/ /dril bu de nyid kyis bzung la/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ shes rab sgra yis rjes 'gro bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /byang chub rgyal ba rdo rje bzhed/ /chos kyi
30a1(rgyud 'grel): dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyi dag /ngo bo nyid nas sring bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems pa mchog/ srid pa mchog ni mdzad pa yin zhes pa ni dril bu'i dam tshig go /de bzhin du oM de'i lus
30a2(rgyud 'grel): la bltas la 'di skad du /snying po bsnyen pa sogs sbyangs pas/ /phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs la/ /gzugs sogs 'dod pa'i dam tshig gis/ /gsang sngags ma tshang med par bzlas/ /rang rig pa yi ngo bo nyid/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum bzhug
30a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par gyis/ /dka' thub sdom pa mi bzang pas/ /bsten nas mi snang mngon shes dang/ /mkha' la rgyu dang lus ngag yid/ /las byung dngos grub 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de bas sangs rgyas byang chub
30a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' mchog/ sngags kyi spyod mchog spyod pa rnams/ /'dod pa thams cad bsten pa yis/ /chos kyi yi ge mchog nyid brnyes/ /bde dab sdug bsngal bde bdag min/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams bsten/ /ye shes don gnyer 'dod chags can/ /sbyor
30a5(rgyud 'grel): bas bsgrubs na myur du 'grub/ /sku gsung thugs na yang dag 'grub/ /gang gzhan dman par bshad pa ni/ /sngags kyi bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgom pas so/ /zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya'i dam tshig /de ltar sdom pa bzung ba'i slob mi yis/ /
30a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du yin gyis slob dpon mnyes par byas la/ /bla ma la phyag btsal la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis dbang nod pa'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod chen gsol mdzad pa/ /bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir
30a7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i rdo rje dang bdag gsol/ zhes gsol ba gdab po/ /de nas shar gyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor chen po dang bar du khruAm 'dom gyis chod par dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du bris la/ /de'i steng du dbang stegs kyi khri bya ste/ ras la gdan pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa g.yas dang
30b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du seng ges mtshan pa la bzhag ste/ steng du yang gdugs dang bla res bkab pa dang/ g.yas g.yon du yang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis klubs la/ /de nas slob dpon sbyor ba gsum rdzogs par bsgoms nas snga ma bzhin du thabs dang shes rab gnyis ?
30b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer gyis nam mkha' i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul nas bum pa'i nang du brud? par byas te/ de dag kyang sbyin la sogs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis bzung nas/ gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la sogs pas nam mkha' i khams ?
30b3(rgyud 'grel): gang ste de dag ni rig pa'i dbang bskur pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di yin te/ rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ /khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin par bya/ /zhes so/ /de nas rdo rje brtul
30b4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pas dbugs dbyung ba la sogs pa byin la/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid dang/ lha'i de kho na nyid bstan to/ /de yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcu gnyis dag pa khru bcu gnyis so/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa
30b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi rnam yang dag pa zur bzhi'o 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par dag pa ngos bzhi'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhags bzhi rnam par dag pa ni shar phyogs kyi sgo'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par dag pa ni lho'i sgo'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dag pa
30b6(rgyud 'grel): ni nub phyogs kyi sgo'o/ /dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dag pa ni byang phyogs kyi sgo'o/ /rnam par thob? pa brgyad dag pa ni ka ba brgyad do/ /rdo rje theg pa'i sgo nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas na rdo rje'i theg pa dang ldan pa'o/ /tshon sna lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin no//
30b7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa'i ye shes kun yongs su bskor ba'i phyir dbus kyi pho brang zlum po rdo rje'i phreng bzlum pas bskor bar ro/ /ting nge 'dzin bzhi dag pa ni kha khyer ro/ /gzungs rnam pa bzhi dag pa ni lha mo'i tshogs mchod pas phyag brel ba'o/ /dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa
31a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas brgyan pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no/ /de las gzhan dang gzhan pa'i brgyan dang rgyal mtshan dang ba ngan dang dril bus mtshan pa ni gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis pa'o/ /thabs kyi bye brag ma 'dres par so sor snang
31a2(rgyud 'grel): ba ni bar bar gyi tshon sna gcig pa'o// //sbos dang me tog la sogs pa mchod pa'i bye brag dang gar dang dbyangs la sogs pa ni bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor bla na med pa'i mchod pa nyams dga' o/ /gser gyi bum pa brgyad po ni tshogS/
31a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gnyis rdzogs pa'o/ /bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang yin pas gzhal yas khang ngo/ /dkyil ni snying po'i don to/ /'khor ni rdzogs pa'i don to/ /de ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /de dag kun kyang tshig gi don dang rgya cher sbyar ro/ /de na lha'i de kho na nyid bstan
31a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ gzugs dang tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa lnga ni me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid dang/ so sor rtog pa dang/ bya ba grub pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ 'od dpag tu
31a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ mi bskyod pa ste go rim bzhin du rnam par dag pa'o/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams ni spyan dang mU ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma ste/ go rim bzhin du rnam par dag pa yin te/ de tshad med pa bzhi'i rang
31a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg ni gzugs rdo rje dang/ sgra rdo rje dang/ dri rdo rje dang/ ro rdo rje dang/ reg rdo rje rnams go rim bzhin du rnam par dag pa'o/ /thabs dang/ smon lam dang/ stobs dang/ ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha
31a7(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no/ /mig dang rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi dbang po dang/ rtsa rgyud dang/ chos ni sa'i snying po dang/ nam mkha' i snying po dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba
31b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ byams pa dang/ kun tu bzang po ste/ go rim bzhin du rnam par dag pa yin te/ gtso bo'i yon tan gyi cha'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no/ /ser sna dang/ mi nyan pa dang/ don mi mthun pa dang/ don mi sbyor pa ni gshin rje gang shar dang/ gzhan gyis mi
31b2(rgyud 'grel): thub pa dang/ rta mgrin dang/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang/ go rim bzhin du dag pa ste/ sbyin pa dang /snyan par smra ba dang/ don mthun pa dang/ don spyod pa'i rang bzhin no/ /mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa drug ni/ mi g.yo mgon po dang/ 'dod pa'i
31b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bo dang/ dbyug sngon can dang/ stobs po che dang/ gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang /gnod mdzes go rim bzhin du ngag ba yin no/ /de dag kyang rang rang gi gtso po'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa la nges par zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi yon tan du
31b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan to/ /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ste/ lha thams cad kyi ngo bor bstan to/ de dag ni lha'i kho na nyid do/ /de nas rjes su gnad ba sbyin te/ 'di skad du/
31b5(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nyid kyi sems can rnams/ /ji lta ji ltar 'du la 'gyur ba/ /de lta de ltar chags la sogs/ /gtsang bas sems can don bya'o/ /nyin re bzhin du thun bzhi ru/ /ting 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ldan par/ /gyur nas thun mong cig shos kyi/ /dngos grub
31b6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'ang 'grub par 'grub?/ /mi snang ba ni stong yin te/ /mngon shes ldan pa nyis stong yin/ /rig pa 'dzin pa sum stong yin/ /rdo rje can ni 'gro kun bdag /zhi dang rgyas la sogs gang dang/ de las gzhan pa ci 'dod pa/ /'khor lo rjes mnyam sbyor ba
31b7(rgyud 'grel): ? bsgrubs nas 'grub par myur du 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pas rgyud nyan ba dang/ 'tshed pa dang mchog dang thun mong sgrub pa dang/ zhi ba la sogs pas sems can gyi don byed pa ste/ de dag thams cad byed par rjes su gnang ba sbyin no/ /de ltar phreng ba la
32a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dgu po des ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du rigs pa'i dbang bskur ba ste bum pa'i dbang gi cho ga'o// //de nas gsang pa'i dbang bskur ba sngar gyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor phyis pa la ba'i tus ?
32a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ dri'i chus phyag pa ste/ me tog sil ma bkram la de nas sngar lo 'am zla bar mnyes par byas pa'i slob ma des pad+ma rA ga dang/ nor bu dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i rin po che snang bdun dang 'khor lo la soD pa rin po che sna ? dang/ gzuD sdug gu'i bye brag sna tshoD dang/ sbra snyan pa'i
32a3(rgyud 'grel): bye brag sna tsho dag dri zhim pa'i bye brag sna tshogs dang/ bza' btung la sogs pa'i ro zhim po'i bye brag sna tshogs pa dang/ gzugs kyi mchog pad+ma can mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa'i lo grangs bcu drug lon pa legs par bslabs pa la sogs pa'i
32a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis yo byad tshogs par bshams te/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su phyag rgya phul te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas cho ga ji lta bar mchod par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang la tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems khyod
32a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba 'grub pa ste/ rnam dag byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen sras su bcas pa rnams/ /yun ring stong pa nyid bsgoms pas ni gdungs pa la/ /dga' ba'i yid 'ong bde ba chen po nyid kyi mdzod/ /kye 'dod chags de ni dri
32a6(rgyud 'grel): med kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ste/ /dga' ba'i 'dod chags rdo rje dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas/ /dka' ba rnam pa drug po spyod pas shin tu gdungs pa yi/ /rab tu dgyes dbang 'dod pa'i bde ba nyid kyis 'jog par mdzod/ /byang chub sems ni rin chen
32a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar phyung la/ /ma lus rgyal ba rnams ni lus skams la/ /rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu/ /dri med dri yi rin chen dbang bskur stsol/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pas/ /pad+ma'i gnas su rdo rje mdzod gtong ba'i/ /
32b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs sems dpa' sems can brlag 'gyur ba/ /sbyor ba gzhan min ma thogs bshad par gsol/ /rdo rje sems khyod sna tshogs bde bar byed pa yi/ /rdo rje pad+ma phre ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzad de/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gzugs kyi sbyin rab bstod nas//
32b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bde 'grub nyid kyi bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas sngar tshogs kyis mchod pa'i sngon du bla mas kyang yid kyis sam bris pas kyang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong? la/ bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam par bzhag pas snyoms par 'jug pa'i chogs
32b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems pad+ma'i snod dam dung chos su bzhag ste/ rol mo dang glu dbyangs dang bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra dang bcas pas brtse bas nam phyed kyi dus su rdo rje can gnyis pa lta bur dmigs la dam tshig gi phyag rgyas slob ma'i lce la sbyin no/ /slob
32b4(rgyud 'grel): rus pa khrag med kyang/ /nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon ltar/ /khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad/ /sku la snyun med mi gtsang med/ /bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang/ /khyod ni 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir/ /'jig rten bya ba stod par mdzad/ /chu zla bzhin du bzung du med/ /
32b5(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams kun la gnas pa med/ /nga rgyal med cing rmongs ming la /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gshegs dang bzhugs dang de bzhin gzimS/ /spyod lam dag ni thams cad du/ khyod ni rtag tu mnyam gzhag pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
32b6(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdzu 'phrul che la rnam 'phrul zhing/ /sna tshogs min la snyoms 'jug pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bstod pa byas te/ de'i 'og tu bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad par gsol ba gdab pa
33a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ 'di skad du/ kun mkhyen ye shes phung bo can/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo rnam sbyong pa/ /de ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis/ /gtso bos bdag la bka' drin gsol/ /khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni/ /gtso bos gzhan la skyabs ?
33a2(rgyud 'grel): mchis/ /'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen gyis/ /de bas slob ma mnyes par mdzod/ /ces gsol ba gdab bo/ /bla mas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi man ngag brgyud pa las 'ongs pa'i sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis nyems? mtshon pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dan? dag ji
33a3(rgyud 'grel): lta ba bzhin bstan to/ /de dag ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas dbang bskur ba yang dag par thob pa'i slob mas thal mo sbyar la mchod cing bstod pas mnyes par bya ste/ 'di skad du/ khams gsum las ni rnam grol zhing/ /nam
33a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur ba/ /'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang/ /skye mtshed? rnams la mi brten cing/ /byin ci log las rnam grol ba/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam rtog med cing kun
33a5(rgyud 'grel): rtog med/ /thugs ni rab tu mi gnas pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi gnas/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing/ /spros med gos pa med pa ltar/ /mkha' la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /dmigs med khyod la
33a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin can/ /mngon par byang chub blta bar 'tshal/ /slob ma thal sbyar bla ma la/ /bstod nas slar yang bskul par bya/ /las dang skye la rnam grol zhing/ /snang ba gsum po spangs pa yi/ /mngon par byang chub mthong bar
33a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /thog mdza' med cing zhi ba dang/ /nyon mongs thams cad rnam sbyong zhing//
33b1(rgyud 'grel): lus dang dag sems rnam sbyong ba/ /rdo je sems dpa' bdag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod pa/ sngon du 'gro ba tshigs su bcad pa dag gis yang dang yang du bstod pas mnyes par byas te/ de'i 'og tu slob ma la snying rje bskyed de/ ?
33b2(rgyud 'grel): mngon par byang chub pa dang/ nang gi mngon par byang chub pa'i man ngag gis shes rab ye shes kyi dbang skur ro/ /de dag ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /de ltar man ngag thob pa'i slob ma la ril por 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor dang/ rjes su gzhi
33b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis legs par bslab par bya'o/ /de nas thun mongs ma yin pa'i dam tshig dang/ sdom pa gnyis bslab par bya ste/ dban bskur 'dir ni blta bar bya/ /byang chub spyod gzhan de bzhin du/ /dge ba'i tshul ni gzhan gsungs par/ /
33b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun rdzogs thob mi 'gyur/ /bu yis dam tshig bsrung pa dang/ /rtag tu sdom pa bskyang ba dang/ /bcu phyed sgron ma mi 'chi spyad/ /dam tshig gzhan yang bsrung ba ni/ /dkon mchog gnod byed gzhom bya ste/ /shes rab thams cad sad par bya/ /
33b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi nor yang blang bar bya/ /rtag tu rdzun du smra bar bya/ /de las gzhan yang dam tshig ni/ /ji bzhin don ldan bcu bzhi dag/ phas pham par ni rab tu grags/ /sbang zhing dor par mi bya ste/ /rtsa ba'i ltung sa shes par bya/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas pa dang/ /bde
33b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang/ /sdang bas yun gyi bsngags min smra?/ /byams pa chen po rnam spong dang/ /byang chub sems ni 'dor ba dang/ /theg pa gsum ni smod pa dang/ /skal min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang/ /rgyal ba'i phung po bdag nyid smod/ /dag pa'i
33b7(rgyud 'grel): chos la yid gnyis dang/ /gdug la byams dang chags bral dang/ /chos la gnyis su dbye ba dang/ /dad pa'i sams la rab tu btud/ /dam tshig bsnyen tshe ji snyed pa'i/ /brtags pa'i shes rab smod pa ste/ /sngags pas 'di dag byas na ni/ /kha na ma tho spos?
34a1(rgyud 'grel): sor? 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i ltung pa yin par bshad/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re bzhin du bzlas par bya/ /kha na ma tho tshar 'gyur bas/ /yan lag dam tshig bshad par bya/ /dam tshig mi ldan snod min la/ /rig ma bsten
34a2(rgyud 'grel): par dga' ba dang/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo rtsod pa dang/ /gsang ba'i chos ni ston pa dang/ /sems can dad? dang ldan la chos/ /gzhan du ston par 'gyur ba dang/ /nyan thos ngag tu slob byong pa'i/ /nang du zhag bdun gnas pa dang/ /sbyong ba nges par ma
34a3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i/ /snod min gsang ba bsgrags pa dang/ /kha na ma tho cher gyur pa'i/ /sngags pa dam tshig nyams par 'gyur/ /nad dang sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel/ /de bas dam tshig bus bsrungs shig /ces pas sdom pa sbyin no// //de nas
34a4(rgyud 'grel): skad cig gis yi ge a de las shAkya thub pa'i cha lugs su bsgyur te/ /g.yas pa la lung ston pa'i phyag rgya mgo bor bzhag ste lung bstan par bya'o/ /oM nga yis 'di ltar lung bstan te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa'i mchog
34a5(rgyud 'grel): ni bsgrub pa'i phyir /srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba sid+d+hi b+hur b+hu pa swA/ /'di yis dbang bskur gyur pa yi/ /sngags la 'gro ba kun gyi bdag /bla na med pa'i byang chub tu/ /bde gshegs kyis kyang
34a6(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan mdzad/ /ces pas bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por lung bstan pa'o/ /de'i rjes su brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i lag tu 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs
34a7(rgyud 'grel): brtan/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha taM? d+he ra ya mi badzra straM? hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes pas sbyin no/ /de nas mchog gsang dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /mthong pa 'am ni zhugs gyur pas/ /srid ba kun las nges grol bar/ /de rnamS
34b1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba yod med de/ /mi thub pa dang mi sod pas/ /? kyang mi 'jigs dga' par gyis/ /srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir/ /ston pa mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /? dang gtan du dngos grub ?
34b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sdom pa bsgrub pa ni/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /byang chub sems ni btang mi bya/ /phyag na rdo rje gang yin pa'o/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du
34b3(rgyud 'grel): the tshom med/ /dam pa'i chos ni mi spad? zhing/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'/ /mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yi/ /tshul chen bstan pa mi bya'o/ /bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas ni/ /dga' thub ci ni ma gdungs bar/ /ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung/ /'di ni ma byon rdzoD
34b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang yongs su mi 'dor zhing/ /slob dpon snad par mi bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi/ /slob dpon la ni gang smod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas/ /rtag tu
34b5(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsnal thob par 'gyur/ /rim dang sgra dang dug dang nang/ /mkha' la 'go rnams gtses pa dang/ /gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis/ /bsad nas sems can dmyal bar ltung/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /dge ba
34b6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu mi spyoms pa/ /nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /bla ma la ni gus pas yon/ /rjes su mthun pa sbyin par bya/ /de nas rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag
34b7(rgyud 'grel): tu bla ma la yang phul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de sbyin bsod nams tshogs yin te/ /tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /gang phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas/ /deng khyod
35a1(rgyud 'grel): skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig mnyam pa ru/ /deng khyod gyur par the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas par/ /kun gyis de? khyod dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa
35a2(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas nyid/ /de nyid thob par the tshom med/ /de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi bzad ? skyed bstan par gyis/ /deng? ni 'gro ba myur du
35a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ /rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par gyis zhes pas rdo rje sems dpa' i sa la dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /de nas sngar bstan pa'i rjes su gnang ba sbyin no/ /de nas bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar bka' stsal pa ltar
35a4(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o/ /zhes lan gsum gsol to/ /de nas rin chen khyim dang glang po rta/ /yul dang mal stan rnams dang ni/ /bran dang bran mo chung ma sdug /bu mo shin tu yid 'ong sdug /gang gis bdag kyang dbul byas nas/ /lhag ma rnams lta ci zhig smos/ /zhes
35a5(rgyud 'grel): pas mnyes par bya'o/ /nges ni dban bzhi pa yon dang bcas pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya ste/ de la las so so'i sbyin sreg dang/ las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg go/ de la las so so'i sbyin sreg ni de la zhi ba la ni
35a6(rgyud 'grel): zlum po rgyar khru gang zabs su de'i phyed do/ /rgyas pa la ni khru bzhi rgyar khru do/ /zabs su khru gang ngo/ /dbang la ni zla gam rgya dang zabs ni zhi dang mthun no/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum rgyar sor nyi shu zabs su de'i phyed do/ /de dag kyang grwa bzhi
35a7(rgyud 'grel): dang sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ /grwa bzhir zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa sgo bzhir lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis mtshan pa thab kyi dbus kyi kha khyer la yang zhi ba la ni 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i phreng ba/ rgyas pa la rin po che dangrin po che'i
35b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba/ mngon par spyod pa la ni khro bo'i rdo rje gdengs ba dang de nyid kyis phreng ba'o/ /zhi ba la ni kha dog dkar po'o/ /rgyas pa la ni ser po'o/ /dbang la ni dmar po'o/ /mngon spyod la ni nag po'o/ /yam shing yang zhi ba la u duM ba ra la sogs pa'i ma can
35b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi shing las byas pa mtho gang rtse mor mnyam por spyad pa/ rtse mo gnyis pa la lo ma dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa la yang yam? shing de nyid la yang sboms su chags srid khru gang bya'o/ /dbang la ni a sho ka dang pri yang ku la sogs pa'i shing la yang
35b3(rgyud 'grel): yam shing la sogs zhi ba'i ched du bya'o/ /zhi ba la ni til la sogs pa'o/ /rgyas pa la ni zho dang 'bras la sogs pa'o/ /dbang la ni me tog gis so/ /dgug pa la ni pha wang gis shas so/ /mngon spyod la ni sha chen gyis so/ /tshe srid ba la ni dur bas
35b4(rgyud 'grel): so/ /bsrung ba la ni ku sha mar du spags pas so/ /hoM gzar la yang las dang mthun pa'i phyag mtshan gyis mtshan pa'o/ /hoM gzar dang dgang gzar dang/ mchod g.yogs la sogs pa dang/ sngags pa'i rgyan cha la sogs pa thams cad las dang rjes su mthun par kha
35b5(rgyud 'grel): dog bsgyur ro/ /sngags pa'i stang stabs kyang zhi ba la ni byang du blta'o/ /rgyas pa la ni shar du blta'o/ /mngon spyod la ni lhor blta'o/ /dbang la ni nub du blta'o/ /bsang ba la ni shar du blta'o/ /skam pa'am zhe sdang la ni lho nub tu'o/ /bskyad pa dang/ dbye ba la ni nub
35b6(rgyud 'grel): byang du'o/ /rmongs pa dang rengs pa la ni byang shar du'o/ /zhi ba la ni 'jam zhing 'bol ba'i stan dang nang tshangs can no/ /rgyab ba la ni ku sha'i stan rgya dang spangs su khru gang pa sor bzhi pa'o/ /dbang la ni pad+ma'i stan no/ /mngon spyod la ni stan med pa'am dur khrod kyi ras so/ /las so
35b7(rgyud 'grel): so'i me lha yang zhi ba la ni pa pa ka sku mdog dkar po'i 'od kyis gzi brjid kyang dkar po 'phro ba'o/ /rgyas pa la ni me lha dbang chen zhes bya ba 'od dang kha dog ser po'o// /dbang la ni me lha dmar po zhe bya ba 'od dang kha dog dmar po'o/ /mngon spyod la ni me lha
36a1(rgyud 'grel): rlung zhes bya pa 'od dang kha dog nag po'o/ /de dag kyang spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa mchod phyir thogs pa dang ral pa'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i me lha ni g.yas gnyis na dbyug to dang bskyabs sbyin/ /g.yon gnyis na
36a2(rgyud 'grel): gund+he ngang bgrang phreng/ /dbang gi me lha ni g.yas pa na dbyug pa dang lcags kyu/ /g.yon pa na bgrang phreng dang zhags pa/ /mngon spyod kyi me lha ni g.yas dang po na ral gri/ gnyis pa na dbyug pa/ /g.yon dangpo na zhags pa/ gnyis pa na phreng ba'o/ /las so
36a3(rgyud 'grel): so'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha yang zhi ba la ni rnam par snang mdzad gtso bor gyur pa/ thams cad sku mdog dkar po'o/ /rgyas pa la ni rin chen 'byung ldan gtso bor gyur pa thams cad sku mdog ser po'o/ /dbang la ni 'od dpag med gtso bor gyur pa thams cad
36a4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar bo'o/ /mngon spyod la ni mi bskyod pa gtso bor gyur pa thams cad sku mdog nag po'o/ /gzhan yang gshin rje gshed kyis dgug pa la sogs pa khro bo bcu'i las so so ni rang rang gi las gtso bor byas pa'i las dang rjes su dpag par bya'o/ /spyan
36a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis zhi bar bya ba dang/ shu li ni sa klu'i bu mos dgug pa la sogs pa dang/ gnod mdzes kyis lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug pa la sogs pa phal cher phyag rgya re re la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de yang dgug pa ni dbang gi khongs su bsdus nas bstan no/ /bskrad pa dang dbye ba dang
36a6(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa dang rengs pa dang rmugs pa ni mngon spyod kyi khongs su bsdus nus bstan pa'o/ /oM Tak+ki ni pa pa ka agna ye Tak+ki hUM dza:zhi ba'i me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM Tak+ki ni ma hi nakra agna ye Tak+ki hUM dzA:rgyas pa'i me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM Tak+ki ni ka
36a7(rgyud 'grel): ma agna? ye Tak+ki ni hUM dza:/ dbang gi me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM Tak+ki ni dza:hUM baM ho:hUM kro d+ha te dza agna ye hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): mngon spy+d kyi me lha spyan drangs pa'i sngags so/ /de dag ni so so'i sbyin sreg go /da ni las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg bshad de/ de yang
36b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i dbyibs lta bu'i thab khung bya ste/ rgyar khru gang sor bzhi dor gang khyer gyi rgya dang dpangs sor bzhi yod pa/ thab kyi nan du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad yod pa/ dbus kyi lte ba la rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa 'am rtse dgu pas mtshan pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i pad+ma la 'khor lo dang
36b2(rgyud 'grel): rin po che dang pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /mtshams kyi pad+ma ngag la utpa la dkar po dang/ sngon po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu bri'o/ /kha khyer gyi nang du sor bzhi dor ba la las dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog can/ pad+ma'i phreng ba lta bus bskor ro/ /de nyid la pad+ma'i dbyibs lta bu zhes bya'o/ /
36b3(rgyud 'grel): nang du yang mdza' skor du rdo rje phreng bas bskor ro/ /phyi rol du yang kha khyer la rdo rje phreng bas bskor ro/ /gru bzhir rdo rje bzhis brgyan pas thab khung nyid sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa lta bur brtag go /sngar bstan pa'i las so so'i thab khung ni ri'u mig dang brtag par bya ste/ de yang phyag
36b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya dgod pa ni dkyil 'khor bsgyur ba'i dbang gis ci rigs su sbyar ro/ /'dir las thams cad pa'i me lha ni lnga pa mi lta zhes bya ba yin te/ las dang rjes su mthun par bskyed do/ /las thams cad pa'i lha ni lha thams cad pa'i bdag nyid yin pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen
36b5(rgyud 'grel): po nyid de/ de yang thab kyi khor yug tu yang shing sngon pos g.yogs la de'i steng du rtswa ku sha sngon po gtsang ma'i bsang gtor gyis bsangs la/ mgo rtsa phan tshun du non pas g.yas skor du 'khor bar dgram mo/ /mchod rdzas sreg rdzas g.yas su dgram/ de da kun la
36b6(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra satwa a zhes pas lan bdun bzlas pas byin brlab par bya'o/ /hoM gzar yang yu ba khru gang rgya sor bzhi rin po che 'am pad+ma'i dbyibs su byas pa'i dkyil du rdo rje sor gnyis pas mtshan pa'o/ /dgang gzar sor gnyis thabs? su sor gcig chu la sor gnyis bya'o/ /gnyiS
36b7(rgyud 'grel): ka'i dbus su ye shes kyi lha'i yig 'bru gcig bsam mo/ /de la 'di ni rdzas dbul ba'i sngags te/ oM na ma:sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAn agna ye swAhA/ /dgan blugs kyi sngags so/ /oM agna ye swAhA/ /dmar gyi'o/ /oM sarbba pa paM da ha na badzrA ya swAhA/ /til gyi'o/ /oM badzra
37a1(rgyud 'grel): bidzA ya swAhA/ /so ba'i 'o/ /oM badzra mahA be gA ya swAhA/ /nas kyi'o/ /oM badzra mahA ba lA ya swAhA/ 'bras kyi'o/ /oM badzra g+hasma ri swAhA/ /gro'i 'o/ /oM badzra adz+nya swAhA/ u dum+ba ra'i 'o/ /oM bo d+hI brik+ShA ye swAhA/ a shwat+tha'i 'o/ /oM badzra la tra? aM? swAhA/
37a2(rgyud 'grel): blag sha'i'o/ /oM badzra ku be ra ye swAhA /n+ya grod+ha'i 'o/ oM badzra ha sa karA ya swAhA/ /a mra'i 'o/ /yam shing de dag ni urdzu na la sogs pa'i shing legs pa gang rnyed pa la bzlas pa byas la mngon par sngags te sbyin sreg bya'o/ /las kyi bye brag la ni pa la ni swAhA 'i?
37a3(rgyud 'grel): mdza' dang bcas pa'o/ /rgyas pa la ni bo Sha Ta ho'i mdza' dad bcas pa'o/ /dbang la ni ma ni h+ri'i mdza' dang bcas pa'o/ /dgug pa la ni dza'i mdza' dang bcas pa'o/ /mngon spy+d la ni hUM gi mdza' dang bcas pa'o/ /sreg rdzas dbul ba'i rim pa ni mar la sogs pa zhu
37a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdzas ni zhal du'o/ /yam shing ming rus bsrags pa'i phye ma dang/ bdug spos ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du dbul lo/ /zho dang 'bras la sogs pa'i kha zas dang til dang 'thor 'thung ni phyag du dbul lo/ /dri ni thugS kar ro/ /me tog ni spyi bo ru'o/ /zhabs bsil ni zhabs
37a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /mchod yon dang mar me ni mdun du'o/ /de la sngags pa rdo rje sems dpa' i ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa las dang rjes su mthun pas ri las bskyed pa'i me'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su a las gyur pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du gdan zhi ba 'chu'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rgyas ba
37a6(rgyud 'grel): la gser gyis gzhi/ dbang la ni me'i dkyil 'khor/ mngon spyod la rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du las dang mthun pa'i me lha dam tshig sems dpa' ji lta ba bzhin bskyed la/ de nas oM agna ye ma hA te dza sarba karmma mahA satwa ka kA ru Na tri ta swAhA/ ard+ha sA d+ha ya smi san+na
37a7(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ba zhes bya ba 'dis nam mkha' i spyod yul nas/ ye shes kyi me lha thab kyi g.yas phyogs su spyan drangs la las thams cad pa'i chu yis bsang gtor byas la/ mchod yon gyi snod du mchod yon dang/ zhabs bsil dang/ mchod pa dang stod pa tshul bzhin du byas te/ de la
37b1(rgyud 'grel): oM dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): khaM raM:mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /oM ni ri ti hUM khaM/ zhabs bsil gyi sngags so/ /oM A:badzra puShpe hUM swAhA /me tog gi sngags so/ /oM A:badzra d+hu pe hUM swAhA/ spos kyi sngags so/ /oM A:badzra gand+he? hUM swAhA/ dri chab kyi sngags so/ /oM A:badzra ?
37b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA /mar me'i sngags so/ /oM A:badzra nai bi dyA hUM swAhA/ lha bshos kyi sngags so/ /de nas dbang blugs kyis sngags kyis mar gyi dgang blugs gsum gsum dbul lo/ /drag po yin na shing mar gyi dgang blugs gsum gsum dbul? lo/ /de ltar zhal du phul yang spyan? gyi
37b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis reg pa tsam gyis mnyes bar 'gyur ba'i ngon gyis na spyan la dbul lo/ /de ni spyir mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas bye brag tu mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas shing khru gang la ras? kyis dkris la rgyal po dang/ bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ gdol pa'i khyim
37b4(rgyud 'grel): nas las dang mthun par me blangs la de sbar te btsugs nas rlung yab kyis g.yab cing/ /oM badzra dzwa raM dza la hUM phaT ces sbar ro/ /oM badzra a nA lam hA b+hu ta dzwa la ya sarbba duSh+TaM hUM phaT swAhA/ dri sh+ye ho dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM zhes bas dam tshig sems
37b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la bstims la spyi bo naS rkang pa'i bar du rnam par snang mdzad nas/ gnod mdzes kyi mthar thug pa'i bar byin gyis brlab pa dang/ gnas gsum du sku gsung thugs rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la de nas mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mar gyi
37b6(rgyud 'grel): dgang blugs gsum 'am/ bdun 'bul lo/ /de nas bkra shis kyi yab shing ngo/ /de nas mar dang/ til dang/ zho dang/ 'bras dang/ ku sha rim pa bzhin du dbul lo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha me lha ye shes sems dpa' i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil
37b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi steng du hUM las nges par byung ba'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms la/ oM e hye hi b+ha ga ban ne ta ban dza nas ma yen tsa a ka sa sa pra ti A:hUM pu dza at+ma pra si d+ha me zhes bya bas bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas mnyes par byas pa dang/ de ltar
38a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor de la ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas par la mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ sbyin sreg gi khyad par gyis mnyes par byas la yi ge gsum gyis bdag
38a2(rgyud 'grel): gi thugs kar bsdu'o/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams la mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho gas ji lta ba bzhin du mnyes par bya ste/ bzod pa gsol la/ las bcol la rang gi gnas su btang ngo/ /de nas me lha ye shes sems dpa' la mchod yon dang/ zhengS?
38a3(rgyud 'grel): bsil dang/ mchod pas mnyes par byas la mar gyi dgang blugs gsum phul te sngags 'dis bshegs su gsol lo/ /oM tri to sarbba satwa s+thi sid+d+hi ma dang ta ya tha mu gats+tsha daM b+hu ta ba sha yaM bu ra nan ma tsha mu zhes pa'o/ /de nas me lha dam tshig sems dpa' la
38a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi lhag ma dang sbyin sreg gi lhag mas ci nus kyis sbyin sreg gi chog ga rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi mngon du bgegs zhe bar byed na/ mi rus phye mas gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyi phreng bas bya'o/ /slob ma'i sdig pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir g.yon phyogs
38a5(rgyud 'grel): su tsog? bur 'dug la/ slob ma'i sor mo gung mo slob dpon gyi mtheb srin gyis bzung la / til dang de'i sngags kyi ci nus kyi zhi bar bya'o/ /de nas me lha de nyid thugs kar bsdu sbyin sreg gi yo byad de dag slob dpon gyi yin pas gzhan gyi spyad du mi rung ngo/ /slob dpon
38a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis kyang ci rigs su spyad par bya'o/ /de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang/ smon lam btab ste thab kyi nang chus bkru bar bya'o/ /de dag ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mthar rab gnas gyi cho ga bya ste/ snga dro'i dus su slob dpon mtshan nyid
38a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang ldan pas bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad tshogs par bya ste/ mchod rten dang/ tsha tsha dang/ ri mor bris pa dang/ lugs su blugs pa dang / 'bur du brkos pa la sogs pa dkyil
38b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po'i byin gyis brlab ba'i cho gas ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te/ mchod pa thams cad kyis mnyes par byas la /'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du sems can gyi don gyi phyir rab tu bzhugs par gsol ba btab ste/ de nas sbyin slog gis mnyes par byas nas bkra shis
38b2(rgyud 'grel): par byin gyis brlab pa 'di ni rab gnas kyi cho ga'o/ /thams cad stong pa zab cing phra bas na/ /rtog ge'i yul min 'khrul pas shes mi nus/ /des na de la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ /rim gnyis thabs kyi sngon 'gro'i cho ga yin/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i
38b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+ha shi ta dang /zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dbang? bzhi pa rab?
38b4(rgyud 'grel): tu byed pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa bzhugs so// */ /rgya gar skad du/ she ka tsa tu pra ka ra Na/ dbang bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa l phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos
38b5(rgyud 'grel): kun rnam dag 'od gsal rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i sku/ /'gro ba 'di kun thugs rjes khyab mdzad cir yang snang ba'i sku/ /ma lus yul du gyur pas khams gsum ro mnyam gnyis su med/ /zung 'jug gzod nas dbyer med rdo rje 'chang ba de la 'dud/ /de yi
38b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thob pa'i thabs ston pa/ /rdo rje 'chang dang tha dad med pa yi/ /lung dang man ngag brgyud pa ma nyams pa'i/ /bla ma rje btsun de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dbang bzhi'i rab tu byed pa'i gdams ngag bri/ /rnyed dang bkur sti grags spangs byams dang ldan/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
38b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ba'i thugs rje can/ /rgyud dag grol bar ston par dgyes pa po/ /mtho dman med par kun la mnyam por gzigs/ /dad ldan g.yo rgyu med cing gtang dka' gtong/ /'khor bas yid byung mya ngan 'das pa sgrub/ /sman bcud mi 'bod dus kyi bdud rnams spong/ /
39a1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rkyen thub rtse gcig bsam gtan byed/ /rten dang brten med ngo bo nyid/ /bdag byin brlob pa'i man ngag go /dang por maN+Dal lnga byas te/ /gdugs sogs me tog rin po che/ /kha dang mngar sogs ro? drug dang/ /glang po?
39a2(rgyud 'grel): rta dang rin chen khyim/ /brgyad khri bzhi? stong chos phung po/ /lha mi klu sogs bu mo sdug/ gnas lnga dag tu dbul bar bya/ /bdag byin rlobs shig gsol ba gtab/ /khong stong khyod kyi sku la med/ /bya ba la sogs chig bcad kyis/ /gsol pa
39a3(rgyud 'grel): gang bcing gnang ba spyin/ /bsrun ba'i' khor lo sngon 'gro bas/ /byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/ /gzugs brnyan lus dang byang chub sems/ /mtshan ma dbyibs dang spas pa yum/ /zhal gyis bum bas dbang bskur te/ /phyi yi bzhi pa grangs
39a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi bzhi/ /spas pa'i bzhi ba dga' bral bzhi/ /bde chen bzhi pa 'bras bu'i bzhi/ /de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang/ /yang gi sgra don kyang ldan phyir/ /'di ni bde chen bzhi pa ste/ /dang por nga rgyal sgom du gzhug /nga ni ye nas rdo rje 'chang/ /gnas skabs glo bur
39a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsgribs shing/ /rang gi mtshan nyid ngo ma shes/ /dam pa'i drin gyis de mthong nas/ /rang gi lus la de nyid gnas/ /chu khams gser dang nam mkha' 'dra/ /de ltar mos ldan blo bzang la/ /spro ba skyed pa'i bum pa zhal/ /dang po lus 'di grub pa ni/ /
39a6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga gsum dang byang chub lnga'o/ /pha ma'i sa bon bar do'i sems/ /las kyi rlung la zhon nas ni/ /ma rig pa yis len par byed/ /chags dang phrag dog dbang gis zhugs/ /mer mer ltar ltar yi ge lnga/ /gor gor ma brang gyur mtshan ma lnga/ /yan lag rdzogS
39a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rigs lnga'i sku/ /sngon du shi ba chos sku ste/ /bar do longs spyod rdzogs pa'o/ /sa bon gsum 'dres zla ba yin/ /gnas skabs gnyis ni yi ge ste/ /gnas skabs gnyis ni mtshan ma yin/ /gcig ni sprul pa'i sku rdzogs pa'o/ /rab tu byung zhing tshul
39b1(rgyud 'grel): khrims bsrung/ /mgo zlum dpung zlum chos gos gyon/ /kham zas spangs shing bcud kyis 'tsho/ /thal sbyar gus pas mgo zlos byed/ /sa bcu'i bar du dka' thub bsrungs/ /de nas sngags kyi spyad pa spyod/ /dbang thob don du gsol 'debs pa/ /sgyur? byed
39b2(rgyud 'grel): rlung gis zlog par byed/ /bcom ldan dkyil 'khor sgor bltas te/ /thal sbyar gdong g.yogs bkrol par byed/ /a hi sgra sgrogs gsol ba 'debs/ /nga rgyal byed pa'i lha yis te/ /sbas pa'i yum ni bum ba'o/ /ku sha bsrung skud shis pa brjod/ /lhan cig
39b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i gnyid kyis nyal/ /bkra shis rdzas rnam lag thogs shing/ /nam mkha' ca co'i sgras bkang nas/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /bde legs phun sum tshogs pa brjod/ /chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang/ /dril bu ming gi dbang rnams bskur/ /de
39b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis yang ni lan gnyis brjod/ /zas dang mal stan nu ma dang/ /bshang gci la sogs brtul zhugs yin/ /pha dang ma yis longs spyod la/ /'di yi bdag po byed pa yin/ /pha dang ma dang gzhan pa la/ /rag ma lus par rang stobs ldan/ /rin chen rta
39b5(rgyud 'grel): dang glang bo khyim/ /rjes su gnas nas rang dbang thob/ /'di ni bum pa'i bzhi pa'o/ /sme sha can sogs bu mo rnams/ /rgyas shing smin par gyur pa la/ /gzhan gyi spro ba skyed byed cing/ /gzhan dag snyoms par 'jug pa la/ /dga' dang mos pas 'jug byed cing/ /skye po
39b6(rgyud 'grel): cog ces mos skyed pa/ /'di ni gsang ba'i bzhi pa yin/ /phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig tu/ /'o dang 'khyud pa'i 'jib par byed/ /snyoms bar zhugs nas srub par byed/ /snang ba rang bzhin bcas pa nub/ /stong pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /semS la dmigs pa bang po'o//
39b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa rnams kun kyang dud khan nas/ /'dod chags chen po mes bzhu ste/ /a ba d+hU tI'i sgor zhugs shing/ /k+Sha yi sgo ni ma phye bar/ /mched pa rang bzhin bcas pa nub/ /shin tu stong pa zhes brjod do/ /sems la dmigs pa gnyis pa yin/ /ye shes tsam
40a1(rgyud 'grel): la snyoms 'jug cing/ /yi ge k+Sha yi sgo phye ba/ /bde chen bde ba chen po ni/ /skad cig tsam la nyams myong ba/ /dpal du yid ches byed pa yin/ /log rtog mtshan ma ma lus 'gog /nyer thob rang bzhin dang bcas grub?/ /stong pa chen?
40a2(rgyud 'grel): po zhes brjod de/ /sems la dmis pa gsum pa'o/ /gong ma de la rtog dpyod byed/ /glan po che yi lcags kyu 'dra/ /mchog dan dga' bral dbus dg tu/ /mtshan nyid dmigs la brtan par gyis/ /thun dam zla phyed zla ba ? /bskal pa g.ye shes ?
40a3(rgyud 'grel): la sbyor/ /stong pa gsum ni ro mnyam pa/ /thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba/ /sems la dmigs pa bzhi pa'o/ /'di ni gsum pa'i bzhi pa yin/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /dbugs gtod ? pa ma yin te/ /
40a4(rgyud 'grel): spyan phye btsums pa ma yin no/ /skye ba ma yin sbu? ba min/ /gsung ba ma yin mi gsung min/ /phyir ni yul la mi dpyod cing/ /nang du sems la mi rtog go/ sems gang gis ni byis pa rnams/ /'khor pa'i bcing bas 'ching bar 'gyur/ /sems gang giS
40a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rnal 'byor pa/ /bde gshegs gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /bya ba thamS cad blos btang la/ /gang ltar gnas pa'i don la bzhag /ma bcos pa nyid ma nor ba/ /bde ba chen po rang so nyid/ /don du snang ba rang bzhin med/ /dngos por gsal ba rtog pa med/ /chu dang
40a6(rgyud 'grel): rnyog ma de bzhin no/ /byi zhing lci ba gzeng bstod cing/ /mthong zhing 'phyang ba rang sor bzhag /cung zad cung zad goms byas pas/ /gong nas gong du khyad par 'gro/ /mthar ni mi rtog ting 'dzin dag /lhun gyis grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /sems kyi 'jun
40a7(rgyud 'grel): bu btang la bzhag /bla ma nyidkyang mnyam gzhag la/ /slob ma byin gyis brlab par bya/ thun gyi nges pa yod min te/ /ci tsam gnas kyi bar du bzhag /'dod pa'i longs spyod kun brten cing/ /lus kyi 'byung la ro yang mnyam/ /bzhi pa'i dbang bskur cho
40b1(rgyud 'grel): ga'o/ /de yi don ni bshad bya ste/ /e baM ma ya'i? yi ge bzhin/ /don bzhi dang ni sbyad bar bya/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa'o/ /oM ni 'jug pa bi ni gnas/ /oM ni bsrung ba ya ni grogs/ /e ni las dang baM ni chos/ /ma ni ru pha?  a? dA dka' / /oM? ni snang bstong
40b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /baM ni mched pa shin tu stong/ /ma ni nyer thob chen po stong/ /ya ni ro mnyam thams cad stong/ /e ni ma thob thob par byed/ /baM ni thob pa bstan bar byed/ /ma ni gong nas gong du 'gro ma ni cha 'dir rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /e ni rgan bo dang ma dang/ /gzhon
40b3(rgyud 'grel): dang lang tsho bab pa'o/ /de bzhin bdag na ma khris pa dang/ /rlung dang 'du ba cha mnyam pa'o/ /de bzhin gti mug zhe sdang dang/ /'dod chags dug gsum cha mnyam pa'o/ /ti pa skyes bu las zin dang/ /gzhon pa'i dondang spyad thag chad/ /go rim bzhin du shes par bya
40b4(rgyud 'grel): e ka ka la zhes pa ste/ /rang gi rgyud la cher te bltos/ /skyes bu ma bcos dang du gnas/ /bla ma dm pas mi rtag sbyar/ /rang dbang? med par rnam rtog phrogs/ /baM ni mar me rgyan tshe dang/ /dig? ma'i rmi lam khyung chen 'dra/ /brtan par zung la mnyam pa zhog /rjes thob bzhin ni sgyu ma
40b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /ma ni nor bu so ka'i be'u/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor o 'dra/ /legs par spyod la rtag tu bsrungs/ /ya ni seng+ge glang chen dang/ /sbyon pa'am lceb pa lta bu yin/ /mgon po'i tsarya dus dang sbyor/ /sngags kyi tsarya gdod nas spyod/ /zhi pa'i cho ga'i gdams pa ste/
40b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs dang dus dang gnas dang ni/ /bya ba spyod pa 'di ma nges/ /rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la/ /nas 'dun so 'du ba nyon mongs sbyar/ /kho na zla ba bcu gnyis pa'o/ /? ldan ni sngon sangs rgyas/ /rten can las la brten pa ste/ /las ni lus ngag nyid kyi las/ /de las rgyas
40b7(rgyud 'grel): 'debs phyag rgya yin/ /dog 'bral? la ni bzhi pa brjod/ /sems la dmigs pa ji bzhin du/ /sgem pa sems la dmigs pa ste/ /rten can zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /rten med rang lus thabs ldan nam/ /'khor lo bzhi dang 'khor lo gnyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dbang?
41a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs sam/ /rnam par shes pa thad? sbyor? ram/ yi ge hUM gi dbab thabs sam/ /gtum po 'am mkha' 'gro'i byin brlabs sam/ /bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pas so/ /nyams su myong ba bzhi pa ste/ /rnam shes rlung dang ro gcig pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid ? dang rje ?
41a2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag bdun dang ldan pa ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa kha sbyor bde chen rang bzhin med/ /snying rjes nges gang rgyun mi 'chad cing 'gog pa med/ /lha la dmigs shing 'dod la spyad/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyu ru bshad/ /las kyi phyag rgya rang 'od yum/ /ye shes phyag rgyas
41a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas btab cing/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub dang dbang gnyis dus so/ /tshogs dang spyod pa ro mnyam dus/ /yum dang bcas pa'i rgyu ru bshad/ /bde la stong pas rgyas btab cing/ /ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba las/ /bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa
41a4(rgyud 'grel): yid ? bcu drug char yang me thod do/ /dngos kun rang gi mtshan nyid las/ /ku dan yod pa ma yin na/ /lha sogs ye shes snang ba las/ /gzhan du dmigs pa smos ci dgos/ /chu'i nang gi zla ba ni/ /bden pa ma yin rdzun pa min/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor 'khor/
41a5(rgyud 'grel): lo yang/ /rang bzhin med lugs de ltar snang/ /rnam dag tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang/ /smon lam snying rje gang ba'i rgyu/ /thog mdza' med pa'i rdo rje sems/ /dus dang phyogs ris rnam par spangs/ /chu bo'i gzhung ltar rgyun mi 'chad/ /'di dang 'di la byas ni bral/
41a6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs la sogs 'dod lnga rnams/ /ma bkag bde chen rgyan du shes/ /gser 'gyur rtsi bzhin shes pas 'grub/ /bde chen bde ba chen po'i sku/ /rang snang rigs mas nyer brgyan ba?/ /'og min gnas su dus rtag tu/ /mtshan dang dbye byang 'bar bas bzhugs//
41a7(rgyud 'grel): gang dang gang gis 'dul 'gyur pa/ /de de bzhin du so sor snang/ /mos pa'i dbang gis tha dad pa/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul bar mdzad/ /rgyud gzhan dag las bshad pa ni/ /sbyang bya gsum dang ma rigs pa/ /sbyong byed smin byed dbang bzhi po/ /grol
41b1(rgyud 'grel): byed rgyud dang sngags dang chos/ /gsang ba'i rim pas bzhi pa na 'dod/ /'di nyid yi ge spyi dang sbas/ /mthar thug yin pas bzhi par 'dod/ /mkha' 'dra chos sku stong pa las/ /rtog med ye shes 'ja''dras?/ /rlung dang ye shes ting 'dzin gyis/ /'bad ? bral
41b2(rgyud 'grel): bas lhun gyis grub/ /dka' thub dka' spyad 'dir mi dgos/ /dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pa/ /lus skams nas ni sems gdungs nas/ /sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig byed par zang/ /khrus dang gtsang sbras gdung ba skyed/ /'dod pa lnga ni ma spangs par/ /dka' thub kyis ma?
41b3(rgyud 'grel): ma gdungs par/ /bde bas byang chub tshe 'dir 'thog /bskal pa grangs med gsum du ni/ /lus dang srog la ma bltas kyang/ /bde ba chen po rnyed par dka' / /phyag rgya chen po rdo rje ye shes kyis/ /dbang bskur bzhi pa'i gdams pa byas pa yin/ /'gro kun
41b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mthong nas ni/ /zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob par shog/ dbang bzhi pa'i rab tu byed pa/ slob dpon na gardzu? nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shan+ti garb+ha dang/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas
41b5(rgyud 'grel): btsas kyis bsgyur ba'o// //byang chub sems kyi 'grel ba zhes bya ba slob dpon glu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o// */ /rgya gar skad du/ /bod+ha tsit+ti pi bar Na nA ma/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems kyi 'grel ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
41b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ /phung po khams dang skye mched gyi/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa/ /chos bdag med pas mnyam nyid pas/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /zhes bya ba 'byung ngo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
41b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis ji ltar byang chub chen por thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du /bdag gis kyang sems can ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ mgrol ba rnams grol ba dang/ dbugs ma byung ba rnams dbugs
42a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyung ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub la mchis kyi par du byang chub chen por sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsung? sngags
42a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis de ltar kun rdzob kyi rnam pas byang chub kyi sems smon pa'i rang bzhin can bskyed nas/ don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i stobs kyis bskyed par byas yin pas de'i phyir de'i rang bzhin bshad par bya'o/ byang chub
42a3(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi bdag nyid dngos/ /dpal ldan rdo rje rnams btung de/ /byang chub sems kyi bsgom pa ni/ /srid pa 'jig de bdag gis bshad/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems / /bdag dang phung sogs rnam rig gi /rtog ba rnams kyis ma bsgribs pa/ /rtag tu stong
42a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid mtshan nyid bzhed/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'bad pas bsgom par bya ba yin/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyis/ /byang chub sems 'di rtag tu bsgoms/ /mu stegs can gyis gang brtags pa/ /bdag de rig pas rnam dpyad na/ /phung
42a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun gyi nang rnams na/ /gang zhig gnas kyang rnyed ma yin/ /phung rnams yod kyi de rtag min/ /de yang bdag gi ngo bo min/ /gang yang rtag dang mi rtag gnyis/ /rten dang rten pa'i dngos bo med/ /bdag ces bya ste yod min na/ /byed po zhes bya ga la rtag /
42a6(rgyud 'grel): chos can yod na chos rnams la/ /'jig rten na ni spyod pa 'jug /gang phyir rtag pas don byed pa/ /rim dang cig car gyis min pa/ /de phyir phyi rol nang du ni/ /rtag pa'i dngos de med pa nyid/ /gal te nus na ci de ltos/ /de ni cig car dngos ba byin 'gyur/ /
42a7(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig dngos gzhan la ltos la/ /de ni rtag dang nus ldan min/ /gal te dngos na rtag min te/ /dngos rnams rtag tu skad cig phyir/ /gang phyir mi rtag dngos po la/ /byed pa po nyid bkag pa med/ /bdag sogs bral ba'i 'jig rten 'di/ /phung po khams dang
42b1(rgyud 'grel): skye mched dang/ /gzung 'dzin blo yis 'joms par 'gyur/ /phan par bzhed pa rnams kyis ni/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang/ /'du byed rnam shes phung po lnga/ /de ltar nyan thos rnams la gsungs/ /rkang gnyis mchog gis rtag tu yang/ /gzugs ni dbu ba
42b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzas? 'dra snang/ /tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra/ /'du shes smig rgyu dang mtshungs shing/ /'du byed chu shing dang 'dra la/ /rnam shes sgyu ma lta bu zhes/ /phung po bstan pa 'di lta bu/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsungs/ /'byung chen bzhi yi rang bzhin can/ /gzugs
42b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi phung por rab tu bshad/ /lhag ma gzugs med nyid du ni/ /med na mi 'byung phyir na 'grub/ /de dag rnams kyi mig gzugs sogs/ /khams rnams bshad pa de dag nyid/ /skye mched dag ni gzung ba dang/ /'dzin par yang ni shes par bya/ /gzugs rdul dbang
42b4(rgyud 'grel): shes skyed min te/ /de ni dbang po las 'das yin/ /'dus pas de rnams skyed byed na/ /tshogs pa de yang mi 'dod do/ /phyogs kyi dbye bas phye ba yis/ /rdul phran la yang dbye ba mthong/ /gang la cha shas kyis brtags pa/ /der ni rdul phran ji ltar 'thad/ /phyi rol
42b5(rgyud 'grel): don ni rnam cig la/ /tha dad shes pa 'jug par 'gyur/ /yid 'ong gzugs ni gang yin pa/ /de nyid gzhan la gzhan du 'gyur/ /bud med gzugs ni gcig pu la/ /ro dang 'dod bya bza' ba la/ /kun rgyu chags can khyi rnams bzhin/ /rnam par rtog pa gsum
42b6(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /don mtshungs ba yis don byed ba/ /rmi lam gnod pa bzhin min nam/ /rmi lam sang pa'i gnas skabs la/ /don byed pa la khyad par med/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo yis/ /rnam shes snang ba gang yin pa/ /rnam shes las ni tha dad par/ /phyi rol don ni
42b7(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' yang med/ /de phyir dngos po'i ngo bor ni/ /phyi don rnam pa kun tu med/ /rnam shes so sor snang ba 'di/ /gzugs kyi rnam par snang bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar skye bo sems rmongs pas/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za yi/ /grong khyer la sogs mthong ba ltar/ /de bzhin
43a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs sogs snang ba yin/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /phung po khams sogs bstan pa yin/ /sems tsam po la gnas nas ni/ /skal chen rnams kyis de yang spangs/ /rnam par shes par smra pa la/ /sna tshogs 'di
43a2(rgyud 'grel): ni sems su grub/ /rnam shes rang bzhin gang zhe na/ /nga ni de nyid bshad bya ste/ /'di dag thams cad sems tsam zhes/ /thub pas bstan pa gang mdzad de/ /byis pa rnams kyi skrag pa ni/ spang ba'i phyir yin de nyid min/ /kun brtags? dang ni
43a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dbang dang/ /yongs su grub pa 'di nyid ni/ /stong nyid bdag nyid gcig pu yi/ /ngo bo sems la brtags pa yin/ /theg chen dga' ba'i bdag nyid la/ /chos la bdag med mnyam pa nyid/ /sems ni gdod nas ma skyes te/ /sangs
43a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyis ni mdor bsdus gsungs/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa pa rnams kyis/ /rang gi sems kyi dbang byas te/ /gnas yongs gyur nas dag pa'i sems/ /so sor rang gi spyod yul brjod/ /'das pa gang yin de ni med/ /ma 'ongs pa ni thob pa min/ /gnaS
43a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir gnas ni yongs gyur pa/ /da lta ba la ga la yod/ /de ji ltar de ltar snang min/ /ji ltar snang de de ltar yin/ /rnam shes bdag med ngo bo ste/ /rten gzhan rnam par shes pa med/ /ji ltar khab len dang nye bas/ /lcags ni myur du yongs su 'khor/ /de la semS
43a6(rgyud 'grel): ni yod min te/ /sems dang ldan zhing snang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes ni/ /bden min bden pa bzhin du ni/ /gang tshe? sgra 'od g.yo bar 'gyur/ /de tshe srid pa 'dzin par byed/ /ji ltar rgya mche dang ni shing/ /sems ni med kyang g.yo par 'gyur/ /
43a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes ni/ /lus brten nas ni g.yo ba yin/ /lus med na ni rnam par shes/ /yod pa min zhes yongs rtog na/ /de yi so so rang rig nyid/ /ci 'dra zhes kyang brjod par gyis/ /so so rang rig nyid brjod pas/ /de ni dngos po nyid du
43b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /'di de yin zhes brjod pa ni/ /nus min zhes kyang brjod pa yin/ /rang la de bzhin gzhan dag la/ /nges pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ /rtag tu 'khrul pa med par ni/ /mkhas rnams rab tu 'jug pa yin/ /shes pas shes bya rtogs pa ste/ /shes bya med par shes pa
43b2(rgyud 'grel): med/ /de ltar na ni rig bya dang/ /rig byed med ces cis mi 'dod/ /sems ni ming tsam yin pa ste/ /ming las gzhan du dga' yang med/ /ming tsam du ni rnam rig blta/ /ming yang rang bzhin med pa yin/ /nang dam de bzhin phyi rol lam/ /yang na gnyis ka'i bar dag tu/ /rgyal ba
43b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi sems ma rnyed/ /de phyir sgyu ma'i rang bzhin sems/ /kha dog dbyibs kyis dbye ba 'am/ /gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa 'am/ /skyes pa bud med ma ning sogs/ /ngo bo sems ni gnas pa yin/ /mdor na sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /gzigs par ma gyur gzigs mi
43b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /ji lta bur na gzigs par 'gyur/ /dngos po zhes bya rnam rtog yin/ /rnam rtog med pa stong pa yin/ /gang du rnam rtog snang gyur pa/ /der ni stong nyid ga la yod/ /rtogs bya rtogs byed rnam pa'i sems/ /
43b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis ma gzigs/ /gang na rtogs bya rtogs byed yod/ /der ni byang chub yod ma yin/ /mtshan nyid med cing skye ba med/ /yod? gyur ma yin dag lam bral/ /mkha' dang byang chub sems dang ni/ /byang chub gnyis med mtshan nyid can/ /
43b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub snying po la bzhugs pa'i/ /bdag nyid chen po'i sangs rgyas dang/ /brtse ldan kun gyis dus kun tu/ /stong pa mkha' dang mtshungs par mkhyen/ /de phyir chos rnams kun gyi gzhi/ /zhi zhing sgyu ma dang mtshungs par/ /gzhi med srid pa 'jig byed pa'i
43b7(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid 'di rtag tu bsgom/ / skye med dang ni stong nyid dang/ /bdag med ces byar stong pa nyid/ /bdag nyid dman pa gang sgom pa/ /de de sgom par byed pa min/ /dge dang mi dge'i rnam rtog gi/ rgyun chad pa yi mtshan nyid can/ /stong nyid sangs rgyas
44a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsungs gzhan/ /de dag stong pa nyid mi bzhed/ /sems la dmigs pa med pa yi/ /gnas pa nam mkha' i mtshan nyid yin/ /de dag stong nyid sgom pa ni/ /nam mkha' sgom par bzhad pa yin/ /stong nyid seng+ge'i sgra yis
44a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /smra ba thams cad skrag par mdzad/ /gang dang gang du de dag bzhugs/ /de dang der ni stong nyid 'gyur/ /gang gi rnam shes skad cig ma/ /de yi de ni rtag ma yin/ /sems ni mi rtag nyid yin na/ /stong pa nyid du ji ltar 'gal/ /mdor ? sangs rgyas la
44a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis ni/ /sems ni mi rtag nyid bzhed na/ /de dag sems ni stong nyid du/ /ci'i phyir na bzhed mi 'gyur/ /thog ma nyid nas sems kyi ni/ /rang bzhin rtag tu med par 'gyur/ /dngos po rang bzhin gyis grub pa/ /rang bzhin med nyid brjod pa
44a4(rgyud 'grel): min/ /de skad brjod na sems kyi ni/ /bdag gi gnas pa spangs pa yin/ /rang gi rang bzhin las 'das pa/ /de ni chos rnams chos ma yin/ /ji lta bur ram mngar ba dang/ /me yi rang bzhin tsha ba bzhin/ /de bzhin chos rnams
44a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'dod/ /stong nyid rang bzhin du brjod pas/ /gang zhig chad par smra ba min/ /des ni rtag pa nyid du yang/ /'ga' zhig smras pa ma yin no/ /ma rig nas brtsams dga' ba yin/ /mthar thug yan lag bcu gnyis kyi/ /brten
44a6(rgyud 'grel): nas byung ba'i bya ba ni/ /kho bo rmi lam sgyu 'drar 'dod/ /yan lag bcu gnyis 'khor lo 'di/ /srid pa'i khyim du 'khor ba ste/ /de las gzhan du sems can gang/ /las 'bras spyod par 'dod pa med/ /ji ltar me long la brten nas/ /bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang
44a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa/ /de ni der 'tho ma yin zhing/ /de med par yang de yod min/ /de bzhin phung po nyid mtshams sbyor/ /srid pa gzhan du skye ba dang/ /'pho ba med par mkhas rnams kyis/ /rtag tu nges par bya ba yin/ /mdor na stong pa'i chos rnams la/ /chos rnams
44b1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa skye bar 'gyur/ /byed po las 'bras longs spyod pa/ /kun rdzob tu ni rgyal bas bstan/ /ji ltar rnga yi sgra dang ni/ /de bzhin myu gu tshogs pas bskyed/ /phyi yi rten cing 'brel 'byung ba/ /rmi lam sgyu ma dang mtshungs 'dod/ /chos rnams rgyu las skyes pa ni/ /nam yang
44b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gal bar mi 'gyur te/ /rgyu ni rgyu nyid kyis stong pas/ /de ni skye ba med par rtogs/ /chos rnams kyi ni skye ba med/ /stong nyid yin par rab tu bshad/ /mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni/ /chos kun zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /de nyid ji bzhin bshad pas na/ /kun rdzob rgyun ni
44b3(rgyud 'grel): 'chad mi 'gyur/ /kun rdzob las ni tha dad par/ /de nyid dmigs pa ma yin te/ /kun rdzob stong pa nyid du bshad/ /stong pa kho na kun rdzob yin/ /med na mi 'byung nges pa'i phyir/ /byas dang mi rtag ji bzhin no/ /kun rdzob nyon mong las las byung/ /las ni sems laS
44b4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba yin/ /sems ni bag chags rnamS kyis bsags/ /bag chags bral na bde ba ste/ /bde ba'i sems ni zhi ba nyid/ /sems zhi ba ni rmongs mi 'gyur/ /rmongs med de nyid rtogs pa ste/ /de nyid rtogs pa grol thob 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mdza' / /mtshan ma
44b5(rgyud 'grel): med dang don dam nyid/ /byang chub sems mchog de nyid dang/ /stong nyid du yang bshad pa yin/ /gang dag stong nyid mi shes pa/ /de dag thar pa'i rten ma yin/ /'gro drug srid pa'i btson rang ni/ /rmongs pa de dag 'khor bar 'gyur/ /de ltar stong pa nyid 'di ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis
44b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom byas na/ /gzhan gyi don la chags pa'i blo/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /gang dag pha dang ma dang ni/ /gnyen bshes gyur bas bdag la sngon/ /phan pa byas par gyur pa yis/ sems can de dag rnams la ni/ /byas pa bzo bar gyur par bya/ /srid
44b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i btson rang sems can ni/ /nyon mongs me yis gdungs rnams la/ /bdag gis sdug bsngal byin pa ltar/ /de bzhin bde ba sbyin par rigs/ /'jig rten bde 'gro ngan 'gro yis/ /'dod dang mi 'dod 'bras bu de/ /sems can rnams la phan pa dang/ /gnod pa las ni ? 
45a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems can bsten pas sangs rgyas kyis/ /go 'bangs bla med nyid 'gyur na/ /lha dang mi yi longs spyod par/ /tshangs dang dbang po drag po dang/ /'jig rten skyong bas brten de dag /sems can phan pa tsam zhig gis/ /ma drangs
45a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni 'gro gsum 'dir/ /'ga' yang med la mtshar ci yod/ /sems dmyal dud 'gro yi dags su/ /sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma'i dngos/ /sems can rnams kyis myong ba gang/ /de ni sems can gnod las byung/ /bkres skom phan tshun bdeg pa dang/ /gzir ba yi
45a3(rgyud 'grel): ni sdug bsngal nyid/ /bzlog par dka' zhing zad med de/ /sems can gnod pa'i 'bras bu yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid dang/ /de 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro gang/ /sems can gang gi rnam smin kyang/ /ngo bo gnyis su shes par bya/ /dngos po kun gyis rten bya
