45a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /rang gi lus bzhin bsrung bar bya/ /sems can rnams la chags bral ba/ /dug bzhin 'bang pas spang bar bya/ /nyan thos rnams ni chags bral bas/ /byang chub dman pa thob min nam/ /sems can yongs su ma dor bas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byang chub
45a5(rgyud 'grel): thob/ /de ltar phan dang mi phan pa'i/ /'bras bu 'byung bar dpyad pa na/ /de dag skad cig gcig kyang ni/ /rang don gnas shing ji ltar gnas/ /snying rjes brtan pa'i rtsa ba can/ /byang sems myu gu las byung ba/ /gzhan don gcig 'bras byang chub ni/ /rgyal ba'i sras
45a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams sgom par byed/ /gang zhig bsgom pas brtan pa ni/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis thed nas/ /bsam gtan bde ba dor nas kyang/ /mnar med pa yang 'jug par byed/ /'di ni ngo mtshar 'di bsngags 'os/ /'di ni dam pa'i tshul lugs mchog /de dag rnams kyi
45a7(rgyud 'grel): rang lus dang/ /nor rnams byin pa ngo mtshar min/ /chos rnams stong pa 'di shes nas/ /las dang 'bras bu sten pa gang/ /de ni ngo mtshar bas ngo mtshar/ /rmad du 'byung bas rmad du 'byung/ /sems can bskyab pa'i bsam pa can/ /de dag srid pa'i 'dam skyes
45b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /de byung nyes pas mgos pa/ /chu yi pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin/ /kun bzang la sogs rgyal ba'i sras/ /nyon mongs bud shing bsregs mod kyi/ /de lta'ang snying rjes brlan 'gyur cing/ /snying rje'i dbang du gyur pa rnams/ /gshegs dang bltam dang rol pa dang/ /?
45b2(rgyud 'grel): nas 'byung dang dka' ba spyod/ /byang chub che dang bdud sde 'joms/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis zhus pa dang/ /de bzhin du ni mya ngan las/ /'das pa stong par mdzad pa yin/ /tshangs dang dbang po khyab 'jug dang/ /drag sogs gzugs su sprul mdzad nas/
45b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /thugs rje'i rang bzhin can gar mdzad/ /srid pa'i lam la skyo rnams la/ /ngal so'i don du theg pa che/ /'byung ba'i ye shes gnyis po yang/ /gsungs pa yin te don dam min/ /ji srid sangs rgyas kyis ma bskul/ /de srid ye shes
45b4(rgyud 'grel): lus dngos can/ /ting nge 'dzin myos pas rgyal 'gyur ba/ /nyan thos de dag gnas par 'gyur/ /bskul na sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni/ /sems can don la chags gyur cing/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /
45b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis bag chags yod pa'i phyir/ /bag chags sa bon brjod pa yin/ /sa bon de dngos tshogs pa ni/ /srid pa'i myu gu skyed par byed/ /'jig rten mgon rnams kyis bstan pa/ /sems can bsam dbang rjes 'gro ba/ /'jig rten du ni thabs mang po/ /rnam
45b6(rgyud 'grel): pa mang po tha dad 'gyur/ /zab cing rgya che'i dbye ba dang/ /la lar gnyis ka'i mtshan nyid can/ /tha dad bstan pa yin yang ni/ /stong dang gnyis med tha dad min/ /gzungs rnams dang ni sa rnams dang/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin gang dag/ de dag byang chub sems kyi
45b7(rgyud 'grel): char/ /kun mkhyen rnams kyis gsungs pa yin/ /lus ngag yid kyis brtags par ni/ /de ltar sems can don byed pa/ /stong nyid rtsod par smra rnams la/ /chad pa'i rtsod pa nyid yod min/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa la/ /bdag nyid che ste mi gnas pa/ /de
46a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni /mi gnas mya ngan 'das 'dir bshad/ /snying rje ro gcig bsod nams gyur /stong nyid ro ni mchog gyur pa/ /bdag dang gzhan don sgrub don du/ /gang 'thung de dag rgyas sras yin/ /dngos po kun gyis
46a2(rgyud 'grel): de la 'dud/ /srid pa gsum na rtag mchod 'os/ /sangs rgyas gdung ni 'tsho ba don du/ /'jig rten 'dren pa de dag bzhugs/ /byang chub sems 'di theg chen po/ /mchog ni yin par bshad pa ste/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i dbang? pa yis/ /byang chub
46a3(rgyud 'grel): sems ni bskyed par gyis/ /rang dang gzhan don bsgrub don du/ /srid na thabs gzhan yod ma yin/ /byang chub sems ni ma gtogs pas/ /sangs rgyas kyis sngar thabs ma gzigs/ /byang chub sems bskyed tsam gyis ni/ /bsod nams phung po gang thob gcig
46a4(rgyud 'grel): gal te gzugs can yin na ni/ /nam mkha' gang ba las ni lhag /skyes bu gang zhig skad cig tsam/ /byang chub sems ni sgom byed pa/ /de yi bsod nams phung po ni/ /rgyal ba yis kyang bgrang ma sbyed/ /nyon mongs med pa'i rin chen sems/ /'di ni nor
46a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gcig pu ste/ /nyon mongs bdud sogs chom rkun gyis/ /gnod min phrogs par bya ba min/ /ji ltar 'khor bar sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i smon lam ni/ /mi g.yo de ltar blo nyid ni/ /byang chub sems gzhol rnams kyis bya/ /do
46a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshar gyis kyang khyed cag gis/ /ji ltar bshad pa la 'bad kyis/ /de rjes kun bzang spyod pa ni/ /rang nyid kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /rgyal mchog rnams kyis bstod pa yi/ /byang chub sems ni bstod byas pa'i/ /bsod nams mtshungs med deng du bdag
46a7(rgyud 'grel): gis thob pa gang yin pa/ /de yis srid pa'i rgya mtshe dpa' klong nang du nub pa yi/ /sems can rkang gnyis dbang pos bsten pa'i lam du 'gro bar shog/ byang chub sems kyi 'grel ba slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa
46b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po gu Na a ka ra dang/ lots+tsha bar bzhi bshes gnyen gyis bsgyur cing zhus/ slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ? warma dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tsha ba nyi ma grags kyis bcos pa// //rgya gar skad du ? d+he
46b2(rgyud 'grel): tsi tA bi ba ra Na/ /bod skad du / byang chub sems kyi 'grel ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i 'grel pa bshad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad sems kyis rnam par brtags pa'i zhes gsungs
46b3(rgyud 'grel): bas re zhig sems ni de nyid kyi rang bzhin ci zhig zhes des par rtog pa na/ /dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /chos bdag med par mnyam nyid pas/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes ba/ /stong pa
46b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /smras pa 'di yi don ci yin zhe na/ brjod pa/ dngos po dang bral zhes te/ dngos po'i sgras bdag la sogs pa mngon bar brjod do/ /'di skad du sems de ni bdag dang/ sems can dang/ srog dang/ gsong? dang/ skyes
46b5(rgyud 'grel): bu dang/ gang zag dang/ shes las skyes dang/ shed bu dang/ byed po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la bya ba'i mtshan nyid can yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nyid kyi phyir bdag la sogs pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin
46b6(rgyud 'grel): na/ sems de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa lta ga la yod ces smras par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir dngos po thams cad dang bral zhing bdag dang 'dzin btsam gyis yang dag par bskyed ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad bdag tu 'dzin pas yang rig par bskyed ba'i phyir
46b7(rgyud 'grel): sems ni de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhe na/ sems de ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir/ phung po khams dang skye mched dang/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs zhes gsungs so/ /'di ltar re zhig phung po la sogs pa nyid kyi dngos
47a1(rgyud 'grel): po don dam par ma dmigs na/ sems de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ ji ltar zhe na/ re zhig gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dngos po rnaMs dngoS po med pa nyid de/ gzugs kyi phung po ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i
47a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs so/ /'byung ba ni bzhi ste/ sa dang chu dang/ me dang rlung ngo/ /'byung ba las gyur pa lnga ste/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya'o/ /sa la sogs pa 'byung ba rnams dang/ gzugs la sogs pa 'byung ba las gyur pa de dag re re zhing tha dad pa'i dngos
47a3(rgyud 'grel): po nyid du ma dmigs te/ gang du gcig tu yod pa der gzhan yang yod pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i phyir gzugs ni ming tsam du kun tu brtags pa'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po ni gzugs kyi phung pos stong zhes gsungs pa las ni gzugs kyi phung po yang yongs su
47a4(rgyud 'grel): ma grub pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba'i phung po yongs su ma grub ste /ji lta zhe na/ tshor ba rnam gsum mo/ /bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ sdug bsngal ma yin zhing bde ba yang ma yin pa de dag phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir te/ sdug bsngal ba la bltos nas bde ba dang/ bde ba
47a5(rgyud 'grel): la bltos nas sdug bsngal du 'dogs bar byed do/ /chos gang zhig gcig pur gnas pa dmigs pa med pa de ni rdzas nyid du yod pa yin te/ ring po dang thung du bzhin no/ /gzhan du tshor ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/ lus las byung ba dang/ sems las byung ba'i
47a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes par yang re zhig lus ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i phyir ma dmigs so/ /de'i phyir lus med pa'i phyir lus las 'byung ba'i tshor ba ma grub bo/ /sems kyang yul na mi gnas pa/ phyogs na mi gnas pa/ /gzugs med pa /
47a7(rgyud 'grel): /bstan du med pa/ rab tu mi gnas pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par mi rig par gsungs na/ tshor ba de ni ci 'dra zhig de'i phyir sems las byung ba yang ma grub bo/ /de'i phyir tshor ba'i phung po'o zhes gsungs pa las na/ tshor ba'i phung po yang
47b1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su ma grub bo/ /'du shes kyi phung po yang med tsam gyis dngos po nyid de / 'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can yin la/ de ltar re zhig gang dag la mtshan mar bzung bar bya ba'i dngos po yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma
47b2(rgyud 'grel): can yang yod pa ma yin no/ /'du shes kyi phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung pos stong ngo zhes gsungs pa las na 'du shes kyi phung po yang yongs su ma grub po/ /'du byed kyi phung po yang yongs su ma grub ste/ tshogs pa tsam gyi phyir ro/ /'du byed kyi phung po ni tshor
47b3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ sems dpa' dang 'du shes dang 'dun pa dang reg pa dang blo dang/ dran pa dang yid la byed pa dang mos pa la sogs pa mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung la sogs pa'i skye ba la sogs pa mtshungs par mi ldan bdag la brjod na/ sems
47b4(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i chos rnams dang skye ba la sogs pa dag kyang re re zhing la skye ba yod pa ma yin no/ /'du byed kyi phung po ni las kyi mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir yang med pa nyid do/ /byed pa po med pa'i phyir bya ba yang dngos po med do/ /'du byed kyi phung po ni
47b5(rgyud 'grel): 'du byed kyi phung po'i dngos pos stong ngo zhes gsungs pa las na 'du byed kyi phung po yongs su grub pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang yongs su ma grub ste/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po nyid ni mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus
47b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams yin la/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa de dag kyang re re zhing rang gi ngo bo ma dmigs so/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung zhing med na mi 'byung ste/ mig dang
47b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs med na mig gi rnam par shes pa ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ltar na re zhig mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma grub po/ /tshig de nyid kyis rna ba dang/ sna dang lce dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang shes par bya'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa
48a1(rgyud 'grel): yang yid 'das pa dang ma 'ongs ba'i chos thams cad kyi rten can yin na/ ci ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams yid kyi rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i rkyen du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis re zhig 'das pa ni de nyid dang/ lhan
48a2(rgyud 'grel): cig 'gags shing ma 'ongs ba ni mthob pa yin la/ da ltar byung ba rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig pa yang gnas pa yod pa ma yin zhes gsungs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang rnam par shes pa'i phung pas stong ngo/ /zhes pa las na rnam par
48a3(rgyud 'grel): shes ba'i phung po yang yongs su ma grub bo/ /de ltar phung po de nyid khams dang skye mched du bstan pa'i phyir logs su dag par mi bya ste/ sa bon med pas myu gu med pa bzhin du phung po rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis de rnams kyang rang bzhin med par
48a4(rgyud 'grel): grub po/ /de'i phyir sems ni phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las/ sems ni sngon
48a5(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ btsong kha dang/ shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog dang/ ring po dang/ zung du dang/ zlum po dang/ gru gsum dang/ gru bzhi la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ ma ning gi rnam pa ma mthong ngo zhes ba dang/
48a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i bdag po sems ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
48a7(rgyud 'grel): mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba'i rang bzhin ma yin no/ /zhes pa nas rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na ma dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/ /de ltar na re zhig sems de ni gzung ba ma yin no/ /ji
48b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'dzin pa yang ma yin pa de ltar brjod par bya ste/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po sems de ni nang na yang ma yin phyi rol na yang ma yin/ gnyis ka'i bar na yang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i bdag po sems de ni rang bzhin
48b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i phyir gang rnam pa thams cad kyis yongs su btsal na ma dmigs pa de ji ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yin par 'gyur/ de ltar na sems de ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /chos bdag med par mnyam pa nyid pas zhes bya ba ni
48b3(rgyud 'grel): phung po la sogs pa thams cad bdag med pa de bzhin du/ sems de yang ngo/ /de skad du bcom ldan 'das kyiS chos thams cad stong pa de bzhin du sems kyang stong pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /chos thams cad bdag med pa de bzhin du sems de yang bdag med pa'i mtshan
48b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par dben pa ste/ de bzhin du sems de yang rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de'i phyir chos bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis sems de mnyam pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi sems gdong ma nas ma skyes pa'o/ /de'i phyir stong
48b5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' i rang bzhin no/ /de skad du 'ang nam mkha' stong pa'o/ /chos thams cad nam mkha' i rang bzhin no/ /byang chub kyang de'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du nam mkha' rang bzhin med pa'i ming
48b6(rgyud 'grel): tsam mo/ /de bzhin du sems kyang rang bzhin med pa'i ming tsam yin/ gang yang sems ma skyes ma 'gag bar khong du chud pa de ni byang chub bo/ /de skad du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub gang zhe na/ gang sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa ste/ /de
48b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po/ /gsang ba'i bdag po phra ba yang yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs pa med pa des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub zhes brjod bo/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ rtogs pa po 
49a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rtogs par bya ba 'ga' yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni nam mkha' i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs so/ /de phyir gang zhig rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma rig pa de la brtse ba'i thabs byas/ /kye ma kyi ? ? sems
49a2(rgyud 'grel): ? 'di dag sdug bsngal ba/ 'di dag ni yang gi sems kyi chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ma rtogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa phyin ci log gi gdon gyis bzung ba/ 'khor ba na sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong ba yin zhing/ ji ltar de dag rang gi sems kyi chos
49a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag gis 'bad bar bya'o zhes sems can la dmigs pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub kyi sems dang/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang/
49a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad la bde ba'i sems dang/ bla na med pa'o sems dang/ chos kyi dbyings la? 'jug pa'i sems dang/ sems can thams cad la brten nas skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa
49a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //kha che'i paN+Di ta dzA? ya ananda dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba khu mdo sde 'bar gyis bsgyur pa'o// //rim pa lnga pa slob dpon chen po bsgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa zhugs so// */ /rgya gar skad du / pany+tsa kra ma /bod skad du/ rim pa lnga pa 'dzi? dpal
49a6(rgyud 'grel): ? nur gyur ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /dpal ldan bde chen la btud de/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim bshad bya/ /bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod
49a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la/ /thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs/ /sems can rnams kyi srog gyur pa/ /rlung zhes bya ba las kun byed/ /'di ni rnam shes bzhon pa ste/ /lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can/ /rlud gi de nyid rim
49b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni/ /sngags kyi de nyid yang dag 'jug /sngags kyi dmigs pa rtogs nas ni/ /rdo rje bzlas pa rnams la slobs/ /rdo rje bzlas gnas rnal 'byor pa/ /sems la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /yang dag mdza' ni rnam par
49b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs/ /yang dag mdza' las langs nas ni/ /gnyis med ye shes 'thob par 'gyur/ /bzung 'jug ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /slar zhing gang la'ang mi slob bo/ /'di ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'ang? de/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan
49b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /thams cad mkhyen par de nas 'gyur/ /'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i srid gsum ni/ /'od gsal bas ni rnam dag pas/ /skad cig de la ma lus mthong/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud du ni/ /de nyid 'di dag rgyas btab gnas/ /
49b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i rgyud kyis rjes 'brangs nas/ /bla ma'i kha las rtogs par bya/ /de la dang po kho nar rlung gi de kho na nyid bstan pa'i tshig rtsa ba'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste/ sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam/ /'gro dang ma 'gro yungs kar la/ /gsang ba'i sngags kyis
49b5(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa yis/ /ye shes mchog gi gnas bsgom ?/ /rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam/ /sna yi rtse mor nan tan du/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/ zhes bya ba ste/ 'di ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o/ /rdo rje tshig 'de'i
49b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa/ /lha mo bzhis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud las/ snying po las ni snying po mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /gang de thams cad bdag nyid gnas/ /de ni lha mo bshad par bya/ /ye shes lnga yis dngos de nyid/ /yungs kar gyi ni
49b7(rgyud 'grel): 'phru? chod tsam/ /de yi dbus na gnas pa'i lha/ /mi gsal gsal ba'i bdag nyid can/ zhes gsungs pa dang/ gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las kyang don 'di nyid gsal bar gsungs te/ ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs/ /'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid//
50a1(rgyud 'grel): gong bu'i gzugs kyang phyung nas ni/ /sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa/ /srog dang rtsol pa zhes byar bshad/ /rang sngags snying gar bsams nas ni/ /srog ni thig ler gnas par bzhag ces gsungs pa dang/ /'di
50a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid yang slar bshad pa/ /rdo rje phreng pa zhes bya bshad pa'i rgyud las/ sna rtser yungs kar zhes bya ba/ /srog dang rtsol pa'i brtag pa ste/ /srog dang rtsol pa la gnas pa/ /'od lnga sangs rgyas rnams su bsgom/ /steng gi sna las nges byung ba/ /g.yon dang g.yas dang
50a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka dang/ /dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur/ /nang gi dus ni yin par bshad/ /lkog? ma snying ga lte ba dang/ /gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro 'ong ston/ /thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu/ /go rim ji bzhin gnas par bstan/ /g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /me yi
50a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /kha dog dmar zheng gsal ba 'di/ /pad+ma mgon po'i rgyu pa'o/ /g.yon pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba/ /ljang ser ngag tu snang ba ste/ /las kyi mgon po'i rgyu ba'o/ /gnyis ka las ni byung ba'i
50a5(rgyud 'grel): khams/ /mdangs chen kha dog ser po ste/ /dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rin chen mgon po'i rgyu ba'o/ /ngal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams/ /dag cing shel ltar snang pa ni/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /rdo rje mgon po'i rgyu pa'o/ /lus kun la
50a6(rgyud 'grel): ni gnas pa'i rlung/ /bya ba kun la 'jug pa po/ /'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste/ /'chi ba'i lus las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di/ /ye shes lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /rnal 'byor byis pa'i yul min zhing/ /rtog ge pa yis mi shes so/ /de ltar
50a7(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi de kho na nyid bstan nas/ da ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid ston pa'i tshig rtsa ba'i rgyud nyid la 'jug par bya ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun tu skul bar byed pa/ zhes bya ba/
50b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gsang ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas sngagS bsdus pa'i lta bu gsungs so/ /oM A:hUM/ /don rtogs pa yis bzlas pa ni/ /ngo bo nyid med bzang po las/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis brtags pa/ /
50b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bzlas par de bshad do/ /slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te/ /ma bslangs pa la'ang chags mi bya/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing/ /sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas/ /bshad pa 'di nyid slar bshad pa/ /dgongs pa lung bstan pa'i rgyud las gsungS
50b3(rgyud 'grel): pas rol 'jug par bya ste/ de nas dpal ldan snang mdzad che/ /khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa/ /sems can thams cad skyed pa po/ /sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni/ /de bas dngos po med gyur kyang/ /srid pa dag tu rab tu grags/ /byang chub sems
50b4(rgyud 'grel): ni mkhar mnyam pa/ legs par rjes su myong mdzad pa/ /'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po/ /skye po mchog la de bstan gsol/ /sgrub pa yi ni thabs tsam zhig/ shes nas rgyud rnams 'chang par byed/ /'di ltar bdag ni slob dpon zhes/ /ma 'ongs pa na smra par
50b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid ngag /yin zhes smra zhing byis pa 'jig/ de ni dgongs pa'i byang chub sems/ /ji bzhin don du mi shes so/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /rnam par mdzad thub chen gyis/ /legs zhes lan gsum gsungS
50b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad nas/ /lag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs/ /me tog don gyi de nyid ni/ /rab tu phyi nas bshad par bya/ /brjod dang dmigs par bcas pa dang/ /brdar gyur dang ni don dam mo/ /tshig gi brjod pa thun mong ste/ /dmigs par bcas pa sangs rgyas
50b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /sngags kyi de nyid brda? ru bshad/ /don dam de bzhin nyid yin no/ /dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na/ /gang zhig bcu yis ma gcings pa/ /de nyid bcings med ces bya ste/ /de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed yi
51a1(rgyud 'grel): ge ste/ /grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa/ /as bcings phan tshun yang ngag sbyor/ /gang gis shes de 'gro ba'i bla/ /'byung ba'i mdza' dang yang dag ldan/ /cha la sogs pa bcu drug gnas/ /lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /?
51a2(rgyud 'grel): ni gsum na nges par sbyar/ /yi ge AM bcas ring por bcas/ /yon tan sbyor sogs phyis dang mtshungs/ /thung ngu ma lus ngag du 'gyur/ /gcig min du ma ma yin no/ /yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad pa/ /gang yang mngon par phyogs pa rnams/ /bud
51a3(rgyud 'grel): med skyes pa ma ning ste/ /khams la sogs par rab tu brtag /'og dang steng du bcas pa ni/ /shes nas blos ni nges par sbyar/ /brjod pa yi ni sngags 'di dag/ dngos med ngo bo las byung pa'o/ /de ni yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs/ /lha ru nye bar mtshon
51a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gang/ /de ni nye bar dmigs pa'o/ /brda ni de nyid gsum gnas pa/ /rang bzhin bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /a yig bshad pa'i ye shes ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying por gyur/ /oM gyiS sems can yang dag sdud/ /sangs rgyas skur ni rab
51a5(rgyud 'grel): tu brtag /hUM gis sems can yang dag spro/ /sangs rgyas thugs su rab tu brtag/ A(rgyud 'grel): ni gnas par gyur pa'o/ /sangs rgyas gsung du rab tu brtag /'jug pa nyid dang gnas pa dang/ /ldang ba yi ni rim gyis kyang/ /shes rab thabs kyi gzhir gnas
51a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ /sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlos/ /gos dkar la sogs bzlas bshad pa/ /brgya phrag nyis dang nyi shu lnga/ /bzhi po legs par bsdus pa ni/ /sbyor bzhi bsdus pa brgya phrag dgu/ /dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i
51a7(rgyud 'grel): rim gyis ni/ /de ni so sor 'byung ba las/ /nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o/ /nang gi dus 'di nyid gsal par bya ba'i phyir gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las/ rig pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /thun mtshams bzhi ni rab sbyor bas/ /grangs 'bum gyi ni
51b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid can/ /sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas/ zhes gsungs pa dang/ bsgom pa yi ni bar chad can/ /rnal 'byor phyi rol bzlas pa spangs/ /sngags don bcos ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje bdag nyid ji ltar bzlas/ /glang po sngon du rnyed gyur nas/ /glang po'i
51b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes ni tshol byed ltar/ /sngags lus rang nyid mngon gyur nas/ /gzhan dag jig tshol byed dam/ /gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin gang zhig/ sbyor ba gsum dang ldan pa yi/ /spyan drangs gshegs su gsol gyur dang/ de bzhin bzhugs su gsol ba yang/ /
51b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa yis ni spyan drangs te/ /myur ba yis ni gshegs su gsol/ /gnyis ka min pas bzhugs su gsol/ /sna tshogs gnas grub bla med pa'o/ /myur ba dang ni rnam bsdus dang/ /dal ba can dang sngags sbyor ba/ /bla mas slob ma'i rna drung du/ /rab tu
51b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bad de bshad par bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/ /thabs kyi dam pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor 'bras bu rab ster ba'i/ /gsang ba'i yi ge bshad par bya/ /gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor can la mchog ster gyur/ /dang po'i
51b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge sbyor ba yi/ /rtag tu dbugs ni rdub par bya/ /brgyad pa'i mdza' dpal ldan pa yi/ /yi ge u ni thig ler bcas/ /rnal 'byor pa ni dbugs stob byed/ /'od ni ci dga' i bzlas par bshad/ /khri phrag gnyis dang chig stong dang/ /de bzhin du ni
51b6(rgyud 'grel): brgya phrag drug/ rnal 'byor dbang po nyin mtshan gyi/ /bzlas brjod? kyi ni? grangs byed do/ /de 'dir gsang zhing dgongs pa yis/ /phra mo'i sbyor bar bshad pa yin/ /klog dang kha ton med mod kyi/ /'on kyang bzlas par bshad pa ni/ /rdo rje bzlas pa 'di
51b7(rgyud 'grel): yis ni/ /cho ga ji bzhin brten bya zhing/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de bas na gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang/ mnyam med sngags
52a1(rgyud 'grel): ni bzlas nas su/ /sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sgrub/ /de yis zla ba gcig gis ni/ /khams gsum 'grub par gdon mi za/ /rnam shes las ni 'byung ba'i sngags/ /mtshan nyid drug ldan 'das nas kyang/ /rdo rje sems
52a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' phyag byas na/ /zla ba nya la de 'grub 'gyur/ /de la brtul zhugs bshad pa med/ /phreng ba mi dgos sngags mi dgos/ /gzung dang sbyin sreg las rnams dag/ gcig nas gcig tu log par 'gyur/ /ya'i don gyis gang ci ?/ /dngos
52a3(rgyud 'grel): grub 'dod pas bya ba ni/ /ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis/ /'gro ba'i don la 'jug par bya/ /me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang/ /chu stegs so so'i dkyil 'khor du/ /thun ni phyed phyed dus su ni/ /las ni gnyis gnyis gnas par 'gyur/ /mchod la
52a4(rgyud 'grel): brtson pas mchod par 'gyur/ /bzlas la brtson pas rnam par dag /me la sbyin sreg brtson pas 'byor/ /bsam gtan brtson pas thar pa 'thob/ /sngags pas de ltar shes nas ni?/ /'gro na byis pa bzhin du spyod/ /des ni mi rtag chos can
52a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /gsang sngags rnams ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsung gi rdo rje bsgrub pa ste/ /'di ni sngangs kyi de nyid gsal/ /ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba yis/ /sems can la ni nges par sbyar/ /bla ma la gnas sgyu can dad pa med/ /sngags kyi rlom
52a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing glegs bam mthong bas khengs/ /dad pa mod cing dbang skur dman pa la/ /gtam gyi rim pa'ang de la brjod mi bya/ /gang zhig bla ma la gus dang dang ldan/ /mos pas bsnyen bkur la ni rtag tu brtson/ /thos pa 'dzin gang slob ma'i dam pa yis/ / 
52a7(rgyud 'grel): de la bla ma'i drin sbyin brtag mi dgos/ /ri dbang rtse nas 'ga' zhig lhung gyur na/ /ltung bar mi bya snyam yang ltung bar 'gyur/ /bla ma'i drin gyis phan pa'i lung thob na/ /grol bar mi 'gyur snyam yang grol bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa
52b1(rgyud 'grel): ste slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i rim pa dang po'o// //phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /ji ltar bstod cing phyag 'tshal ba/ /gang la bstod cing gang gis bstod/ /ji lta ?
52b2(rgyud 'grel): chu bzhag dang/ /ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du/ /rang gis rang gis ye shes ni/ /legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin/ /'on kyang kun mkhyen ma thob par/ /de ni nye bar dmigs mi 'gyur/ /mun nag rab rib kyis khebs pa/ /drin gyis snang ba thob par 'gyur/ /
52b3(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid shin tu stong pa dang/ /gsum pa chen po stong pa dang/ /bzhi pa thams cad stong pa ni/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag go/ shes rab thabs su sbyor ba las/ /rdzogs par nye bar thob par 'gyur/ /rdzogs par nye bar thob gyur nas/ /thams cad stong pa 'od gsal
52b4(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /rgyu yi rim pa rnam dag pa/ /rnam shes gsum po sbyor bas dang/ /stong pa gsum ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /snang bstong pa shes rab dang/ /sems dang gzhan gyi dbang dag ste/ /de yi rang bzhin/ /'phro gsal ba/ /ba ni rab
52b5(rgyud 'grel): tu bshad par bya/ /chags bral dang ni bar ma nyid/ /de bzhin du ni chen po dag /yid la 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang/ /mya ngan la sogs gsum de bzhin/ /zhi dang rnam rtog 'jigs pa dang/ /'jigs pa bar dang shin tu 'jigs/ /sen dang sred pa bar ma dang/ /shin tu
52b6(rgyud 'grel): sred dang bar len pa/ /mi dge bkres rang skom nyid dang/ /tshor dang tshor ba bar ma dang/ /shin tu tshor ba'i skad cig dang/ /rig pa po dang rig 'dzin gzhi/ /so sor rtogs dang ngo tsha shes //snying rje dang ni brtse ba gsum/ /dogs dang bsam pa nyid dang ni/ /?
52b7(rgyud 'grel): dog ? bya bar grags /rang bzhin? sum cu rtsa gsum gang/ /lus can rnams kyi rang rig ste/ /kun rdzob gsal ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ /mtshan mo'i ming du nges par bshad/ /de bzhin bud med ming du brjod/ /'jam po lta buAng de bzhin no/ /g.yon
53a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ming yang de nyid de/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma can/ /brtan bar bya ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ dad po'i yi ge thig ler bcas/ /zla ba'i 'od zer ltar snang zhing/ /snang ba'i ye shes yang dag 'byung/ /shin tu stong pa thabs ldan pa/ /snang pa mched pa
53a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de/ /de bzhin du ni kun rtags dang/ /de bzhin sems las byung bar bshad/ /chags dang zhen dang de bzhin dga' / /dga' ba bar ma shin tu dga' / /rangs dang rab tu mgu ba dang/ /ngo mtshar de bzhin dgos pa dang/ /tshim dang de bzhin 'khyud pa dang//
53a3(rgyud 'grel): 'o byed de bzhin 'jib pa dang/ /brtan dang brtson dang nga rgyal dang/ /bya dang 'phrog dang stobs dang ni/ /spro dang lhan cig skyes nyid dang/ /de bzhin lhan skyes bar ma dang/ /shin tu lhan cig skyes dang grags/ /rnam par sgeg dang zhes 'gras? nyid/ /dge dang tshig
53a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal bden pa dang/ /mi bden pa dang de bzhin nges/ /nye bar mi len sbyin pa'o/ /skul dang de bzhin dpa' po dang/ /ngo tsha med dang sgyu dang gdug /ma srun pa dang gya gyu nyid/ /mtshan nyid bzhi bcu gang yin pa/ /shin tu stong pa'i skad cig ste/ /nyin mo
53a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i ming dang ni/ /rtsub mo g.yas par bstan pa yin/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ming dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni rdo rje'i ming/ /thig le gnyis kyi brgyan pa yi/ /cha ru de nyid shes par bya/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer 'dra ba yang/ /snang ba mched pa'i sbyor las
53a6(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /snang ba thob pa dag dang ni/ /nye bar thob pa de bzhin te/ /yongs su grub pa nyid dang ni/ /ma rig pa ni nyid ces bya/ /stong pa chen po'i tshig gi ni/ /rnam grangs 'di dag rgyal bas gsungs/ /chags pa bar ma'i skad cig dang/ /brjes ngan pa dang 'khrul
53a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /mi smra gyur dang skyo ba dang/ /le lo de bzhin the tsom ste/ /ma rig skad cig bdun pa ni/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor pas shes bya/ /sa bon thig le ldan min la/ /rlung gi sgo nas 'byung ba min/ /gang zhig snang ba thob pa ni/ /yongs su rdzogs
53b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /rang bzhin phra ba brgya dang ni/ /drug cu tham pa 'di dag nyid/ /rlung gi bzhon pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /nyin dang mtshan du byung ba yin/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang/ /mig btsums de bzhin thal mo ste/ /skad cig se gol gtogs par
53b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /thang cig yungs kar bskor ba dang/ /yud tsam dbugs rdub 'byung ba tsam/ /mig btsum mig ni btsums pa'i bar/ /thal mo lag gnyis brdabs pa ste/ /skad cig la sogs mtshan nyid ngo/ /rang rig tsam gyis ye shes ni/ /nam mkha' lta bur
53b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid med/ /'on kyang de yi dbye yod de/ /mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams bdag nyid/ /snad dang snang ba mched pa dang/ /de bzhin snang ba nyer thob dang/ /sems ni rnam pa gsum bshad nas/ /de yi sgrub pa brjod par bya/ /rlung rnams phra ba'i 
53b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyis ni/ /shes dang yang dag 'dres gyur nas/ /dbang po'i lam nas 'byung nas ni/ /yul rnams la ni dmigs par byed/ /gang tshe snang ba ldan gyur cing/ /rlung ni bzhon pa nyid gyur pa/ /de tshe rang bzhin de dag kun/ /ma lus lus pa med
53b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'byung/ /rlung ni gang dang gar gnas pa/ /rang bzhin de dang de 'byung 'gyur/ /ji srid rlung ni mi rgyu dang/ /snang ba mi g.yo bar gyur pa/ /snang ba gnyis kyi rgyur gyur pas/ /bdag gi dngos po rnam par brtag /ji ltar snang ba thob pa ltar/ /gnyi
53b6(rgyud 'grel): ga'i yan lag nyid du 'gyur/ /sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las/ /bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags/ /ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba ni/ /gsal bar 'di laS mtshon par 'gyur/ /'dod chags nyid dang chags bral dang/ /de yi bar de gsum po ni/ /
53b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'dus las so/ /ye shes gnyis ni mnyam sbyor las/ /snyoms par 'jug par bshad pa yin/ /ye shes gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor dang/ /ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba yis/ /'bad pas ye shes
54a1(rgyud 'grel): gang thob pa/ /de ni snang ba thob pa'o/ /gang zhig chu skyes rdo rje sbyor/ /kun rdzob tu yang med gyur na/ /lan cig tsam zhig myong nas kyang/ /rnal 'byor stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /ye shes 'jug pa'i ngo bo yis/ /dbye ba
54a2(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin shes byas la/ /rang bzhin de nyid slar yang ni/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor pas mtshon bya/ /ji ltar sprin ni sna tshogs shing/ /mdog dang dbyibs ni tha ngang pa/ /nam mkha' i dbyings su byung nas ni/ /de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur/ /de
54a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rang bzhin thams cad ni/ /snang pa gsum gyi rgyu can te/ /ma lus yul la zhugs nas ni/ /'od gsal par ni zhugs par 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i rang bzhin ma shes pas/ /mi shes mun pas khebs pa ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i
54a4(rgyud 'grel): las byas nas/ /'gro ba lngar ni 'khor bar 'gyur/ /mtshams med la sogs byas nas ni/ /dmyal la sogs par 'tshed par byed/ /sbyin sogs dge ba byas nas ni/ /mtho ris la sogs dag tu mchod/ /skye ba dpag med stong phrag ni/ /'di
54a5(rgyud 'grel): ni yang dang yang 'thob pa/ /'dir ni sngon las rnam smin zhes/ /rmongs pa rnams ni mya ngan byed/ /rang bzhin snang ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /gang gis skye bo nyon mongs pa/ /de nyid shes nas ye shes can/ /srid pa'i gzeb las rnam grol
54a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /shes rab ngo bo nyid 'di ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag /sems nyid rang gis mthong 'gyur te/ /rang nyid zla ba'i gzugs bzhin no/ /de nas zla ba la dmigs pa/ /rdo rje'i mtshan mar rab tu brtag /'di ni rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /rnal
54a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa yi thabs su bshad/ /zla ba rdo rje sogs mnyam sbyor/ /sems dang sems byung 'dus pa ste/ /shes rab thabs su 'dus pa las/ /lha yi gzugs ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab cing/ /lha yi nga rgyal 'chang
54b1(rgyud 'grel): byed de/ /bskyed pa'i rim dang ldan par ni/ /sngagS pa rtag tu sbyong par 'gyur/ /ji skad dpal ldan 'dus sogs par/ /de dang der ni rgyas gsungs pa'i/ /ji srid sgom la sbyor gyur pa/ /de srid dang po'i las can yin/ /da ni yongs rdzogs rnal
54b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyi/ /gsal ba ru ni bshad bya ste/ /stong pa gsum gyi rnam dag gang/ /'od gsal bar ni 'dir bshad do// /thams cad stong par de brjod de/ /ye shes gsum ni rnam dag pa/ /ye shes dag nas de nyid rtogs/ /thams cad
54b3(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa bla na med/ /'gyur ba med cing snang ba med/ /gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid/ /yod dang de bzhin med pa dang/ /de ni tshig gi spyod yul min/ /de nas 'od gsal dag pa la/ /ye shes gsum ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis
54b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan 'chang zhing/ /dpe byang bzang po brgyad cur gyur/ /rnam pa kun tu mchog ldan pa'i/ /thams cad mkhyen par de nas 'gyur/ /de skad du rgya che rol pa'i mdo las / shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs/ /mngon par byang chub 'di bzhed nas/
54b5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa chen po sangs rgyas nyid/ /thob par bya zhes mngon par dgongs/ /nai rany+dza na'i chu 'gram du/ /mi g.yo'i ting 'dzin la bzhugs la/ /de'i tshe rgyal ba mkha' rdo rje/ /til gyi gang bu gang bzhin bzhugs/ /rgyal ba'i sras la sel gol btoD/
54b6(rgyud 'grel): de la dbyangs gcig gi gsungs pa/ /bsam gtan 'di ni rnam dag min/ /'di ni mthar thug mi 'thob ste/ /nam mkha' i ngos ltar mchog gyur pa/ /'od gsal ba ni de dmigs shing/ /'od gsal ba yi gnas thob nas/ /rab dga' i gzugs su
54b7(rgyud 'grel): skye bar 'gyur/ /de tshe rab dga' i rdo rje'i sku/ /kun gyi mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /'di ltar sgra de gsan pa dang/ /de nas ting 'dzin mi g.yo btang/ /'di ltar na ma phyed dus su ni/ /rgyal pa'i sras kyis de nyid dmigs/ /sku ni drang po ma yin zhing/ mi drang
55a1(rgyud 'grel): ba yang ma yin la/ /dbugs gtong pa dang rdub pa ni/ /gsung pa ma yin mi gsung min/ /spyan bzang btsums pa ma yin zhing/ /spyan phye ba yang ma yin pas/ /thams cad stong pa rmang chen po/ /dang zhing gsal ba'i ye
55a2(rgyud 'grel): shes che/ /bla ma nyid kyi drin gyis ni/ /de nas de ni gsal mthong gyur/ /'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i srid pa gsum/ /skad cig de la ma lus mthong/ /'od gsal pa ni rnam dag 'chang/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /skya reng
55a3(rgyud 'grel): 'char ba'i dus su ni/ /chu zla dang ni smig rgyu sogs/ /sgyu ma'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /byang chub snying por bzhugs nas ni/ /de ni bdud rnams bcom par mdzad/ /shAkya mgon pos yang dag pa'i/ /ye shes bla med legs thob nas/ /
55a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba gsum la phan pa'i phyir/ /de nyid 'dir ni ston par mdzad/ /mngon par byang chub ston pa ni/ /de nyid ye shes byar bshad/ /mtshams med lnga yi las can dang/ /mi gang bsod nams dman pas kyang/ /yid bzhin nor dang
55a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba bzhin/ /bla ma'i drin gyis thob par 'gyur/ /spyod pa ci dga' spyong byed de/ /'di ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /chags min chags dang bral ba min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ /stong pa ma yin mi stong min/ /dbu mar yang
55a6(rgyud 'grel): ni mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mnyam sbyor ba/ /'di nyid lhar ni rab ston te/ /ye shes gsum bral de nyid gang/ /dgongs pa yis ni gsungs pa yin/ /de bzhin dpal ldan gsang 'dus kyi/ /byang chub sems kyi le'u
55a7(rgyud 'grel): las/ /dngos med la sogs tshig bshad kyis/ /mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid gsungs/ /'dod chags la sogs rnam dag gang/ /dpal mchog las kyang gsungs pa yin/ /de nyid de bzhin gshegs pas kyang/ /thams
55b1(rgyud 'grel): cad stong par gsungs pa yin/ /sna tshogs mdo dang rgyud las ni/ /de nyid gang zhig nyer bstan pa/ /thams cad stong gnas 'di nyid las/ /der ni gzhan dag ma gsungs so/ /chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong ni/ /thub pa chen pos ?
55b2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa las/ /mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid ni/ snying po las ni snying por gsungs/ /ral pa gcer bu mgo reg gam/ /cod pan 'dus pa spong 'jug ste/ /sna tshogs rtags can de dag ni/ /mngon par byang chub 'dod pa rnams//
55b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dman pa de rnams kyis/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa la sogs rim/ /de nyid ye shes dman pas na/ /des ni grol brnyed mi 'gyur/ /dang po las kyi sbyor pa yis/ /sa brgyad pa ni thob par 'gyur/ /snang ba gsum pos mthong pa dang/ /
55b4(rgyud 'grel): sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas/ /mngon par byang chub legs thob nas/ /gtsang ma'i gnas su nye bar 'gro/ sangs rgyas zhing nas mi ldog pas/ /tshe 'di nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen/ /chos 'byung mngon par byang chub pa'i/ /chags
55b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs rol mo rgya chen po/ /chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa/ /ji ltar rnyed pa'i spyod pas so/ /mngon par rtogs pa gang 'byung pa/ /bla med mngon par byang chub pa/ /spros bcas la sogs sbyor pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni
55b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir slob po/ /bzod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin can/ /ngo bo nyid kyis de grub na/ /bslab pa'i sbyor ba ci zhig bya/ /rtogs las de bzhin nyid ma skye/ /gang zhig de ltar 'dir rtog na/ /ye shes rim pa spangs pa nyid/ /de yi dbye ba mi
55b7(rgyud 'grel): shes pas/ /slar yang slob par 'gyur ba yin/ /rang bzhin snang ba'i dbye shes shing/ /de nyid bzhi pa la brten kyang/ /gang zhig rnams gsum mi slob na/ /nges ni 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar shing la mi gnas pa/ /ma btsums
56a1(rgyud 'grel): bar ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin byang chub bslab bral pas/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig yo sgyu'i blo can le lo can dag dang/ /bla ma la smod dbang bskur thob ces rlom? sems 'gyur/ /blo dman
56a2(rgyud 'grel): sems ldan kun mkhyen yang dag thob mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs bla ma'i skyon rnams mthong gi yon tan min/ /bsnyen bkur med par myur du de nyid thob par 'dod/ /yang dag tshig ma yin zhes khro bcas g.yo bar 'gyur/ /tshogs? na ba bla ma
56a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs par byed/ /de nas de ni dben par song nas phyag byed 'gyur/ /de ltar rang bzhin ngan gyur dman pa'i slob ma ni/ /rang gi slob bu yin yang gzhan bzhin yongs su spangs/ /rgyal rigs rje'u rigs mchog las skyes ?
56a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang/ /brtan pas nam yang de nas drung du bzhag mi bya/ /yon tan mchog ldan ye shes brtson par bcas pa dang/ /yang na bla ma la gus sangs rgyas dang mnyam lta/ /rgyal ba'i chos rnams rtogs shing bstan la shin tu dad/ /de 'dir
56a5(rgyud 'grel): snod gyur yin phyir de la drin sbyin bya/ /rgyud mang rab tu thos shing lung la legs sbyangs kyang/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dman phyir lung thob ma gyur pa/ /de ni bdag phan tsam la'ang dbang med bstan pa'i mchu/ /de yi bstan bcos skyo ba'i rgyu tsam
56a6(rgyud 'grel): 'ba' zhig yin/ /skal ldan gyur cing de nyid man ngag thob gyur kyang/ /gang zhig blo gros blun min don ni sbyor nus pa/ /gzhan don bya ba'i blo yis ston la rab tu 'jug /tshig gi yon tan med na de yang brnyas bcad 'gyur/ /rgyud mang thos shing
56a7(rgyud 'grel): shes ldan gnas drug shes pa dang/ /dran dang blo gros brtan blo brtson pa phun tshogs ldan/ /bla ma'i zhabs bkur bcas shing de nyid lung thob pa/ /rgyud rgyal man ngag de la bstan par 'os pa yin/ /'phags pa rdo rje'i drin gyis rgyud rnams
56b1(rgyud 'grel): mang po thos/ /gsal ba rnam spras tshig gis byang chub lam ni rnam phye bas/ /shAkya bshes gnyen gyis ni dge ba gang bsags des/ /mkhas shing gsal pa'i rnam min byang chub snor gyur shog /ming gi khyad par gzhan yang bla na med pa'i dgongs ba
56b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba thams cad dag cing rnam par dag pa'i rim pa slob dpon shAkya shes gnyen gyis mdzad pa ste rim pa gnyis pa'o// //rdo rje can rnams kun gyi gtso/ /rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal te/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab pa nyid/ /brtse bas
56b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bshad par bya/ /de la dang por bskyed pa'i rjes su 'brang bas dbang bskur ba thob cing/ /rgyun rnam pa bzhi'i dgongs pa shes pa/ shes rab dang ldan zhing lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid rnam par dben pa'i thos pa 'dzin pa/ bden pa rnam pa gnyis la
56b4(rgyud 'grel): lhag par mos pas/ rdo rje slob dpon yang dag par mnyes pas byas te/ de'i 'og tu bla ma mnyes par gyur nas tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po byas la lo bcu drug ma rdo rje slob dpon chen po la phul te/ /de'i 'og tu bla ma'i zhal snga nas bdag la byin gyis/ brlab pa'i
56b5(rgyud 'grel): rim pa'i man ngag thob nas/ de'i 'og tu phreng ba dang chu dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang rdo rje dang dril bu sbyin pa dang me leng dang ming dang slob dpon dang rjes su gnang ba ste/ de dag dang bcas par gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob nas/ /bstod pa 'dis bla ma la bstod par
56b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /khong stong khyod kyi sku la med/ /sha dang rus pa khrag med kyang/ /na mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon ltar/ /khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad/ /sku la bsnyun med mi gtsang med/ /bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang/ /khyod ni 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir/ /'jig
56b7(rgyud 'grel): rten bya bston par mdzad/ /chu zla bzhin du gzung du med/ /chas rnams kun la gnas pa med/ /nga rgyal med cing rmongs mi mnga' / /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gshegs dang bzhugs dang de bzhin gzims/ /spyod lam dag ni thams
57a1(rgyud 'grel): cad du/ /khyed ni rtag tu mnyam 'jog pa/ /mi dmigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdzu 'phrul che la rnam 'phrul zhing/ /sna tshogs min la snyoms 'jug pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
57a2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rdo rje slob dpon la yang dag pa'i bstod pas bstod nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mnyan bar bya ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /kun mkhyen ye shes phung bo can/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo rnam sbyong ba/ /de ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis/ /
57a3(rgyud 'grel): gtso bos bdag la bka' drin stsol/ /khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni/ /gtso bo gzhan la skyabs ma mchis/ /'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen gyis/ /de bas blo mchog mnyes par mdzad/ /de ltar 'jigs med gsol 'debs pa'i/ /tshig dag
57a4(rgyud 'grel): thos par gyur nas ni/ /snying rje slob ma la bskyed de/ /de nas bdag la byin brlabs brtsam/ /bdag byin brlabs pa'i rim zhes pa/ /kun rdzob bden pa bstan pa ste/ /de ni bla ma'i drin dag gis/ /'thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /bdag la byin gyis
57a5(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa'i rim/ /gang gis rnyed par ma gyur pas/ /mdo sde rgyud dang rtog pa la/ /de yi ngal pa don med 'gyur/ /bdag la byin brlab rin thob pa'i/ /gtso bo sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas ni/ /the tshom med par thob par
57a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i ting 'dzin dang/ /de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi gnas/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis/ /bden pa gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis ni/ /'od gsal ba ni thob par 'gyur/ /de bas
57a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /dang por bdag la byin brlab bstan/ /'gro kun rang dbang med pa ste/ /rang dbang du ni 'byung ma yin/ /de yi rgyu ni 'od gsal ba/ /'od gsal thams cad stong pa'o/ /sems gang gis ni byis pa rnams/ /'khor
57b1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'ching bas bcing gyur pa/ /sems de nyid kyis rnal 'byor pa/ /bde gshegs gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni gang yang skye ba med/ /gang yang 'chi ba yod na yin/ /sems kyi rang bzhin rnam gnas par/ /'khor ba nyid ni shes par bya/
57b2(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi sbyor ba med par ni/ /sems kyi rang bzhin gzung du med/ /sems kyi rang bzhin rgyur gyur pa/ /las dang skye ba kun tu 'byung/ /de nyid rlung dang yang dag ldan/ /rnam shes gsum po slar yang ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi lus su 'byung/ /sgyu
57b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i lus zhes de la bshad/ /de bas 'di ltar 'gro ba kun/ /sgyu ma lta bur 'dir bshad de/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /thams cad de dang 'dra bar mthong/ /gzugs dang tshor ba nyid dang ni/ /'du shes dang ni 'du byed rnams/ /lnga pa rnam
57b4(rgyud 'grel): par shes pa dang/ /de bzhin khams ni bzhi po dang/ /mig la sogs dang yul rnams nyid/ /shes pa lnga po nyid dag ste/ /phyi dang nang du rnam phye ba/ /thams cad sgyu ma las gzhan min/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan gyis/ /sgyu ma'i lus ni sheS
57b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /kha dog rnams ni 'ja' lta bu/ /khyab pa chu yi zla bas so/ /dngos dang dngos min las grol ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' legs bris pa/ /me long dri ma med pa la/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang dang mtshungs/ /rnam pa kun gyis
57b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog ldan pa'i/ /sku ni blta bas mi ngoms pa/ /slob ma bzang po de la stan/ /bdag byin brlab ces de bshad do/ /sgyu mar bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /'di nyid nye bar mtshon pa ste/ /kun rdzob bden pa'i sgyu ma nyid/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
57b7(rgyud 'grel): yang de/ /de nyid dri za'i sems can gyur/ /rdo rje'i sku yang de nyid yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid de/ /de bas bdag nyid mchod la 'jug /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyid/ /de bas kun nas
58a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bad ba yis/ /bdag nyid rtag tu mchod par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba dang/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs rnam rtogs dang/ /sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs kun/ /rtag tu sgyu ma bzhin du bya/ /zhi ba dang ni
58a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa dang/ /de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang/ /dgug sogs gang yang rung ba kun/ /dbang bo'i gzhu dang mtshungs par bya/ /sgeg dang nye bar longs spyod dang/ /glu dang rol mo sogs bsten dang/ /sgyu rtsal rnams la rab 'jug pa/ /chu zla
58a3(rgyud 'grel): dag dang mtshungs par bya/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya nyid dag la/ /mig la sogs pa 'jug 'gyur ba/ /sgyu ma lta bur nyer bar brtag /rdo rje thag pa de nyid du/ /'dir ni mang du bshad ci dgos/ /rnal 'byor pas ni gang
58a4(rgyud 'grel): gang dmigs/ /de de sgyu ma bzhin du brtag /me long gi ni gzugs brnyan dang/ /rmi lam sgyu ma chu bur dang/ /mig 'phrul mtshungs par gang gis mthong/ /de ni gtso bo yin par bshad/ /mthong ba dang ni rigs pa nyid/ /'gro ba sgyu
58a5(rgyud 'grel): ma ji? bzhin te/ /dmigs med kun rdzob dag tu ni/ /sgyu ma lta bur rab tu bshad/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur/ /de dang de yi ngo bor bya/ /mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor/ /kun tu kun
58a6(rgyud 'grel): nas thams cad dang/ bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos grub ni/ /rang nyid kyis ni de mthong 'gyur/ /gtso bo bde ba kun rang bzhin/ /sems dpa' chen po 'gro dang bzhugs/ /gnas dang zas dang gos la sogs/ /
58a7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la skad cig ngag gis rnyed/ /srid pa gcod par 'gyur ba dang/ /'gro la rab mchog ston par 'gyur/ /lha dang bcas pa kun gyis mchod/ /yang dang yang du phyag byed 'gyur/ /ji ltar ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten phan par
58b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhed pas gshegs/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po ni/ /sna tshogs ye shes rjes su sdud/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mtshon pas na/ /bsgrub par mi bya ci yang med/ /bde chen phyag rgya chen po ni/ /rang nyid rjes su bsgrub par 'gyur/ /las dang nyon mongs las
58b2(rgyud 'grel): can lus/ /byed pa po dang 'bras bu nyid/ /smig rgyu rmi lam lta bu dang/ /dri za'i grong khyer dag dang mtshungs/ /'di 'dra'i ting 'dzin mi shes pas// dngos po la ni nyer dmigs te/ /'dod chags sna tshogs skyes pa rnams/ /de dag sgyu ma'i sman gyi
58b3(rgyud 'grel): gso/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i man ngag dag /gang gis bla ma las ma bsgrub/ /rtag dang chad pa la dmigs pas/ /mi de phyir ldog 'gyur ba yin/ /mchod pa thams cad spangs nas ni/ /bla ma la mchod yang dag rtsom/ /de mnyes pas
58b4(rgyud 'grel): ni kun mkhyen pa'i/ /ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /bla med byed pa slob dpon gyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchod byas nas/ /de yi bsod nams ma byas ci/ /dka' thub ma bstan gang zhig yod/ /de nyid mi zad 'dod pa yis/ /shin tu dga' 
58b5(rgyud 'grel): ba gang dang gang/ /shin tu khyad par can nyid de/ /de dang de ni bla ma sbyin/ /slob dpon gyis ni sdig pa 'phrog /slob dpon gyis ni 'jig pa sel/ /slob dpon gyis ni sdug bsngal gyi/ /rgya mtsho'i 'jig las pha rol sgrol/ /gang zhig nga rgyal
58b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis spags shing/ /yang dag rim pa sun 'byin dang/ /de nyid chos la brnyas bcad pa/ de las de nyid bstan mi bya/ /bla ma la gus bden par smra/ /rnam par mkhas shing rgyud cig la/ /dam tshig sbyong ba bsrung ba dag /rim pa de la
58b7(rgyud 'grel): bstan bar bya/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa ste rim pa gsum pa'o// //thams cad stong pa nyid ston pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas to/ /bzhi pa mngon par byang chub pa'i
59a1(rgyud 'grel): rim 'di bdag gis bshad par bya/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu bdag nyid che ba'i lha/ /man ngag rnams ni rab ster bas/ /rdo rje slob dpon de bas lhag /de ni yang dag mnyes byas te/ /lo
59a2(rgyud 'grel): 'am yang na zla ba la/ /bla ma de ni mnyes byas la/ /ci nus bas ni mchod par bya/ /ci 'byor pa yi phyag rgya ni/ /leD par bslabs la dbul bya zhing/ tshoD kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /cho ga ji bzhin mchod par bya/ /de nas 'dod yon lnga sbyor bas//
59a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor chen bo mnyes gyur te/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho ga yis/ /snang ba dag ni bskyed par bya/ /byang chub sems ni rab 'bad pas/ /ka la sha sogs dag tu bzhag /slob ma bzang la bla ma yis/ /brtse bsan? ma phyed dus dbang bskur//
59a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur yang dag thob nas ni/ /tho rangs kyi ni dus su yang/ /slob mas thal sbyar bla ma la/ /mchod cing bstod pas mnyes par bya/ /khams gsum las ni rnam grol zhing/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur la/ /'dod pa rnams kyis mgos
59a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang/ /skye mched rnams la mi brten cing/ /phyin ci log las rnam grol ba/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnams rtog med cing kun rtog
59a6(rgyud 'grel): med/ /thugs ni rab tu mi gnas pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi thugs/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing/ /spros med gos pa med pa ltar/ /mkha' dang mnyam ba'i thugs mnga' 
59a7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin can/ /mngon par byang chub lta bar 'tshal/ /slob mas thal sbyar bla ma la/ /bstod nas slar yang bskul bar bya/ /las dang skye las rnam grol zhing/ /snang ba gsuM
59b1(rgyud 'grel): po spangs pa yi/ /mngon par byang chub mthong ba ni/ /mgon po chen po bdag phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /slob dpon chen po bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /
59b2(rgyud 'grel): thog mdza' med cing zhi ba dang/ /nyon mongs thams cad rnam sbyong zhing/ /lus dang ngag dang sems sbyong ba/ /rdo rje chen po bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar yon tan yang dag pa/ /brjod pas rnal 'byor pas mnyes bya/ /snying rje slob ma la
59b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed de/ /de nas rim pa 'di nyid brtsam/ /mtshan mo snang ba'i cha ste gsal ba'i nyi ma'i zer 'gyed snang ba mched ba yin/ /mtshams ni snang ba thob par rang gi rang bzhin rnams kyis lan cig min par 'gro/ mtshan min nyin par ma yin
59b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams min gang zhig rang bzhin rnams dang rnam bral ba/ /de ni byang chub skad cig yin par bla ma mchog bshad rnal 'byor pa nyid yul/ /mtshams kyi mdza' ni 'jig min mun nag tshogs ni ma lus gang du 'das ba dang/ /ji srid nyi ma shar
59b5(rgyud 'grel): skad cig 'dir ni dri med yang dag mdza' ru bshad/ /slob dpon mchog ni rab rib bral bas slong ma la ni phyi rol byang chub bstan/ /nang gi bde ba rnyog bral sangs rgyas byang chub skad cig dag gis thob par 'gyur/ /tha mar 'byung dang thog mar 'byung ba'i
59b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus min 'byung ba'i dbus su 'byung ba'o/ /mdza' med 'byung ba'a? mthar ni 'byung ba rnaMs/ /de dag thaMs cad stong par dam bas gsungs/ /gang du 'gro ba dang ni 'ong med cing/ /zad dang 'phel med dngos dang med yin/ /ngo mtshar gzugs can yin
59b7(rgyud 'grel): zhing ngo mtshar min/ /gnas par 'gyur min myur du 'gro ba min/ /gang zhig yod dang med pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral/ /bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzuD ma yin/ /bsod nams sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa/ /de ni thaMs cad stod par sangS
60a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /rnal 'byor par na de lta'i de nyid thob/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i bdag nyid 'gro gnyer gcig /ye shes rang bzhin mi yi seng ge gang/ /mi zang lus thob ma lus 'gro ba'i rgyu/ /de ni yo ba'i lus kyang drang
60a2(rgyud 'grel): po yin/ bstan la gnas med gyur kyang gnas ba yin/ /de ni mig btsums gyur kyang rnam rgyas yin/ de ni mnyam ma gzhag kyang mnyam gzhag yin/ /de ni tshig dang ldan yang brjod bral yin/ /de ni longs spyod ldan yang gzung bral
60a3(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /de ni 'jig rten mgon yang gzhan bral 'gyur/ /gang zhig de nyid rtogs shing nyes kun zad/ /man ngag thob pa'i slob ma yis/ /de nas rnal 'byor rnam gnyis bslab/ /ril por 'dzin pa'i rim pa dang/ /de bzhin rjes su gzhig pa'o
60a4(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo nas ni rkang pa'i bar/ /ji srid snying gar phyin pa'i bar/ /rnal 'byor yang dag mdza' la 'jug /ril por 'dzin pa zhes bshad de/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu nyid/ /dang po 'od gsal bar bya ste/ /phyi nas de bzhin bdag nyid byed/ /rjes su
60a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhig pa'i rim pa yin/ /dbus kyi rlung ni me long la/ /ji ltar kun tu thim gyur pa/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor yang dag mdza' / /yang dang yang du 'jug par byed/ /'gro dang 'dug dang nyal dang za/ /mig? btsums 'byed dang rgod pa na/ /bsam
60a6(rgyud 'grel): gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /de nyid rig brtag tu gnas/ /gzugs bcas 'od zer de dang de/ /rnam shes rlung dang ldan pa yi/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis kyang/ /sems can don du 'ang lan 'gar 'gyur/ /ji ltar dang ba'i
60a7(rgyud 'grel): chu klung las/ /nya dag myur du ldang ba ltar/ /de bzhin thams cad stong gsal las/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la bltos pa'i/ /phyag rgya chen bor brtag ba ni/ /'od zer lnga bzhi? 'byung ba dag/ nam mkha' i
60b1(rgyud 'grel): 'ja' tshon ngag dang mtshungs/ /phyag rgya 'tshang bar byed pa'am/ /gal te gsang sngags zlos pa'am/ /gang gzhan thams cad phyed ba na/ /thams cad stong pa'i gzhi la gnas/ /thams cad za zhing kun la blta/ /kun la phyag byed kun tu 'gro /thamS
60b2(rgyud 'grel): cad byed pa'i mtshan ma can/ /thams cad stong pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni don dam zhes bya ba/ /skal bzang slob ma bzang pos man ngag thob/ /thal mo sbyar nas me tog 'dzin pa yi/ /bla ma las ni slar yang blang bar bya/ dngos po
60b3(rgyud 'grel): kun dang rnam bral zhing/ /phung bo khams dang skye mched dang/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa/ /chos bdag med dang mnyam med pa/ /rang sems gdong nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid/ /de nas rjes su mthun pa'i yon/ /bla ma la
60b4(rgyud 'grel): ni dbul bya ste/ /rin chen khyim dang glang po rta/ /yul dang mal stan dag dang ni/ /bran pho bran mo chung ma sdug /bu mo shin tu yid 'ong dang/ /gang gis bdag kyang dbul bya na/ /lhag ma rnams lta smos ci dgos/ /slob dpon la ni dri ma thob dri med
60b5(rgyud 'grel): brtan ba'i blo ldan dngos kun bdag /gsal dag shin tu phra ba mchog zhi'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa'i khams/ /gnyis med rtog bral rtag tu bde ba'i rang bzhin de nyid rnal 'byor pas bsgom bya/ /bsod nams bsod nams min grol
60b6(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid 'dir ni bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i bde ba mngon par byang chub pa'i ? ste slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i rim pa bzhi pa'o// //mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /gnyis pa
60b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnam spangs la/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni zung 'jug pa'i/ /rim pa tha ma 'bri bar bya/ /'khor ba dang mi mya ngan 'das/ /rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas na/ /gang du dngos po gcig gyur pa/ /zung du 'jug ces de la bshad/ /kun nas nyon 
61a1(rgyud 'grel): mongs rnam bar byang/ /don dam nyid du shes nas ni/ /gang gis gcig tu gyur shes pa/ /de yis zung du 'jug par shes/ /dngos po rnam bcas kun rtog dang/ /dngos po med par rtog pa dag /rnal 'byor pas ? cig
61a2(rgyud 'grel): cad spyod/ /de'i zung 'jug shes pa'o/ /gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa zhes/ /rnam gnyis blo ni yod min gyi/ /gang du mi phyed blo yod pa/ /de ni zung 'jug ces byar bshad/ /rtag dang chad ba'i blo dag ni/ /gang gis spangs nas gnas pa yi/ /zung
61a3(rgyud 'grel): du 'jug pa'i rim 'di yi/ /de nyid shes te mkhas pa yin/ /shes rab snying rje gcig bar ni/ /shes nas gang du 'jug gyur pa/ /zung 'jug ces byar bshad pa ste/ /rim 'di sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/ /thabs dang shes rab
61a4(rgyud 'grel): snyoms 'jug par/ /thams cad bsdus las shes gyur pa/ /rnal 'byor chen po gang du gnas/ /de ni zung du 'jug par 'gyur/ /gang du lhag mar bcas pa dang/ /de bzhin lhag ma med pa zhes/ /'di lta'i rtog pa med gyur pa/ /de ni
61a5(rgyud 'grel): zung du 'jug pa'o/ /gang du gang zag bdag med dang/ /chos la bdag med pa dag gi /rtog pa gnyis las rnam grol ba/ /zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de nyid shes pa'i rim shes nas/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i 'od gsal la/ /de
61a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid la ni 'dus pa gang/ /zung du 'jug ba'i rim 'di yin/ /ril por 'dzin dang rjes gzhig dang/ /'jug dang de bzhin gnas pa dang/ /de nas gang du ldang gyur pa/ /mnyam gyur zung du 'jug pa'o/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang/ /so so'i
61a7(rgyud 'grel): char ni shes gyur pa/ /gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa/ /zung du 'jug par de bshad do/ /de bzhin nyid la dmigs nyid dang/ /gang du ldang bar gyur pa ni/ /zung du 'jug pa de yin te/ /mi zad rnal 'byor pa yi gnas/ /gnyid
61b1(rgyud 'grel): log dang ni sad pa ste/ /gnas skabs de gnyid spangs pa ni/ /gnyid logs dang ma rnam bral pa/ /zung 'jug yin par ston pas gsungs/ /mnyam par bzhag dang ma bzhag pa/ /gang la 'di dag thams cad med/ /dngos dang dngos
61b2(rgyud 'grel): med rnams spangs pa/ /rnal 'byor pa ni zung 'jug gnas/ /dran dang mi dran las grol zhing/ /rtag tu 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /rnal 'byor pa ni 'dod bzhin spyod/ /zung 'jug rim pa la gnas pa'o/ /chags dang chags min las
61b3(rgyud 'grel): grol zhing/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i lus dang ldan/ /'khor ba srid du gnas byed pa/ /zung 'jug rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bya ba dang ni byed pa dang/ /mi phyed pa yi ngo bo nyid/ /gnas dang rnal 'byor pas shes pa/ /zung du 'jug par de bshad do/ /
61b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed ba'i rim pa 'di gcig yin/ /gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i rim bdag /gnyis bo ? gcig gyur pa/ /de ni zung du 'jug par bshad/ /yongs su dag pa'i lha dang ni/ /'dir ni ma dag par 'gyur zhes/ /gang zhig mi byed par rtogs pa/ /
61b5(rgyud 'grel): gang yin de ni zung 'jug pa'o/ /gzugs can dang ni gzugs med ces/ /rtog pa gnyis po spangs pa nas/ /gang zhig zhi rtogs rnal 'byor dbang/ /de ni zung 'jug thob pa'o/ /de ltar gang gnas rnal 'byor pa'o/ /zung 'jug rim la gnas pa
61b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /de ni kun mkhyen de nyid mthong/ /sna tshogs 'dzin ces brjod pa yin/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon sangs rgyas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol son/ /bya ba byas pa'i rnal 'byor che/ /bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas/ /de nyid gnyis med
61b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes te/ mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /de bzhin kun gyi dbang phyug yin/ /rdo rje lta ba'i ting 'dzin yang/ /rdzogs pa'i rim gnas de nyid de/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang/ /gnyis su med par de
62a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad do/ /mi gnas sgra gang skye med la sogs pa/ /gnyis med ye shes ston pa rnams/ /thams cad 'di yi tshig yin te/ /der ni gzhan dag med sbyar bshad/ /gang gA klung gi phye snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams
62a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'di dag nyid/ /thugs chud yod med phyogs spangs pa/ /phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid grub/ /zung 'jug go 'phangs la gnas pa'i/ /slob bzhin pa yi rnal 'byor tshe/ /zung du 'jug pa bsgoms gyur pas/ /spyod pa'i ? de dang gnyis su
62a3(rgyud 'grel): med/ /ji ltar bdag nyid de bzhin dgra /chung ma de bzhin man lam dang/ /ji ltar smad 'tshong de bzhin ma/ /ji ltar bram ze de bzhin gdol/ /ji ltar pags pa de bzhin gos/ /ji ltar rin chen phub ma dang/ /ji ltar chad dag de bzhin
62a4(rgyud 'grel): gci/ /ji ltar bza' bde bzhin bshad/ /ji ltar dri bzang ga bur dag /de bzhin bshad las byung ba'i dri/ /ji ltar bstod? pa byed pa'i tshig /de bzhin du ni smod pa'i tshig /drag po rdo rje can de bzhin/ /ji ltar nyin mo de bzhin mtshan/ /de ltar rmi
62a5(rgyud 'grel): lam de bzhin mthong/ /ji ltar 'jig pa de bzhin gnas/ /ji ltar bde ba de bzhin sdug /ji ltar sdang ba de bzhin bur/ /mnar med mtho ris de bzhin te/ /de bzhin sdig dang bsod nams so/ /de ltar shes nas ye shes can/ /dge pa med
62a6(rgyud 'grel): par thams cad byed?/ /sbas pa'i brtul zhugs kun bsgrubs na/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub/ /mchog gyur rim pa lnga pa 'di/ /bshad nas bsod nams gang thob pas/ /zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /'di yis 'jig
62a7(rgyud 'grel): rten rol par shog /zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa ste rim pa lnga pa rdzogs so// //'phags pas mdzad pa'i rdzogs tshul rim pa lnga/ /lam lnga sbyang phyir bla ma'i bka' sgyur bas/ /sgrib pa
62b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga bral ye shes lnga thob ste/ /sku lnga mngon shes lngar ldan sangs rgyas shog/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsarya sh+rAd+d+ha kar warma? dang/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ?  rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te/ slad kyi rgya gar gyi
62b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhan bo ka mA la gupta dang/ yul dbus kyi dpe dang yang gtugs te gtan la thab? pa'o// //spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma slob dpon chen po arya de ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa bzhugs so// /rgya gar skad du /tsarya ? pA na pra dI paM/ bod skad du / spyod
62b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos med rnam dag nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma lus tshig med yi ge bral la phyag mtshal lo/ /'das dang ma byon
62b4(rgyud 'grel): kun tu son la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun tu ma lus thams cad stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje theg pa 'di la sngags kyi sgor spyod pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ /slob dpon gsang sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba dang/ nang la mchog tu gzhol ba ste/ thos
62b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu son pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i don du/ mdo sde dang rgyud rtog pa dag las yang dag par gsungs pa'i lung gi tshig rnam par gsal par bya ba'i phyir tshig snyan cing rgya che ba du ma dag bltas nas
62b6(rgyud 'grel): tshigs su bcad pa dang rkyang pa la soD pa sba sbas pa rnams dang spel zhing ? tu spel ba rnams kyi rgyud yang dag pa rnams las btus te/ byis pa'i skya bo rnams kyis khong du chung par bya ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i thabs kyi yan lag mar me lta bu byed ba dag sngon byung
62b7(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur pa ni mi rigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzogs ldan dang gsum ldan dang gnyis ldan gyi dus na ni 'jig rten ba rnams tshe dang nang med pa phun sum tshogs shing/ /sbyin ba dang/ tshul khrims la spyod pa la yon tan phun sum tshogs pa
63a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa rnams ni bstan bcos la gnas shing yongs su chol bas de kho na nyid shes pa la mngon par zhugs shing tshig rgya che ba la sogs pa rnams dang/ sbas ba'i sgra'i sgo nas de kho na nyid ston la/ de rnams kyis kyang khong
63a2(rgyud 'grel): du chud pa yin no/ /da ltar ni rtsod pa'i dus te/ 'jig rten pa rnams tshe dang/ nang med ba dang/ phun sum tshogs pa dman zhing g.yo dang sgyu dang dregs pa dang/ phrag dog dang ldan la / shes rab zhan cing log par lta ba las ngan pa la sogs
63a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la dga' bas ji srid du tshig rgya che ba la sogs pa sbas pa'i sgra'i don rnams la nges par mi dga' bas de kho na nyid tshol bar mi byed do/ /de'i phyir na dang po'i bstan bcos yongs su tshol ba spangs pas de kho na nyid mi rtogs shing dge ba dang mi
63a4(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i las la mngon par gzhol bas dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na thob pa thob par 'dod pa rnams la dgos pa med par 'gyur te / tshig snyan pa dang rgya che ba la sogs pa'i thog ma tshig gi sgo la gnas pa'i sgra rnams ni gzings dang
63a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ji skad du don gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'i sgra ji bzhin par ma yin no zhes gsungs so/ /de bas na don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas bdag gis slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi man ngag
63a6(rgyud 'grel): las bskyed pa'i go rim gyis rdzogs pa'i go rim gyi ting nge 'dzin thob nas 'dus byas pa dang 'dus ma byas pa'i slob ma rnams kyi thun mong du bshad pa'i sgra yi sgo nas sngags kyi de kho na nyid dang / phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid dang/ bdag gi
63a7(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid dang/ chos kyi de kho na nyid dang/ lha'i de kho na nyid de go rim rnam pa lnga rnam par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdo sde dang/ rgyud dang /rtog pa rnams bsres nas bshad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde la sogs pa
63b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i gsung rab kun las/ /bskal ba bye ba rnams su yang/ /de nyid bral nas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs te/ ji skad du/ bcom ldan 'das la lha mo bzhis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang / thub pa chen
63b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i chos rnams kyi/ /phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la/ /gang gis de nyid mi shes pa/ /de yi thams cad 'bras bu med ces gsungs pas so/ /rdo rje slob mas gsol pa /de kho na nyid mi shes par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das
63b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsungs na / yang de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid gsung rab kyi sgo nas nyan par 'tshal lo/ /gang gi phyir theg ba chen po pa dang /rtog ge pa la sogs pa rnams ni don 'di nyid la gnas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pas de kho
63b4(rgyud 'grel): na nyid rtogs par bgyid na/ de rnams bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol / rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa / yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom
63b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bgyi pa de ji lta bu lags / smras pa / gang mi slu ba zhes bya ba de ni yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa / mi bslu ba zhes bya ba de ji lta bu lags/ smras pa/ shin tu yang dag pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid can gyi ting nge
63b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin de ni mi slu ba zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin ces ba de gang lags/ smras pa/ gang bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni yang dag pa'i tshul
63b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa gnyis zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ smras pa/ dang po ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang/ gnyis pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa
64a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud las bka' stsal te/ /phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi gnas don dam pa'i
64a2(rgyud 'grel): bden ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po chos thams cad phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dang/ 'gro ba rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba rnams te/ de yang don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas pas
64a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa med ba'i tshul gyis don dam pa'i bden pa ni bdag med pa zil gyis mi non pa thams cad stong pa ste/ 'phel ba med pa/ 'grib pa med pa/ rnam par dag pa / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang/ dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid yi ge med
64a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ tshig med pa/ lus med pa dang ngag dang yid dang bral ba / yod pa ma yin /med pa ma yin/ rgyu ba ma yin/ mi rgyu ba ma yin / thag ring ba ma yin/ thag nye ba ma yin/ stong pa ma yin/ mi stong pa ma yin/ dbu ma
64a5(rgyud 'grel): yang ma yin pa 'di ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o/ /de bas na de ni mchog tu zab ba dang/ 'jug par dka' ba dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa ste /kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rkyen can no/ /rgyu rkyen gyis 'byung ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste/
64a6(rgyud 'grel): de ni ji srid tu rmi lam dang/ mig 'dul dang/ gzugs brnyan ltar snang ba dang ldan pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i rgyur gyur pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o/ /de gnyis zung du 'brel par
64a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'i rim la 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin te/ dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba gang yin pa de kho na nyid ces bya'o/ /rdo rje slob mas gsol pa/ bdag cag lta bu'i so so'i skye bo thog ma med pa nas
64b1(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa la mngon par zhen pas yod pa dang med pa dang / gcig dang / du ma dang/ gnyis dang/ gnyis ka ma yin pa dang/ yod pa ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa dang/ rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs
64b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin gyi bag chags kyi rgyas rnam par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i go rim kyi ting nge 'dzin la slob pa na go rim ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bgyi 'am/ yang na bla ma'i man ngag tsam
64b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis de dag skad cig tsam gyis so sor snang bar bgyi / rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/ rim gyis 'jug pas bslab par bya'i cig car ni ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang langkar gshegs pa'i mdo las gsungs te/ de nas bcom
64b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang /gsol ba btab pa / bcom ldan 'das rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud cig car ram /rim gyis 'jug
64b5(rgyud 'grel): par sam /ji ltar rnam par ngag par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyiS bka' stsal pa/ blo gros chen po rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud ni rim gyis 'jug pas rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ cig car ni ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ blo gros chen po shing a
64b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bra'i 'bras bu no rim gyis sbyin par 'gyur gyi /cig car ni ma oyin no/ /blo gros chen po de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud kyang rim gyis rnam par dag ste / cig car ni ma yin no/ /blo gros chen po 'di lta ste/ ? mkhan
64b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi snod rnams ni rim gyis byed kyi cig car ni ma yin no/ /blo gros chen po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can rnams kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud kyang rim gyis rnam par sbyor ste/ cig car ni ma yin no/ /blo gros chen po 'di 
65a1(rgyud 'grel): lta ste /sa chen po las rtswa dang/ shing gal pa dang/ sman dang/ nags tshal rnams rim gyis mjug pas skye'i/ cig car ni ma yin no/ /blo gros chen po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad
65a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rim gyis spyong ste/ cig car ni ma yin no/ /blo gros chen po 'di lta ste/ bzhad gad dang rol mo dang glu dang/ pi wang dang sil snyan dang rol mo dag la mkhas pa ni rim gyis 'byung gi /cig car ni ma yin no/ /
65a3(rgyud 'grel): blo gros chen po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rim gyis sbyong ste/ cig car ni ma yin no/ /rim pa 'di nyid ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las kyang gsal bar
65a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slob na byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis par dpa' par 'gro
65a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la slob pa lags/ de skad gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bstan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/ dper na 'phong
65a6(rgyud 'grel): gi slob dpon nam/ 'phong gi slob ma ni thog mar ba lang gi ko ba la phog par byed do/ /gang gi tshe ba lang gi ko ba la lobs pa de'i tshe shing leb la phog par byed do/ /gang gi tshe shing leb la lobs pa de'i tshe 'ben la phog par byed do/ /
65a7(rgyud 'grel): gang gi tshe 'ben la lobs pa de'i tshe dbyu gu la phog par byed do/ /gang gi tshe dbyu gu la lobs pa de'i tshe skra brgya la phog par byed do/ /gang gi tshe skra la lobs pa de'i tshe skra bcu la phog par byed do/ /gang gi tshe skra bcu la lobs pa de'i tshe skra
65b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig la phog par byed do/ /gang gi tshe skra gcig la lobs pa de'i tshe sgras mtshon la phog par byed do/ /gang gi tshe sgras mtshon la phog pa de'i tshe mi 'chor bar phog par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe mi 'chor bar phog pa de'i tshe 'phong slob pa mthar phyin
65b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin te/ de 'dod na mun pa mun nag gi nang na yang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dang gang gi sgra grag pa de dang der lhun gyis grub cing mi 'tshor ba nyid du mnga' 'gro'o/ /sgras mtshon pa la phog par byed par 'ongs? pas phyis gang du yang mi slob ste/
65b3(rgyud 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na /sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir phog par bya ba thams cad de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyis chos gang la yang bslab par mi
65b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de nyid la sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' i yon tan gyi chos thams cad de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /yang tshul 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i theg pa la gnas pa'i dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge
65b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la slob par 'dod pas kyang rim pa 'di nyid kyis bslab par bya'o/ /de'i rim pa yang 'di yin te/ thog ma nyid du ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsam pa la slob bo/ /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsam pa la lobs par gyur pa de'i tshe theg pa sar la
65b6(rgyud 'grel): dran pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob po/ /gang gi tshe theg pa sar la dran pa cig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la lobs pa de'i tshe rtog pa'i rnal 'byor la slob po/ /gang gi tshe rtog pa'i rnal 'byor la longs pa de'i tshe las dang po pa'i ting 'dzin la rab tu gnas par
65b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe las dang po pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de'i tshe rigs brgya 'i? dbye ba la 'jug go /gang gi tshe rigs brgya'i dbye bas lus rnam par dben pa shes pa de'i tshe/ sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lus rnam
66a1(rgyud 'grel): par dben pa la gnas nas/ A li kA yi ? dag rnam par dben pa la 'jug go /gang gi tshe rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim gyis srog dang rtsol ba shes par gyur pa de'i tshe gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro//
66a2(rgyud 'grel): dag rnam par dben pa la gnas nas rang bzhin gyis snang ba'i rim gyis sems rnam par dben pa la 'jug go/ gang gi tshe rang bzhin gyis snang ba la rlung gi gzhon pa'i rab tu dbye bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du slob pa de'i tshe sems kyi ting nge
66a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa la gnas nas sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis kun rdzob kyis bden pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la
66a4(rgyud 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba thob po/ /gang gi tshe dbang bskur thob pa de'i tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas la gnas nas stong pa chen po bco brgyad kyi rim gyis don dam pa'i bden pa la 'jug go/ gang gi tshe ril
66a5(rgyud 'grel): por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yang dag pa'i mdza' la 'jug pa de'i tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe ye shes kyi rim gyis ldang ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bden pa
66a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la gnyis su med pa'i rnam pas bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par gyur pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni phyis
66a7(rgyud 'grel): chos gang la yang mi slob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des sngon legs par bslab pa'i phyir te/ ji ltar 'phong gi slob dpon ni sgras mtshon pa la phog par byed par gnas pas phyis gang du yang mi slob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon legs par bslabs
66b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir de'i sngon gyi 'phen shugs kyi stobs kyis mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa ni phyis gang la yang slob par mi 'gyur te/ sngon shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir/ /de'i phyir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
66b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'i dngos grub dag ni lhun gyis grub pa nyid du mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par byed pas kyang rim gyis 'jug pas bslab par bya'i cig car ni ma yin no/ /de bas na lus rnam par dben pa med par
66b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dben pa shes par mi nus so/ /dag rnam par dben pa dang bral bas ni sems rnam par dben pa rtogs par mi nus so/ /sems kyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba'i ting 'dzin med par kun rdzob kyi bden pa mngon sum bya bar mi nus so/ /kun rdzob kyi
66b4(rgyud 'grel): bden brtog pa dang bral bas ni don dam pa'i bden pa mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so/ /don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs pa med par ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ngon gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas
66b5(rgyud 'grel): rim gyis 'jug par bslab par bya'i cig car ni ma yin no/ /rim gyis 'jug pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa la bslabs pas cig car rang gi rgyud rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang langkar gshegs pa'i mdo las/ blo gros
66b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'di lta ste/ me long gi nang du gzugs kyi gzugs su snang ba thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pas cig car snang ngo?/ /de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rnam par me rtog cing snang
66b7(rgyud 'grel): ba med pa'i spyod yul rnams cig car rnam par spyod do/ /blo gros chen chos? lta ste /zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'od zer rnams kyis gzugs su snang ba thams cad cig car mngon par byed do/ /de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
67a1(rgyud 'grel): yang sems can rang gi sems snang ba'i gnas ngan len gyi bag chags dang bral ba rnams la rgyal ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul dang spyod yul yang dag par ston to/ /'dir bshad pa/ sems can dang
67a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i las can rnams/ /dam pa'i don la 'jug pa la/ /thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /skas kyi rim pa lta bur bzhag /ces bya ba'i rim pa lnga'i go rims dang bral bas ni rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtogs par mi nus so/ /zhes khong
67a3(rgyud 'grel): du chud par bya'o/ /spyod pa bsdus pa las/ the tsom yongs su gcod pa ste le'u dang po'o// //rdo rje slob mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang por rang gi lus rnam par dben pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi smras pa/
67a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can chen po legs so legs so/ /lus rnam par dben pa brgya cher khong du chud par bya'o/ /de la khams bzhi pos lus mngon par bskyed pa las lus su grub pa 'di ni spungs pa bzhin du gnas te/ sha'i kham tshad dang/ rtsa dang/ rgyus pa dang/
