110b4(rgyud 'grel): ba lan yin no/ /dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub pa la ni yang a nu rA ga ya mi zhes bya ba lan yin no/ /rta mchog gi sgrub pa la ni a nu bar Sha yA mi zhes bya ba lan yin no/ /lha mo gang yin pa rnams kyi mchod pa'i lan yin te/ sa ma ya stwaM zhes
110b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i tshig lngas so/ /rang gi lha rjes su dran par bya ba la ni/ sa ma yo haM zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor te tshogs kyi mchod pa'o/ /ngag gi brda'i le'u'i rim pa'o// //da ni lus kyi brda bstan par bya ste/
110b6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor nyug pa ni phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /dpral bar reg pa ni phyag gi lan no/ /g.yas pa'i smin ma bskyod pa ni sku'i dngos grub po/ /g.yon pas ni rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /mig g.yon pa la reg pa ni bud med bzang mo yin zhes pa'o/ /g.yas pas ni
110b7(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa bzang po'o/ /rna ba g.yon pa la reg pa ni legs par 'ongs pa'o/ /g.yas pas ni legs par smras pa'o/ /sna khung g.yas pa la reg pa ni spos so/ /g.yon pa la ni dri slong ba'o/ /lce g.yas su sgul ba ni sha'o/ /g.yon du ni chang slong ba'o/ /mchan
111a1(rgyud 'grel): khung g.yon par reg pa ni zas so/ /g.yas par reg pa ni tshang? ma slong ba'o/ /lus kyi brda'i le'u'i rim pa'o// //de ltar 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan rnam par bsal zhing yid la re ba rnams spangs nas
111a2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu rab tu dga' ba'i yid can gyis rnal 'byor pa rnams dang lhan cig dga' bzhin pas ni ji ltar rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti dang 'dra bar phung po'i khog pa brjes te / rdo rje'i lus su gyur nas btsun mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu mi snang bar gyur te/ yon
111a3(rgyud 'grel): tan brgyad dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste / ji skad du rtsa ba'i mdo las / lha mo kun gyis longs spyod la/ /ci bde bar ni brten bya ba/ /bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas/ bdag la bdag gis rab tu mchod//
111a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yi/ /rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing/ /rtag tu myang bar byed pa na/ /shin tu sbyor bas rab tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi/ /ras ya nI bde ba des/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal tshe dang/ /lang tsho nad
111a5(rgyud 'grel): med bde mchog 'grub/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /
111a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /gtso rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi/ /de dag dang ni dga' spyod na/ /'dod ba bzhin du 'gro 'od? lding/ /lha mo thams cad grub chen po/ /'khor los sgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ /ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /yang
111a7(rgyud 'grel): na 'byor pa chung ba rnams kyis bshad ma thag pa'i rim pas rol pa'i spros pa rgya che ba dang/ rtag tu phun sum tshogs par mi nus pa des ni spros pa med pa dang shin tu spros pa med pa 'di nyid bde mchog tu bstan pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya ste/ /
111b1(rgyud 'grel): nyin re 'am yang na zla re 'am/ /yang na de bzhin lo rer ni/ /ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang/ /sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba dang/ langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa'am/ /'chag gam ji ltar gnas pa dang/ /rgod dam
111b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu smra yang rung/ /gang na ji ltar spyod kyang rung/ /zhes bya ba dang dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur/ /de dang de yi ngo bor bya/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas rang bzhin bya/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /'dod chags
111b3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi tshul bstan pa'i/ /rnam par rol pa spros pa ni/ /nam mkha' mnyam pas mkha' lta bu/ /mdza' med rgya mtsho dag dang mtshungs/ /slob mas khong du chud pa'i phyir/ /dngos po tsam zhig blangs pa yin/ /'dod chags bstan par bya ba ni/ /
111b4(rgyud 'grel): skye ba du mas bshad nus sam/ /dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi tshul las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa chos 'byung ba'i mngon par byang chub pa'i spros pa dang bcas
111b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcad pa ste/ le'u dgu pa'o// //rdo rje slob mas gsol pa/ spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa ni yongs su gsal bar gyur lags na/ spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol/
111b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/ sems can chen po legs so legs so/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi man ngag gis rab tu bstan par bya yis/ /rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis nyon cig /ri bo shin tu dben pa dang/ /dgon pa chen
111b7(rgyud 'grel): po'i sa phyogs ni/ /'bras bu me tog rnams kyis brgyan/ /'dir ni bsam gtan bsdus pa'o/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su sa'i khang pa ji skad du bshad pa bzhin mngon par sbyangs la der zur bzhi
112a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo can gyi gzhal yas khang bskyed la / de'i 'og tu tha mal pa'i nga rgyal dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor chen pos phyi rol gyi phyag rgya mngon par sbyangs la gcig tu gtogs pa'i rang gi slob
112a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang lhan cig tu 'og nas bshad pa'i rim gyis phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/ /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te / dang po kho nar don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs nas/ bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis mi bskyod pa phyung ste / rjes su bcul?
112a3(rgyud 'grel): nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid du gnas la/ de nas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal bsal te / mi phyed pa'i 'khor rnams rang gi sku'i dkyil 'khor lta bur yan lag tu gyur pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams su lhag par mos pas
112a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha ma lus pa rjes su mnyes par byas la rang gi phyag rgya dang lhan cig ril por 'dzin pa'am gzhig pa'i rim gyi don dam pa'i bden pa la 'jug go /de nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i don
112a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis rdo rje sems khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis yang dag par bskul bas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis skad cig gis langs nas mchog tu dga' ba'i ro myang bar bya ba'i phyir nyams rnam pa dgus rol pa mdzad do/ /de
112a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar yang nas yang du yang dag pa'i mdza' la rab tu zhugs nas yang nas yang du bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams myong bar mdzad de / ji ltar yid zhum par mi 'gyur de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
112a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi a ra li rdzogs par byed de/ de la rang gi gzugs la sogs pa gzugs kyi yul rnam pa gsum la rjes su spyod pa byed pa dang/ glu dang pi bang la sogs pa'i sgra'i yul rnam pa gsum la rjes su spyod par byed pa dang/ spos dang me tog
112b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa dri rnam pa gsum la rjes su spyod par byed pa dang/ kha ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ bska ba dang/ sgyur ba dang/ lan tshwa la sogs pa'i ro rnam pa gsum la rjes su sbyod par byed bo/ /de nas lo bcu drug ma skyed gnas ma nyams nyid nu ma mkhrang? zhing
112b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i mchung? ji lta ba'i sme sha can dang/ btso blag mkhan dang/ gar mkhan ma dang/ phred? rgyud ma dang/ mnga' mkhan ma 'am/ bzo byed ma 'am/ gzhan yang rung/ yan lag mi dman pa'am/ rtsa lag tu gyur pa'i bud med dang/ gzhan la'ang des bgrod par bya ste/ de
112b3(rgyud 'grel): nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten pas smad pa'i dam tshig rnams gang yin pa la spyad pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis mngon par 'dus byas la 'jig
112b4(rgyud 'grel): rten pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa spangs te/ rab tu gsang ba'i gnas na 'dug ste longs spyad par bya'o/ /de bzhin du phyag rgya mi bcing ba dang/ dkyil 'khor med pa dang/ thab khung med pa dang / mchod rten gyi las mi bya ba dang/ glegs bam mi klag
112b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ lus kyi ngal dub spang ba dang/ ras ris dang shing dang rdo'i gzugs brnyan la phyag mi bya ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mi 'gro ba dang/ chos grangs dang byed pa dang thang cig dang skar ma'i dus la bltos par mi byed de /de'i
112b6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa ni 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid kho nas rdzogs par byed do/ /gal te 'byor pa ma tshang ba yis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bya bar mi nus par gyur na sgrub pa po nges de kho na nyid rnam pa lngas kyang spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la rim pa 'dis brlab par
112b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /rim pa ni 'di yin te/ la la ni gzugs rdo rje lta bus lag pa'i pad+ma 'jam pa dang/ me long thogs nas zhi ba'i mig gis lta zhing mu tig gi chun 'phyang ma lus par 'khrol zhing rnam pa phyi ba dang/ nu ma rgyas shing cung zad mnyen pa dang/ 
113a1(rgyud 'grel): gos grol zhing ro smad cung zad ston pas bde ba chen po rjes su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir shar lho'i mtshams su gnas so/ /la la ni sgra rdo rje lta bu mig rnam par 'byed cing lta ba dang/ sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pas rol cing 'gyid
113a2(rgyud 'grel): bag dang bcas pas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos ston pa'i chad pa la mkhas shing dge ba'i gtam smra zhing rab tu glu len la kA ka la'i glu'i rjes su pi baM gi rolmo rab tu brdung bas lho nub gyi mtshams su gnas so/ /la la ni dri rdo rje lta bus 'dzum
113a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis lta bar byed cing sor mo mthon po bimpa? lta bu'i 'od kyi rnam par mdzes pa zangs ltar dmar zhing dra bas 'brel pa'i lag pa'i rtse mos gar byed pa lta bus nor bu'i rang bzhin gyi snod thogs pa 'dzin cing gur kum dang/ a ga
113a4(rgyud 'grel): ru dang/ gla rtsi dang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang/ ga bur la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyis bsgos pas phyogs bcu ma lus pa dri khyab par byed pa'i dri'i snod thogs te nub byang gi mtshams su gnas so/ /la la ni ro rdo rje lta bus brtse ba dang bcas pa'i mig gis lta
113a5(rgyud 'grel): bar byed cing/ gser dang/ dngul la sogs pa dang/ rin po che dpag tu med pa'i snod thogs te /tshad ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i ro'i mchog rnams dang/ lha'i kha zas bdud rtsi chen po mthun pa'i kha zas thogs nas byang shar mtshams
113a6(rgyud 'grel): su gnas so/ /la la ni reg rdo rje lta bus lus mtshan thams cad kyi brgyan pa khrem gnyer gsum gyis mngon par mdzes pa/ dbus shin tu phra ba rgyal mtshan ltar lte ba rgya che zhing g.yas phyogs nas 'khyil cing zab pa sku smad lci ba 'gros dal
113a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing shin tu sgeg pa bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas shing zhi bas blta ba bde ba chen po rjes su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir phang bar nye bar nye bar bzhag nas gnas so/ /de nas bde ba chen po'i dpal rab tu dga' ba'i spyod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ A li ga na dang /tsuM ba
113b1(rgyud 'grel): na dang/ tsu shaM na dang/ ku tsa gra ha ni dang/ pu la ka twa Da na dang/ da sha na kha da na dang/ mar dan dang/ dol dang/ su tsi dang/ kur bar la sogs pa'i ka ngan dang/ rab tu rmongs pas mu tig gi chun 'phyang bskyed cing gdu bu dang/ dbu rgyan dang/ rkang
113b2(rgyud 'grel): gdub kyi sgra dang ldan par yul dang/ dbang po dang/ rdo rje dang/ pad+ma dang/ thabs dang/ shes rab dang/ ye shes dang/ shes bya la snyoms par zhugs shing/ A li kA li dang/ ma ngan pa tra dang/ kurma kaN+Tha dang/ sha shAdka ste / nA Di gsum tyaM? ku
113b3(rgyud 'grel): las rab tu bskul bas phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dri ma med pa'i rgyun lta bus zhu bar gyur nas ye shes kyi sa thob nas mchog tu bde ba chen po'i gnas yang dag par rig par 'gyur ro/ /don 'di nyid gsal
113b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ba'i phyir/ rtsa ba'i mdo las/ chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan bsten/ /ces gsungs pas so/ /gal te gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa dag kyang med na de'i tshe reg rdo rje gcig pu dang lhan cig pa'i kun tu sbyor bas kyang
113b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par bya ste/ gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sgrub pa bo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'dus pa yin la lha mo thams cad ni reg rdo rje'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'dus pa yin te / de bas na mi phyed pa'i nga rgyal gyi rnam par mi
113b6(rgyud 'grel): rtog par bslab par bya'o zhes rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa
113b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung po/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /lus dang dag sems bsgom pa ni/ /rang gi ngo bor de byas na/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs
114a1(rgyud 'grel): so/ /thog tshugs dbu rgyan can gyi gzugs/ /chen po kha dog dkar po 'dra/ /sngags kyi sdom pas kun tu bsdams/ /cho gi bzhin du thams cad bya/ /pho grangs bcu drug lon pa ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/? /bzhin
114a2(rgyud 'grel): sdug mig ni dkyus ring ba/ /rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod pas/ /rdo rje mtshan mas bsgom par bya/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi cho ga shes/ /sngags dang rgyud ni legs ? bslabs/ /de bzhin gshegs
114a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i btsun mor bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab gnas la/ /brtul zhugs chen po dus bzhir ni/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya/ /sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu yin/ /bza' dang bca' ba spyad par bya/ /'on kyang myur du sangs rgyas gyur/ /bdag po
114a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rgya mtsho che/ /zla ba drug gis de dag kun/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa po ni blo brtan pas/ /nags tshal rtag tu bsod snyoms bslang/ /kha zas bzang po bstar ba dag /skrag nas de dag ster bar 'gyur/ /
114a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das na rdo rje gsum bdag nyid/ /rdo rje mi 'gyur ma rung 'gyur/ /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /lha ma yin nam mi mo'ang rung/ /rnyed nas reg pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /rdo rje gsum gyis ye shes bsten/ /zhes gsungs te/ de ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa
114a6(rgyud 'grel): na drug ste/ gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa dang /lag pa bcangs pa dag/ bltas pa dang/ rgod pa'i/ 'khrig pas mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba skad cig skad cig la nyams su myong bar byed do/ /rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs na yang 'khor ba dag
114a7(rgyud 'grel): las rtag tu dga' ba'i gzugs can du gyur ro/ /don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir lha thams cad yang dag par 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor te/ /rtsol ba'i cho ga'i 'og tu ni/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis thugs
114b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub pa/ /bde ba chen po zhes bya'o/ /spros ba med pa'i sbyong ba bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste/ le'i bcu pa'o// //da ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la 'jug par bya ste/ /ri bo shin tu dben pa'am/ /chu dogs 'bab rgyu'i
114b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnams dang/ /du khrod la sogs gnas rnams su/ /bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di bya'o/ /zhes rgyud las gsungs pa'i yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su kha zas sbyor ba'i phyir gnod sbyin mo mdag gzhugs ma la sogs pa bsgrub pas bya'o/ /yang na grub pa'i grogs
114b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gam/ tshogs chen pas kha zas tsam bsgrubs nas rim pa 'dis shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la 'jug par bya'o/ /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po kho nar sgrub pa pos 'khor ba thog ma med pa can gyi sdug bsngal dran par byas ? mya
114b4(rgyud 'grel): ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'dod pas 'du 'dzi thams cad yongs su spang bar bya zhing tha na rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la'ang sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/ /gnyis pa til 'bru tsam la'ang dngos por 'dzin pa'i blo spang bar bya'o/ /gsum pa don dam pa'i
114b5(rgyud 'grel): bden pa la dad pas lus dang srog la'ang bltos pa med par bya'o/ /ji skad du ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo las/ rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
114b6(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pas lus dang srog la bltos pa med par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub phra mo dang/ grub pa chen po brgyad la don du gnyer bar mi bya ste / rnam par g.yengs par 'gyur ba dang/
114b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /ji skad du mthun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las / de nas gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos grub thob pa'i phyir dngos grub gang ci yang rung ba la tshol bar mi byed de/ 'jig rten rgyad
115a1(rgyud 'grel): phan ba'i ngag gi dngos grub dang/ mdag gzhug pa'i dngos grub dang/ bum pa bzang po'i dngos grub dang/ sa 'og gi dngos grub dang/ rgyal srid kyi dngos grub dang/ rgyas pa'i dngos grub dang/ dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub dang/ mngon spyod kyi
115a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub rnams don du gnyer bar mi bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos grub chen po'i don du dngos grub pra mo 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i dngos grub 'ba' zhig la sems rtse gcig par 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de skad du gsang ba grub
115a3(rgyud 'grel): pa las kyang/ sbyor ba la sogs 'bad pa ni/ /de nyid rig pas spang bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' des 'dug pa/ /spangs nas gzhan du mi bya'o/ /dag pa'i de nyid la gnas pas/ /sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya ste/ /bdag med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rje srid par
115a4(rgyud 'grel): du so sor brtag /dngos med go 'phang la gnas dang/ /thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/ /rtog las gang ci 'byung ba rnams/ /ma rtogs par ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni/ /dngos grub mtshan nyid gang ci 'ang rung/ /de
115a5(rgyud 'grel): kun skad cig tsam la ni/ /rang nyid gnas par 'gyur ba yin/ /de bas phyi rol gyi bud med rnam par spangs nas snying gar gnas pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig snyoms par 'jug pas shin tu myur bar rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang rdzogs par
115a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /zhes spros pas dmigs te/ cig pu kho nar 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin du bsam par bya'o/ /de yi rim pa ni 'di yin te/ ji srid phung po'i za ma tog yod pa de srid kyi bar du ni rnam par shes pa gsum gyi ngo bo ste/ rang bzhin
115a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis snang ba 'gro ba dag dang gzhan la snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ji lta zhe na/ dang po ni snang ba'o/ /gnyis pa ni rang bzhin no/ /de rlung dang bcas pas gang phyogs bcur 'khor ba ste/ gang gis shes na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ 'dod chags
115b1(rgyud 'grel): bar ma la sogs pa dang/ gzhan yang drag po dang/ zhi ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ bkres shes pa dang/ bskom pa dang/ tshor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang bzhin rgya drug cu nyin mtshan nyid yid la byas nas ma rig pa rang 'gags shing yang
115b2(rgyud 'grel): langs nas rlung gi dbang gis 'khor bar 'gyur ba ste / de lus dkrus nas ji srid du mi la sogs pa'i dbang po yul la dmigs pa de srid du de nyid du dmigs par 'gyur te/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas skye ba gcig nas
115b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu goms pas bdag med pa'i chos la bslabs pa sa rnam par bsres pa'i sbyor ba khong du chung nas rang bzhin gyis snang ba dang gcig tu 'dre bar bya ste/ rim pa 'dis don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs par bya'o/ /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ phung
115b4(rgyud 'grel): po la sogs pa ni khams phra ba la gzhug go / khams phra ba ni yang sems la zhugs go /sems ni yang sems pa la gzhug go /sems ni yang ma rig pa la gzhug ste/ de ltar sbyar nas gnyid log par byed do/ /de la dus 'dir
115b5(rgyud 'grel): ni sems dang sems dpa' rig pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i skad cig la dran pa brjed pa'o/ /phyis ni brjed pa yang med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o/ /yang grol ba na rlung gi rang bzhin snyed de/ gang gi tshe rmi lam gzhan dag
115b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba ni ji sried du rnam par shes pa mi g.yo ba de srid du gnyid log nas 'od gsal ba la blta ste/ de ni so so rang gis rig pa lus dang ngag dang sems dang/ bral ba'i don daM pa'i bden pa nang gi mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya'o/ /rim
115b7(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dis lus kyis dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad par bya zhing de bzhin nyid kyi gzhug par byas nas skal pa bzang po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te / spros pa dang bcas pa dang spros pa med pa'i
116a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyod pa la bltos pa mod pas shin tu myur bar 'dir rang gi gzugs yongs su brdzas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i don te/ don 'di nyid dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ gzugs
116a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs nang gi chos rnams ni/ /mthong ba lhag mthong zhes brjod la/ /mi bskyod la sogs grangs bzhin du/ /brtags pa dag ni zhi gnas yin/ /'di dag dngos med gyur pa yis/ /de bzhin nyid ni zhi bar bshad/ /de bzhin nyid kyi
116a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du/ /rnal 'byor ba yis sangs rgyas gzhug /ces gsungs pa dang/ yang lha thams cad yang dag par 'dus pa'i rgyud las kyang/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i mi bzad med/ /tha la'ang lus par mi 'gyur te/ /des na der ni dbang
116a4(rgyud 'grel): don dang/ /khams rnams 'dir ni yod pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rim pa 'dis ni lung dang rigs pa dag gis mngon par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum nges par byas nas/ yul la zhen pa dang rol pa thams
116a5(rgyud 'grel): cad spangs te/ rim pa 'dis b+hu su ku tsam gyi spyod pa la spyad de/ de'i rim pa ni 'di'o/ /b+hu zhes bya ba ni zas la spyod pa ste/ de tsam zhig rjes su dran pa dang/ 'du 'dzi spong bar byed cing/ dka' thub dang brtul zhugs so/ /zhes gang la
116a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od? bsam byar mi bya'o/ /su zhes bya ba ni gnyer log ba ste rnam par shes ba 'di dag ma rig pas nye bar mtshon pas mngon sum du byed do/ /ma rig pa lcags kyu lta bu de nyid kyis rnam par shes pa gang la'ang 'dre bar mi byed de/ 'od
116a7(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba nyid mngon par 'du byed cing dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /ku zhes bya ba ni bshad sar 'gro ba ste/ bshad pa dang gci ba 'dor ba'i phyir de tsam zhig rjes su dran par byed cing 'du 'dzi spong byar byed la/ lus dang tshor ba dang yul
116b1(rgyud 'grel): dang dbang po'i ngo bo nyid la sems par mi byed do/ /shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa smyon pa'i brtul zhugs bshad pa'i mdo las gsungs pa'i rim pas kyang bshad par bya'o/ /de yis rim pa ni 'di yin te/ gang tshe brtan par mi rtog la/ /gnas
116b2(rgyud 'grel): shin 'jig rten pa spangs te/ /spyod pa thams cad bsdus byas na/ /de la de tshe sangs rgyas gzigs/ /kun tu the tshom gcod pa yis/ /rigs pas byis pa ji bzhin spyad/ /gang tshe chags med rnal 'byor pa/ /de tshe phun sum tshogs 'phel 'gyur/ /sdig pa
116b3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus ldan ba dang/ /gti mug sdig pa rab gnas na/ /smon pa'i brtul zhugs sbyor ba yis/ /zla ba drug gis don yod 'grub/ /rang nyid sangs rgyas kun mthong zhing/ /'dod pa kun gyis rab tu 'gengs/ /zad med gzhom du med pa dang/ /dang po'i tshe
116b4(rgyud 'grel): lus 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog /'bad? pa med par yang dag 'thob/ /'dod pa kun gyis dga' mo rnams/ /'bad dang bral bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'gro dang 'dug dang gnas pa na/ /mchog tu zab pa'i gnas la brtag /'ong
116b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal ye shes la mkhas pa/ /mtshan nyid rtag par rnal 'byor ba'i/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yin te/ /sems kyi rin chen brtan par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab zhugs pa/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /de ltar
116b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur par zhugs nas kyang/ /ji srid sems ni mi skyo'i phyed do/ /mnyam gzhag yid ni bzang po yis/ /de la 'bod pas bsgom par bya/ /de'i 'og tu ci dga' ba'i/ /spyod pa yis ni spyang byas nas/ /cung zad spyan phye'i mtshan nyid can/ /byang chub
116b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen 'thob par 'gyur/ /rgod dom smro 'am 'dug pa dang/ /la la rab tu gar byed par/ /ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur bar/ /sgom pa'i sems la zhen par bya/ /de lta'i dam tshig ldan 'gyur zhing/ /rnam par mi rtog sngags pa yis/ /dus kyi nges pa
117a1(rgyud 'grel): yongs spangs nas/ /bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar chung du dang/ 'bring dang/ chen po'i dbye ba dang/ na chod dang rjes su mthun pas spyod pa rnam pa gsum zla ba phyed dam / zla ba cig gam zla ba drug zlas par
117a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa'i mtshan ma nye bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ /de la mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin no/ /gzugs phra ba dang/ reg pa yang ba dang/ khyab pa dang/ yang dag thob pa nyid dang/ rab tu snang ba
117a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang/ brtan pa dang/ dbang du gyur pa dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba zhes bya'o/ /yang rmi lam gyi mtshan ma gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ byang chub ye shes mchog thob pas/ /sangs rgyas sku dang mtshungS
117a4(rgyud 'grel): par mthong/ /sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku/ bdag med pa ni myur du mthong/ /sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pas/ /mchod pa byed pa des mthong ngo/ /ye shes chen po 'di yis gzugs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems
117a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' yis/ /'dod pa'i yo tan lnga rnams kyis/ /rtag tu mchod pa byed pa mthong/ /rdo rje sems dbang gzugs chen dang/ /grags chen rdo rje mchog dag tu/ /rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong/ /grags chen rdo rje gsang ba dang/ /
117a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong 'gyur ba/ /lus ngag sems kyi mthu las skyes/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang/ /khye'u
117a7(rgyud 'grel): bu mo dag mthong na/ /de ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad rnams/ /zhing na gnas pa nges par mthong/ /thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang/ /chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol/ /chos kyi 'khor lo
117b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyur ba'i sku/ /semS can gyis yongs bskor ba/ /bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i/ /dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje slob mas gsol pa/ gal te sgrub pa po bden pa mthong yang sngon gyi bag chags la goms pa'i stobs
117b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ zhing dang/ las dang/ tshong dang/ bsnyen bkur la sogs pas g.yengs pas spyod pa rnams gsum spyod par mi byed pa dang/ sgrub pa po gzhan dag 'byor pa mtshang bas rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byed
117b3(rgyud 'grel): mi nus pa'i phyir mi sbyod ba de dag ni/ 'chi ba'i dus byas nas yang/ /srid pa gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ram/ /yang na rdo rje 'chang ba nyid thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras ba/ 'di la bsal ba gang yang med/ /bzhag par bya ba ci
117b4(rgyud 'grel): yang med/ /yang dag nyid la yang dag blta/ /yang dag mthong nas rnam par grol/ /zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i dbang du byas pa'i tshig ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa mthong ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i mthong bas/
117b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa dang/ chad pa dang/ 'pho ba la sogs pa'i lta ba ngan pa 'gags par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang tha snyad la brten nas 'pho ba rnam par dag pa nges par spyad par bya ste / 'di ni phung po la sogs pa ni 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho bar mi byed de/ rtag
117b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /'jig rten pha rol 'chi ba las gzhan las kyang 'byung ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /'di lta ste/ mar me las mar me dang/ rgya las rgya dang/ sgra las brag ca dag ni
117b7(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dam de las gzhan pa zhes brjod par mi nus so/ /de bas na gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las kyang/ sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing/ /chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/ /sems can rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir/ /mya ngan 'da' bar
118a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs pa dang/ de bzhin du langkar gshegs pa'i mdo las kyang/ 'di la gang yang rkyon rnams kyis/ /skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/ /brtags pa'i rkyen rnams kho na ni/ /skyes zhing
118a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gag par 'gyur ba yin/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /rigs pa 'dis na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas mdzad pa thams cad mdzad pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar ston par mdzad pa yin no/ /de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs
118a3(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pas kyang thams cad byas nas 'jig rten du mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'di la som nyi mi bya'o/ /de bas na de kho na shes pa ni/ rkyen ma tshang bas ji skad du bshad pa'i spyod pa gal te ma spyad du zin kyang/ lta ba thams cad rnam par
118a4(rgyud 'grel): spangs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin la/ skye ba ni kun rdzob kun gyi bden pa'o zhes yang dag par mngon par rtogs nas/ brgya lam na 'od gsal bar zhugs nas/ tha ma la pa'i phung po bor nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i
118a5(rgyud 'grel): rim ldang bar bya'o/ /zhes brtan pa'i sems bskyed de/ yid la byed pas gnas par byed na/ de skye ba gzhan du yid la byed pa de 'dor bar mi 'gyur te/ de bas na thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ bsam pa gang dang gang gis
118a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor/ /de ni de yi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bas na 'di dag thams cad ni khyad par can du yongs su bsgyur bas yongs su 'gyur bzhin pas khyad par can gyi 'bras bu
118a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dir bshad pa/ gang zhig skye ba kun rdzob bden zhes bya/ /'chi ba'i ming yang don dam bden pa yin/ /rim gnyis de dag bla ma'i drin gyis ni/ /rnyed pa 'di ni ma 'ongs sangs rgyas yin/ /bden gnyis de la zung du
118b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa ni/ /mi 'chad bzhin du de dag khyad par med/ /ming gnyis mdza' ma gcig du kho nar ni/ /shes pa de 'dir bcings las grol ba yin/ /ri dbang rtse las 'ga' zhig lhung gyur na/ /lhung bar mi 'dod kyang ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /bla ma'i drin
118b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis phan pa'i lung thob na/ /grol bar mi 'dod kyang ni grol bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na don yod gsung gi de nyid rtogs mthu 'gro ba la med de/ /mtsho chen chu la drag po'i rlung gis kun tu g.yengs pa'i til mar thig pa 'dra/ /de na bdag
118b3(rgyud 'grel): gis cung zad tsam zhig blangs nas bsdu bar byas pa ni/ /mthar thug kun rdzob kyis 'jigs skal ldan skye bo'i blo la sgron ma ltar bu yin/ /shin tu spros med pa'i spyod pa bsdus pa'i the tshom gcod pa ste / le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //
118b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma/ slob dpon chen po Arya de ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sto// //rgya gar gyi khan po sh+rAd+d+ha? ka ra warma dang/ zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba/ dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
118b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //'di la rgya gar gyi shlo ka stong sum brgya yod/ /phyag dpe gnyis la gtugs so// //sems kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du / tsit+tA ba ra bi sho d+ha nA ma bra
118b6(rgyud 'grel): kA ra NaM/ bod skad du/ sems kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa/ bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog ma mthA ma med zhi ba/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam
118b7(rgyud 'grel): par spangs/ /rnam par rtog med dmigs dang bral/ /gnas pa med pa gnyis med pa/ /'gro ba med pa dpe med pa/ /rjod du med pa bltar med pa/ /gnas pa med pa gnas med pa/ /'gyur ba med pas 'dus ma byas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
119a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi ni gnas/ /sku ni snying rje'i rang bzhin nyid/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs la/ /thabs rnams sna tshogs rab ston pa'o/ /'dod chags chen po tshul phyag 'tshal/ /pad+ma gar dbang khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rang gi sems
119a2(rgyud 'grel): ni rtogs bya'i phyir/ /cung zhig tsam zhig brjod par bya/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshogs kyi ni/ /thams cad nyid du rab nges pa/ brjod bar bya ba 'di dag nyid/ /de phyir 'di dag spyad par bya/ /las drag gang gi 'gro ba rnams/ /gang dang gang du 'ching
119a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba/ /thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis/ /srid pa'i 'ching las grol bar 'gyur/ /sems tsam rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /'bras bu rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /'di dag shin tu rgyas par ni/ /theg pa chen por gsal bar bstan/ /chos
119a4(rgyud 'grel): dang gang zag dbyer med pa/ /ye shes tsam du thub pas gsungs/ /de lta na yang 'di ltar 'byung/ /rigs pa dang yang rab tu mthun/ /dngos 'dzin gdon gyis zin pa yis/ /zhen pa rab tu gsal bya'i phyir/ /lung las kyang ni gsal po ru//
119a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par snying rje'i bdag nyid gsungs/ /chos rnams sngon du 'gro ba'i yid/ /yid gtso yid ni mgyogs pa ste/ /yid gnyis kyis ni 'bad pa yang/ /smra ba'am ni byed pa'o/ /dge slong rang gi pha rgan gyis/ /myur gyis zhes ni bskul
119a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas/ /bskul bas de nyid shi gyur kyang/ /mtshams med sbyor pa ma yin no/ /shin tu na ba'i dgra bcom pas/ /dge slong nad g.yog byed pa la/ /nga yis mgrin pa sdoms zhes bstan/ /de
119a7(rgyud 'grel): ni shi yang skyon med bstan/ /'du shes gzhan gyis gzhan dag ni/ /shi yang nyes te mi spyod par/ /'di 'dra lung las gsal por bstan/ /de phyir sems dge nyes pa med/ /de 'dus byas pa'i blo yis ni/ /mchod rten bshig kyang
119b1(rgyud 'grel): nyes med de/ /nye ba'i mtshams med byas pas kyang/ /bsod nams phung po 'ba' zhig go / bsam pa bzang pos mchil lham gnyis/ /thub pa'i dbul bzhag pa dang/ /de nyid gzhan gyis bsal byas pa/ /gnyis kas rgyal srid thob par
119b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de phyir bsam pa'i rtsa ba las/ /bsod nams sdig pa rnam par gnas/ /lung las 'di ltar gsungs ba'i phyir/ /sems dge ba las nyes pa med/ /rang lhar sbyor ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /'gro ba'i don ni byed brtson pas/ /rnal 'byor
119b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod yul longs spyod kyang/ /grol 'gyur gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar dug gi de nyid shes/ /dug pa spyad nas za bar byed/ /'di ni brgyal bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /nad las thar pa 'ga' zhig 'gyur/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za yi/ /grong dang rmi lam
119b4(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam bltas la/ /ci zhig ji ltar su zhig spyod/ /byis pa rnams ni gzugs la chags/ /'bring po rnams ni chags bral 'gyur/ /gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid shes nas/ /blo mchog rnams ni grol bar 'gyur/ /
119b5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig thams cad rnam bsam la/ lha la mchod pa'i chog yis/ /the tshom med par bzang por blta/ /sngags kyis bskul la longs spyod bya/ /yi ge gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/ /sbyang dang rtogs dang de bzhin spang/ /srid lag mthe bong rtse mo
119b6(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams chim bar bya/ /byis pa rnams la 'di bden pa/ /de ni rnal 'byor ba la brdzun/ /de tsam zhig tu longs spyod pa/ /bcings pa med cing grol ba med/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa zhes/ /de nyid ma mthong ba yi
119b7(rgyud 'grel): sems/ /'khor med mya ngan /'das med des/ /de nyid mthong ba rnams kyis sems/ /rnam par rtog pa gdon chen po/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin/ /rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid ches/ /srid pa'i mching las grol bar 'gyur/ /
120a1(rgyud 'grel): the tshom dug gis gnod pa ni/ /skye ? dug gis gnod pa bzhin/ /de nyid rtsa ba nas bton la/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis spyad/ /dper na shel sgong dag pa ni/ /kha dog gzhan gyis bsgyur bar byed/ /de bzhin rin
120a2(rgyud 'grel): chen sems 'di yang/ /rtog pa'i chen gyis bsgyur ba nyid/ /tha mal rtog pa'i tshon gyis ni/ /rin chen sems ni dben 'gyur na/ /thog ma nas dag ma skyes pa/ /gnyug ma'i rang bzhin dri med gang/ /byis pas gang dang gang smad pa/ /de dang de la
120a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas spyos/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /sems ni dri med bya ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor dge ba'i sems kyis ni/ /chags med dug gis rmongs pa yis/ /'dod can ma la 'dod spyad pas/ /'dod pas thar pa thob par 'gyur/ /dper na bdag
120a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid mkha' lding du/ /bsgoms nas dug kun 'thung byed pa/ /bsgrub bya'i dug gkyang med par byed/ /dug gis zil gyis mi non no/ /'khor lo dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ /lcags byas mgol 'khor ba yang/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed ma thag /med par gyur
120a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes thos pa yin/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems byas pa/ /de yis mi bya gang yang med/ /'gro ba bzung ba'i bsam pa yis/ /thog ma nas dag ma skyes pa/ /dngos po med pa dri med pa/ /'gro ba bsam pas yang
120a6(rgyud 'grel): dag mthong/ /bcings pa med cing grol ba med/ /lha yi yon tan rgyas par ni/ /rnal 'byor chog bzhin bsams nas/ /chags pa'i sems kyis chags pa'am/ /chags pa spyad nas grol bar 'gyur/ /ci bya gang la dmigs shes na/ /dngos po nus
120a7(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs pa/ /ji ltar dug gis zin pa 'ga' / /dug nyid kyis ni dug med byed/ /rna ba'i chu la chu nyid dang/ /tsher ma zug la tsher ma ltar/ /de bzhin chags la chags nyid kyis/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis 'dzin par byed/ /dper na khrus mkhan
120b1(rgyud 'grel): dri ma yis/ /gos kyi dri ma med par byed/ /ji ltar rdul gyi me long gi / dri ma bdag par 'gyur ba bzhin/ /de bzhin mkhas pas nyes pa dag /nyes pa sbyangs phyir bsten par bya/ /lcags kyi gong bu chu nang du/ /ji ltar gting du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /??
120b2(rgyud 'grel): nyi bsnod du byas bas su/ /bdag dang gzhan yang sgrol bar byed/ /de bzhin snod du byas pa'i sems/ /shes rab thabs kyi chog yis/ /'dod pas spyod bzhin grol bar 'gyur/ /gzhan dag kyang ni grol bar byed/ /rnam shes ngan pas bsten
120b3(rgyud 'grel): byas na/ /'dod pa 'ching ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de nyid mkhas pas bsten byas nas/ /'dod pas thar par rab tu sgrub/ /'o mas dug ni zhig 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten kun la rab tu grags/ /de nyid sprul gyis 'thungs nas ni/ /dug ni shin tu 'phel bar
120b4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /ji ltar dang bas 'o ma ni/ /chu las 'thung bar byed par ltar/ /de bzhin mkhas pas dug bcas yul/ /sbyangs nas spyad pas grol bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar cho ga bzhin spyad na/ /dug kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ba yin/ /byis pa rnams kyis mar
120b5(rgyud 'grel): kham sogs/ /bza' ma legs pa dug tu 'gyur/ /de ltar sems ni 'di nyid kyang/ /gtan tshigs bzang pos sbyangs byas na/ /rnam par mi rtog dmigs med pa/ /rang bzhin dri med rab tu snang/ /ji ltar me ni chung du yang/ /mar dang snying
120b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs 'dus byas pas/ /snang ba dri med mi g.yo ba/ /bstan pa'i mun pa rnam 'jig 'gyur/ /ji ltar phra ba'i sdong po las/ /ji ltar lo ma 'bras bu yis/ /brgyan pa'i shing chen 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yung dang rdo rje sbyar ba las/ /
120b7(rgyud 'grel): kha dog gzhan zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /chos dbyings mkhas pa de ltar shes/ /mar dang sgrang rtsi mnyam ldan pas/ /dug nyid du mi 'gyur ba yin/ /de nyid cho ga bzhin spyad na/ /bcud kyi len
121a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /dngul chus reg pa'i zangs ma ni/ /ji ltar skyon med gser du 'gyur/ /de bzhin yang dag ye shes ni/ /sbyangs pas nyon mongs bzang por byed/ /theg pa dman la zhon pa rnams/ /skad cig skad cig
121a2(rgyud 'grel): 'ching bar byed/ /g.yul las rgyal bar bya ba'i sems/ /ring pa nyid du rnam par gnas/ /theg pa chen la zhon nas ni/ /snying rje'i go cha bgo byas nas/ /shes rab rgyud bcas mnga' dang gzhus/ /'gro ba gzung ba'i bsam pa yis/ /sems
121a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' che dang thabs che ba/ /brtan pa'i blo ni gnyid sangs nas/ /brgal dka' g.yul las rgyal byas nas/ /gzhan dag kyang ni sgrol bar byed/ /rang don tsam la gzhol bas ni/ /byol sod rnams kyang nyon mongs byed/ /'gro ba'i don ni byed ba po/ /
121a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba de gtor gang+gA na/ /grang dang rlung sogs sdug bsngal rnams/ /rang don zhugs las kyang bzod na/ /'gro ba'i don la zhugs rnams lta/ /de mi bzod pa ji lta bu/ /dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal yang/ /snying rje can gyi bzod bya na/ /grang dang
121a5(rgyud 'grel): rlung sogs sdug bsngal dag /da ltar gyi la bsam ci dgos/ /dka' thub brtag pa mi bya zhing/ /bsnyung ba yang ni bya ba med/ /'dir ni khrus dang gtsang sbra med/ /grong ba'i chos ni spang bar bya/ /sen mo rkang dang rus pa so/ /pha yi khu ba'i rgyu las skyes/ /
121a6(rgyud 'grel): sha dang khrag dang skra la sogs/ /ma yi khrag las yang dag byung/ /'di ltar mi gtsang las byung zhing/ /mi gtsang bas gang ril po gang/ /de lta bu yi lus 'di nyid/ /gang gAr bkrus kyang ji ltar 'dag/ /mi gtsang phur mchu dag gis/ /yang
121a7(rgyud 'grel): yang bkrus kyang dag mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin mi gtsang bas gang ba'i/ /phur ma 'di yang bdag mi 'gyur/ /gang gA'i klung la khyi dag gis/ /rkyal zhing 'phyo yang dag mi 'gyur/ /de phyir chos 'dod skyes bu dag /'bab stegs khrus byed 'bras bu
121b1(rgyud 'grel): med/ /khrus kyi gal te dag 'gyur na/ /nya pa rnams kyang don byas 'gyur/ /nyin dang mtshan du gnas pa yi/ /nya la sogs pa smos ci dgos/ /khrus kyis sdig? pa zad pa yang/ /nges par yod pa ma yin te/ /ji ltar 'bab stegs bsten pa la/ /'dod chags
121b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs 'phel bar mthong/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang/ /nga rgyal lta ba the tshom rnams/ /sdig pa'i rtsa bar rab tu grags/ /'di dag sbyang bya khrus kyis min/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa las/ /srog chags rnams las byung ba yin/ /de yang
121b3(rgyud 'grel): ma rig rtsa ba las/ /ma rig de yang ? 'khrul par 'dod/ /de ltar nya phyis la dngul blo/ /nya phyis mthong bas ldog par 'gyur/ /bdag med mthong bas de yang ni/ /rtsa ba nyid nas med par 'gyur/ /dper na thag pa sbrul gyi blo/ /thag par shes na ldog
121b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /de las sprul gyi blo yi bar/ /skye bde las yang mi 'byung/ /de bzhin 'di la bden pa'i blo/ /ye shes rdo rje ldog par 'gyur/ /de ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sa bon bsregs pa'i myu gu bzhin/ /bdag nyid mi gtsang 'dus pa yis/ /gong bus
121b5(rgyud 'grel): yi rang bzhin nyid/ /de 'dus pa yi chos 'gyur bar/ /byis pa dga' bar rnam brtags pas/ /zla ba 'phel dang 'grib pa la/ /bltas nas tshe grangs brtags pa la/ /nyi ma 'phel dang 'grib pas kyang/ /nyin dang mtshan mor rnam par brtag /shar
121b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyang/ /rtags la bltos nas byas pa yin/ /gza' dang rgyu skar khyim la sogs/ /'jig rten kun gyi rnam par brtags/ /grang dang tsha dang char 'bab pa/ /bltos nas de bzhin dus rnams brtags/ /rang gi las kyis 'bras spyod
121b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bzang dang ngan pa'i gzar bstan to/ /ma rig 'dam gyis gtums pa yi/ /sems kyi yid bzhin nor bu nyid/ /skyes bu mkhas pas bkru byas nas/ /ma rig gang gis yang dag bskyed/ /gza' dang rgyu skad tshe grangs dang/ /yul dang dus la
122a1(rgyud 'grel): bltos med par/ /rtog pa med par spyad par bya/ /'tshom med the tshom med par ni/ /rtog pa med par spyad par bya/ /dbang po lam dgur gang dang gang/ /de ni de yi ngo bo nyid/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad
122a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rang bzhin bya/ /mig ni rnam par snang mdzad gtso/ /rna ba rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /sna ni rta mchog nyid yin no/ /kha ni pad+ma gar dbang phyug /dpal ldan he ru ka rgyal lus/ /yid ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /de ltar yang dag sbyor ba yis/ /snying
122a3(rgyud 'grel): rje'i bdag nyid can gyis spyad/ /mkhas pas sems ni brtag gyur nas/ /mi rtog pa 'dis 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pas bya ba yis/ /kun bzang kun byed de bzhin no/ /las dang bya ba kun byed na/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba yis/ /
122a4(rgyud 'grel): langs dang 'dug par byed pa dang/ /ji ltar 'chag na 'ang de bzhin no/ /rgod dang smra bar byed pa dang/ /ji ltar de ltar gang de bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa/ /sgrib pa kun dang ldan pas kyang/ /rang gi lha sbyor bdag nyid kyis/ /bsod nams
122a5(rgyud 'grel): chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /dpa' bo dag ni thams cad nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang 'di rig /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ji ltar 'jig rten phal pa las/ /rnal 'byor pa yi ting 'dzin
122a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ /gong ma gong ma'i blo khyad kyis/ /rnal 'byor pa yang rgyal bar 'gyur/ /shes rab che dang thabs che dang/ /brtse ba che dang mos pa nyid/ /theg pa chen por yang dag bstan/ /sems can chen po'i spyod yul yin/ /gang zhig bskal
122a7(rgyud 'grel): pa grangs med ni/ /mang pos mi 'thob par 'dod pa'i/ /sangs rgyas tshe 'di nyid kyis ni/ /thob pa 'di la the tshom med/ /theg pa chen po bdag nyid che/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyis ni/ /kun khyen go 'phang nyams dga' ba/ /tshe 'di
122b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /lung las mnyam par gsungs pa gang/ /theg pa che la mi rigs te/ /bsam pa lhag bsam bye brag gis/ /theg pa'i khyad par rab tu bstan/ /gzhan nyid du ni? mos pa dang/ /byang chub spyod pa de bzhin gzhan/ /sems kyi rnams dag
122b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan nyid kyis/ /'dir ni 'bras bu gzhan mthong med/ /ji ltar me long dri med la/ /dri ma med pa'i mig gis gzugs/ /dang ba'i rang bzhin dri med la/ /shin tu gsal bar snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor ye shes kyang/ /dri med ye shes
122b3(rgyud 'grel): me long la/ /rtog pa'i dra ba rnams sbyangs pa'i/ /sems dge ba la rnam par gsal/ /ji ltar nor bu me shel la/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis kun reg pas/ /de ma thag tu me 'bar bas/ /rang gi don ni 'grub par nus/ /rtog pa'i dra bas rnam spangs pa'i//
122b4(rgyud 'grel): nor bu me shel 'dra ba'i yid/ /shes rab nyi ma'i 'od phog pas/ /rnal 'byor de bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur/ /shing gnyis drag tu brud pa las/ /ji ltar me ni 'bar 'gyur ba/ /thog ma bar dang mdza' dag la/ /dngos po ma lus rab snang byed/ /shes
122b5(rgyud 'grel): rab thabs su sbyor ba las/ /rnal 'byor pa yis de bzhin shes/ /dper na mar me gcig nyid la/ /snying po gzhan dag la brten nas/ /ji bzhin gnas su rang don gzhan/ /mthon po'i gnas nas snang bar byed/ /shes rab thabs bdag rnam bsgomS
122b6(rgyud 'grel): shing/ /dpag tu med pa'i lus spros nas/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs la/ /mdzad pa ji bzhin nyams su blangs/ /ji ltar cho ga shes pa 'gas/ /nyes pa med pa'i bsil nyams dga' / /nad rnams thams cad gang byed pa'o/ /bdud rtsi 'o ma
122b7(rgyud 'grel): dag las blang/ /shes rab 'o ma thabs chen pos/ /cho ga bzhin du bsgrub las skyes/ /chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag pas/ /bde ba dam pas sdug bsngal 'jig /me tog 'bras bu ldan pa yi/ /'khril shing kun tu 'byung ba ltar/ /de
123a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin tshogs gnyis dang ldan pa'i/ /skad cig cig gis mngon byang chub/ /dbang dang sdang dang 'gro ba rangs/ /char dbab dgu pa la sogs pa/ /sha chang dga' ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /byas par gyur kyang mthong bar 'gyur//
123a2(rgyud 'grel): lag pa'i gdu bu lta bu la/ /me long dag ni dgos sam ci/ /theg pa chen po de rgyas yang/ /sngags kyi nus pa bstan pa yin/ /pha ma bu mo 'brel ba ni/ /'dir ni de nyid med par brtags/ /lcags kyi reng du bshig pa ltar/ /'gro bde
123a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bde gshegs gsungs/ /'byung lnga'i bdag nyid khu ba dang/ /khrag kyang de dang 'dra ba dang/ /de yi rang bzhin gong bu lnga/ /bram ze gang yin mthar skyes? gang/ /dge slong dag gi lus 'de ni/ /thams cad phung po lnga bdag nyid/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal

123a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal ni rab tu bzhad gyur cing/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /rang gi lha yi yid kyis ni/ /bstan pas skad cig mthong dang blta/ /thos dang nyan par byed pa yang/ /myong zhing bde la spyod par ldan/ /gsal ba'i dag kyang smra bar

123b7(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /rang bzhin dri med gsal 'gyur ba/ /ye shes sgron ma rab tu gsal/ /rab tu gsal ba'i 'byung ba rnams/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba nus pa yis/ /gzhan nyid du ni 'byung bar byed/ /brjod pa thams cad yongs spongS
124a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ /sngags kyi brjod pa yang dag spyod/ /pra de ba'i dngos grub sbyin pa yi/ /sngags kyi nus pa 'di la ltos/ /dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing/ /de bzhin bla ma byang chub sems/ /srog chags rnams kyang bsad mi bya//
124a2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dag kyang byin gyis brlabs/ /rin chen dang ni ga pur bcas/ /tsan dan dmar po dang sbyar ba/ /thub pi? rdo rje chu zhes bya/ /lnga po dag kyang byin gyis brlab/ /lha yi dam tshig gzhan dag kyang/ /sems ni spro bar byed pa can/ /rlung dang me ni zhe
124a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyir/ /sems kyi rdo rje tshim par bya/ /'tshom byed the tshom med par ni/ /rnal 'byor rnam rtog med brtson pas/ /sems ni mnyam par sbyor ba yis/ /sngags bas thams cad mnyam par spyod/ /sprang ma'i rkang ba cam gyi ni/ /dug gis zil gyis
124a4(rgyud 'grel): non bar 'gyur/ /'tshom dang the tshom chung dus kyang/ /de la sdug bsgnal sky+d par byed/ /mkhas pas legs par 'thab pa'am/ /yang na legs par 'bros par bya/ /bar ma ngo yi dngos po ni/ /don med pa ru ltung bar 'gyur/ /bla ma'i bka' 
124a5(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya dang/ /grib ma yang ni 'gom mi bya/ /de yi yon tan gzung bar bya/ /skyon ni nam yang ma yin no/ /slob dpon lha yi mchog yin te/ /'bad pas mchod par bya ba yin/ /de nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /mngon sum gzugs kyi
124a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gnas/ /ji ltar nor bu chu dang gis/ /rnyog ma thams cad dangs byed pa/ /de bzhin dang ba'i nor bu yis/ /sems kyi rin chen rnam par byang/ /shes rab mig dang bral gyur na/ /dad pa'i bdag nyid can rmongs 'gyur/ /de phyir lung
124a7(rgyud 'grel): rtogs bdag nyid can/ /shes rab nye bar skyed par bya/ /dad ldan thos mang shes rab ldan/ /rang bzhin snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir/ /de yi bde ba'i thabs shes bya/ /sems rnam
124b1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa 'di byas pas/ /bdag gis dge ba gang lags pa/ /rnam par dag pa'i sems thob nas/ /des ni 'gro ba 'di thob shog /sems kyi sgrib? pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon Adya de bas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //
124b2(rgyud 'grel): A tsarya dz+nyA nA ka ra dang/ lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba// //bdag 'byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dang mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i man ngag 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o/ / */ /rgya gar skad du/ swa? a d+hiSh+Tha na? kra ma pra b+he daM/ bod skad
124b3(rgyud 'grel): du/ bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa rnam par dbye ba/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lta ba thams cad rab bcom pa'i/ /ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rnam dbye 'di/ /brtse bas bdag gis
124b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya/ /yod ces rtog pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed rtag pa'i lta ba ste/ /rtag par mngon par zhen pas na/ /'di ni sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min/ /med ces rtog pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed chad pa'i lta ba ste/ /chad par mngon par zhen pas na/ /'di
124b5(rgyud 'grel): yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min/ /yod ces pa dang med ces pa'i/ /de dbus su gang rtog pa ni/ /dbus su mngon par zhen pas na/ /'di yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min/ /kun rdzob bden par gang gsungs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku mtshan
124b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /de 'dir sgyu mar bstan pa ste/ /bdag byin brlab pa zhes brjod do/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /gang zhig gis ni thams cad khyab/ /bsod nams dman pas mi rnyed de/ /lung bstan nyid kyis rnyed par 'gyur/ /gtsang
124b7(rgyud 'grel): spra pa sdams pa 'dir mi dgos/ /dka' thub dka' spyod mi dgos te/ u/dka' thub sdom pa med par yang/ /dga dang bde bas 'grub bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig de ltar shes nas ni/ /de nyid gang zhig rtag dran na/ /thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam/
125a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul gyis/ /de yis sangs rgyas 'grub bar 'gyur/ /sgyu mas gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ? pa/ /'di la ltas kyang rtag tu skyong/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /thams cad mkhyen bar de nas 'gyur/ /rdo rje che
125a2(rgyud 'grel): dang stobs po che/ /lang tsho nang med bde ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob nas ni/ /skye ba 'byung ba rang dags so/ /mthong ba nyid kyis bskul med pa/ /sems can rnams ni dbang du 'ong/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /
125a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod don thams cad rnyed par 'gyur/ /chos kun rmi lam sgyu 'dra ste/ /sangs rgyas pa kun smra mod kyi/ /bdag byin brlab las phyir bltas pas/ /des na bden pa mthong mi nus/ /gzhu yi rnam pa'i yid rang bzhin/ /rnam shes rlung
125a4(rgyud 'grel): dang yang dag ldan/ /sgyu ma'i dpe la rmongs pas ni/ /rang gi ye shes des mi mthong/ /bskal ba bye ba mdza' yas par/ /thos pa'i pha rol son gyur kyang/ /bla ma'i lung dang bral ba yis/ /bdag byin brlab pa rnyed mi
125a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de bas nga rgyal yongs spangs nas/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /rdo rje theg pa zhon pa yis/ /bla ma bsgrims te mnyes par bya/ /shin tu rnyed dka' i rim dbye bas/ /'di ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /gang zhig shes
125a6(rgyud 'grel): nas rnam spyad pa/ /sgrub po sangs rgyas kun dngos 'gyur/ /sa la sogs pa rnam bzhi dang/ /de bzhin du ni stong pa bzhi/ /gnas ni rnam pa brgyad po dang/ /skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyur shes bya/ /'od gsal las ni stong chen te/ /de
125a7(rgyud 'grel): las thabs ni yang dag 'byung/ /de las skyes pa shes rab ste/ /de las rlung ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rlung las me ni yang dag skyes/ /me las chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chu las skyes pas yin te/ /de rnams la ni sems can 'byung/ /
125b1(rgyud 'grel): sa ni chu la thim 'gyur te/ /chu ni me la thim par 'gyur/ /me ni phra ba'i khams su zhugs/ /rlung yang sems la thim 'gyur te/ /sems ni sems las byung las 'gyur/ /sems las byung ma rig par zhugs nas/ /de yang 'od gsal bar sod
125b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /srid pa gsum po 'gag par 'gyur/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /ji srid bdag nyid ma mthong ba/ /de srid thog ma'i dus can gyi/ /srid pa'i 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur/ /rang rig sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /rtog gel yi yul min
125b3(rgyud 'grel): ning/ /rang gi lus la gnas mod kyi/ /bsod nams dman pas rnyed mi 'gyur/ /rang lus 'gyur ba med pa de/ /mchog gcig gis ni shes byas te/ /de ni dpe yis nyer mtshon nas/ /bla ma'i zhal? gyi drin gyis so/ /sa dang de bzhin chu
125b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs/ /gter dang nor bu sbas pa ltar/ /de bzhin lus la kun mkhyen pa'ang/ /rmongs dang ldan pas mthong mi 'gyur/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za yi/ /grong khyer dang ni brgya byin gzhu/ /me long gi ni gzugs brnyan dang/ /chu zla
125b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni brag ca dang/ /rmi lam mig yor sgrin dang glog /chu yi chu bur zhes bya ba/ /sgyu ma'i dpe ni bcu dang gnyis/ /rnam pa du mar yongs mtshon pa/ /de 'di shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs/ /lta ba'i gzugs la dmigs par byed/ /sgyu ma
125b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum du bstan pa yis/ /nan tan du ni rab tu bsgrags/ /me lang gi ni gzugs brnyan dang/ /'ja' tshon dang ni de las gzhan/ /gsum pa chu zla lta bu yis/ /de yi sku ni bsgom par bya/ /spyod pa bsdus las gang bstan pa'i/ /
125b7(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bdag nyid che/ /lha dang lha mo tha dad pa/ /rigs lnga las ni yang dag 'byung/ /khro bo pho nya pho nya mo/ /bran pho bran mo mdag pa sogs/ /de ni yod min de med kyang/ /'gro ba'i don phyir rab tu bstan/ /de ltar
126a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/ /thams cad spro zhing bsdus pas te/ /dkyil 'khor tshul ni rab rgyas pa'ang/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog kyang/ /sgyu ma lta bur rab tu ?
126a2(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'jigs dang chags bral dang/ /skrag dang de bzhin rmongs pa dang/ /sdug bsngal ba de yod min pas/ /de bzhin mi sdug mthong thos dang/ /yid du mi 'ong dri ro dang/ /reg bya rtsub sogs gang gyur pa/ /tshul dang mi mthun rang? bzhin
126a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /sgyu ma lta bus dag par bya/ /bshad dang gci sogs 'jug pa dang/ /grangs dang rims sogs nad dang ni/ /rgas las sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams/ /de rnams sgyu ma'i sman gyi gso/ /chos gang gis ni byis pa rnams//
126a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i gnas su 'jug 'gyur ba/ /chos nyid kyis ni rnal 'byor pa/ /bde pa chen po'i gnas la 'brug /'dod yon lnga yi bde ba yis/ /byis pa rnams ni 'tshing? rjod de/ /chos de nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'grub par
126a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /chags dang rgyags dang sred pa dang/ /de bzhin byams dang snying rje dang/ /dga' dang btang snyoms nyid dang ni/ /stobs dang de bzhin spro ba dang/ /dpa' dang mi sun 'dug pa dang/ /drag shul de bzhin dka' bar sbyor/ /snang ba'i rang
126a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gzhan dag kyang/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i bden pas bsdu/ /phyag rgya gcig dang ldan pa'am/ /yang na phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan/ /btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs pas kyang/ /bdag byin brlab pa rjes dran bya/ /gzugs dang
126a7(rgyud 'grel): sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya sdug pa rnams/ /bde chen go 'phangs gnas nas kyang/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rtag tu myang/ /rgyud mangs dang ni rgyud gcig dang/ /stug po dang ni gling bu nyid/ /rol mo rnam bzhi rnal 'byor pas/ /
126b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag byin brlab pas rab tu 'jug /rtag tu sgeg la sogs pa yi/ /gar gyi ro dgur yang dag 'byung/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rnal 'byor pa'i longs spyod bya/ /rnal 'byor rgyud las gang gsungs pa'i/ /brda sogs cho ga
126b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa dag /sgyu ma lta bur dmigs pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pas ni de la 'jug /'byed pa dang ni 'dzums pa dang/ /rgod dam de bzhin smra ba dang/ /'gro 'ong nyal lam za na yang/ /sgyu ma'i lus su dran par bya/ /sna tshogs rtogs
126b3(rgyud 'grel): pas rtags pa yi/ /'gro ba'i bdag pos rol pa gang/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul gnas nas/ /de nyid rig pas rnam pr dpyad/ /lta ba thams cad spangs pa yi/ /bdag byin brlab pe 'di thos nas/ /las rnams thams cad bya ba
126b4(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rgya/ /mchod brten las ni mi bya zhing/ /glegs bam klag pa mi bya ste/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis kyang?/ /bya ba dang ni klag pa'ang bya/ /lha la gdud par mi bya zhing/ /dge slong rnams la phyag mi
126b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rim nyid kyis/ /yang na kun la phyag bya'o/ /sngags dgod pa ni mi bya zhing/ /phyag rgya 'chang ba'ang de bzhin no/ /sngags kyi bzlas brjod mi bya ste/ /yang na gzugs brnyan ldan par bya/ /phyi rol don ni yod min /
126b6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /'di dag rang gi sems su blta/ /de bzhin sgyu mar bsgoms nas ni/ /de nyid kyang ni rjes dran bya/ /bsam gtan cho ga dpag med dang/ /sngags kyi sku yi ting 'dzin rnams/ /ji srid sgyu ma rnyed med na/ /kun kyang sa yi 'bras
126b7(rgyud 'grel): don tsam/ /lus dang gnas dang longs spyod dang/ /sa dang pha rol phyin la sogs/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam rol pa/ /thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul yin/ /ji ltar me long dri ma med pa la/ /yan lag kun dang ldan gzugs snang
127a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ltar/ /dpe byad brgyad cu mtshan chen sum cu gnyis/ /de bzhin rtag tu rdo rje 'dzin lus? nyid/ /mkha' dbyings dbang po'i mtshon cha kha dog snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'dzn pa'ang kha dog dkar po la
127a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas/ /dge sogs las rnams ji bzhin de bzhin du ni 'jig rten la/ /yan lag ma nyams phun sum tshogs pa'i gzugs ni ston par mdzad/ /gang zhig gser dngul dang ni nor bu dung dang shel byu ru/ /bai DUrya dang zangs?
127a3(rgyud 'grel): dang steng sogs yang dag gnas/ /nam mkha' i ngos nas ri bong can gyi gzugS? ni gcig shar pas/ /de la rnam par 'jug pas shin tu gsal bar gang byas ltar/ /rang dngos sna tshogs gzugs can zad mi gang/ /'jig rten kun khyab sgyu
127a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rang bzhin nyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'gro ba'i sder gnas pa'i/ /sems mgon rdo rje de yang de bzhin no/ /gzugs sogs rnam pa lnga dang gang yang skye mched rnams de nas/ /bco brgyad zhes byar gsungs dang khams ni rnam pa lnga
127a5(rgyud 'grel): dang yang/ /ye shes lnga po dang ni yul de 'gro ba ma lus kun/ /sgyu ma las byung de 'dir rdo rje 'dzin de gzhan ma yin/ /ri rnams dang ni rgya mtsho chen po brgyad gang yin/ /gling rnams dang ni dmyal ba la sogs dbye ba rnams/ /rgyu ba dang ni
127a6(rgyud 'grel): mi rgyu ba nyid gang yin pa/ /de de'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin te gzhan min ba lta/ /de ltar 'gro ba ma lus rang gi sems las byung bas te/ /srid dang thar pa rtog dang yang dag ldan pa'i rnam par shes/ /gang gis srid pa'i rgya mtsho sdug

127b2(rgyud 'grel): pa chen pos chos rnams ni/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa la/ /mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid ni/ /snying po las kyang snying por gsungs/ /mngon par byang chub rnam ba? gnyis te/ /phyi dang nang gi zhes su bshad/ /phyi nI mdo sde rnal 'byor rgyud/ /
127b3(rgyud 'grel): thub pa mi g.yo la zhugs la/ /rgyal ba kun gyis 'di skad bskul/ /'dis ni mthar thug mi thob ste/ /nam mkha' i dkyil ltar mchog gyur pa/ /'od gsal ba yi gnas thob nas/ /rang 'ga' gzugs su skye 'gyur gsungs/ /de ltar thams cad stong

127b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags chen po'i tshul nyid kyis/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /nyid kyis 'khor bsdus gzugs sprul te/ /bde ba'i rnam pa snang ba gsum/ /zil mnan 'od gsal mi rtog pas/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i gzhal yas
127b7(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /sngags kyis bdag por byin brlabs te/ /zhal gsum lta bur dbus su bzhugs/ /chos bshad 'khor rnams rim byung ba/ /de ni nang gi mngon byang chub/ /yang na nan gi phyi nyid ni/ /phyag rgya mo mar? ba brten te/ /snang gsum
128a1(rgyud 'grel): rim myong las 'das pa'o/ /thams cad stong ba'i 'od gsal ba /bla ma'i man ngag las rnyed pa/ /de ni nang gi ? zhes bshad/ /nang gi nang ni phyag rgya thal/ /dang po smig rgyu 'od kyi 'tshul/ /bde ba rtog brel nyan?
128a2(rgyud 'grel): myong gsum/ /gsum po las 'das gsum po nyid/ /thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin dag /bla ma'i man ngag las brnyed pa'o/ /de bzhin rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pa'i/ /nyams su blang ba'i bsam gtan ni/ /stong pa gsum gyi rnam

128a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa zhes su bshad/ /yang na yang dag snang gsum yin/ /chos bdag med pa'i rigs pa yis/ /gzhigs pa'i sgyu ma'i snang ba gsum/ /de nyid rigs pas yang gzhigs pas/ /'od gsal thams cad stong pa nyid/ /de nyid
128a7(rgyud 'grel): rjes gzhig thun mong ngo/ /yang na khyad par snang ba gsum/ /'byung ba'i rim gyi sgyu ma'i sku/ /smig rgyu lta bu'i yid kyi lus/ /bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa nyid/ /mgo bo nas ni rkang pa'i bar/ /snying ka'i bar la snang ba gsum/ /'dus
128b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khrog la je chung nas/ me long gi ni rlung bzhin du/ /mi dmigs 'od gsal thams cad stong/ /ril por 'dzin pa zhes su bshad/ /ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas/ /phyi rol tu ni snang mi 'gyur/ /bum pa de nyid bcag byung? na/ /
