128b3(rgyud 'grel): par lta bar 'gyur zhe na/ /snang ba mi snang yod med sogs/ /de kun bltos ba'i rigs pa yis/ /snang yod la sogs bsgrubs gyur na/ /mi snang med sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /snang yod la sogs ma grub na/ /mi snang med sogs ga la
128b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /mdza' bral dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ /thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba/ /spros pa kun bral gang yang min/ /chang par lta ba ga la yin/ /de yi mtshan nyid yod med dang/ /snang dang mi snang rtag chad sogs/ /pho mo ma ning kha
128b5(rgyud 'grel): dog dbyibs/ /bskyed dang sngags dang sems la dmigs/ /bden gnyis 'khor 'das la soD dang/ /bsod nams gzugs dang sdig gzugs min/ /sku dang yon tan gang yang min/ /brjodpa' i tha snyad kun dang bral/ /e ma'o kun tu
128b6(rgyud 'grel): bzang po yi/ /rdo rje sku dang gsung thugs sogs/ /skye ba med pa'i tshul gyi ni/ /skye ba dag tu rab tu bsgrags/ /skyes pa nyid na skye ba med/ /skyes dang ma skyes gnyis su med/ bdol po med pa bsgom pa'i dngos/ /bslom par
128b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba bsgom pa min/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med ps/ /bslom pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs ba?/ /chos bdag med pa mnyam
129a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid pas/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pas/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pas/ /chos dang chos nyid med pa ste/ /nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa/ /byang chub tshul ni brtan pa'o/ /
129a2(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams thams cad dngos med pas/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/ /bdag med chos las kun tu 'byung/ /byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /ngo bo med de bsgom pa'ang med/ /nam mkha' i tshul
129a3(rgyud 'grel): du sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po dag tu rab tu grags/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /byang chub med cing rtog pa med/ /byang chub tshul ni brtan pa'o/ /mngon par byang chub mngon sangs rgyas//
129a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi de nyid chos kyi dbyings/ /de bzhin nyid la sogs pa'i tshig /thams cad de yi rnam grangs so/ /sus kyang ma byas ma bcos pa/ /ma bslad mi 'gyur de bzhin nyid/ /byang chub nam mkha' i mtshan nyid pas/ /mngon par byang chub
129a5(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod do/ /de nyid rtogs te mthong sgom tshe/ /gzhan gyi don du lan 'ga' zhig /chu las nya ldang ji bzhin du/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rims kyis ni/ /rtsol bas skur bzhengs don mdzad de/ /da dung bden gnyis phra mor snang//
129a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas zung 'jug ye shes skye/ /chos rnam gang la'ang mi bzod dang/ /'jigs skrag nyam nga'i rtog pa med/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam sbyangs pa'i/ /dbyer med zung du 'jug pa nyid/ /de ltar rtogs pas thag bcad de/ /spyod pa'ang
129a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gnyis med pa'o/ /sngags pas seng+ge bzhin du spyod/ /zung 'jug ting nge 'dzin bslabs pas/ /mi slob zung 'jug chos sku thob/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar/ /mi rtog smon lam dbang gis na/ /gzugs sku
129b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs yon tan rnams/ /gdul bya dag pa'i ngo la snang/ /ma rungs phyi ma'i dus su ni/ /lung zab man ngag mi bsten par/ /'thad sgrub rigs pas gtsor byed pas/ /rang rang grub mdza' dam par 'dzin/ /sbas don tsam gyi mchog byed cing//
129b2(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug lta ba zab mo la/ /mi mos slar yang sun 'byin byed/ /des ni bdag gzhan don brlag 'gyur/ /glang chen myos pa rang yan gyis/ /glang rdzi lcags kyu ldan pa yi/ /glang chen gzhon yang sun? 'byin brlab//glang rdzi lcags kyu
129b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyang 'joms/ /de ni rgyal po'i skor min te/ /rang gzhan gnyis ka'i don rlag byed/ /de bzhin gnyis dang ldan pa yi/ /rigs pa'i glang po ring yan gyis/ /gnyis ldan rigs pa'ang sun 'byin zhing/ /gnyis pa nyid kyang 'joms par byed//
129b4(rgyud 'grel): de ni gsang sngags la min te/ /bdag gzhan gsang ba'i don rlag byed/ /seng ge'i gzugs can nga rgyal gyis/ /wa yi tshig gis zab mo yi/ /mnyam nyid gang yang ma yin pa/ /stong nyid lta ba sun 'byin 'joms/ /rin chen rdzab tu bsnabs
129b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur kyang/ /'od dang yon tan rang snang bzhin/ /mthar thug lta sman rjes bsnubs kyang/ /rtsal can blo la 'bar zhing snang/ /sur 'dzin dman dang brtsad dus su/ /'thad sgrub rigS pa gnyis gtso ste/ /'jig rten grags te gtsor byed pas//
129b6(rgyud 'grel): gong ma'i lung dag mi tshad kyang/ /gsang sngags mthar thug lta dus su/ /yid dang dbang po mngon sum dang/ /rjes su dpag pa mi tshang de/ /lung zab man ngag tshad med bya/ /gang zhig nga rgyal gyis sbags shing/ /de nyid chos la brnyas
129b7(rgyud 'grel): byas byed/ /yang dag rim pa sun 'byin pa/ /mnar med sems can dmyal bar ltung/ /gang zhig slob dpon smod pa dang/ /theg pa chen po sun 'byin dang/ /mi gang gsang sngags rgyud dag gis/ /sbyor ba la ni 'phya byed pa/ /des ni dngos grub
130a1(rgyud 'grel): thob mi 'gyur/ /de ni rtag tu gdon gyis 'dzin/ /kha ba len rdo la lcags 'du ltar/ /mi 'dod yid du mi 'ong ba/ /tshe 'dir mi 'dod sna tshogs 'du/ /phyi mar ngan song gsum mthar ltung/ /dngos po don dam
130a2(rgyud 'grel): mi shes par/ /phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pas/ /ngan par rtog pa'i rnam rtog gis/ /rin chen sems ni dri mar byas/ /sgyu mar 'dzin la mngon zhen cing/ /don dam phyi rol byas pa yi/ /lta ba dman pa ba rnams kyis/ /bla med
130a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub ji ltar thob/ /tha snyad tshig gi nga rgyal gyis/ /bla ma mi bsten bsnyen bskur med/ /dman pa'i lta ba la mos te/ /sbas gsum lta zhen mi gtong zhing/ /mthar thug don lam mos te/ /rigs pa gtsor byed shes rab kyis/
130a4(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug zab mo sun 'byin pa/ /de la de nyid bstan mi bya/ /gang zhig bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing/ /thams cad stong pas mi skrag bzod/ /mthar thug don la dad mos la/ /de la bla ma'i drin sbyin bya/ /'phags pa klu sgrub man ngag
130a5(rgyud 'grel): la brten nas/ /bdag gis mchog tu gsang ba 'di bshad pas/ /kun gyis kun rdzob bden pa dag gyur nas/ /mthar thug don rtogs byang chub mi dmigs sngo/ /mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ slob
130a6(rgyud 'grel): dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa'i man ngag rdzogs sho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r'd+d+ha ka ra barmA dang/ /dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/
130a7(rgyud 'grel): mar ma bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ ro bsreg pa'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba/ /gnyis med zhe sdang rdo rje gtso/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i gru gyur la/ /gus pas
130b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /las las skyes pa'i sems can rnams/ /tshe 'das sdig pa sbyang ba dang/ /srid pa'i gzeb las bsgral ba'i phyir/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i ro sreg brtsam/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam/ /me tog 'bras
130b2(rgyud 'grel): bu la sogs brgyan/ /ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs gang/ /slob dpon las la mkhas pa dang/ /las kyi rdo rje dag gis ni/ /de du bsreg pa dag tu gsungs/ /dang por las kyi rim pa dag/ bla ma nyid kyi zhal snga nas/ /tsho gnyer? shur rgyas
130b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pas/ /rim pa bdag gis 'dir ma bris/ /de ltar rim par byas nas kyang/ /sta gon gnas pa'i dus dag tu/ /dag cing byin brlabs gnang bya'i phyir/ /dri dang bdud rtsis bkru ba dang/ /srung skud byin brlabs tshul bzhin bya/ /bdag ?
130b4(rgyud 'grel): sa bon rnams kyang dgod/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thig gdab ni/ /cho ga nyi shu'i tshul dag tu/ /btab nas me thab bca' bar bya/ /me thab tshad ni pho brang tshad/ /pho brang dkyil 'khor tshad dag ni/ /bdag nyid ji tsam 'dod kyi bar/ /
130b5(rgyud 'grel): de srid du ni bdag gis bya/ /rdo rjer ba'i zhed tshad du/ /dpangS kyang de bzhin shes par bya/ /zab su khru gang sor bzhi bru/ /ba yi lci bas byug pa dang/ /de ltar byi dor byas nas kyang/ /dang po'i thig so bzung nas ni/ /de bzhin du ni gdab par bya/ /de
130b6(rgyud 'grel): nas lha ni sum cu gnyis/ /tshul bzhin du ni bri bar bya/ /shing bu dag kyang brtsig par bya/ /slob dpon rig mar bcas pa'am/ /yang na thugs ka las phyung ste/ /rim pa bzhin du bskyed nas kyang/ /dam tshig lha rnam dbyung bar bya/ /yi sheS
130b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor spyan drang dang/ /gzhug dang bcing dang dgyes bskyed nas/ /mchod dbul bstod pa bya ba dang/ /zhugs nas gsol ba bsoD bya/ /rdzogs nas ro ni drang ba'o/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang/ /sna tshogs pa yi rgyan byas nas/ /
131a1(rgyud 'grel): shar sgor bcug ste lan gsum bskor/ /de nas rim bzhin dbang bskur bya/ /dbang bskur zin dang gnas su bzhag /bdag gi byang du kha bltas te/ /cho ga nyi shu'i tshul dag tu/ /mchod rdzas la sogs tshul bzhin
131a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsang gtor bya/ /bsil yab kyis ni me spar ro/ /oM dzwa la dzwa la hUM phaT/ /gtso bo spyan drangs me lha bskyed/ /raM las byung ba'i me lha ni/ /kha dog dkar po 'od zer 'bar/ /spyan gsum ral pa'i thor tshuD
131a3(rgyud 'grel): can/ /phyag bzhi mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba/ /g.yas pas thob mchog sbyin phyag /g.yon pa guN+De bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /de ltar tshul bzhin byas nas kyang/ /ye shes me lha spyan drangs pa/ /oM Tak+ki ti ni pA pa ka agna ye Tak+ki ni hUM
131a4(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): gzhug dang bcing dang dgyeS pa bskyed/ /de la zhal bsil mchod yon dang/ /sreg rdzas lnga 'am bdun du dbul/ /oM dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): kha raM/ /mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /oM ni? ri ti hUM kha/ zhal bsil gyi'o/ /oM A:badzra puShpe swAhA/
131a5(rgyud 'grel): me tog gi'o/ /oM A:badzra d+hu pe hUM swA hA/ spos me'i'o/ /oM A:badzra gand+he hUM swAhA/ dri chab kyi'o/ /oM A:badzra dI be hUM swAhA/ mar me'o/ /oM A:badzra ne bi dya hUM swAhA/ lha bshos kyi'o/ /oM A:nA ye swAhA/ mar gyi'o/ /oM sa ?
131a6(rgyud 'grel): paM da ha na badzra ya swAhA/ /taM la gyi'o/ /oM badzra bi dzA ya swAhA/ /dur ba'i'o/ /oM badzra ma hA be gAya swAhA/ /zhi ba'i 'o/ /oM badzra ma hA ba lA ya swAhA/ /'bras kyi'o/ /oM badzra g+hasma re swAhA/ /ku sha'i'o/ /oM badzra bar tA ya swAhA/ /u
131a7(rgyud 'grel): dum+ba ra'i 'o/ /oM bo d+hi brik+Sha ye swAhA/ a shwat+tha'i'o/ /oM badzra ma tA ya swAhA/ /pa lak+Sha'i'o/ /oM badzra ku be ra ye swAhA/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i'o/ /oM badzra ha sa ka rA ya swAhA/ /a ma'i'o/ /me lha'i rgyal po las kyi gtso/ /phrin las
131b1(rgyud 'grel): kun la snyoms mdzad pa/ /thams cad kun gyi bdag po ste/ /mnyam snyoms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bstod nas me lhar gsol ba gdab/ /ma lha rdo rje las kyi gtso/ /tshe 'das sems can sbyang ba dang/ /lha rnams tshim par
131b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir/ /de nyid du ni phrin las mdzod/ /phrin las rnaM pa gnyis zhes bya/ /me lha'i rgyal po'i thugs ka nas/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i me phyung ste/ /tshe 'das sems can mi mthun phyogs/ /rnam rtog bag chags bsreg pa dang/ /
131b3(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams tshim par bya ba'o/ /rtog pa'i dngos po bsregs nas kyang/ /sgyu ma chu zla lta bu yi/ /rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje sems par lha rnams kyi/ /thugs kar ye shes tshul du bzhugs/ /tshim par bya ba'i
131b4(rgyud 'grel): rim pa dag /dang la mchod yon dbul ba dang/ /sreg rdzas rim pa bzhin du ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis grub tshad dbul/ /sngags kyi thog mar rang sngags gzhug /thar par gyur pa'i phung po dag /bshad gci'i mthar ni rnam par
131b5(rgyud 'grel): brtag /de nas bstod dang bsdu ba bya/ /yi ge gsum gyis bsdu pa'o/ /tshe 'das don du bdag gis ni/ /ro bsreg cho ga 'di byas pas/ /'di las dge ba gang thob pas/ /thams cad gnyis med thob par shog /tshe 'das pa yi sems
131b6(rgyud 'grel): can 'di/ /dbang bskur byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /lha rnams tshim par byas pa dang/ /rtog pa'i dngos po bsreg pa yis/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa mthar phyung ste/ /rdo rje bzlas pa thob par shog /rdo rje bzlas nas rnal 'byor pas//
131b7(rgyud 'grel): sems la dmigs pa thob par shog /sems la dmigs pa thob gyur nas/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rim thob shog /bdag byin brlab pa'i rim thob nas/ /'od gsal ba ni thob gyur cig /'od gsal ba ni thob gyur nas/ /
132a1(rgyud 'grel): chos sku mkha' dang 'dra ba las/ /zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /sprin lta bu ni 'byung gyur cig /de las sprul sku char lta bus/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor sprul gyur nas/ /sems can thams cad sgrol bar
132a2(rgyud 'grel): shog /gsang ba 'dus pa'i ro bsreg gi chog 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs sto// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rAd+d+ha ka ra warmmA las lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
132a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das gsung gi dbang phyug 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji srid ya ra la ha'i bar/ /ka kha g+ha mdza' na/ /dza'i mdza' / /da d+ha'i mdza' dang ma mthar bcas/ /de de'i rtsa ba yi ge gsum
132a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs pas ni rgyud khyad du gyur par ston te/ /de la ya'i mdza' can ni a dwa ya bi dzA ya zhes pa ste gnyis su med pa rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /ra'i mdza' can ni badzra shi kha ra te rdo rje rtse mo'o/ /la'i mdza' can ni badzra mA la ste rdo rje
132a5(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba'o/ /ha'i mdza' can ni a sa dar gu ha ste thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba'o/ /ka'i mdza' can ni sarba de ba mi la ka ste lha thams cad 'dus pa'o/ /kha'i mdza' can ni badzra mu kha ste rdo rje'i sgo'o/ /g+ha'i mdza' can ni ba ni na ya a me g+ha
132a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ 'dul ba'i don yod pa'o/ /na'i mdza' can ni saM d+hi b+hya kar Na? ste dgongs pas lung ston pa'o/ /dza'i mdza' can ni twad? da sa ha dza ste de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /da'i mdza' can ni kalpa tshe da ste rtog pa spyod pa'o/ /d+ha'i mdza' ni a di bud+d+ha
132a7(rgyud 'grel): ste dang po'i sangs rgyas so/ /ma'i mdza' can ni sarba saM mya ka ga ma ste thams cad yang dag par 'gro ba'o/ /de dag ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las rtsa ba'i rgyud 'ba' zhig ste/ sbyir rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
132b1(rgyud 'grel): mdza' can stong phrag sum cu rtsa gsum du nges so/ /de nas de dag thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa ni sa ma dza ste 'dus pa'o/ /de'i phyir/ grub pa chen pos chos phung po/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa la/ /dpal ldan 'dus 'di snod yin te/ /de
132b2(rgyud 'grel): bas 'di ni rgyud kyi rtse/ /zhes gsungs so/ /re zhig de ni yi ge'i don no// //da ni spyi'i don bshad pa/ /ya'i sgra las drangs na ba spu ste rlung do/ /ra ra gi ni 'am rAgta ste ma 'am chags pa'o/ /la la ti ste sa'i khams 'byung ba rnams
132b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rten byed cing 'dzin pa'o/ /pa bin du ste chu'i khams so/ /ha a na ha ta ste/ /mi shig pa'i kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems so/ /ka ka pA la ste bde ba skyong ba'o/ /kha kha ga na ste nam mkha' ltar tha mal pa'i rtog pas stong pa'o/ /de yang ji skad du/ sra
132b4(rgyud 'grel): pas sa yi khams yin te/ /zhu bas chu yi khams su 'dod/ /dro bas me yi khams yin te/ /rgyu bas rlung du rab tu grags/ /mi shigs thig ler gsungs pa ste/ /bde ba nam mkha' i khams yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa dang/ /yang reg pa
132b5(rgyud 'grel): las ni lha mo spyan/ /dro ba gos dkar mo zhes bya/ chu ni mA ma kI nyid do/ /sgrol ma rlung du rab tu bsgrags/ /bde bas rdo rje dbyings phyug ma/ /thig le bdun snang bde skyong ma zhes so/ /g+ha a pra ti ga ste thogs pa med pa'i bde ba chen po myong ba'o/ /de
132b6(rgyud 'grel): yang/ bde chen bde ba chen po ni/ /skad cig tsam du myong bas na/ /'phral du yid ches byed pa ste/ /log rtog ma lus mdza' dag 'gog ces pa'o/ /na ni she ta ste rtog pa tha mal rnams 'gags pa'o/ /de yang dngos dang dngos med log rtog
132b7(rgyud 'grel): dag /bkag nas rnam par mi rtog pas/ /bskal pa stong phrag du mar yang/ /gnas nas ye shes sbyor bar byed/ /ces so/ /dza dza na ma ste/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes gong nas gong du khyad par can du 'gro ba'o/ /de yang cung zad du 
133a1(rgyud 'grel): cung zad goms byas pas/ /gong nas gong du khyad par 'gro /mthar ni mi rtog ting 'dzin dag /lhun gyis grub ? 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /da dad ste thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub ster pa'i phyir ro/ /de
133a2(rgyud 'grel): yang mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas na/ /dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo rnams/ /ring na bzhugs kyang gzigs 'gyur te/ /don kun grub par byed pa'o/ /zhes so/ /d+ha d+ha ra ste byang chub kyang/ /sems ? nyid du zin pa'o/ /
133a3(rgyud 'grel): de yang dga' dang dga' bral dag gi dbus/ /mtshan nyid dmigs pa brtan byas pas/ /mthun nam zla phyed zla ba lo?/ /bskal par ye shes che la sbyor/ /zhes so/ /ma ma ni te ra ste kun tu rtog pa yid kyi gnas 'phrog pa'o//
133a4(rgyud 'grel): de yang/ mi rtog pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /sgrib pa lnga spabs lhun grub pa'i/ /bde ba chen po mngon byas nas/ /stobs sogs yon tan rnams gyis brgyan ?/ /yang sbas pa'i don du bshad pa la/ /ya ya btan ste gzung 'dzin spangs
133a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i byang chub kyi sems dang po'i ye shes skya zhing mched pa'o/ /de yang/ ston ka'i sprin med na mkha' la/ /zla ba'i 'od zer kun gsal ltar/ /gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i ye shes ni/ /bdag gzhan bcas snang gsal byed pa'o//
133a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes so/ /ra rA ga ste ye shes de nyid khyad par 'gyur ba'i chag pa chen por rang bzhin gzung 'dzin gnyis med pa'i ye shes byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po gnyis pa'o/ /de yang/ ston ka'i sprin med nam mkha' la/ /nyi ma'i
133a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer shar ba ltar/ /thabs kyi ye shes gnyis pa ni/ /don dang sems can bcas snang byed/ /ces so/ /la la ti ste gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis spangs pa'i ye shes len cing gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa'i sgo 'gags shing
133b1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' ltar mi rtog dngos po'i snang ba rnams nub pa'o/ /de yang ji skad du/ /sprin med mkha' dang mun lta bu'i/ /snang med ye shes goms byas pas/ /rang rig tsam las grub pa yis/ /sgyu ma'i lus ni len par byed/ /ces so
133b2(rgyud 'grel): ha a na ta ta ste mi shigs pa'i ye shes de nyid kyis yid kyi lus kyi rang bzhin 'byung ba'o/ /de'i rang rig tsam du 'od gsal ba/ /rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam shes kyis/ /chu zla 'dra bar gzugs mid pa'i/ /chags med lus ni 'grub par
133b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /zhes so/ ka ka pA la ste de lta bu'i yid kyi lus rang snang ba'i bde bas gang zhig rdzogs pa ni bde skyong zhes bya ba'o/ /de yang/ yid kyi lus dang ldan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor pas ni khams gsum du/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi
133b4(rgyud 'grel): don byas nas/ /mthar ni rang gnas bde bar 'gro zhes so/ /kha kha gan ste sgyu ma'i lus la brten nas ril por 'dzin pa'am rjes su gzhig pa'i sgo nas don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du byed pa'o/ /de yang sgyu ma'i lus la brten byas nas/
133b5(rgyud 'grel): ril por 'dzin dang rjes gzhig gis/ /dngos po thams cad bshig nas ni/ /de nas snang ba med par 'gro/ zhes so/ /g+ha a pra tig ste thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi nam mkha' lta bu'i chos dam pa'i bden pa rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de yang
133b6(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis/ /snang ba thams cad nub byas nas/ /rang tsam la yang chags med pa'i/ /snang ba med pa'i dbyings su 'gro zhes so/ /na ni she ta ste bdag dang gzhan la sogs pa'i mdza' 'gog pa ste/ de yang bdag dang gzhan du
133b7(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa yi/ /rnam rtog dra ba bsal nas ni/ /mdza' med dmigs pa med pa ru/ /snang ba med pa'i tshul du 'gro zhes so/ /dza dza na ma ste sgyu ma lta bu'i lus de nyid las snang ba med par gong nas gong du 'gro ba'o/ /de yang snang ba med pa'i
134a1(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin gyis/ /snang ba tsam yang 'dzin spangs te/ /yang dang yang du don dam pa'i/ /bden pa mngon du byas nas 'gro /zhes so/ /de dang ste sgyu ma lta bu'i lus kyi 'bad pa med par 'dod pa thams cad nam mkha' mdzod kyis ster
134a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /de yang sgyu ma'i lus kyis 'bad med par/ /'dod pa thams cad nam mkha' la/ /'bad pa med par rnyed 'gyur te/ /bdag dang gzhan rnams bde bar 'tsho/ /zhes so/ /d+ha d+ha ra ste yid kyi lus sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis bsgrubs pa 'dzin
134a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de yang yid kyi lus tsam bzung nas ni/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub cing/ /dmigs pa thams cad zad byed pas/ /'gro med gnas su nam zhig 'gro zhes so/ /ma ma ni ha ra ste yid kyi lung snang ba gsum gyi bdag nyid rlung dang ldan
134a4(rgyud 'grel): pa las/ /grub pa sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis nye bar mtshon pa'o/ /de yang rang snang rlung dang ldan pa yi/ /'ja' tshon bzhin du mdza' med pa'i/ /stong pa gsum du goms byed pas/ /thog ma med par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes so/ /yang
134a5(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug pa'i don du bshad par bya ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'i lus la rten te don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du byed do/ /de yang chos bdun dang ldan pa yin te sgyu ma lta bu'i lus dang/ /thabs ril 'dzin dang/ rjes gzhig dang/ tha mal pa'i
134a6(rgyud 'grel): chos 'gog pa dang/ rtags mngon du skye ba dang/ de 'dra bar rtogs pa dang/ dbang gi rim pa la sbyar ba dang/ nyams su blang zhing bslab pa'i go rim dang bdun no/ /de la la ste sa chu la thim pa las smig rgyu 'dra bar skye ba dang ba ste chu med
134a7(rgyud 'grel): thim pa las du ba lta bu dang/ ra ste me rlung la thim pa las mkha' snang lta bu dang/ ya ste rlung rnam par shes pa la thim pa las mar me lta bu'o/ /ha ste rnam par shes pa 'od gsal pa la thim pa las nam mkha' lta bur snang pa'o/ /de yang
134b1(rgyud 'grel): dang pos sa ni chu la thim/ /chu yang me la thim par 'gyur/ /me ni rlung la thim par 'gyur/ /rlung yang rnam par shes la 'jug/ /rnam shes 'dzin pa de nyid ni/ /'od gsal par ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /gzhan yang phung po la sogs pa ni khams phra ba?
134b2(rgyud 'grel): la gzhug go /khams phra ba ni rnam par shes pa la'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni sems dpa' la'o/ /sems dpa' ni ma rig pa la'o/ /ma rig pa ni 'od gsal pa la'o/ /zhes pa'i rim pas kyang dang po ni sgyu ma lta bu la 'od zer lnga dang ldan par mthong ngo//
134b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis par zla ba lta bu dang/ gsum par nyi ma lta bu dang/ bzhi par mun pa lta bu dang/ lnga par ni snang ba med pa nam mkha' lta bu mthong ngo zhes kyang gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /ka su ka ste snang ba med pa'i bde ba chen po dmigs pa med pa'i
134b4(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de yang stobs dang mi 'jigs la sogs pa'i/ /che ba'i yon tan rnams brgyan pa/ /bden gnyis sbyor pa'i zung 'jug sku/ /bde ba chen po des thob 'gyur zhes so/ /kha kha ga ste nam mkha' lta
134b5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i chos kyi snang ba'i chogs thams cad nub pa'i rang bzhin las rnam par rtog pa med bzhin du bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i dbang gis chu klung dang pa la nya 'phar ba dang gnyid log pa las myur du sad pa bzhin du zung du 'jug pI
134b6(rgyud 'grel): skur ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang mkha' dang 'dra chos stong pa las/ /rtog med ye shes 'ja''dra ba/ /tshogs dang smon lam stobs dag gis/ /'bad pa med pa lhun gyis grub ces so/ /na ni she ta ste zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs
134b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa la soD bI sgrib pa rnaM pa drug gtan spangs pa'o/ /de yang zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /nyon mongs sgrib sogs rnam spangs shing/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'thob 'gyur te/ /'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'od ston zhes so/ /de yang 'ja'
135a1(rgyud 'grel): tshon 'dra ba'i longs sku las/ /'bad pa med pa sprul pa'i sku/ /mdza' las rdul phran ji bzhin du/ /sems can don kun grub par mdzad ces so/ /dza dza na ma ste zung du 'jug pa'i sku rdo rje 'chang chen po las sprul pa'i sku ?
135a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'byung ba'o/ /dad da ste sems can rnams la gang dang gang gis 'dul ba la de dang de ltar skal ba dang mthun par snang zhing 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang gang dang gang gi 'dul 'gyur pa/ /de de bzhin du so sor snang/ /mos par ?
135a3(rgyud 'grel): gis tha dad par/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /d+ha d+har ste lhun gyis grub pa'i sku rgyun gyis rtag par stug po bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rang bzhin gyis btsun mo la 'khyud pa'i bdag nyid bus rtag tu 'dzin pa'o//
135a4(rgyud 'grel): de yang lhun grub bde ba chen po'i sku/ /rang snang rig mas nye brgyan pa/ /'og min gnas su dus rtag tu/ /mtshan dang dpe byed brgyan pas bzhugs zhes so/ /ma tsind+ha ma Ni ste yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'bad pa med par bdag dang
135a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi don sgrub par mdzad pa'o/ /de yang yid bzhin nor ltar bsams tsam gyis/ /'bad med bdag dang gzhan gyi don/ /che ba'i yon tan rnams rgyan sku/ /bde ba che las 'byung bar 'gyur zhes so/ /de ltar tshul bzhi'i bshad pa'o// //
135a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal gsang pa 'dus pa'i rdzogs rim mthar phyin pa slob dpon Arya de bas mdzad pa rdzogs sto// // */ /'dus pa'i sgrub thabs rnam par bzhag pa'i ? zhes bya ba grub pa'i slob dpon klu'i blo'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o// //
135a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sa ma dza sA d+ha naM bya ba s+tho la nA ma / bod skad du/ 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par bzhag pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gsum po mi phyed sku/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas te/ /
135b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs yan lag gi/ rnam gzhag rim pa bshad par bya/ /de la dang bo re re zhig dngos po med la zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas snod la sog pa'i dngos po rnams stong pa nyid du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' i
135b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya zheS bya ba la soD pas dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim gyis sa'i cha bsgrubs te/ /de'i steng du b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang bskyed la/ der mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo thams cad
135b3(rgyud 'grel): lhag par mos bas dgod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rnal 'byor dang/ rjes su rnal 'byor dang/ shin tu rnal 'byor dang/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rim pas rdo rje ? chen po'i bdag nyid du skyed de/ dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyar pa las dkyil 'khor gyis
135b4(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams phyung ste/ bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas nas gshegs su gsol 'di bsgom pa bsdus te bstan pa'o/ /rnam par gzhag pa dang po nye bar bstan pa brjod par bya ste/ gang gi cho 'dir 'jig rten du 'jig pa thob par gyur cing/ khams gsum
135b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems can gcig kyang ma lus par gyur nas snod kyi 'jig rten 'ba' zhig lus pa de'i ? rim gyis rim gyis nyi ma bdun gyi 'od zer rnams rab tu bklags pas khams gsum pa bsregs te nam mkha' i rang bzhin du byed do/ /don 'di
135b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos/ /dngos po med la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rgyun gyi stobs las khad kyi khang kyis rlung rnams g.yos te/ rlung/
135b7(rgyud 'grel): de rnams 'phel bar gyur pa ni/ rngams su ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu drug go /rgyar grangs med pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de nam mkha' i steng du chags par gyur nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor de las byung ba shing rta'i phad lo tsam gyi char gyi rgyun bab par gyur te /de
136a1(rgyud 'grel): las chu'i dkyil 'khor du gyur to/ /de'i tshad ni rngams su 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang stong phrag nyi shu'o/ /de yang slar chu la rlung gi bsrubs pas ? ser gyi rang bzhin gyis gzhi chu'i ster du chags te/ de'i tshad ni 'bum? phrag
136a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang stong phrag nyi shu'o/ /me'i dkyil 'khor yang de dag gi nang nyid du gnas so/ /de ltar yang dag par sgrub cing skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pa nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par rlung gi dkyil 'khor sgom par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pas
136a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim pas sa'i cha bskyed par bya'o/ /de ltar sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis yang dag par byung ba'i rlung rnams kyis yang dag par bsrubs pas gser la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i ri rab la sogs pa'i ri
136a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lha'i gzhal med khang dang/ gling lcags ris bskor ba tshun chad du shing dang ljon pa dang lcugs ma la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /srid pa'i rim pa de ltar sgom par byed pa rnams kyis der ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis
136a5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid dmigs pa mngon du song bas dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim pas sa'i cha skyed de'i steng du gzhal yas khang bskyed par bya'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rnam par shes pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po sems can skyed par mdzad
136a6(rgyud 'grel): pa pos snod kyi 'jig rten bskyed kyi 'og tu sems can gyi khams nges par sprul bar mdzad de/ /gnas ni bsgom pa mngon 'gro bas / /rdo rje gsum bskyed bsgom par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /der skye gnas bzhi pa 'di lta ste
136a7(rgyud 'grel): sgo nga las skyes pa dang/ mngal las skyes pa dang/ drong gsher las skyes ba dang/ brdzubs? te skyes pa'o/ /skye gnas ni skye pa'o/ /sgo pa las skyes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag sgo nga las skye bar 'gyur pa'o/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na
136b1(rgyud 'grel): dang pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang /ne tso dang/ sha ri ka la sogs ba'o/ /mngal nas skye ba gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag mngal nas skye ba ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ glang po dang/ rta dang/ ba lang dang/ ma he dang/ bod bu dang/ /pag dang/ ma ?
136b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'o/ /drong gsher las skyes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag 'byung ba'i drong las skyes pa ste/ de dag gang zhe na/ srin bu dang/ phye ma leng dang/ mchu spang la sogs pa'o/ /brdzus te skyes pa gang zhe nas sems can gang dag dbang po ma
136b3(rgyud 'grel): tshad ba med cing ma rdzogs pa med pa yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan par cig car skyes pa ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ lha dang/ dmyal ba dang/ srid pa bar ma dang/ bskal pa dang po pa'i mi la sogs pa'o/ /'dir gsol pa/
136b4(rgyud 'grel): gling gsum pa'i mi rnams kyang so sor gnas pa lags sam/ ci'i slad skye ba cig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog nas der 'jug par mi mdzed par 'dir nges pa kho nar 'dzam bu'i
136b5(rgyud 'grel): gling du 'jug cing mi rnams la chos ston pa'i rgyu nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/ shar gyi lus 'phags dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyong dang /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams longs
136b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod chen po dang ldan te/ de lta mod kyi blun zhing rmongs bas mi dpyod cing mi 'byed do/ /'dzam bu'i gling pa 'di ni las kyis pa yin te/ de na legs par spyad pa dang/ /nyes par spyad pas mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i sems can rnams su las kyi 'bras
136b7(rgyud 'grel): bu rnam par smin pas 'dir snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams g.yo ba dang/ sgyu dang/ dregs pa dang/ phrag dog dang/ gdug pa'i bsam pas rims nang la sogs pas yongs su gzir bar 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang mgo smos pas 
137a1(rgyud 'grel): go ba dang/ dbang po rna zhing sgran pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzam bu'i gling ge skye bo'i? gnas kyi dbus su sku 'khrung zhing chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir gsungs pa/ mi ru la grungs pa des tshul dang po ste/
137a2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu byung ba tshul ni gnyis ba'o/ /'dul bsrung ba tshul chen gsum pa ste/ /ting 'dzin brnyes ba tshul mchog bzhi pa yin/ /zhes bya ba thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las gsungs pas 'das ba
137a3(rgyud 'grel): dar ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mi'i bdag nyid kyi srid par zhugs te thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi go 'phang brnyes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu des na 'dir ma'i srid pa'i skye ba'i rim pa bstan to/ /de la
137a4(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa dang bo'i mi rnams sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan cing yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus can yan lag dag nyid lag thams cad kyis mtshan ba/ dbang po mtshang ba med cing ma rdzogs pa med pa/ /kha dog gsal ba'i
137a5(rgyud 'grel): lus can/ rang gi mthus nam mkhar 'gro ba/ tshe ring zhing dga' ba la sbyor ba/ /ye shes kyi lus can yin yang di rnams kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mi shes shing ma shes pas na thog ma med pa'i dus nas mi shes pa'i bag chags
137a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyun gyi stobs pa sgra? rim gyis rang gi sems las byung ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mngon par zil gyis mnan bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag gi yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus spangs te nyon mongs pa'i rgyun gyiS? riM? gyis tha
137a7(rgyud 'grel): mal pa'i ma'i bdag nyid kyi dngos por yongs su 'dzin to/ /de lta bu'i thugs rdo rje dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas rang gi rang bzhin yongs su ye shes pas sems can gyi ris nas 'pho zhing ji srid du skye bo'i tshogs pa ma rnyed pa
137b1(rgyud 'grel): de srid du nyin zhag bdun du srid? pa bar mngon gnas so zhes nges par bshad do/ /srid pa bar ma'i rang bzhin ji lta bu lags/ smras pa/ 'chi ba'i srid ba dang skye ba'i srid pa'i bar na bdag gi ngo bo mngon par grub cing yul gzhan du skye ba grub pa de la?
137b2(rgyud 'grel): srid pa bar ma zhes bya'o/ /de yang dbang po rno bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mtshan thams cad dang dpe byang dpal ngo tsho yongs su rdzogs pa de bzhin du srid pa bar ma na gnas pa yang ma'i
137b3(rgyud 'grel): dum du rab tu 'jug pa'o/ /bye ba brgya yang 'di'i 'od kyi snang bas gsal bar byed do/ /ji skad du bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i mdo las gsungs te/ de yang 'byung ba chen po rnams rab tu spangs te lha'i dran pa rab tu thob cing 'dod pa drug la spyod
137b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lha mthong ba dang dmyal ba bcu drug mthong ngo/ /de yang rkang ba dang lag pa mtshang ba med cing rang gi ngo bor snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang bdag gi lus de dang de ni 'di yin no/ /zhes rang tu shes so/ /de yang ji skad du mdzod kyi le'u?
137b5(rgyud 'grel): byas pa las/ sngon dus srid pa'i sha tshugs can/ /dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan/ /las kyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ldan/ /ris mthun lha mig dag pas mthong/ /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /'dis bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom par byed pa rnams
137b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang rnal 'byor dang/ rjes su rnal 'byor gyi rim pas lha'i sku bskyed ba bstan te/ ji ltar skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus mi rnams kyi don mdzad par mi spyod
137b7(rgyud 'grel): pas phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rjes su zhugs pas sprul pa'i sku 'dzin pa'i don tu mngal du 'jug pa nye bar bstan pa de bzhin du srid pa bar man gnas pa yang nyin zhag bdun pa dor te/ thog ma med pa'i rang gi rnam par rtog ?
138a1(rgyud 'grel): bag chags las byung ba'i las kyis yang dag par bskul te/ rim pa 'dis skye ba len to/ /de la rim pa ni 'di yin te/ dang po'i bskal pa'i mi rnams bdud rtsi zab nas ji srid du 'bras chan za ba yan lag? kyis lus?
138a2(rgyud 'grel): sra ba dang lci ba nyid kyis non te/ 'od mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu mun pa skyes pas nyi ma dang zla ba dag 'jig rten du rab tu byung ba'o/ /de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par dbye ba bstan pa'i ched du de dag gi pho dang mo'i dbang po
138a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dod cing dbyibs tha dad cing/ de dag sngon goms pa'i dbang gis gcig la gcig lta zhing phan tshun du chags ba'i sems skye'o/ /gang gi phyir log par zhugs pa de nas brtsams te/ pho dang mo dang? zhes bya ba'i ming du 'jig rten du grags
138a4(rgyud 'grel): so/ /de nas dri za nye bar 'khor ba'i sems can gnas skabs gsum nye bar gyur pas ma'i rum du mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te/ mo nang med pa dang/ khrag dang ldan pa dang/ ma dang pha rjes su chags par 'gyur ba'o/ /de nas de dag phan
138a5(rgyud 'grel): tshun rjes su chags pas rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas 'khyud pa dang 'o bya ba la sogs pa'i bya bas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba mthong bas 'dod pa nye bar len pa'i phyir srid pa bar ma spangs te rta zhon pa bzhin rnam par shes pa'i
138a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag po thugs rdo rje rlung gi bzhon pa la yang dag par zhon nas shin tu myur bar 'od zhing skad cig thad cig gam yud tsam gyis ye shes sems dpa' ltar rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas zhugs te/ ye shes kyis thob nas thabs kyi ye
138a7(rgyud 'grel): shes dang lhan cig gnyis su med par gyur nas shin tu dga' bar chung pa'i snying po yin te / rgyud las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis/ gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i rigs pa dang/ shes rab kyi mdo las/
138b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka mchog tu dga' ba'i bde bas tshim par byas pas rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par bskul te/ A li dang kA li rnams gcig tu gyur nas khams phra ba la zhugs pas shes rab ye shes kyi 'od zer shar bas gnyis ? zhu
138b2(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur te khu ba dang khrag yang dag par 'dres nas skye gnas kyi dbus su thig le'i gzugs su babs so zhes gsungs so/ /'di'i don don gsal bar gsungs pa rtsa la'i? rgyud las/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs
138b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs so/ /de'i 'og tu rim gyis 'phel te/ dang por mer mer po'i rnam pa'o/ /mer mer po las ltar ltar por 'gyur/ /ltar ltar po las gor gor po'o/ /gor gor bo las mkhrad gyur/ mkhrad gyur las yang rlung gis bskul te/
138b4(rgyud 'grel): des rkang lag 'gyu ste gnas skabs lnga gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu skra dang/ kha sbu dang/ sen mo la sogs pa dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ gzugs dang mtshan ma rnams rim gyis skye'o/ /de yang de bzhin gshegs pa ldas byin gyis
138b5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa la sa bon gyi gnas skabs nas brtsams te gnas skabs lnga des par skye'o/ /de la mer mer po ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /ltar ltar bo ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o/ /gor gor po ni 'od dpag med gyi'o/ /mkhrad gyur ni don yod grub pa'i 'o/ /rkang lag
138b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyu ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs ba'o/ /khrag gi yang gnas skabs lngar bstan par bya ste /de la zhu ba ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /dmar po ni 'od dpag med kyi'o/ /gor gor po ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o/ /mkhrang? gyur ni don yod par grub
138b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'o/ /yang dag par 'dres pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i'o/ /de yang skyes gnas dbus kyi rtsa gnyis ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas/ /g.yon na khu ba shes par bya/ /g.yas pa na ni khrag nyid de/ /de dag
139a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu 'dres ba nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings su bsdus pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar na mer mer po la sogs pas sa bon dang myu gu bzhin yongs su smin pa thob ste/ mngal gyi snod kyi nang du las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes
139a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rlung rgyu ba gang dag gis mngal gyi snod yongs su bsgyur nas ma'i rus nas chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi sgor mngon par phyogs shing gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de yang pho zhig yin na ma'i rum gyi g.yas su brtan cing rgyab tu
139a3(rgyud 'grel): mngon par ltas te tsog tsog bor gnas so/ /gal te mo zhig na de'i phyir mngal gyi g.yon du brten te/ lte bar mngon par bltas te gnas so/ /de'i 'og tu zla ba bcu'i tha mar rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo
139a4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par bstan pa'i rim pas ma'i mngal nas 'thon bar gyur te/ de'i phyir dri za nye bar 'khor gyi sems can sha'i mig gi yul du gyur to/ /de ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das de
139a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhal gsum pa lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par gzigs par gyur to/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'dir gsungs pa/ chu yi khams ni pha yin te/ /me'i khams
139a6(rgyud 'grel): ni ma zhes bya/ /pags pa sha dang khrag rnams ni/ /ma zhes su ni bstan pa yin/ /rgyus pa rkang dang khu ba rnams/ /pha zhes su yang bstan pa yin/ /de tsam zhig tu bstan pa ni/ /lus kyi gong bu bsdus pa'o/ /gzugs dang tshor ba
139a7(rgyud 'grel): 'du shes dang/ /'du shes rnam par shes pa nyid/ /phung po la sogs sangs rgyas lnga'i/ /rang bzhin dngos shes bstan pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo bzhis zhus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las gsungs so/ /gzhung
139b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis rnal 'byor bzhi las bsgrubs pa ni bdag yin no zhes sngags pas nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o zhes bstan to/ /rnam par dgod pa bstan pa'i rim par bye ba ste dang po'o// //da ni rnam par bzhag pa'i rim pa gnyis pa nye bar
139b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i phyir dang po kho nar sku'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bshad par bya ste/ tshangs pa'i thig nas yang dag brtsams/ /gru bzhi pa ru rnam par dbye/ /gzhal yas khang ltar snang ba yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sku dkyil 'khor/ /de skad du b+ha ga'i dkyil
139b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zhes bya dang/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ dkyil 'khor lus su gsungs pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du brtags/ /shes 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs so/ /de ltar byung pa'i rang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor la
139b4(rgyud 'grel): phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis lha rnams dgod pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gsungs pa/ de la gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad/ /tshor ba'i phung po ni rin chen 'byung ldan/ /'du shes kyi phung po ni 'od dpag med/ /'du byed kyi phung
139b5(rgyud 'grel): po ni don yod grub pa/ rnam par shes pa ni mi bskyod ba'o/ /de'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga ru rab tu bsgrags/ /zhes gsungs so/ /des na phung po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya ste/ de
139b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgod ba las/ phung po lnga byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur te/ ji skad du rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /gti mug zhe sdang chags pa dang/ /yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig rnams/ /de ltar rigs ni lnga nyid de/ /'dod dang thar par ba sgrub byed/
139b7(rgyud 'grel): ces gsungs so/ /lha mo rnams rnam par bzhag pa gsungs pa/ gti mug dga' ma spyan ma ni sa'i khams so/ /zhe sdang dga' ma mA ma kI ni chu'i khams so/ /'dod chags dga' ma gos dkar mo ni me'i khams so/ /rdo rje dga' ma sgrol ma
140a1(rgyud 'grel): ni rlung gi khams so/ /don de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /sa yi khams ni spyan mar bshad/ /chu yi khams ni mA ma kI/ me'i gos dkar mor bshad de?/ /rlung ni sgrol ma rab tu grags/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de
140a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar khams rnams kyi yang rang gi mtshan nyid shes par bya ste/ lha mo rnams bkod pas khams rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgod pa'i rgyu dang
140a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje de nyid kyis sa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin mig gi dbang po la bkod pas gzugs gsum la 'od gsal ba'i thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i mig gi dbang po stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du phyag na
140a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rna ba la bkod pas sgra gsum la de bzhin du thogs pa med ba'i rdo rje'i rna ba'i dbang po rab tu stsol lo/ /nam mkha' i snying po sna la bkod pas dri gsum la thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje sna'i dbang po rab tu stsol lo/ /'jig rten dbang phyug
140a5(rgyud 'grel): lce la bkod pas ro gsum la thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje lce'i dbang po rab tu ster ro/ /bcom ldan ldas 'jam dpal 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa mdza' drug la bkod pas ye shes gsum la thogs pa med pa'i gzhan gyi semS
140a6(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'i mngon par shes pa rab tu stsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa rnam par sel ba lus kyi dbang po la bkod pas sgrib pa med par nang gi khams rnams cig la gcig bsdus te skye ba la rab tu bzhugs nas rdo rje'i sku rab tu bsgrub par
140a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po tshogs thams cad la bkod pas 'od gsal du tshigs thams cad gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das byams pa rgyus pa'i rang bzhin la bkod pas rgyus pa'i rang bzhin 'od
140b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar rab tu 'jug go/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid gzugs gsum gyi rnam pas phyi rol lta bur snang bas mig gi dbang po la bde stsol ba'i gzugs rdo rje'o/ /de ltar sgra rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyang khong du chud par bya'i/ /ji skad du rnal 'byor
140b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus kun/ /de yi nye bar longs spyod nyid/ /ces bde mchog las gsungs te/ 'dis lha ma rnams dgod pa'i rang bzhin yongs su
140b3(rgyud 'grel): shes pas yul rnam par dag pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /don 'di nyid gsal bar rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ /rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor mchog ces pa dang/ gzugs sgra dri ro sngags pa yis/ /lha rnams
140b4(rgyud 'grel): su ni rtag par bsgom/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /yan lag thams cad la khro bo rnams bkod pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gsungs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa gshin rje gshed/ /g.yon la gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /kha yi pad+mar rta mgrin bsam/ /
140b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste/ /dpung ba g.yas par mi g.yo ba/ /g.yon par 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /bus mo g.yas par bsam bya ba/ /dbyug pa sngon po 'bar chen po/ /bus mo g.yon la stobs po che/ /spyi bor gtsug tor
140b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor los bsgyur/ /rkang thil gnyis su bsam bya ba/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po rnam par bsam/ /khro ba'i rgyal po 'di dag ni/ /sgrub pa po'i yan lag la bkod pas 'bar ba med par zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i rnam pa lta bu nyid
140b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor las byung nas phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs la bsdigs par mdzad do/ /'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud las khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes/ /rtag tu gsod la brtson pa ste/ /gsod ba'i don gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /sgrub
141a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog la chos can yin /zhes gsungs so/ /sku'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bzhag pa'i rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o// //sku'i dkyil 'khor la lha rnams dgod pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu rtogs
141a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags pas gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir sku'i dkyil 'khor las phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di sprul pa bya ste /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ /sems can rang gi rigs kyi bu mo spros pa 'am/ yang na phyi rol gyi bu mo blangs la sgrub thabS
141a3(rgyud 'grel): las gsungs pa'i rim pas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba byas te/ sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas gzhal yas khang bsgrubs la byang chub kyi sems las bsgrub cing badzra d+h+ri ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rjod de lha thams cad
141a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo spro bar bya'o/ /phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor pa'i sngags bstan par bya ste /mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga ston pa'i rdo rje bsnams pas na rdo rje 'chang ngo/ /'dis nyon mongs pa zhe sdang rnam par sbyangs nas slar byon te/ rdo
141a5(rgyud 'grel): rje 'chang chen po dang gnyis su med par 'gyur te/ ? sbyor bas mi bskyod pa'i gzugs kyis bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor los bdud bzhi las rgyal bas na rgyal ba rgyal lo/ /bsam pa thams cad
141a6(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rin po che 'dzin pas ni rin chen 'chang ngo/ /A ni ma lus pa'o/ /ro ni 'khor ba ste 'khor ba las 'das shing 'gro bas na 'khor 'das so/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab ste/ de'i 'dzin
141a7(rgyud 'grel): pas shes rab 'chang ngo/ /gti mug ni rnam par snang mdzad de/ de la dga' bas na gti mug dga' ma'o/ /zhe sdang ni mi bskyod pa ste/ de la dga' bas na zhe sdang dga' ma'o/ /'dod chags ni 'od dpag med de/ de la dga' bas
141b1(rgyud 'grel): na 'dod chags dga' ma'o/ /rdo rje ni don yod par grub pa ste/ /de la dga' bas na rdo rje dga' ma'o/ /sa ltar mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de nyid snying po ste nang gi bdag nyid gang la yod pa de ni sa'i snying po'o/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang bar
141b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pas na phyag na rdo rje'o/ /nam mkha' ni sgrib pa dang bral ba'i ye shes te/ de nyid snying po ste nam mkha' i snying po'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten rnams dbang du byed pas na 'jig rten dbang phyug go /'od gsal zhing yid du 'od ba'i ting nge
141b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis bskul ba'i dpal yod pas na 'jam dpal lo/ /sgrib pa thams cad ni nyon mongs pa rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis mnan pas na sgrib pa thams cad sel ba'o/ /kun nas mdzes ba na kun tu bzang po'o/ /byams pa'i
141b4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan gang la yod pa ni byams pa'o/ /blta bar bya bas na gzugs so/ /mnyan par bya bas na sgra'o/ /bsnams par bya bas na dri'o/ /myang bar bya bas na ro'o/ /reg par bya bas na reg bya'o/ /rdo rje'i sgras ni de dag gi ting nge 'dzin gyis
141b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa bstan to/ /gshin rje 'di myal ba ste/ de 'joms pa dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mthar byed pas na gshin rje mthar byed do/ /shes rab kyi 'ching ba rnams mthar byed pas
141b6(rgyud 'grel): na shes rab mthar byed do/ /pad+ma da ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag pas mthar byed pas na pad+ma mthar byed do/ /bgegs ni bdud bzhi ste nge 'joms pa dang ldan pas na khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de rnams mthar
141b7(rgyud 'grel): byed pas na bgegs mthar byed do/ /'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis rtag tu sems rab tu bskyod pa rnams rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mnan cing bcom pas na mi g.yo ba'o/ /Tak+ki ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags te/ de bsal bar byed
142a1(rgyud 'grel): cing rnam par dag par byed pas na 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /sngon po ni sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i las so/ /dbyug ba ni de chad pas tshar gcod ba ste/ de byed pas na dbyug sngon po/ /don dam gir stobs kyis sems can rnams
142a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pas na stobs po che'o/ /sems can rnams la khams gsum las rnam par sgrol ba'i ye shes stsal bas na gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o/ /phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs nges par bkug nas
142a3(rgyud 'grel): phur bus 'debs pas na gnod mdzes rgyal po'o/ /lha sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gi sprul pa'i sku zhal gsum phyag drug pa mtshan ma'i phyag mtshan sna tshogs phyag na bsnams pa rnams byang chub sems las sngags kyi gzugs kyi
142a4(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa yang 'bad pa mang ba nyid kyis grub pa po'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor las phyung ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs 'phel bar bya ba'i don du 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa
142a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ting nge 'dzin de dang des sbyangs nas slar byon te rang rang gi stan la bzhugs par gyur to/ /rdo rje dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ ral dri dang/ dril bu rnam gangs bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi mtshan mar
142a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te/ de nyid mtshon cha lta bur bsnams so/ /zhi pa dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las kyi dbye ba yis kha dog so sor bya'o/ /rin po che thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir mdog in+d+ra nI la lta bu'o/ /phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bshad
142a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i b+ha ga la rdul dang bral ba'i dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa ni gsal ba de'i ngo bo nyid/ /sna
142b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gzugs kyis kun tu mtshan/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab/ /'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ gsal pa la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gzhi/ zhes gsungs so/ /gsol ba gal te rgyab 'di la lag pa'i phyag
142b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya med na 'di ltar phyag rgya bzhi sa rgyas btab pa'i lha'i sku bskyed par 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa /sangs rgyas kyiyon tan ma lus pas brgyan pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i lha'i sku ni phyag rgya chen po'o/ /btsun mo ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /sngags kyi yi
142b3(rgyud 'grel): ge ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /gzugs sna tshogs kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed cing sgrub pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /gsol pa/ de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa dang/ gnyis ka'i rgyud las ni zhal gcig par rab tu grags na ci'i phyir
142b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dir zhal gsum pa lta bur snang bar 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di'i don bshad pa'i rgyud dgongs pa lung ston ba'i rgyud las/ gang zhig phyi nang bdag gyur dang/ de nyid gnyis ka'i rtog pa rnams/ /gnyis su med par
142b5(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa ste/ /'di yi de nyid chen po yin/ /lag pa g.yon par rab grags pa'i/ /mthe'u chung tha rtag gung mo dang/ /de bzhin mdzub mo mthe bong ni/ /rim bzhin gzugs la sogs par gzung/ /de rnams dngos po med payi/ /shes rab rnam
142b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'byed mtshan nyid/ /chos kyi sku ru rnam par bshad/ /de bzhin nyid du gnyis med ming/ /mi bskyod rin chen dpag med dang/ /don yod rnams snang de bzhin gshegs/ /'di dag lag pa g.yas pa yi/ /mthe'u chung la sogs rim bzhin gnas//
142b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka gcig tu sbyar ba yi/ /'di yi de nyid skyabs gsum pa/ /sangs rgyas ches dang dge 'dun te/ /gcig kyang gsum du brtags pa yin/ /phan tshun sbyor bas rdo rje sems/ /shes rab thabs kyi go 'phang mchog/ thal mo sbyor ba tsam gyis ni/ /
143a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'gugs/ /skyabs gsum de nyid gsum yin te/ /sku gsum rnam par thad gsum gyis/ /zhal gsum yin te mdog gsum yang/ /sbyor gsum dam tshig gsum sbyor bas/ /khams gsum du ni
143a2(rgyud 'grel): lha gsum gyi/ /dkyil 'khor gsum gyis dus gsum du/ /lam gsum gyis ni mchog gsum gyi/ /ji snyed du ni rtog pas bskul/ /gsol ba 'debs pa yid la byed/ /'jig rten rnams kyi don rnams byed/ /yang dag sangs rgyas de mnyes 'gyur/ /de nyid
143a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni thal mor gnas/ /sems can gang de sangs rgyas yin/ /de bzhin nyid dang gnyis med chos/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bzhugs zhes gsungs so/ /gsol pa 'dir gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor
143a4(rgyud 'grel): la lha rnams dgod pa slob dpon sna tshogs pa'i gzhung 'jig rten du rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ de ji ltar sgrub pa po rnams so ma nyi ma mchis par 'gyur/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so/ /lung dang rigs pas so sor bshad par bya'o//
143a5(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar sku'i dkyil 'khor la phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi lha rnams ming gis dgod ba de bzhin du phung ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang lha rnams dgod par 'gyur ro/ /da lta mod kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud las lha dgod pa rdzogs par ma bstan
143a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni 'di ltar slob dpon med par 'jug par ma gyur cig snyam du dgongs so/ /dkyil 'khor dgod pa yang gcig tu yongs su rdzogs par bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud las yang dag par gsungs te/ de
143a7(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug par bya'o/ /sems kyis gzhan ni mi bsam par/ /sems dpa' chen po mnyan par gyis/ /rdo rje dpon lus 'di la/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni rim bzhin gnas/ /dang po sku yi rdo rje ni/ /gzugs phung la ni rab tu bzhugs/ /rjes su chags
143b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje ni/ /tshor ba'i phung por rab tu zhugs/ /bcom ldan gsung gi rdo rje ni/ /'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs/ /mchod pa kun gyi rdo rje ni/ /'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs/ /bcom ldan thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /rnam shes phung por yang dag bzhugs/ /'di
143b2(rgyud 'grel): yi sha sogs sa khams la/ /bcom ldan 'das yum spyan ma bzhugs/ /khrag sogs chu yi khams la ni/ /bcom ldan 'das yum ma mA ma bzhugs/ /dro ba la sogs me khams la/ /bcom ldan 'das yum gos dkar bzhugs/ /bskyod pa la
143b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs rlung khams la/ /bcom ldan 'das yum sgrol ma bzhugs/ /de yi mig gi dbang gnyis la/ /de bzhin gshegs pas snying po/ /de yi rna ba'i dbang gnyis la/ /bde gshegs phyag na rdo rje'o/ /de yi sna yi dbang gnyis la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
143b4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' snying bzhugs/ /de lce dbang la bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang/ /khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni/ /rang gi lus zhes bya ming la/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dir bzhugs so/ /de yi
143b5(rgyud 'grel): yid kyi dbang po la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs bzhugs/ /lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang/ /lus kyi rtsa rgyus thams cad la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i
143b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bar ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i rtsa bar ni/ /bder gshegs gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /kha yi pad+mar bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rta mgrin no/ /gsang pa'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni/ /de
143b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba/ /dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal/ /pus mo g.yas na bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs
144a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dbyug pa sngon/ /bus mo g.yon la bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs po che/ /rang gi spyi bor bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor los bsgyur/ /rkang pa'i thil du bzhugs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs
144a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gnod mdzes te/ /lus ni 'di nyid kun la 'dir/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid kyi lus/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku rdzogs pa/ /'di dag ma lus rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje legs byas bstan pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das
144a3(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das 'gyur ? khyod kyi dge ba yongs su smin/ /de ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /lus la rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs/ /nyon cig mthong ba don yod kye/ /phyi ma'i dus na sems dpa' che/ /dang po'i las kyi
144a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi/ /rab tu 'bad de bla ma brten/ /de tshe mthong ba don yod bcas/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags pa che/ /dga' zhing mgul rab dang ldan/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni mchim blags/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gsol pa/ nyon mongs pa thamS
144a5(rgyud 'grel): cad spangs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brnyes pa rnams 'dir tha mal pa'i lus la dgod pa mi 'gal lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ ji srid du bkru bshal gyi snod
144a6(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i gnas skabs su ni mtshil? ma dor la gzhong pa'i gnas skabs su 'jig rten pa rnams zas za'o/ /gzugs brnyan gyi gnas skabs su mchod par byed do/ /de bzhin du tha mal pa'i lus la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gti mug la
144a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas brlan pa'i sngon gyi gnas skabs su 'khor ba'i rgyu yin la phyis rang bzhin yongs su shes shing yongs su dag pas thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa'i rgyur 'gyur pa la skyon med do/ /de yang gsungs pa/ shin tu mi gtsang gzugs 'di
144b1(rgyud 'grel): gzung byas na/ /rgyal ba'i rin chen gzugs byas rin thang med/ /rtsi yis sbyangs ba lta bur bskyed pa 'di/ /byang chub sems ni rab tu brtan par gzung zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin du yang dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mod las/ 'od srung 'di lta ste ?
144b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis g.yogs pa'i sa gzhi las/ sa bon thams cad skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srungs de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i lud kyis khyab pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang/
144b3(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa lung ston pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud las kyang/ /phra mo'i sbyor don de nyid shes/ /phyag na rdo rje grags chen la/ /'gro ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /phra mo'i de nyid dgongs pas gsungs/ /mngon bar byang chub rnams lnga 'di/ /ma 'ongs skye po'i
144b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyun can yin/ /chos rnams yang dag brjod pa'i sku/ /ji lta ji ltar yin gsungs pa/ /phung po 'di dag sangs rgyas yin/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rkyen du 'gyur/ /gnyis med de bzhin nyid 'jug pas/ /de yang de bzhin gshegs par gsungs/
144b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes so/ /phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o// //da ni don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir/ mdor bstan pa'i tshig rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'jug par bya ste/ dam tshig
144b6(rgyud 'grel): khu phyung chog bzhin/ /'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad nas/ /dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur/ zhes le'u bdun pa las mdor bstan te/ 'di'i bshad pa dgongs pa lung ston pa zhes bya ba'i
144b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs te/ /gzugs sogs nang gi chos rnams ni/ /mthong ba lhag mthong zhes bshad de/ /mi bskyod la sogs grangs bzhin du/ /brtags pa dag ni zhi gnas bya/ /'di dag dngos po med 'gyur ba'i/ /de bzhin nyid ni
145a1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ming can/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rnal 'byor bas ni sangs rgyas gzhug /'di yang slar bshad pa rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las gsungs te/ de la 'jug par bya'o/ /gzugs phung rtogs la me
145a2(rgyud 'grel): long dang/ /sa khams mig gi dbang po dang/ /gzugs dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste/ /khro bo byams par yang dag ldan/ /tshor ba'i phung po mnyam nyid dang/ /chu khams rna ba'i dbang po dang/ /sgra dang rna lngar gyur pa ste/ /khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan//
145a3(rgyud 'grel): 'du shes so sor rtog pa dang/ /byin za sna yi dbang po dang/ /dri za rnam lngar 'gyur pa ste/ /khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /'du byed bya ba grub pa dang/ /rlung khams lce yi dbang po dang/ /ro dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste/ /khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /steng
145a4(rgyud 'grel): 'og khro bo shin tu bcas/ /rang bzhin gyiS ni snang ba nyid/ /rnam shes phung por bzhugs pa ste/ /rnam shes kyang ni 'od gsal ba'o/ /mya ngan 'das bcas kun stong dang/ /chos kyi skur yang bshad pa yin/ /brtan par bya ba'i don du ni/ /gsang sngaD
145a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma konyahaM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rnam par bzhag pa bzhi pa 'di nyid kyis rdzogs pa la gnas pa nye bar bshad par bya ste/ /de la gzugs kyi phung po 'od gsal du bzhugs pa'i mtshan ma
145a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas shes par bya ste/ /yan lag thams cad phra ba dang/ lus kyi nyams chung zhing lhod par 'gyur ro/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes thim pa na rab rib tu 'gyur ro/ /sa'i khams 'gags pa na lus thams cad skams par 'gyur ro/ /mig gi
145a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang po 'gag pa na mig 'gyur zhing brum par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs kyi yul 'gag pa na rang gi lus kyi mdangs med cing nyams zad pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de ltar 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas rkang med dang/ rkang gnyis dang/ rkang bzhi dang/ rkang mangs
145b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sems can rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can rnams sku'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor du skad cig pa'i rim gyis 'jug go /gang dag cha shas la gnas pa de dag gi ni 'dir rnam par bzhag pa med mod kyi/ /'on
145b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang rim gyis don dam pa'i bden par rab tu 'jug go /de bzhin du gnyis pa rin po che'i rigs kyi lha rnams don dam pa'i bden par 'jug pa de'i tshe mtshan ma mkhas pas shes par bya ste/ tshor ba'i phung po thim pa na rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang
145b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa la sogs pa lus tshor ba nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thim pa na yid kyi tshor ba rnam pa gsum dran par mi 'gyur ro/ /chu'i khams skams pa na rang gi lus la kha chu dang khrag dang khu ba la sogs pa skams par
145b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i dbang po thim pa na phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i sgra thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /sgra'i yul thim pa na rang gi lus kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /gnyis pa rin po che'i rigs kyi lha rjes su gzhug pa'o/ /gsum pa pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha rnams 'jug pa'i
145b5(rgyud 'grel): dus su mtshan ma mkhas pas shes par bya ste/ 'du shes kyi phung po thim pa na rkang gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sems can rnams dran par mi 'gyur ro/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thim pa na pha dang ma dang bu dang gnyen la sogs dang 'gro ba thams
145b6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi ming mi dran no/ /me'i khams thim phan? bza' ba thams cad mi 'ju'o/ /sna'i dbang po thim pa na steng gi rlung rtseg cing rtseg cing ser 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dri'i yul thim pa na rang gi lus dri'i yul bro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gsum pa pad+ma'i rigs
145b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha rjes su gzhug pa'o/ /bzhi pa las kyi rigs kyi lha rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mthar 'jug pa'i mtshan ma mkhas pas shes par bya ste/ de la 'du byed kyi phung po thim pa na lus kyi bya ba thams cad la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /bya ba? grub pa'i
146a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thim pa na 'jig rten pa'i bya ba dang dgos pa dran par mi 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi khams thim pa na srog la sogs pa'i rlung bcu rang gi gnas nas 'pho'o/ /lce'i dbang po thim pa na lce sgom pa dang thung ba dang thung ba dang rtsa ba sngon por
146a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /ro'i lus thim pa na ro drug nyams su mi myong ngo/ /bzhi pa las kyi rigs kyi lha rnams rjes su gzhug pa'o/ /lhag ma rang bzhin gyi snang ba 'jam dpal gyi ye shes rim pa gnyis par bya ste/ de yang srog dang rtsol ba dang bcas par rdo rje bzlas pa'i
146a3(rgyud 'grel): rim pas gnas te/ ril po 'dzin pa dang/ rjes su gzhig pa'i rim pas mi shigs pa mngon sum du bya ste/ 'dzin pa nye bar bsdus nas de'i tshe/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma konyahaM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi don mngon sum byed par 'gyur ro/ /
146a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba/ sngags 'di'i don bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs te/ de bshad par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
146a5(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /phra mo'i sbyor ba rnam par bzhugs/ /oM zhes pas ni gcig dang ldan/ /shU n+ya tA ni gnyis pa yin/ /dz+nyA na zhes pa gsum pa yin/ /bzhi pa badzra ming can te/ /swa b+hA ba at+ma ko lnga pa/ /drug pa a haM zhes su brjod/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
146a6(rgyud 'grel): drug/ skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin/ /oM shU n+ya tA zung dang po'o/ /dz+nyA na badzra gnyis pa yin/ swa b+hA ba ni/ at+ma ko haM gsum pa yin/ /de nyid gsum du 'di ru bstan/ /de nyid gsum ni gcig tu 'gyur/ /gsal dang mi gsal ming can te//
146a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin gang zhig/ gsum gyi brda dang ldan pa'i mi/ /spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba dang/ /de bzhin du ni bzhugs pa'o/ /'jug pa yis ni spyan drangs te/ /myur ba yis ni gshegs su gsol/ /dal ba yis ni de bzhugs 'gyur/ /
146b1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa las ni dngos grub mchog /skyes bu de de'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya chen po gcig tu 'gyur/ /myur ba la sogs gsum ldan pa/ /phyag rgya bsgrub pa bshad pa yin/ /myur dang rnam bsdus dal ba can/ /sngags su nges par sbyor ba yi/ /slob dpon gyis ni dbang?
146b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /slob ma'i rna ba'i drung du brjod/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bzhag pa'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o// //grub pa'i slob dpon klu'i
146b3(rgyud 'grel): blo'i zhal snga nas kyi mdzad pa rnam par bzhag pa'i rim pa bzhi pa rdzogs sto// //*/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nyi shu pa zhes bya ba slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/
146b4(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI gu hya sa ma dza maN+Dal u pA yi ki bi sha bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nyi shu pa zhes bya bo/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis med ye shes sku mnga' ba/ /dang po'i mgon la phyag
146b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal nas/ /rdo rje slob mar phan 'byung ba/ /dkyil 'khor yan lag bdag gis bshad/ /bya rgyud cho ga ma gtogs par/ /spyod dang gnyi ga'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /grub pa'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas ni/ /kun lugs las 'ongs yang dag bsngags/
146b6(rgyud 'grel): dang por sa ni sbyang ba dang/ /de nas sa yongs 'dzin pa dang/ /phyi nas bgegs ni nyer zhi dang/ /thod le kor gyis thig gdab dang/ /de nas sa lha sogs lhag par/ /gnas dang de nas gsol gdab dang/ /phyi nas slob ma lhag gnas dang/ nam mkhar
146b7(rgyud 'grel): thig ni gdag pa dang/ /tshon sna lnga yi cho ga dang/ /tshon rtsi rnams ni dgye ba dang/ /lha rnams spyan drangs nyid dang ni/ /de nas slob ma gzhug pa dang/ /khrus kyi dkyil 'khor cho ga dang/ /de nas sangs rgyas dbang bskur dang/ /de nas phyag mtshan dbang bskur
147a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bla ma lha dang yon gnyis dang/ /rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa dang/ /de nas gshegs gsol cho ga dang/ /dkyil 'khor las chen phur pa dang/ /skud pa bsdu ba nyid kyang ste/ /rab bshad cho ga nyi shu yis/ /ji lta ji ltar rgyas
147a2(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa yis/ /rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /kha cig grub pa brgyad 'dod pas/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la 'jug par 'gyur/ /de bzhin bden mthong de bzhin du/ /dpa' bo sngags pa brtags pa ste/ /de dag sbyor
147a3(rgyud 'grel): ba bla ma yis/ /rigs nas bla ma mkhas pa yis/ /slob ma'i don kun bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /'khor lo rnam brgyad bri bar bya/ /rin chen sa bon de bzhin dang/ /me tog tshon dang de bzhin du/ /bye ma g.yo dang phye ma ste/ /de bzhin yid kyi dkyil 'khor
147a4(rgyud 'grel): bden/ /sa bon dgod dang phyag mtshan dang/ /yang na lha yi sku nyid ni/ /'bur du btong dang lugs ma ni/ /stobs bzhin dkyil 'khor la dgod bya/ /phreng ba chu dang rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu me long dang/ /ming dang slob dpon rjes gnang
147a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes/ /bya ba 'di ni dbang bskur rim/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje yi/ /theg par slob dpon rnam gnyis gsungs/ /gcig ni gsang sngags gtsor byed 'gyur/ /gcig ni bsam gtan la gzhol ba/ /gsang sngags smrar gnas rnal 'byor pa//
147a6(rgyud 'grel): lha la dmigs pa lhur len pas/ /de las mtshan ma rnyed gyur te/ /rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /gsang sngags tshul gnas rnal 'byor pa/ /gnyis med ye shes sbyor ldan pas/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i lus kyis ni/ /'khor lo sgyu ma lta bu
147a7(rgyud 'grel): bri/ /grong khyer grong dang grong rdal dang/ /kun dga' tshod 'dus gtsug lag ni/ /khang du pus nub tsam bkos nas/ /rim gyis sa ni spyang bar bya/ /shing dang gyo mo gseg ma dang/ /de bzhin rus pa sol ba dang/ /skra la sogs pa bsal byas nas/ /de
147b1(rgyud 'grel): nas sa ni sbyang ste/ /kun nas steng ni yang dag par/ /bsnyams te ba lang lci bas byug/ dri yi chu yis bsangs nas ni/ /phyi nas drag po'i sbyin sreg bya/ /sngags pa rdo rje sems zlos shing/ /rdo rje'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi
147b2(rgyud 'grel): cha/ /skyon dang ldan yang spyod par 'gyur/ /gsang dbang rtog pa la gnas shing/ /byang chub sems ni rnam spangs po'i/ /sngags pa gang zhig sa sbyong bar/ /byed pa de yis 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sa sbyang pa'i cho ga'o// //
147b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas bla re sogs brgyan cing/ /mchod pa lnga dang bcas pa yi/ /'khor lo'i khyim du phyin nas su/ /sa ni yongs su gzung bar bya/ /dkar la ma nyams gos 'chang zhing/ /gtsug tor dag pa yis brgyan la/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spud cing//
147b4(rgyud 'grel): dri bzang byugs pa'i chal 'thor pas/ /nyi ma gsum du thun gsum du/ /cho ga ji bzhin gtor ma dbul/ /de nas bgegs rnams zhi bar ni/ /bya phyir phyogs skyong bcu la'o/ /brtul zhugs brtan pas zhi ba yi/ /sbyin sreg tshul bzhin
147b5(rgyud 'grel): sngar byas nas/ /phyi nas dbang bskur rab grub phyir/ /slob mas kyang ni byed du gzhug/ sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o// //zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la/ /gnas shing khro bos yongs bskor ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yis
147b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs byung tshe/ /bgegs ni nges par bsal bar bya/ /rkang thil rdo rje bsam byas nas/ /rdo rje gsor ba lhung len zhing/ /rdo rje'i no ma sgeg gang byed bzhin/ /hUM yig drag po che bar bcas/ /yi ge Ta yis mig g.yon zla bar byas/ /yi ge ma yis mig g.yas
147b7(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma bkod/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi bsnyems la 'chang ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa yi cha la 'gro byed cing/ /mnga' bdag rtse ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /brgya byin la sogs gdug pa yi/ /tshogs bcas sa dang bar snang dang/ /phyogs nas gsal bya 'di skad brjod/
148a1(rgyud 'grel): a pa sa ran+tu b+ha ban+to yi ge cing de ba a su ra yak+Sha rak+Sha sa pre tA mi shA tsa a pasmA ra b+hu ta DA ki n+ya o star kamA hal+la ka ma hal+li ka tsha a nu ra sa pa ri Shad+ga ru DaM? ka pu ru Sha ma stra sid+d+hi/ /bdag gis phyogs 'dir slob mtshe? ge mo'i rdzoD
148a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /'di thos nas myur du dngos shig
148a3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig mi dang pa 'di'i mgo bo ye shes kyi rdo rje chen po 'bar ba dag hUM gi rdo rje 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba 'dis tshal ba brgyad 'gags par 'gyur bya'o/ /de skad lan gsum brjod nas de nas ni/ /sngags pa khro bar gyur cing shar phyogs na//
148a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pas hUM yig phyag rgya dang bcas par/ /g.yas brkyang sngon 'gro'i sbyor ba tshul bzhin bya/ g.yas brkyang dang/ g.yon brkyang dang/ sa ga dang/ zlum po dang / mnyam pa'i steng? stabs dang /rul sbal gyi stang stabs dang/ rdo rje phul byung
148a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje sgeg pa dang/ rkang cig gis 'phung stangs dang/ bung ba'i 'phur stangs dang/ seng+ge'i stang stabs dang/ seng+ge'i gla la ba dang /rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ /rdo rje bskor 'dzin dang /rdo rje 'phen pa dang/ /rdo rje'i gang stabs dang /rdo rje
148a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig byed dang/ rdo rje ro langs dang /rdo rje tho ba dang/ gdong bzhi byin gyis brlabs pa dang /rdo rje 'khyil pa dang/ bud med ltar sgyu 'phrul byed pa dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ stobs po che phul byung dang/ rdo rje mche ba dang/ rdo rje bzhad pa
148a7(rgyud 'grel): dang /rdo rje sgrogs pa dang /ral gri'i tshul dang/ rdo rje'i tshul dang/ 'khor lo'i tshul dang/ gtun shing gi tshul dang/ bdan gyi tshul dang/ zhags pa'i tshul dang/ pad+ma'i tshul dang/ gtum po'i tshul dang /mi 'jigs pa'i tshul dang/ lcaD
148b1(rgyud 'grel): kyu'i tshul dang/ thong gshol gyi tshul dang/ 'phang mdung gi tshul dang/ mda''gengs pa'i tshul dang /mda''drem pa'i tshul dang/ mda''phen pa'i tshul dang /thag mdung 'phen pa'i tshul dang/ mchog sbyin pa'i tshul dang /mdud thung gi tshul
148b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /chu'i tshul dang /phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang /rdo rje'i 'dug tshul dang/ bsam gtan pa'i tshul dang/ rdo rje'i skyil krung dang/ pad+ma'i 'dug tshul dang /sems dpa' i skyil krung dang /dpa' bo'i tshul dang /bzang po'i
148b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug tshul dang/ tsog tsog por 'dug tshul dang /rol pa'i 'dug tshul dang /mngon du phyogs pa'i tshul dang /rgyab kyi phyogs pa'i tshul zhes bya'o/ /sngags pa rang bzhin shes pa yis/ /stang stabs de ltar dbang po sogs/ /tshoD
148b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang bsdigs nas phyogs skyong rnams/ /ji bzhin phur bus yang dag gdab/ /seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pa'i/ /tshad dang ldan pa blangs nas ni/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa yis/ /de ni go rim bzhin du dkri/ dri dang me tog sogs rnams kyis//
148b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod nas snod ni sar par bzhag/ lag par reg cing phur bu la/ yi ge gsum gyis mngon bar bsngags/ /de ltar 'dus byas phur pa ni/ /kun rdzob rang bzhin 'thon po las/ /blo dang ldan pas rim pa 'dis/ /slar yang bsam gtan
148b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin bya/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM /grih+Na gri hA hUM/ gri h+NA pa ya gri h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga ba na badyi rA dza hUM phaT/ khro bo'i gzugs can 'di yis ni/ /de ltar log 'dren kun bkug ste/ /blo dang ldan pas sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga
148b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du phur bus gdab/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che/ /utpal sngon po'i 'dab ltar sngo/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs 'di can/ /rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom/ /lte ba'i phyogs nas smad kyi tshe/ /rtse mo'i rnam par rab tu bsgom/ /stod
149a1(rgyud 'grel): ni khro bo'i rnam pa dang/ /zhal gsum rnam pa phyag drug tu'o/ /gnod mdzes gzugs 'dzin rdo rje can /gcig gis rdo rje tho ba ste/ /? yon pas phung po 'dzin byed cing/ /gsang sngags 'di yis phur bus gdab/ /oM
149a2(rgyud 'grel): g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba tuSh+TaM? phaT phaT/ kI la kI la ya sarba pA bi phaT phaT /hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ra A dza pa ya ti?/ sarba bag+h+nA? kA ya bAk+tsi? twaM kI pratA? ya? hUM hUM hUM phaT/ de ltar rtog pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bgegs rnams bskal?
149a3(rgyud 'grel): nas sngags rig pas/ /bde mchog dpal gsungs cho ga yis/ /slar yang bgegs rnams sbyang bar bya/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis rnam par spyod mdzad pa/ /sems can phyir yin las sbyang pa phyir min/ /'di na bgags yod ma yin bdud rnams
149a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /rtog pas 'phel med byin rlabs 'grub med nyid/ /bdag bdud nyid dam brtan pa nyid mi 'gro/ brtan pa nyid phyir rjes su bstan mi bya/ /rang bdes da? bsgrub sdug bsngal gyis mi gang/ /byang chub mchog rab myur phyir brtan par
149a5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas legs par mnyam bzhag pa'i/ /slob dpon bla ma thabs cig pa/ /blo dang ldan pas rim pa 'dis/ /thod le kor gyis thig gdab bya/ /slob dpon chu lha'i
149a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs gnas dang/ /slob ma mngon du phyogs gyur pa/ /dbang po'i phyogs na gnas pa yis/ /tshangs pa'i thig ni gdab par bya/ /sngags rig gshin rje'i phyogs gnas pa/ /slob ma lus ngan phyogs gnas dang/ /lhan cig
149a7(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i thig gnyis pa/ /yang dag par ni gdab par bya/ /slob dpon me lhar gnas pa dang/ /slob ma mngon du phyogs gyur pa/ /dbang ldan du ni gnas nyid kyis/ /rtsa ba'i thig ni gdab par bya/ /de nyid du gnas rdo rje can/ /
149b1(rgyud 'grel): thig shes pa la mkhas pa dang/ /bden bral la gnas bu yin ni/ /lho phyogs kyi ni thig gdab bya/ /de nyid du gnas slob ma dang/ /rlung ltar gnas pa'i slob ma yis/ /bden bral rlung lha la gnas pa'i/ /thig ni gsum pa gdab par bya/ /de nyid du
149b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnal 'byor pa/ /las shes pa dang zhi phyogs su/ /gnas pa'i bu yis phyi nas ni/ /rtsa thig bzhi pa gdab par bya/ /me ltar gnas pa'i slob dpon ni/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan dang/ /rlung ltar gnas pa'i sngags pa yis/ /mtshams kyi thig kyang
149b3(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya/ /bla ma dbang ldan phyogs su ni/ /gnas nas slob ma bden bral du/ /gnas pa yis ni mtshams kyi thig /gnyis pa yang dag gdab par bya/ /sgyu ma'i lus ni dran bzhin du/ /de nas sgo ni rnam par dbye/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha
149b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /lha yi snam bu de bzhin no/ /sgo khyud sgo yi tshad du ste/ /de bzhin 'gram dang ngos kyang do/ /de yi phyed du kha khyer ro/ /kha khyer phyed du tshon gyis/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi phyed kyis ni/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor tshang yin te/ /'od zer lnga yis rnam brgyan cing/
149b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phreng bas 'bar bar bya/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor phyi rol tu/ /thig bzhi yang dag bri bar bya/ /nang du ka ba brgyad po ni/ /'khor los mtshan cing legs mdzes bri/ /rdo rje ka ba'i bar dang bar/ /de nyid du ni re mig dgu /dra ba kha khyer tshad du 'gyur/ /
149b6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen pa gu de phyed du/ /'ba' li dang ni mnga' yab dang/ /phyi rol ka ba'i sa de bzhin/ /bum pa ka ba'i steng? gnas pa/ /rta babs sgo yi sum 'gyur te/ /mnga' yab dang ni bya 'dab dang/ /ldan zhing dril bu nges par 'khrol/ /ba dan dag dang rnga yab
149b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /me tog chun 'phyang sogs mdzes pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni zur bzhi po/ /zla phyed nor bu rdo rje 'dzin/ /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /rta babs rdo rje'i rtse mo can/ /de yi phyi rol khor yug ste/ /rdo rje'i
150a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba 'od zer rgyas/ /thig btab pa las grub 'gyur bya'o/ /gzhan rnams 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par/ /ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag /sngags pas slob ma'i nus pa dang/ /rjes su bstun nas dkyil 'khor de/ /khru gang pa nas
150a2(rgyud 'grel): brtsams byas nas/ /khru stong bar du bri bar bya/ /thod le kor gyis thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o// //bgegs rnams phur pas btab byas te/ /de nas rab dra ba sogs/ /bsams nas rdo rje'i rang bzhin/ /thig btab
150a3(rgyud 'grel): lhag par gnas bar bya/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par dang/ /sa dang pha rol phyin rnams la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi dpung bcom ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gi

150b1(rgyud 'grel): dgod/ /mkhas pas gur kum la sogs pa/ /mngon 'dus byas pas dkyil 'khor pa/ /kun gyi sa bon nam mtshan ma/ /bum pa'i ngos la nges par bri/ /rin po che la sogs ldan zhing/ /rang gi sngags kyis mngon sngags pa/ /chu bcas 'di rnams blo ldan kyis?

150b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas 'gyur pa yis/ /tshig 'di dag tu gsal bar brjod/ /deng du bdag tshe 'bras bur bcas/ /bdag ni dam tshig lha rnams dang/ /mnyam par gyur pa the tshom med/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems gcig pa/ /bdag ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur//

150b6(rgyud 'grel): btud de mchod yon phul? nas ni/ /blo dang ldan pas phyi nang gi /mchod pas mchod de 'di skad brjod/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /rdo rje can bdag che ge mo/ /zhes ni bgyi ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dri/
150b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun deng gshegs su gsol/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i las la ni/ /ci nus bzhin du rab tu bgyi/ /de nas bsnyems bcas langs nas ni/ /rdzogs rim rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i/ /brtul zhugs can gyis

151a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo can mchod nas/ /bla ma byang chub gsol ba la/ /slob mas me tog thal mo ni/ /snying gar sbyar byas gsol ba gdab/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa ste/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan
151a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum bdag la stsal du gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu//

151b2(rgyud 'grel): med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /deng nas bzung ste sdom pa ni/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'byung ba gzung/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen pa la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi//
151b3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rig mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyi ma re re lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhir rab tu sbyin/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa ni/ /byang chub chen po 'byung ba la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg gsum pa/ /dam pa'i chos

151b7(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra hA sa ha(rgyud 'grel): shar dang byang du phyogs gnas nas/ /bcas te de ni 'dor du gzhug/ de nas bla mas phyogs kyi ni/ /rnam dbyes zhi sogs bstan par bya/ /de nas ku sha rtswar bcas shing/ /skyon spangs pa rnams blangs nas ni/ /stan dang sngas phyir
152a1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma la/ /sngags 'di yis ni steng du gzhug/ oM badzra tik+Sh+Na? baM/ bu mos skud la gsum bsgril ga /mdud gsum mngon par legs sngags pa'i/ /gsang sngags 'di yis rang nyid kyis/ /dpung pa g.yas la bcing par bya//

152a5(rgyud 'grel): sku/ /zab dang rgya che zhes grags pa/ /bden pa gnyis zhes bya bar bshad/ /kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don/ /rnam 'byes so sor shes nas ni/ /phyi nas slar yang bsreg bya ste/ /go 'phang zad pa med pa sgom/ /de yis kun tu kun las kun/ /rnam
152a6(rgyud 'grel): kun kun tshe rang nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rang bzhin du/ /grub par rang nyid kyis mthong 'gyur/ /byang chub sus kyang byin ma yin/ /su yis kyang ni bzung ma yin/ /rang chos yongs su shes pa las/ /de la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas brjod/ /sems
