203a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'ang gang yin zhe na/ snying gi dbus kyi sa bon las/ /gang zhig 'byung dang 'jug pa dag/ gzhan du mi 'phro de nyid du/ /gsal ba nang gi bzlas pa yin /zhes ba snying gi dbus su sa bon bsams te /de las rlung 'byung
203a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang 'jug pa dang gnas pa las bstan par bya zhing bslab par bya'o/ /de yang dang po pa dang/ bar ma dang/ tha ma'i rim pa ni gong bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /'di dag la 'ang ci'i phyir rdo rje bzlas pa snyam pa la/ rdo rje
203a6(rgyud 'grel): zlas dang rdo rje zlas/ /rdo rje la ni dmigs pa dang/ rdo rje yi dang rdo rje'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'byung dang rdo rje spor/ /rdo rje 'joms dang rdo rje bral zhes pa rdo rje bzlas pa ni 'od lnga'i sbyor pas so/ /rdo rje zhes pa gang yin zhe na/ dngos po
203a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rdo rje yi/ /ngo bor byas te bzlos phyir dang/ zhes pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa thams cad rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i ngo bor byas pa'i phyir ro/ /rdo rje la dmigs pa zhes bya ba'ang gang zhe na/ gang tshe sku gsung thuD
203b1(rgyud 'grel): dag? la/ dmigs pa de la de skad do zhes pa sku gsung thugs rdo rje dang 'dra ba la dmigs pa gang yin pa dang/ gzhan yang 'og gi dbang duAng de bzhin no/ /rdo rje yis shes pa bshad pa/ rdo rje'i 'od zer 'bar ba yiS/ /gang du 'bras thob de phyir ro//
203b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa 'od zer dang ba thag dang phreng ba 'di ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba ste/ nges 'bras bu thob pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /rdo rje'i phyir zhes bshad pa/ gang zhig mchog ni thob bya'i phyir/ bzlas pa gang yin de kho na zhes pa ni/ rdo rje
203b3(rgyud 'grel): ni chos kyi dbyings te/ ngo thob par byed pa'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o// rdo rje las byung ba ni/ /snying ga dang ni rtsa ba nas /gang zhig 'byung bar byed pa dang/ zhes pa snying ga'i sa bon dang/ rdo rje rtsa ba'i sa bon de dag las byung ba gang
203b4(rgyud 'grel): yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /rdo rje spong pa dang rdo rje 'joms pa bshad pa/ rtog pa rdo rje dang 'dra ba/ /gang gis 'joms par byed pa dang zhes pa rnam par rtog pa'ang 'jig bar dka' ba nyid kyi phyir te/ de 'joms pa'i bzlas
203b5(rgyud 'grel): pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /'di'i bzlas pa'ang gang yin du zhe na/ rdo rje bzlas dang nang gi dang/ /zab mo gsang ba'i bzlas pa ni/ /rnam grangs yin par shes par bya zhes pa nges pa'i tshig dang/ mi brtan pa'i
203b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir dang / rtog par dka' ba nyid dang/ byang chub sems dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /'di 'ang chos du dang ldan zhe na/ nges pa'i tshig rnams dag gi rtog pa sbyong ces pa bshad zin to/ /'di yis gzhan
203b7(rgyud 'grel): la thal 'gyur ba/ /sel phyir de dag brjod par bya zhes pa ni/ ci rigs su bshad do/ /rgyuAng gang yin zhe na/ ting 'dzin zas la sogs pa rnams/ 'bras bu skyed par byang phyir rgyu zhes pa gang du ting nge 'dzin zas skom dang
204a1(rgyud 'grel): dus nyid dang yul la sogs pa dag gis 'bras bu skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir de la de skad ces bya'o/ /dus gang gi chen? /bskyed pa mthar phyin sems la dmigs/ /'di la gzhal ba de'i dus shes pa
204a2(rgyud 'grel): gang gis bskyed pa'i rim pa mthar phyin pa dang sems la dmigs pa las gzhol ba'i dus su'o/ /'di'i mtshan nyid kyang gang zhe na/ skyon rnams spangs shing yon tan ldan/ 'di ni mtshan nyid ces su bshad zhes pa gang gis
204a3(rgyud 'grel): spang ba dang blang bdag dang bral zhing ldan pa 'di ni 'di'i mtshan nyid do/ /dmigs pa gang yin zhe na/ gang zhig dbye ba'i rnam pa bzhin/ /'od dang ba thag phreng ba dang/ /yi ge gsum gyi rnam pa 'am/ /yang na thabs dang shes
204a4(rgyud 'grel): rab bo zhes pa gang gis 'od dang ba thag dang pa thag la thig le'i phreng ba dang/ rtse mo la oM A hUM dang /A li kA li'i phreng ba la dmigs pa 'di ni 'di'i dmigs pa'o/ /dmigs pa la sems 'dzin pa'i rgyu 'am grogs gang
204a5(rgyud 'grel): yin zhe na/ gang du tshogs la sogs pa rnams/ /'di yi sgrub pa'i grogs su 'gyur zhes pa go sla'o/ /sngon du 'gro ba gang yin zhe na / bskyed pa khams bcos sngon du 'gro zhes pa rdo rje bzlas pa'i sngon du khams bcos
204a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bskyed pa'i rim pa la bslab bar bya ba 'di ni sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /'di'i rten yang gang yin zhe na/ bskyed pa yin ni sbyor ba la brten nas bzlas par bya ba yin zhes pa rdo rje bzlas pa'i rten ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ste /'di la
204a7(rgyud 'grel): brten nas 'di? byed pa'i phyir de la da skad ces bya'o/ /tshig khyal la sogs mi mthun phyogs shes pa/ tshig khyal pa dang/ dag rtsub mo dang phra ma dang brdzun la sogs pa 'di ni bzlas pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so/ /de'i gnyen
204b1(rgyud 'grel): po ni 'di nyid de'i gnyen po'i zhes pa 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sa'i khyad par yang gang yin zhe na/ gang zhig 'di la rtag gnas nas/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par byed ces pa rdo rje bzlas pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa sa brgyad pa bzod pa'i
204b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bring la gnas pa'o/ /de dang 'brel pa'i dngos grub kyang gang yin zhe na/ kha dog lnga la dmigs pa yis/ /las bzhi de dang 'brel pa 'grub ces pa zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang bsrung ba dang/ 'phel ba la sogs pa 'byung bar
204b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /'byung ba gang zhig gnas pa yis/ /thun mong gzhan ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /'jug dang gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'di yis srid pa 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /de yang spyod pa gang dang
204b4(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa yin zhe na/ byug pa dang ni der 'brel lo/ /bslab pa spyod par 'brel pa yin / zhes pa sha chen po la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs te bza' ba dang/ 'di dag gi byug par bya'o/ /sa mtshams kyang gang nas gang du yin
204b5(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ bskyed la brten nas sems la dmigs par du rdo rje bzlas pa yin/ /dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa nas brtsams nas de goms nas sems la dmigs pa'i bar du rdo rje bzlas pa'o/ /'bras bu gang 'byung zhe na/ dag gi
204b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug sbyor ba 'ang/ rdo rje bzlas pa 'di yis 'grub ces pa 'di yiS dag giS dbang phyug yan lag rgya mtsho 'am/ yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /goms pa'i tshad ci zhe na/ gang gis rlung rnams gsal ba ni/
204b7(rgyud 'grel): nyams su myong ba goms pa'i tshod ces pa / kha dog dbyibs dang grangs gang du gsal ba de ni goms pa'i tshad do/ /mthar phyin pa'i tshad kyang gang yin zhe na/ gnas 'pho bar dang du mar byed / 'di ni mthar phyin tshad yin no
205a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa phra ba'i rlung rags pa dang/ rags pa'i rlung phra bar byed pa dang phra ba'i rlung dang rags pa'i gzhan du ma dang de las bzlog par shes pa 'di ni dus su dbugs nang du bsdus na gnod pa mi
205a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'o/ /gzhan ni gang zhig dang po gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa'i gang zag dbang dag tu/ dbyibs dang rlung dang sgyu mar dmigs/ rigs can la ni 'bras bu skye/ /klog dang kha ton sbyor ba med/ /phreng ba mi gos bgrang mi
205a3(rgyud 'grel): dgos/ /'on kyang rlung la brten pa'i phyir/ /'di ni bzlas par bshad pa ste/ /gang zhig sbyor ba 'di la gnas/ /ngag gis dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/ zhes pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /de ltar rdo rje bzlas pa
205a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par bstan nas / da ni sems la dmigs pa bshad par bya ste/ de la sems la dmigs pa du zhig ce na/ bshad pa gang du sems la dmigs pa la/ /ngo bo dang ni rnam dbye dang/ /nges pa'i tshig dang rnam grangs dang//
205a5(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gang dang ldan pa dang/ /gzhan sel rgyu dus nus pa'o/ /ngo bo yang gang yin zhe na /sems la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ /rang gi ngo bor yang dag 'dod ces pa gang du sems la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni
205a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i rang gi ngo bo'o/ /ci'i phyir sems la dmigs pa zhe na/ sku gsung thugs kyi sems dpa' 'am/ /byang chub sems la dmigs pa 'am/ /sems snang phyir ni de skad brjod ces 'og nas ston to/ /dbye ba 'ang du zhig ce na/
205a7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin 'khrul pa lam dag dang/ 'bras bu'i rnam pa bcu gnyis so/ /zhes pa rang bzhin snang ba gsum dang/ 'khrul pa'i snang ba gsum dang/ lam gyi snang ba gsum dang/ 'bras bu'i snang ba gsum mo/ /rnam grangs ni/
205b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la dmigs sems la dmigs/ yid dang rnam shes rnam grangs so zhes pa go sla'o/ /chos du gzhan sel sbyor ba ni/ /thal 'gyur gnyen por brjod pa yin/ /bshad zin to/ /rgyu ni byang chub sems yin te/ /shes rab
205b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni snying rje'o zhes pa gang gis rdo rje bzlas pa mthar phyin nas/ de'i ye shes bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i rgyu'o/ /dus ni bzlas pa mthar phyin pa'o/ /zhes pa gang gi tshe rdo rje bzlas pa mthar phyin nas/ de'i dus su byed pa gang yin
205b3(rgyud 'grel): pa de ni dus so/ /nus pa 'ang? ci yod ce na/ sems kyi dri ma 'khru bar byed ces sems kyi 'khrul pa gang gis spong bar nus pa de ni nus ba'o/ /gzhan yang bskyed pa'i sku la rtag gnas shing/ /rdo rje bzlas pa mthar phyin nas/ /snying gar
205b4(rgyud 'grel): sems gsum mtshan ma'am/ /'od kyi thig le gsal ba ni/ /snang ba zla ba lta bu'o/ /de las 'od byung bdag dang bcas/ /zhu ba snang ba mched pa ste/ /nyi ma lta bu 'dus pa ni/ /snang ba thob pa zhes su bshad/ /dmigs pa'i
205b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang du bshad pa'o/ /spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga 'am/ /yang na gsang ba'i cha la gnas/ /gnas kyi rnam par gnas pa'o/ /skad cig la sogs rnam pa la/ /gnas pa dus kyi snang pa'o/ /zla ba nyi ma nub pa'i tshul/ /dpe yi
205b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang du byas pa'o/ /mngal la sogs pa'i rim pa la/ /shes pa 'phel bar gyur pa dang/ /gang zhig dmigs ba la sogs pa/ dus las 'khrul pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /gzhan yang
205b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa rnams la rgyu dang rkyen/ /'bras bu skye ba'i rim pa dang/ /gang zhig snang ba gsum po dag/ 'byung ngo 'od gsal dang las dang/ /thob pas lugs las bzlas pa dang/ /'di dag 'bras bu'i snang ba'o/ /sems ni rlung la
206a1(rgyud 'grel): zhon pa yis/ /rang bzhin 'di dag 'byung ba yin zhes pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /de ltar sems la dmigs pa rgyas par bshad nas/ da ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bshad par bya ste/ de
206a2(rgyud 'grel): la sems dmigs sbyor ba gong bzhin te/ zhes pa ngo bo la sogs pa gong bzhin no/ /rgyud par bshad pa sgyu ma la dmigs ngo bo ste/ zhes pa gang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni ngo bo'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma'i dpe yis
206a3(rgyud 'grel): nyer mtshon phyir/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sku zhes bshad zhes pa gang la sgyu ma lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i sku'i/ /dbye ba'ang du zhig ce na/ gang du rim dang cig car ba'am/ /mang pa dang  ni nyung ba'o/ /zhes pa bskyed pa bzhin te gong bzhin no/ /kun rdzob bden dang sgyu ma dang/ /yid kyi gzugs ni rnam grangs so zhes pa sgyu ma lta bu dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyis gzugs ni rnam grangs so//
206a4(rgyud 'grel): chos du dang ldan zhe na/ sku dang sgyu 'dra yid gzugs dang/ ting nge 'dzin dmigs 'di rnams so zhes pa gang la 'di dag dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya ste/ 'dis ni gzhan sel ba'ang bsnyad do/ /rgyu gang yin zhe na/ thob
206a5(rgyud 'grel): pa las byung 'di ni rgyu zhes pa snang ba thob pa'i ye shes 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i rgyu'o/ /dus gang gi tshe bsgom zhe na/ sems la dmigs pa mthar phyin nas/ sgyu ma lta bur yang dag gnas zhes pa gang gis bskyed pa sgyu ma lta
206a6(rgyud 'grel): bu bsgom pa ni sems la dmigs nas so zhe na/ nus pa'ang ci yong zhe na/ 'di yis sku gnyis thob par byed zhes pa/ sgyu ma lta bu 'dis sbyangs pas/ longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku thob par byed do zhe'o/ /
206b1(rgyud 'grel): de las gzhan yang bshad pa/ gang zhig gis ni dngos po rnams/ /sgyu ma'i dpes ni nyer mtshon nas/ /phyis ni de yi rnam pa las/ /gzhan du mi mthong mthar phyin tshang/ /lus dang ngag yid sbyor ba yis/ /'di yi sbyor ba 'grub pa yin zhes
206b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /de nas 'od gsal ba bshad par bya ste/ de'i ngo bo bshad pa/ gang zhig rtog pa dang bral pa / de ni 'od gsal ngo bo'i zhes pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dang bral ba de ni 'od gsal ba'i
206b3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo'o/ /'di la ci'i phyir zhe na /rang bzhin 'od gsal rtog sel phyir/ 'od gsal zhes ni rnam par bshad ces pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir dang/ gang gis rtog pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir de la de skad
206b4(rgyud 'grel): ces bya'o/ /dbye ba'ang du zhig ce na / shes pa dang ni shes bya yi/ /'od gsal ba ni 'dir bshad do/ /zhes pa shes bya 'od gsal ni dbyings so/ /shes pa 'od gsal ni ye shes so/ /de'ang gnyis te/ rang bzhin 'od
206b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral rnam gnyis bzhi zhes pa bshad zin to/ /rnam grangs bshad pa 'od gsal rtog bral 'dus ma byas/ /rnam grangs yin par shes par bya zhes pa go sla'o yang bshad pa/ slob pa dang ni mi slob pas/
206b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal gnyis su shes bar bya/ ril por 'dzin dang rjes su zhig/ slob pa'i 'od gsal zhes su bshad/ /mi slob pa ni rtog dang bral/ /dmigs med rnams dang gdod nas dag /rnam grangs dpag tu med pa dag/ rgyal ba
206b7(rgyud 'grel): sras kyi gsung? pa yin/ /zhes pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu ni shes rab ting 'dzin te/ kun rdzob bden la brten 'gyur ba/ /'di ni dus shes bshad pa yin/ /gang tshe thams cad rang bzhin med/ /mthar
207a1(rgyud 'grel): byin? chad ni bshad pa'o/ /'di'i rab tu dga' ba yi/ /sa la yang dag gnas pa'o/ /de'i rtog pa spong ba ste/ /gong ma la ni mngon du phyogs/ /gang gis mtshan ma med pa la/ /mchog tu gzhol ba'i gang zag
207a2(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /gcig gis sbyong bas yang dag 'byung/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /mnyam la gnas par gyur pa la/ /'od gsal lung bstan gleng gzhi yin/ /de bas 'od gsal mngon du bya/ /zhes pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su
207a3(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa'o/ /de ltar 'od gsal ba rgyas par bstan nas/ da ni zung du 'jug par bstan par bya ste/ de la zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bo 'ang gang yin zhe na/ gnyis med ye shes gang yin pa/ zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bo'o zhes
207a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gang rtog pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes de ni zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bo'o/ /'di la'ang ci'i phyir zung du 'jug pa zhes bya zhe na/ gnyis su med phyir mi gnas phyir/ gnyis dang bral phyir gnyis dmigs
207a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ zung 'jug ces ni bshad pa yin zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir dang/ gnyis su mi gnas pa'i phyir dang/ gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir dang/ gnyis la dus gcig du dmigs pa'i phyir zung du 'jug pa'o/ /
207a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i dbye ba'ang du zhig ces na/ slob pa dang ni mi slob pas /zung du 'jug pa gnyis su shes zhes pa gang la slob pa de ni slob pa'i zung du 'jug pa'o/ /slob pa'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni/ mi slob pa'i
207a7(rgyud 'grel): zug 'jug go /rnam grangs kyang gang yin zhes bshad pa mi slob pa dang/ mthar phyin pa dang/ zung 'jug gnyis med rnam grangs so/ /zhes pa ni mi slob pa'i dbang du byas pa'o/ /chos du dang ldan zhe na/ ting 'dzin yin
207b1(rgyud 'grel): dang gnyis la dmigs/ /skad cig dmigs dang thogs pa med ces pa rnam pa bzhi pa 'di dang ldan pa ni zung du 'jug pa'o/ /gzhan la thal 'gyur sel ba ni/ /'di yi 'grub kyis gzhan du min zhes pa ni gzhan shel ba'o/ /'o na thung?
207b2(rgyud 'grel): du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rgyuAng gang yin zhe na/ 'od gsal ba dang rnam pa gnyis slob pa'i zung du 'jug pa'i rgyu zhes pa 'od gsal ba dang/ shes rab dang ting 'dzin ni slob pa'i zung du 'jug pa'i rgyu'o/ /'o na mi slob pa'i zung du 'jug
207b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyu 'ang gang yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dang snying rje dang / smon lam dang ni de yi rgyu zhes pa sems can la phan gdags pa'i bsam pa dang/ snying rje dang sems can gyi don la dmigs pa'i smon lam 'di ni mi slob pa'i
207b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang du byas pa'o/ /'di la'ang ci'i phyir rgyu zhe na/ gang zhig yod na gang 'byung ba de ni de'i rgyu'o/ /dus kyang gang gi tshe 'byung zhe na / 'od gsal ba ni mthar phyin pa / de tshe zung 'jug bsgom par bya zhes pa gang gi tshe 'od
207b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba mthar phyin pa de'i tshe zung 'jug bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so/ /sngon du 'gro ba 'ang gang yin zhe na / rim pa gzhan ni sngon song nas/ /gang zhig 'di la gnas par bya zhes pa go sla'o/ /de ltar lam dngos
207b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad nas/ da ni de'i grogs spyod pa bstan par bya ste / de bshad pa/ spyod pa dag gi sbyor ba la// /ngo bo dang ni rnam dbye dang/ /nges pa'i tshig dang rnam grangs dang/ /rgyud dang dus dang gnas dang grogs zhes pa la sogs
207b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bshad pa la / khyad par 'dod yon lnga la spyod ces pa khyad par can gyi sems kyi zin pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod pa 'di ni rang gi ngo bo'o/ /dus dang bya ba bsam pa la bltos pa'i dbang du spyod pa dgu zhes pa 'di ni dus
208a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi khyad par la bltos pa'i spyod pa gsum mo/ /bya ba dang bsam pa la'ang de bzhin no/ /gsum po nyid gang zhe na/ spros pa dang bcas pa dang/ spros pa med pa dang shin tu spros pa med pa'o/ /'di la ci'i phyir zhe na
208a2(rgyud 'grel): tshim dang spyad du yod phyir te zhes pa go sla'o/ /spyod dang kun rdzob la sogs pa rgyu ni bshad zin to/ /dus gang gi tshe bya zhe na/ bsod gtan las su rung ba'i tshe/ spyod pa dag gi spyad par bya zhes pa rlung la dbang thob pa/ byang
208a3(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dbab pa dang bzlog pa shes pa dang/ rigs ma rtog pa'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa 'di'i tshe'o/ /gnas gang du zhe na/ sa phug rim pa gsum pa ru/ yang dag spyod pa spyad par bya zhes pa spyod pa'i dbang du sa phug
208a4(rgyud 'grel): gi rim pa gsum par spyod par bya'o zhe'o/ /dge ba gang yin 'di yi grogs zhes pa dang? pa la sogs pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang/ ngo bo nyid la sogs pa'i sbyor bas 'di'i grogs su'o/ /gang gis gang zhig gang
208a5(rgyud 'grel): las grol byed pa/ /de yi rigs can dbang du byas pa'o/ /gang zhig gis ni spyod pa lhur len dang/ /spyod pa grogs tsam dbang du bstan pa yin zhes pa ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'bras bu zhes bya
208a6(rgyud 'grel): ba gang zhig ce na/ thun mong mchog gi 'bras bu'o/ /zhes pa gang zhig gi gang thob par bya ba de ni 'bras bu'o/ /gang yin zhe na/ thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub ces bya'o/ /la la dag na re/ rgyu dag thabs dang
208a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dang/ /rnam pa gsum po 'di kho na zhes pa ni/ rgyu ni theg pa chen po'i rigs can no/ /thabs ni rnam pa gnyis so/ /'bras bu ni sku dang ye shes so gzhan yang rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu spang bya dang/ /go rim grangs
208b1(rgyud 'grel): nges rnam pa drug kho na zhes pa ni spang bya ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'o/ /grangs nges pa ni dngos po 'am bsam pa'i dbang bu'o/ /go rim ni thob bya'i dbang du ste 'di ltar drug kho na'o/ /gzhan yang ming dang dgos
208b2(rgyud 'grel): pa byed pa'o/ /tshad ste rnam pa bzhi kho na'o zhes pa la ming ni gsang pa 'dus pa'o/ /dgos pa skye'o 'dod chags can la sogs pa 'dul ba dang/ dngos grub gnyis thob pa'o/ /byed pa po ni drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'o/ /tshad ni le'u
208b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu bdun dang dum bu bcu bdun dang/ rim pa drug gam lnga'o// //yang na smin pa dang grol ba'i rim pa'o/ /yang na dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dbang dag dang/ dam tshig 'phrin las 'bras bu'o
208b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa rdul tshon la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ sgrub pa zhes bya ba yan lag bzhi grogs dang bcas pa 'am/ sbyor ba'i yan lag drug grogs dang bcas pa'o/ /dbang ni bum pa la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /dam tshig ni bzhi
208b5(rgyud 'grel): dang spyi dang khyad par gyi gsum mo/ /phrin las ni zhi ba la sogs pa'o/ /thob pa'i 'bras bu ni dngos grub rnam pa gnyis so/ /khongs su rten gyi gang zag brtan pa ste/ rnam pa bdun kho na'o/ /de ltar rtsa ba'i don phyin ci ma lor par
208b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan to/ /gang zhig mun pa 'dra ba'i sgron byed log rtog drab gcod/ /nyon mongs kun bral rtag tu dge ba'i chos kyi rgyan/ /sems can nyon mongs nyam thag gnas nas 'dren/ /dam pa klu zhes bya ba de la rtag tu dang pas phyag 'tshal lo/
208b7(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi bstod cing nyon mongs skye ba'i bdag po'i rkyen ma yin/ /rgyal ba yin ni sa rab dga' ba'i bdag ces lung bstan te/ /dam pa'i mchog gyur rgyal ba gnyis par grags/ /nyon mongs skyon bral klu sgrub mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// 
209a1(rgyud 'grel): zla grags nyon mongs log rtog thams cad gcod byed pa/ /smra mchog ral gri lta bu'i mnga' brnyes bdag po ste/ /rgyal bas lung bstan kun gyi snod gyur dam pa la/ /rab tu dang bas rtag tu phyag 'tshal
209a2(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /dbu ma chen po nam mkha' dri med bzhin du mngon gyur nas/ /thugs rje'i nyi mas sems can kun la phan byed cing/ /yon tan 'od kyi bde thob dbugs phyung dri med dga' ba'i mchog /dbu ma'i don la thogs
209a3(rgyud 'grel): med de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshe yi dbang thob yun rings du na gnas pa'i mthu snyems shing/ /snying rje'i stobs kyis dbang po mig sogs phangs pa med gtong ba/ /nyon mongs skyon bral sangs rgyas byang chub
209a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' yi/ /spyod pa rlabs chen bdag la dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems kyi bde ba mchog la rab tu gnas gyur cing/ /rgyal ba dri med blta bas mi ngoms sku la mnga' mdzad nas/ /rgyal ba de dag
209a5(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan ma lus thob gyur nas/ /bde chen sar gnas dngos grub kun bdag klu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi rtag tu dam pa'i don rtogs med cing nyon mongS klung chen na/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ma rgal phyir ni ma rig
209a6(rgyud 'grel): 'thoms gyur pas/ /shes rab zhan phyir rtsam par mi rigs gyur kyang blo dman la/ /phan phyir brtsams la nyes 'gyur 'gal ba ci mchis bzod par gsol/ /bdag gis 'di las dge ba'i rtsa ba ci thob pa/ /de ni
209a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams 'dir sems can thams cad la/ /dam bas mdzad pa'i bka' 'di rtag tu yun ring gnas gyur cig /'di la rten nas kun gyi bla med 'bras bu thob par shog// //
209b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'brel pa slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ /zung 'jug gsal ba zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen bo sgra gcan 'dzin dpal bshes gnyen gyis
209b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du / yu ga taM d+ha prakA sha nA ma She ka pra kri ya / bod skad du /zung du 'jug pa gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dbang gi bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur
209b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun tu stong ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la btud de/ /'phags pa klu sgrub gyis mdzad pa'i/ /dbang gi cho ga gsal bar bshad/ /de la 'di yi rim pa ni/ /tshes dang rgyu skar sogs dga' i tshe/ /
209b4(rgyud 'grel): slob mas thal sbyar btud pa yis/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags bya ste/ /skyabs gsum bzung ba nyid du bya/ /byang chub sems ni legs rten te/ /dge bsnyen sdom pa nyid dang yang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa dang/ /
209b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas gso sbyong nyid kyang blang/ /'di yi rjes mthun rim pa yang/ /rdo rje slob dpon tshul dam par/ /bsten te 'dir ni gzhung mangs pas/ /'jigs pa'i phyir ni ma bris so/ /de ltar byas nas bla ma la/ /bdag la dbang bskur
209b6(rgyud 'grel): stsol zhes gsol/ /de la dbang gi mdor bya ba'ang/ /dpal 'dus phyi ma ji bzhin te/ /dbang ni rnam gsum tha dad du/ /rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu brtag/ dang po bum pa'i dbang bskur te/ /gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang//
209b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum par shes rab ye shes te/ /bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no/ /de la phreng ba dang/ chu dang/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ rdo rje dang /dril bu dang /me long dang/ ming dang/ slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba rnams ni bum pa'i
210a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang ste dang po'o/ /kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi ser la? sbyin pa ni gsang ba'i dbang ste gnyis ba'o/ /rang byin gyis brlab pa mtshon pa'i phyir shes rab mtshon pa ni/ / shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ste gsum
210a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim par phreng ba dang/ chu dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ rdo rje dang /dril bu dang/ me long dang /ming dang/ slob dpon dang/ rjes su gsang ba ste
210a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams dang lhan cig gsang ba'i dbang thob nas/ bdag byin gyis brlab pa nye bar bstan pa'i phyir gsum pa shes rab ye shes blang bar bya'o/ /'od gsal ba mtshon par bya ba'i phyir slar yang shes rab de nyid rgyud pa'i shes rab
210a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ye shes ni bzhi pa'o/ /de dag nyid slob dpon gyi slar yang mngon par byang chub ba'i rim par byang chub sems ni rab 'bad pas/ /bum pa la sogs su bzhag ste/ /bla mas slob ma mchog la dbang/ /mtshan mo phyed nas brtse
210a5(rgyud 'grel): bas sbyin zhes gsungs so/ /dbang bskur ba 'di rnams kyang dkyil 'khor du bcug la sbyin par bya ste/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi tshul dam pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim pas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram bris sku la sogs pa yang rung
210a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ slob dpon snying rje dang ldan pas slob ma dam pa gzhug par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin gsum la gnas te phyi 'phred kyi dus su bum pa lhag par gnas bya'o/ /de la gser ram yang na dngul/ /zangs sam 'jim pa'i ngo bo
210a7(rgyud 'grel): 'ang rung/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i bum pa zhig /blangs te brtul zhugs can gyis bzhag /bum pa de dag nang nas ni/ /rnam rgyal mtshan nyid ldan par bya/ /sor mo brgyad kyi tshad kyis ni/ /mgrin pa mthong zhing rnam par mdzes/ /sor
210b1(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis kyis mchu 'phyang ba/ /lto ba'i rgyar ni mtho lnga'o/ /gal te de las tshang zhan na/ /yon bdag dge bar 'gyur ma yin/ /nag po rnam par spangs pa dang/ /rtsa ba dor zhing ma 'byar ba/ /bu ga rnam bar spangs pa dang/ /de bzhin
210b2(rgyud 'grel): gas? pa med pa gzung/ /baM gyi yi ge las byung ba/ /rin chen rnam par cher 'bar pa'o/ /gzhan pa rnams la des med de/ /ji ltar mdzes pa rab tu brtag rdul tshon la ni lha grangs sam/ /yang na bum ba lnga brgyad dgu /de skad du yang
210b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud las/ bum pa lnga 'am brgyad dgu ste/ tsan dan sogs kyis mngon par byugs nas ni/ /sna tshogs dri yi chu yi gtams pa la/ /zlum por byas te mngon par bsngags par bya zhes
210b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pas so/ /bris sku'i dkyil 'khor la ni bum pa gcig nyid yongs su gzung ste/ de'i gdong la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du ngos bzhi po rnams su zla ba'i dkyil
210b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi steng du 'khor lo dang/ rin po che'i steng du rin po che dang/ pad+ma dmar po'i steng du pad+ma dmar po dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du ral gri rnams so/ /yang na bgegs dgra la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sna tshogs rdo rje bri bar
210b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /bum ba lnga 'am brgyad dam dgu po rnams la go rim bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan par bya'o/ /byu ru dang ni dngul dang gser/ /pad+ma rA ga nya phyis skyes/ /bsngags pa'i rin chen rnam pa
210b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga/ /bum pa lto bar rab tu gzhug /nas gro ma sha'i sran ma dang/ /de bzhin til dang mung+ga rnams/ /so ba lnga por bsngags pa ste/ /bum pa'i lto bar gzhug par bya/ /bri haM ti dang tsher ma byed/ /gzhan gyis mi thub lhar?
211a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa/ /ud+pal? sdong du rtsa ba yis/ /sman lnga rab tu gzhug par bya/ /a mra u duM ba ra dang/ /mya ngan tshang dang a shwadtha/ /de bzhin klu skyes lo 'dab lngas/ /bum pa rnams kyis kha na rjes pa'o/ /bum pa rnams
211a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis mgrin pa ni/ /che zhing dkar ba'i ras kyi dkri/ cho ga mkhas pas mgul bcing ste/ /mdzes shing dkar ba'i srad bu dgod/ /de rjes cho ga bzhin du rnal 'byor pas/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lor gnas te gtor ma sbyin/ /ye shes
211a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ /gsang gtor la sogs dbul bar bya/ /dgug cing gzhug par bya ba dang/ /de bzhin bcing dang mnyes par bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho'i sgra brjod de/ mtshan ma'i nang du yongs su gzhug/ bum par gnas
211a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdza phor gyi/ /steng du rdo rje bzhag par bya/ /me tog phreng ba yang dag ldan/ /mnyam par bzhag ste gsang sngags bzla/ /me tog phreng ba dang bcas pa'i/ /mdza' mar dril bu gzung bar bya/ /gtsug tor rnam rgyal zhes
211a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba 'am/ /yang na phyir bzlog blo gros bzang/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha yang rung/ /brgya rtsa brgyad yin de bzhin du/ /las kun byed pa'i sngags kyis kyang/ /bum pa lhag par gnas par bya/ /de skad du yang bcom ldan
211a6(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud las/ gtsug tor rnam rgyal zhes bya ba 'am/ /yang na phyir bzlog pa yang rung/ /dge zhing zhi bar byed ba'i sngags/ /khrus kyi don du sngon
211a7(rgyud 'grel): par bsngags zhes gsungs so/ /'di ni bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de'i rjes su slob ma dang ldan blo gros can/ /don du gnyer zhing rigs las byung/ /nga rgyal med cing 'dod bral ba/ /sngags kyi sal bar ldan
211b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la/ /lag tu me tog phreng gtad de/ /bus mo'i lha nga btsugs nas su/ /dkyil 'khor mngon du byas nas kyang/ /snga ma bzhin du lhag gnas bya/ /gsol ba gdab pa byas nas kyang/ /legs par bshad pa nyan du
211b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhug /slob dpon sbyor bar ba mkhas pas/ /tshigs su bcad pa bshad par bya/ /de la 'dis gsol ba gdab ste/ mA ma kI dang rab 'byor pa'i/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa ste/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po
211b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po
211b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /de skad gsol te slob ma la/ /legs bshad 'di ni brjod bar bya/ /sngags kyi dngos grub don gnyer gang/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug bya ste/ /bsod nams 'dod pas de las gzhan/ /gzhan
211b5(rgyud 'grel): dag 'jig rten pha rol gnyer/ /dad pa chen po ldan bya ste/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer na/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor gzhug bya ste/ /'di yis 'bras bu 'dod mi bya/ /gal te 'di la dmigs gyur na/ /'jig rten pha rol 'byung ma yin//
211b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer ba'i/ /mi la 'di 'bras ma lus 'grub ces brjod la de'i rjes su sngags pas mi bskyod sbyor ldan pas/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' i 'od zer gyis/ /slob ma bkug te de nyid la/ /blo gros ldan pas bcug
211b7(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas su/ /lha mo'i pad nang byang sems kyi/ /zhu ba yis ni dbang bskur te// shar gyi sgo ruAng bzhag pa bya/ /slob ma thams cad phyogs pa la/ /slob ma gcig ni gtsor byas te/ rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa yis
212a1(rgyud 'grel): zlar yang tshig 'di sgrag par bya/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po la/ /khyed ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /dus gsuM du ni legs 'byung ba'i/ /sku gsung
212a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mnyam med pa/ /rdo rje sngags kyi stobs kyi thob/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba mnyam med pa/ /drag pa chen po bdud kyi sde/ /stobs chen dag kyang de yi bcom/ /shAkya seng ge mchog la sogs/ /
212a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mthun par gshegs nas kyang/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas blo gros ldan pa yis/ /byang chub sems sogs slob ma la/ /de tshe
212a4(rgyud 'grel): rim pa 'di nyid ni/ /lan gsum brjod de sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol/ /bdag med 'di zhes bya ba ni/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /byang chub snying por mchis
212a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi bar/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon rnams dang/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni brlab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems
212a6(rgyud 'grel): can don byed tshul khrims bsrung/ /so sor bstan por bdag gis bzung/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ /sdom pa deng nas bdag gis
212a7(rgyud 'grel): bzung/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re
212b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing ni dus drug tu/ /zang zing mi 'jigs dam chos dang/ /byams pa rin chen rigs mchog gis/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung pa'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /
212b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du so sor gzung/ /mchod pa'i las ni ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis
212b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus bzung/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gi bsgral/ /ma grol ba ni bdag gis grol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing/ /sems
212b4(rgyud 'grel): can mya ngan 'das las dgod ces so/ /de nas big+h+nAM taM krita ces bya ba'i sngags kyi bsrungs la/ de rnams kyi mgo bo dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying ga'i phyogs su gnas pa'i 'khor lo dkar po dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ rdo rje nag
212b5(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyi dbus su oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge ? bsgom par bya'o/ /de las langs te slob dpon gyi de'i mgo bo dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying ga'i phyogs su rdo rje yongs su gtugs te/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes brjod la spyi bor me tog
212b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mdun du bdug spos dang mar me'o/ /snying gar dri yis byug par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la chu ru sor mo bcu gnyis la 'o ma can gyi shing la byung/ /ma gas? rtse mo me tog bzang/ /sar pa sngags 'das bza' bar bya/ /a
212b7(rgyud 'grel): badzra hA sa hA(rgyud 'grel): dang po byang du mngon phyogs la/ /sa la bgegs dgras mngon sngags nas/ /ba lang ko lpags tsam byugs te/ /de nas so shing rma med par/ /zos te phyi nas dor bar bya/ /bla mas phyogs kyi cha dbye bas/
213a1(rgyud 'grel): zhi la sogs pa rjes su bstan/ /gal te de ni steng phyogs te/ /gnas na rig 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la bla mas yang dag bstan/ /gal te mngon par phyogs lhung na/ /mchog 'grub par ni shes
213a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /so shing dor ba brgya lam na/ /gal te thur du bltas lhung na/ /de ni nges par sa 'og gi/ dngos grub 'byung la rtag mi dgos/ /de nas bi gi yi ge las byung ba'i chus sngags 'dir 'thar 'thung bya ste/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): su bi
213a3(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha d+harma sarba pA pa ni tsA sya baM sho d+ha ya sarba bi? kalbAM a pa na ya hUM(rgyud 'grel): de nas ku sha kha ba can/ /nyes pa spangs pa blangs nas su/ /mal stan dang ni sngas kyi phyir/ slob ma la ni sngags 'dis sbyin/ /oM badzra tik+ShaM ba bu mos bka' 
213a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skud pa ni/ /gsum sgril mdud pa gsum pa la/ /sngags 'dis mngon par bsngags nas su/ /rang gi dpung pa g.yas par bcing/ /oM bud d+ha mai tri rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba na swA hA/ de nas de yi snying ga mgrin/ /mgo la rim bzhin
213a5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma yis/ /rdo rje chus skyes 'khor lo rnams/ /yi ge gsum las byung ba bsgom/ /slar yang yi ge gsum bzlas pa'i/ /dri yi chu ni legs sbyangs pa/ /de nyid rigs pas sngags 'di yis/ /sdig pa sbyang phyir blud par
213a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /oM h+riM(rgyud 'grel): su baM shud+d+ha d+harmA sarba pA pa ni tsA sya bi shud+d+ha sarba bi kalpAn a pa na ya hUM/ de nas de nyid rig pa yis/ /de nyid don ni dran pa dang/ /sems kyi g.yeng bzhi bya'i phyir/ /slob ma la ni dam chos bshad//
213a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag /u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gis mnyaM
213b1(rgyud 'grel): med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos bstan pa/ /bden pa gnyis la yang dag rten/ /'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang/ /dam pa'i don gyi bden pa'o/ /zab cing rgya che zhes bshad pa/ rnam
213b2(rgyud 'grel): par rtog med zab pa ste/ /rgya che sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/ /'di ni bden pa gnyis su bshad/ /kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don/ /phye ste so sor shes nas su/ /de nas gcig tu 'dres byas pa'i/ /zag med go 'phang thob par bya//
213b3(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/ /sngon du sdig pa byas pa gang/ /dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ma thag/ de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /gang gis spyod pa'i mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu dri med na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung
213b4(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ /ngan 'gro de yis gcod par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa bla med di ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pas/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin par/ /bdag
213b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid chen po khyed gnas te/ /gang gis khyed rnams theg chen du/ /sang ni rab tu skye 'gyur ba/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur
213b6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar yang dag bstan byas na/ /ku sha bkram la nyal du gzhug /mtshan ma mthong ba gang yin pa/ /de kun snga dro nga la smros/ /'di ni slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /snga dro dge mi dge thos te/ /dge bar gyur na dga' ba
213b7(rgyud 'grel): spel/ /rmi lam dag pa ma yin pa/ /bdag med bshad de rnam par sbyang/ /de nas slob dpon rang gi lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas gtor ma byin la big+h+nAM ta krit ces bya ba'i sngags kyi slob ma bsrungs te/ ras ris la sogs
214a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dkyil 'khor la bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i don du rgya chen po'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la /rang nyid dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs te/ 'chad par 'gyur pa'i phreng ba dang/ tshul sogs pa'i
214a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba rnams bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po las bla dbang bya'o/ /de nas slob ma gzhug don du/ rang nyid kyis ni thal sbyar te/ /bden ba'i byin brlabs sngon 'gro bas/ /'khor lo cha la mkhyen? par gsol//
214a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal ba las yang dag byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po/ /gzugs brnyan gyis ni dpe yang ste/ /dkyil 'khor yang ni da dang mtshungs/ /bden pa 'di yis slob ma rnams/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu gzhug/ 'khor
214a4(rgyud 'grel): lo rdzu 'phrul ma lus pa/ /mthong na sdig pa mdza' dag spong/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rdo rje ye shes sgrub byed pa/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /chos kyis dbyings kyis
214a5(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs dang/ /dam tshig dran par byas pa las/ /zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad gsol/ /slob ma shar sgor bkug nas kyang/ /bum pa'i chu yis bskang nas su/ /gdong dar blangs
214a6(rgyud 'grel): te sngags 'di yis/ /de la bcings pa nyid du bya/ /oM tsa k+Shu band+ha ba ra mA na ye hUM /oM pra bi sha b+ha ga wanma hA su kha mok+Sha su raM sarba sid+d+hi su khaM pra daM pa ra ma su khaM ud+d+ha ma sid+hya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): pra sid+hya swa/ phyi rol yol bas g.yog
214a7(rgyud 'grel): pa las? slob ma yis ni yon phul te/ /bla mas rab tu dang sems kyi/ /rtag pa'i gzugs su rnam par bsam/ /de la A(rgyud 'grel): khaM bi ra hUM sngags kyis/ /me tog phreng bar rab bzang po/ /gus pas me tog dor don du/ /'bad pas blo
214b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'dzin du gzhug/ de nas slob ma bzang po la/ /khyod su ci la dga' zhes dri/ /slob ma yin kyang de rjes su/ /bskal bzang bdag yin bde chen la'o/ /zhes smras slob mas thal sbyar te/ /mnyam pa'i rkang bas gnas pa la/ /tshigs su bcad
214b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di brjod pas/ /byang chub sems ni slar yang sbyin/ /dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rje yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung/ /de nas slob ma de nyid
214b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /sngon du mi bskyod par mos te/ /rdo rje thal sbyor dge ba yis/ /lag pa brkyang ste gsang sngags 'di/ /brjod de rab tu 'dud par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga pU dzo pas+tha nA ya At+ma ni niryA ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ rin
214b4(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung par bsam nas ni/ /slar yang thal mo snying gar dgug/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'don pa yis/ /sngags pas 'dud pa byed du gzhug/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She kA ya At+ma naM niryA ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ratna a b+hi
214b5(rgyud 'grel): shiny+tsa maM/ de nas 'od dpag med bsam ste/ thal mo spral bar sbyar nas su/ /sngags brjod bla mas slob ma ni/ /phyag 'tshal gsum pa byed du gzhug/ oM sarba ha thA ga pU dzA pra brtan yAt+ma ni? niryA ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harmA pra
214b6(rgyud 'grel): bar ta ya maM/ de nas don yod bsam pa yis/ /btud de snying gar thal sbyar te/ /blo dang ldan pas gsang sngags 'dis/ /phyag 'tshal bzhi pa byed du gzhug/ oM sarba ta thA ga pU dzA karma Na At+ma naM na ryI ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma
214b7(rgyud 'grel): ku ru mAM/ sems ma rdo rje bsdams pa yis/ /me tog phreng ba mchog gzung nas/ /sa ma ye stwaM zhes brjod de/ /brtan pa'i sna ni rab tu sbyin/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las dbu ma gtso mor sbyar ba ni sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM satwa badzri
215a1(rgyud 'grel): a d+hi hiSh+Tha swa mAM hUM/ da khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyi/ ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci
215a2(rgyud 'grel): dgos/ de lta bu'i rdo rje ye shes ngas khyad la bskyed par byas/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar ma byed cig khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes brjod do/ /yang bla mas phyag rgya de nyid slob ma'i
215a3(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor btugs te/ slar yang 'di skad ces brjod la rdo rje'i mna' brtan par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje ste/ /gal te tshul 'di suAng rung ba la smras na 'dis khyod kyis mgo bo 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /slar yang bla
215a4(rgyud 'grel): mas slob ma yi/ /snying gar phyag rgya bzhag nas ni/ /da dung du yang rdo rje'i mna'/ /gsang sngags 'di yis bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag gnas par 'gyur/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni//
215a5(rgyud 'grel): de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /de nas dud chen por bzhag pa/ /yi ge gsum gyi rdo rje'i chu/ /mngon par bsngags te byin nas ni/ /mna' yi btung ba nyid du bya/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par
215a6(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub pa yi/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung zhig/ oM badzro da ka Tha(rgyud 'grel): slob mas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs te/ /gus bcas lag pa bzung nas ni/ /dbyangs 'di gsal bar brjod pa yi/ /mnga' yi dam pa nyan
215a7(rgyud 'grel): du gzhug/ ded phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis ngas 'di byos shig bya ba de khyod kyi bya dgos so/ /khyod kyi nga la brnyas par ma byed cig byas na khyod yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta
215b1(rgyud 'grel): re zhes brjod do/ /'di ni dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa'o/ /de nas gal te slob dpon gyis 'bebs pa'i cho ga'i nus pa thob par gyur na/ de lta na grub pa'i slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyis rnam par spel ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis cho gas dbab ste /de nas 'dir ni ma smras//
215b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas dkyil 'khor du gzhug par 'dod pas/ khyod kyi mig lam na snang ba ji lta bu zhes dris ste/ des dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang nag por snod zhes smra na/ zhi ba la sogs pa 'grub pa'i skal pa dang ldan par bshad de/ g.yas nas
215b3(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba yang byed du bcug la bden pa'i byin brlabs brjod par bya ste/ yang dag dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /bsod nams ji bzhin lha rnams kyi/ /rigs kyi rim pa'ang de bzhin shog/ ji ltar 'dir ni 'grub
215b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i/ /gang gi rigs kyi snod gyur dang/ /ji lta'i bsod nams mthu yod pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin shog/ ces brjod do/ /de nas me tog gi phreng ba sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor du dor bar bya ste tiSh+Tha badzra dri Dho me b+hA ba shA shwa to me
215b5(rgyud 'grel): b+hA ba h+ri nga yaM me a b+hi tiSh+Tha sarba? sid d+hiM me pra yats+tsha hUM ha ha ha ha ho/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): khaM bI ra hUM pra tIts+tsha ku su ma any+dza? li nA tha ho/ /me tog dor nas mchog dang tha ma'i dngos grub mtshon par bya ste/ de la gang gi tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbu 'am
215b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzod spu'i gtsug tor la lhung na ni de'i tshe phyag rgya chen po 'grub po/ /gang gi cho spyan nam zhal la lhud na de'i tshe gsang sngags 'grub po/ /sku'i stod kyis mchog dang/ sku'i dbus kyi 'bring dang/ sku'i smad kyis tha ma dang/ gzugs brnyan las
215b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byangs na ring la/ nye na myur du 'grub pa rnams dang/ /lha rnams kyi rang gi gnas dang re mig la sogs par rnam par bcad de shes par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe lha gnyis kyi bar du lhung na de'i tshe gang la nye ba de'i rigs su 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor
216a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyi rol tu lhung na dngos grub phra mo 'grub po/ /gang gi tshe rtsig pa la lhung na slar yang dor bar bya'o/ /lan gsum gyi bar du dor kyang de nyid du lhung na 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i ra ba'i pha rol tu lhung na dngos
216a2(rgyud 'grel): grub 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /lte ba la lhung na shin tu dkar bas 'grub bo/ /'di ni me tog dor ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas de'i mig la phreng ba sngags 'dis bcing par bya ste/ pra ti grih+Na twaM mi maM satwa mahA ba laM/ 'di ni phreng ba'i dbang bskur ro/ /de
216a3(rgyud 'grel): skad du 'ang grub pa'i slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyi zhal snga nas kyis/ mkhas pas rigs kyi bye brag dag/ me tog dor la shes par bya/ /sngags dang bcas pas phreng ba yi/ /dbang bskur ba ni spyi bor sbyin zhes gsungs so/ /slob ma
216a4(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa rnam spangs pa'i/ /mi gnyis oM yi gi mnan te/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos sngags 'di yis/ /gdong g.yogs rab tu dgrol bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed pa ni brtson par mdzad/ /phye bas thams
216a5(rgyud 'grel): cad mthong 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la ltos shig dang/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyed ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /he badzra pA sh+ya/ dkyil 'khor
216a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi ni go rim bzhin/ /de nas de nyid rab tu bshad/ /de nas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /rang gi ngo bo 'ang nye bar bstan/ /logs bzhi 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa gru bzhi'o/ /sgo rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po ste//
216a7(rgyud 'grel): re re 'ang rnam pa bzhir shes bya/ /dad pa'i dbang po la sogs sems/ /rtsig pa lngar ni 'gyur ba'o/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni/ /sgo khyud rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /de yis dbus kyi 'khor lo gang/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu ste//
216b1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rnam pa mthar pa brgyad/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi khang chen gyi/ /ka bar gyur pa thams cad du/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /ka ba brgyad ces bya bar bshad/ /chos kyi de nyid don
216b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brda/ /'khor lo'i nang gi don gyi'o/ /sems kyi dkyil 'khor gang yin nyid/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ ces bya ba dang/ de nas 'khor lo'i gtso bo nas/ /brtsams te gnod mdzes par gyi lha/ /rdo rje can gyis slob ma
216b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /de nyid rnam bzhi ji bzhin blta/ /de la dbus kyi mi bskyod pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad do/ /tshor ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /'du shes ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /'du byed ni
216b4(rgyud 'grel): don yod grub pa'o/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams ni sa'i khams ni spyan no/ /chu ni mA ma ki'o/ /me ni gos dkar mo'o/ /rlung ni sgrol ma'o/ /'phar ma gnyis pa'i me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su yul gzugs ni gzugs rdo rje ma'o//
216b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra ni sgra rdo rje ma'o/ /dri ni dri rdo rje ma'o/ /ro ni ro rdo rje ma'o/ /reg ni reg rdo rje ma'o/ /'phar ma gsum pa la mig sa'i snying po'i/ /rna ba phyag na rdo rje'o/ /sna nam mkha' i snying po'o/ /lce 'jig rten dbang phyug go/ yid 'jam pa'i dbyangs so/ /lus
216b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o/ /mgo byams pa'o/ /tshigs thams cad kun tu bzang po'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa gshin rje'i gshed do/ /g.yon pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /kha rga? mgrin no rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o/ /dpung pa
216b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa ma g.yo ba'o/ /g.yon pa 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /rje dar g.yas pa dbyig sngon can no/ /g.yon pa stobs po che'o/ /spyi gtsug gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba'o/ /rkang pa'i mdza' ni mdzes rgyal pa'o/ /mi bskyod la sogs 
217a1(rgyud 'grel): go rim bzhin/ /lus kyi 'khor lor son pa ste/ de nas phyi yi 'khor lo ni/ /slob ma gcig nas brtsams te bstan/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga'o/ /chu yi dbang ni rab sgrub phyir/ /sngags pa yis ni shar
217a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs sam/ /dbang ldan du yang dkyil 'khor bri/ /gru bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi pa/ /khru do ba dang 'phar ma gnyis/ /de dbus sna tshogs pad+ma ni/ /rdul tshon dkar po dmar po dang/ /de bzhin nag po rnams kyis bya/ /re ba rnam pa gsum byas te/
217a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi po dgod par bya/ /shar du rdo rje lhor rin chen/ /nub tu chu skyes ge sar bzang/ /sna tshogs rdo rje nor sbyin du/ /legs par bkod de bum pa bzhag/ 'di ni khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/ /de nas chu yi dbang bskur phyir//
217a4(rgyud 'grel): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha da ni/ /sa la legs par gtsugs nas kyang/ /me tog snyim pa dang bcas te/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di yis ni/ /bla ma rdo rje gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /mchod rten ji ltar gsol
217a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ltar/ /bdag kyang skyab pa'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje deng bdag gsol/ /phreng ba'i dbang bskur byas pa yi/ /slob ma dkyil 'khor du bcug ste/ /rtag pa'i nga rgyal 'dzin pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag nas ni/ /slob
217a6(rgyud 'grel): dpon tshogs pa dang bcas pas/ /rdo rje slob ma dbang bskur bya/ /bum pa bzung ste bkra shis pa'i/ /tshigs su bcad pa thog mar bklag/ til gyi gzugs brnyan ltar gang ba'i/ /rgyal ba bum pa 'dzin pa yis/ /de ring
217a7(rgyud 'grel): khyod la dbang rab bskur/ /de ltar shes nas yid bder bgyis/ /rdo rje khu tshur dang bcas pa'i/ /lo 'dab bum pa'i chu yi blugs/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ste/ /khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pas/ /sangs rgyas
217b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gsang gsum pa'i/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par byas/ /oM mahA su kha badzra satwa a b+hi she ke Na twAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi sarba ta thA ga ta at+ti pa ti tre ni ba drii d+ha b+ha ba/ bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /kun gyi bdag nyid
217b2(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i rigs rnams kyi ni rje/ sems can ma lus sems bskyed bde ba chen po ste/ /bkra shis des ni di ring khyod la dbang rab bskur/ /bkra shis gang zhig ma lus rdo rje'i rigs dang ldan/ /? bas zil mnan skye bo rnam par
217b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod byed pa/ /mi bskyod mgon po zhes byar mtshan gsol de yi ni/ /bkra shis des ni di ring khyod la dbang rab bskur/ /bkra shis gang zhig mdza' dag 'khor lor rigs dang ldan/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rtag 'phrog
217b4(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /rmongs pas zil mnan skye bo yongs su spyod mdzad pa/ /bkra shis des ni de ring khyed la dbang rab bskur/ /bkra shis gang zhig ma lus rin chen rigs dang ldan/ /phongs pa'i sdug bsngal 'grol bar yongs su rab brtsam zhing/ /khengs pa zil
217b5(rgyud 'grel): mnan 'gro ba yongs su spyod mdzad pa/ /bkra shis nges ni de ring khyed la dbang rab bskur/ /bkra shis gang zhig ma lus pad+ma'i rigs dang ldan/ /'jig rten dbang phyug srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po/ /chags pas zil mnan 'gro ba yongs su spyod mdzad
217b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /bkra shis de ni de ring khyed la dbang rab bskur/ /bkra shis gang zhig ma lus las kyi rigs dang ldan/ /brtse ba'i bdag nyid log par lta ba nges par spong/ /de spyod thabs ston de ni kun nas sel mdzad pa/ /bkra shis de ni de ring khyad la dbang
217b7(rgyud 'grel): rab bskur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas/ /de ring khyed la dbang bskur ro/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM su ra ta stwaM a haM/ 'di ni chu'i dbang bskur ba ste me long lta bu'i ye shes so/ /chu yi dbang bskur thob pa yi/ /khrus kyi dkyil 'khor las
218a1(rgyud 'grel): brgal te/ /rgyan rnams thams cad rab bzung bas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'gram nyid du/ /rgyal po'i rgyan gyis rnams brgyan te/ /gdugs dkar po ni bzung ba la/ /dbyangs 'di yis ni dga' bar bya/ /bde ba chen
218a2(rgyud 'grel): po 'dod chags che/ /rdo rje chen po nor che ba/ /shes rab chen po ye shes che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng bdag bsgrub/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje che/ /dngos grub kun gyis bde ster ba/ /kun gyi dbang bskur rang don du/ /rdo rje dbang phyug bla na
218a3(rgyud 'grel): med/ /dza a A i bud+d+ha par martha de ha o/ dzra a kA ma mok+Sha d+harma d+ha a o dza a pany+tsa dz+nyA na su ra a sa mA ha a o/ /dza ya badzdza pa Ni mahA su ha Na ha o/ /phyi nas bla ma dkyil 'khor la/ /'dir ni bskor ba lan gsum bya/ /gser
218a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs las ni bsgrubs pa yi/ /cod pan gtso bo la bzhag ste/ /de yi phyag rgya'i gos kyis kyang/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i sbyor ldan pas/ /de nas shar gyi sgo drung du/ 'jam pa'i stan la rab bsdad de/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur
218a5(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /bla mas slob ma dbang bskur bya/ /mgo bo'i dbus dang dpral ba dang/ /de bzhin mgo bo'i logs gnyis dang/ /rgyab duAng phyag rgya bzhag nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /rdo rje thal sbyar mthe bo dag /dpa' bo'i
218a6(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung nyid du bskum/ /rtse mo rtse mo mnyam par sbyar/ /bar ma mchog gi yan lag kyang/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi phyag rgyar bshad/ /de'i sngags ni/ oM badzra d+d+ha dwI shwa ri a b+hi Shiny+tsa a:rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /lag gnyis rdo rje
218a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdams pa'i rgya/ /de yi dbus ma rtse sbyar bya/ /sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin/ /de'i sngags ni/ oM satwa badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ de nyid las gung mo'i tshigs dbu ma bcag pa ni rin chen rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni/ oM ratna bidzra
218b1(rgyud 'grel): ab+hi Shiny+tsa? twAM/ de nyid las gung mo pad+ma'i rnam pa ltar byas pa ni chos kyi rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni/ oM d+harmA badzri a b+hi Shiny+tsa h+rI:de nyid las dbu ma'i rtse mo cag pa ral gri ste/ las kyi rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni oM karmma badzri a b+hi
218b2(rgyud 'grel): Shiny+tsa taM/ dbang bskur ba yi rim 'di yis/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan la/ /dar dbyangs mngon par dbyangs nas su/ /mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya/ /badzra tuSh+ya ho:'di ni cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba ste mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so/ /de rjes
218b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med bdag tu/ /dmigs te slob ma'i snying ga ru/ /rdo rje gtad de rdo rje yis/ /mgrin gtsug gtugs te 'di skad brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /legs
218b4(rgyud 'grel): par grub phyir rdo rje zung/ /rdo rje lag pa g.yas par sbyin/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin bdag gi/ dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ste/ zhes sogs brjod pa sngon 'gro bas/ /lha'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa/ /slob ma rdo rje bgyings te gzung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i ting
218b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje de nyid gsor bar bya/ /'di ni rdo rje'i dbang ste so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /don yod grub pa'i gzugs su ni/ /slob ma cho ga bzhin du bsam/ /A:yig las byung dril bu slar/ slob ma la ni 'bad pas sbyin/ /de nas bla mas
218b6(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs pa'i/ /dril bu blangs nas dang phor ni/ /rang gi lag nyid kyis dkrol te/ /tshigs bcad 'di ni brjod par bya/ /zla ba'i 'od can ye shes sku mnga' rgyal ba'i cod pan 'dzin pa pad zla'i gdan la bzhugs/ /gdug pa rnams ni
218b7(rgyud 'grel): gdul ba'i don du srid gsum 'dul mdzad bsdigs pa'i de nyid rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bskul phyir de kho na nyid so sor sgrogs pa'i chos nyid dril bu 'khrol/ /dngos po kun gyi ngo bo ma lus stong pa'i bcom ldan gang yin de ni rgyal
219a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /de nas slar yang phab nas su/ /rked pa'i phyogs su rnam bzhag ste/ /snyems pas rdo rje bzung nas kyang/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod bya/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya ma nu pa la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ DiDho me d+ha ba/ su
219a2(rgyud 'grel): to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+haM me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karmA su tsa me/ tsi taM sh+rI ya:ku ru hUM/ha ha ha ha ho:b+ha ga wa na sarba ta thA ga tA badzra mA ma mu ? badzri b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa a:aoM badzrA d+ha ? a:bdag gi
219a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan gzung lags kyis/ /bcom ldan bdag la nye bar gyur/ /slob dpon gyis oM badzra a d+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badzra hI/ sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni dril bu'i dbang bskur ba ste bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so/ /de'i rjes
219a4(rgyud 'grel): la gser ram yang na dngul gyi ni/ /snod du mig sman bzhag pa la/ /thur ma'ang de yi rang bzhin gyis/ /de nyid rigs pas sngags 'dis brjod/ /badzra ne tra a pa ha ra pa Ta laM h+ri:ji ltar sman pa'i rgyal po yi/ /thur mas 'jig rten ling tog
219a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /sgrib g.yogs rgyal ba rnams kyi bsal/ /de nas A:yi yi ge yis/ /mngon par bsngags pa'i me long blangs/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod de/ /rdo rje slob ma la bstan bya/ /chos rnams
219a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las la kun tu 'byung/ /ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa/ /de ltar chos rnams shes gyis la/ /sems can don ni bla med byos//
219a7(rgyud 'grel): 'on kyang skyob pa'i sras su skye/ /'di ni me long gi dbang bskur ba'o/ /mi bskyod gzugs su dmigs nas su/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu sbyin/ /de yi mgo la gtugs nas su/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur te/ oM badzra satwa twaM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badzra nA
219b1(rgyud 'grel): ma a b+hi She ka ta /kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sa ma ya sid+d+hi sa ma ya stwaM b+hud:b+hu ba:sra(rgyud 'grel): a:de la rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i ming du bya ste/ mi bskyod pa'i rnams ni bzhad pa'i rdo rje dang/ /sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang/
219b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med rdo rje dang /mi phyed rdo rje dang/ dga' rab rdo rje dang/ rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams so/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi ming rnams ni gti mug rdo rje dang/ oM snang mdzad rdo rje dang/ rtag pa'i rdo rje dang/ sgyu 'phrul rdo rje zhes bya
219b3(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa rnams so/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ming rnams ni yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang/ mkha' rdo rje dang/ gzi brjid rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams so/ /'od dpag tu med pa'i ming rnams ni 'dod chags rdo rje dang/ spyan ras gziD
219b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang /chos kyi rdo rje dang/ pad+ma rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams so/ /don yod grub pa'i ming rnams ni rta mchog rdo rje dang/ dam tshig rdo rje dang/ las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams so/ /mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi lha mo'i ming
219b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni rdo rje bdag med ma dang rdo rje lag pa ma dang/ rdo rje phreng ba ma dang/ rdo rje 'byung gnas ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams so/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi lha mo rnams kyi ming rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang/ rdo rje sgeg mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa
219b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /rin po che'i lha mo rnams kyi ming ni rdo rje do shal ma dang rdo rje dbugs dbyung ma dang rdo rje 'bar ma dang/ rdo rje phreng ma la sogs pa rnams so/ /'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs kyi lha mo rnams ni rdo rje chags pa ma dang/ /rdo rje dbyangs ma dang
219b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje blo gros ma dang/ rdo rje gos dkar mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams so/ /don yod grub pa'i rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyi rdo rje snyems ma dang/ rdo rje sgyu 'phrul ma dang/ rdo rje dgod ma dang/ rdo rje sgrol ma la sogs pa rnams/ /'di ni ming
220a1(rgyud 'grel): gi dbang bskur ba ste/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/ /'khor dang ni rin chen dang/ /de bzhin pad+ma rdo rje rnams/ /tshigs bcad 'di dag brjod pa yis/ /mtshams ma'i dbang bskur sbyin
220a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /rgyas par gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
220a3(rgyud 'grel): po chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor cig/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul ba yi/ /sangs rgyas rin chen rab tu ston/ /oM badzra ratna sarba d+harma bi shud+d+ha dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka
220a4(rgyud 'grel): prA pa ta oM oM oM/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul ba yi/ /'dod chags dag pa rab tu ston/ /oM badzra d+harmA sarba bi shud+d+ha dz+nyA na rA ga pad+ma da la swa b+hA wa /h+rI:a'a:
220a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje mchod pa rab tu bskor/ /oM badzra karma sarba d+harma bi shud+d+ha dz+nyA na sarba pU dza swa b+hA wa a/de'i rjes su slob dpon rang gi
220a6(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i lha'i tshogs nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bgreng bas brgyan la/ shar gyi sgor seng ge'i
220a7(rgyud 'grel): khril bzhag ste/ sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du rdo rje sems dpa' i gzugs su rnam par bsam la/ /rdo rje'ang hUM gi yi ge las byung bar bsgoms te thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba ste
220b1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems ma'i bdag po dag/ bcom ldan 'das dang po mchog gi skyes bu zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes su A yi yi ge las byung ba'i dril bu lag pa g.yon par byin te /'di de
220b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyed kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyi srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems ldan pa'i/ /srid
220b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dam pa byed par 'gyur zhes brjod la slob mas kyang dkrol bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes su yid kyi lus ni bstan bya'i phyir/ /phyag rgya dam tshig ces su bshad/ /lus kun bstan par byed pas na/ /de phyir phyag rgya zhes su bsgrags zhes bya ba 'dis rang
220b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs nang gi bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas 'khyud par bsams la/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ste/ /khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas
220b5(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba sbyin par bya zhes brjod do/ /de skad du yang shes rab bcu drug lon pa la/ /lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor ba/ /slob dpon dbang du yang dag 'dod/ /ces gsungs so/ /de ltar rdo rje slob dpon gyi
220b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang gi mthar thug pa ni thams cad du bum pa'i bya ba kho na 'jug pas na bum pa'i dbang zhes bya ste dang po'o// //rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang zhes kyang brjod do/ /dbang bskur ba de dag gis kyang
220b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang rgyud nyan pa dang/ bshad pa dang/ gsang sngags sgrub pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /de rjes bla mas rtag pa yi/ /gzugs su legs par rab dmigs te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa'i/ /rjes su gnang ba slob mar sbyin/ /phreng ba 
221a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs dbang rnams kyi/ /dbang bskur nga yis byin pa yis/ /sdig pa thams cad rnams spangs te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mdun na gnas/ /da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon te/ /sngags dang rgyud rnams 'dzin
221a2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kyis kyang mthun par bsams/ /khyod ni bdud rnams las rgyal te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /seng ge'i spyod pa legs spyad pas/ /khyod kyis sems
221a3(rgyud 'grel): can don rnams byos/ /chos rnams kun la ser sna dang/ /sems can rnams la mi phan gang/ /nyam da shin tu chen yang/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi bya/ /'di la the tshom ma mi bya ste/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyis mchog/ /myam med khyed
221a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsgrag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bri bya ste/ /slob ma yongs su bsdu bar gyis/ /dog pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /slob ma rnams la dbang bskur yang/ /brtul zhugs brtan pas 'jig rten dang/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i
221a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub sgrubs/ /de nyid rig pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dngos grub de rnams thams cad 'byung/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis byin brlabs dang/ /dam tshig rnams kyang skyangs pa dang/ /khyod rtag bla ma la gus pas/ /de ltar byas
221a6(rgyud 'grel): nas sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes brjod/ /des na byas pa gzo ba yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang khyod la bsrung/ /de nas slob mas bla ma la/ /lus btud nas ni phyag 'tshal te/ /snying gar thal mo sbyar ba
221a7(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /de kun bgyi zhes brjod par bya/ /slob ma rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas slob ma mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su lhag par mos la/ rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems
221b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i phyag na bsnams/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan zhes bya ba 'dis hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje byin la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzras ma yA a d+hi tiSh+Tha e Sha t+thaM d+ha ra yI ma hi hi hi hi hUM(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa brjod de
221b2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma rdo rje'i brtul zhugs 'dzin du gzhug go /'di ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o/ /de nas bla mas mchog sbyin pas/ /slob ma spro bas lung bstan bya/ /rang nyid de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /slob ma rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag g.yon pa
221b3(rgyud 'grel): yis ni chos gos gzung/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin ldan pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ /lhan cig tshigs bcad 'di brjod pas/ /'dir ni khyod la ngas lung bstan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
221b4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa shin tu dag pas na/ /srid pa'i don 'gro rnams las bton/ /kye dpal che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sid+d+hi sa ma ya stwaM b+hurbu wa:swa:zhes lung bstan to/ /gang la phyag rgya 'dis lung bstan par byas pa de la de
221b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis mgrin cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par mdzad de/ phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis
221b6(rgyud 'grel): mthu dang sngags 'di'i stobs yin no zhes slob ma la brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni lung bstan pa'o/ /de'i rjes su mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyas mahA sa ma ya ha na hUM phaT/ ces brjod la dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil
221b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'dir /zhugs pa dang ni mthong ba yis/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol te/ /de ring khyed rnams bde bar gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /phyi nas 'chi ba yod ma yin/ /srid pa shin tu dag pas na/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal rnams
222a1(rgyud 'grel): las grol/ /byang chub sems ni rnam mi spang/ /rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya ni/ /gang zhig bskyed pa nyid tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/ /dam pa'i chos la smad mi bya/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya ste/ /mi
222a2(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'am gti mug gis/ /rnam par bstan par bya ma yin/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang/ /phyag rgya 'ang nam yang smad mi bya/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /rang gi bdag nyid yongs btang ste/ /dka' 
222a3(rgyud 'grel): thub kyis kyang gdung mi bya/ /ji ltar bde bar bde bzung na/ /'di na ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'di ni dbugs dbyung sbyin pa'o/ /'dir phreng ba nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang gi bar bya ba'i rgyud rnams su yang mi 'gal te/ 'jam
222a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi rgyud la sogs pa rnams su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de dag kyang rjes su gnang ba la sogs pa bzhi po slob dpon gyi dbang gi sngon nam phyi nas kyang sbyin du rung ste/ de yang rnal 'byor
222a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rgyud rnams la mi 'gal lo/ /de lta bu bum pa'i dbang bskur bas sku rdo rje rnam par sbyangs nas de'i rjes su dbang bskur ba gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i rim pa bshad par bya ste/ rmongs pa la min mu stegs can la min/ /rgyal
222a6(rgyud 'grel): po la min gzhon nu rnams la'ang min/ /ma ning la min rgan po rnams la min/ /gcig tu rtog ge la dga' rnams la min/ /byang chub sems ni bu la ma yin te/ /dad pa med pa rnams la'ang de ma yin/ /gang dang yid kyi rdo rje sbyod byed
222a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /nyan thos rnams la sbyin par bya ma yin/ /de nas dben pa'i phyogs su yol ba la sogs pas bsgribs te/ slob ma dang bcas pa'i bla ma rdo rje chen po la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dbul zhing lnga pa reg bya'i yul yang dbul
222b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /slob ma rang gi yid dga' ba/ /gzugs la lang chos rnam par brgyan/ /dam tshig sdom pa'i skal ldan pa'i/ /shes rab de la dbul bar bya/ /gsang ba'i dbang gi don du'o/ /bla mas kyang sems dpa' gsum kyi bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'chang
222b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i ngo bor bskyed la/ de'ang rigs lnga'i tshogs su byas te/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'du byed pa sngon du 'gro bas/ oM sarba ta tha' ga ta a nu dA ga Na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma konyahaM:zhes pa'i sngags brjod do/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas hUM gi
222b3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge'i dbyangs kyi ni ra ta:sa ma pat+ti byas la kun tu bskyod pas stong pa la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum po 'od gsal pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin nyams su myong nas phaT ces bya ba'i gsang sngags brjod de
222b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi chu byang chub kyi sems sbyin par bya'o/ /de bton de rgan po dang mid med dag gis slob ma'i khar btung bar bya'o/ /slob ma rnam par snang mdzad kyis bdag nyid du bsam te/ rang gi lus la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
222b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ a ho su kha zhes brjod la longs spyad par bya'o/ /slar yang byang chub kyi sems dung chos la sogs par bzhag nas dri'i chus spags te/ bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje bla mas
222b6(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis zla gsang thig le las/ pad+ma'i dbus nas rin chen 'bar ba rab phyung ste/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi dbu ni shin tu skam pa la/ /rnam dag rdo rje las ni byung ba'i ye shes chu/ /dri med
222b7(rgyud 'grel): char gyis spyi bor dbang bskur cig ces gsungs so/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas gsung gi rdo dang thuD kyi rdo rje dang rnaM par sbyor ste/ de'ang rlung rnams phra ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ /sems dang yang dag 'dres par gyur zhes gsungs so/ /'di ni gsang ba'i dbang
223a1(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i bar gyis rdo rje slob mas lus dang ngag dang sems dben pa thob nas rdo rje gsum med na mi 'byung ba'i bde ba'i rang bzhin bdag byin gyis brlabs pa rtogs par
223a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i don du gsum pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang la 'jug par bya ste /de la dam tshig sdom pa'i skal ldan pa/ /na tshod bcu gnyis yon pa'am/ /yang na lo ni bcu drug ste/ /nyi shu lon yang mdzes pa ni/ /shes rab sgrub po la dga' ste/ /gsol
223a3(rgyud 'grel): ba btab nas gtad par bya/ /slob ma rin chen gang zag la/ /rdo rje sngar bshad tshigs bshad kyis/ /de yi lag tu bla ma yi/ /lag pas 'bad de gtad nas su/ /rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa yis/ /dam tshig rdo rje rab tu sbyin/ /spyi bor rdo rje legs bzhag
223a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang du gzugs/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa yang/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin gyis brjod/ /khyod kyis dga' ma 'di zung zhig/ brten par sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs/ /'khor lo'i rim pa'i sbyor pa yis/ /srid pa gsum na
223a5(rgyud 'grel): dga' 'di las/ /gzhan pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas min/ /des na 'di dang nam du yang/ /khyod kyis 'bral bar ma byed cig /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rigs ma'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /rmongs pa gang zhig 'da' byed pa/ /de
223a6(rgyud 'grel): la mchog gi dngos grub med ces brjod la reg rdo rje sbyin par bya'o/ /de'ang gur gum dang tsan dan la sogs pas byungs te/ /dri zhim po'i me tog gi phreng bas nye bar dpung la/ /phyogs kyi gos kyis rang gi chu skyes gsal bar bya ste/ 'di skad?
223a7(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod do/ /e ma nga yi pad+ma 'di/ /bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan/ /gang zhig cho ga bzhin bsten na/ /de'i mdun na da 'dug ste/ /sangs rgyas bsnyen la sogs pa yi/ /bya ba pad+ma ji bzhin byed/ /bde chen rgyal po rang nyid de/ /'di nyid
223b1(rgyud 'grel): du ni yang dag gnas/ /de nas twAM b+hany+tsa mo k+Sha ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swab+hA wa At+ma konyahaM zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis de'ang rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas/ /oM A:hUM swA hA
223b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi shes rab rigs lnga'i tshogs su bya ste/ hUM gi yi ge las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa la dbu ma'i rtse mor oM gyi yi ge bsam la/ de'i a'i yi ge las byung pa'i pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa 'od zer lngas kun tu dkrigs pa'o//
223b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rtsa g.yon gyi cha na gnas pa song mos bskul te/ de las cung zad myong ba'i bde ba 'dod pa la sogs pa'i bya bas hUM zhes bya ba'i dbyangs kyi bde ba bsgrub pa rtsam par bya'o/ /de nas bla ma'i zhal las rdo
223b4(rgyud 'grel): rje nor bu'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su gang ba'i mtshan nyid gsum pa dga' bral snang ba nye bar thob pa zhes bya ba rang gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /de skad duAng rdo rje pad+mar rab gnas ste/ /byang chub sems kyang spang mi bya/ /bskyod bya de yi
223b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba yis/ /sems ni kun tu gang bar bsgom/ /rnal 'byor pas ni byang chub sems/ /ji srid mdor de srid du/ /rgyun mi 'chad par dga' ba las/ /byung ba'i bde ba cis mi thob ces gsungs so/ /de'i rjes su phaT ces bya ba'i sngags brjod cing byang
223b6(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi sems yang dag par bton la/ don yod grub pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas yang de nyid phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la sngags 'dis yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA swA b+hA wa:a'at+ma
223b7(rgyud 'grel): konyahaM(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod do/ /gsum pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dpes bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rtogs par bya'o/ /da ni chos kyi sku rtog par bya ste/ bzhi pa yang de bzhin no zhes gsungs pas/ gang gi tshe mya ngan
224a1(rgyud 'grel): las 'das pa thams cad stong pa so sor rang gi rig par bya pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par bya ba de'i tshe/ de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgras snga ma'i dngos po la spyod pa'i phyir gsum pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gang yin pa
224a2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bzhi par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar sngon du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i gsum pa shes rab kyi dbang la de nyid yin na gsum pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du 'dir yang dbang bzhi pa mtshon par bya ba'i phyir shes
224a3(rgyud 'grel): rab ni bzhi par 'gyur te /de nyid shes rab ye shes yin no/ /des na shes rab kyi dpes rdo rje bla ma'i zhal las chos kyi sku'i don rtog par bya'o/ /de nyid kyis na rdo rje slob dpon ma'i ngag gi dris la/ dngos grub kun gyis gter gyur pa'i//
224a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni ltung gyur na/ /rnam shes phung po rgyal 'gyur bas/ /ma smad dngos grub ga la yod/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /reg pa las kyang ches mtshar ba'i/ /bde ba skye 'gyur gang yin de/ /mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'o/ /khyad
224a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gzung byas dus su yang/ /phung po la sogs rgyal 'gyur bas/ /phyag rgya che bdag dngos grub ni/ /gang las de nyid 'byung ba lags/ /mchog tu dga' dang 'od gsal las zhes gsungs so/ /gang gi tshe bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pas
224a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal ba thob ste/ /ye shes gsum las tha mi dad pa'i 'od gsal ba bsgom pa'i stobs kyis ji srid phung po dang bral ba'i mchog tu bde bar ma gyur pa de srid du rnal 'byor pa zung du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos grub mngon sum du
224a7(rgyud 'grel): mi byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phung po med pa'i bde ba'i mchog ces gsungs so/ /de'ang bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang ji ltar pha las bde thob pa/ /de yis bde pa rang gis bza' / /bde ba gang gis
224b1(rgyud 'grel): 'ching pa 'dir/ /de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod/ /dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de/ /gnyis pa'i grangs la mchog dga' nyid/ /gsum pa la ni dga' bral bshad/ /bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod/ /dga' ba bde bcung zad de/ /mchog tu dga' 
224b2(rgyud 'grel): ba de bas lhag/ dga' bral dga' bas chags bral 'gyur/ /lhag mas lhag cig skyes dga' ste/ /'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te /gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir/ /lhan cig skyes pa byang chub
224b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /ces gsungs la/ rgya cher rol pa las kyang ma dag pa yi bsam gtan 'di/ /'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'ang min/ /nam mkha' i dbyings dang 'dra ba'i mchog/ 'od gsal nyid la dmigs nas ni/ /'od gsal go 'phang thob nas su/ /rang
224b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i gzugs 'gyur/ /de tshe 'byor pa kun thob ste/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rab dgar 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /dgongs pa bla na med pa las/ /stong nyid gsum po rnam dag gang/ /de nyid 'od gsal ba zhes bshad/ /thams cad stong pa'i go 'phang
224b5(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /ye shes gsum po rnam dag las/ /ye shes dag bzhi de kho na/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid bla na med/ /rnam gyur med cing snang ba med/ /gnyis su med cing mchog tu zhi/ /yod dang med pa ma yin la/ /de ni ngag gi spyod yul min/ /nges na
224b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal dag pa las/ /'du shes gsum po yang dag byung/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'dzin cing/ /dpe byung brgyad cu dag dang ldan/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /thams cad mkhyen par de nas 'gyur zhes gsungs la/ 'phaD
224b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha'i zhal snga nas kyang 'od gsal ba dang stong pa che zhes gsungs pas zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid grub po/ /dgongs pa bla na med pa las kyang/ /stong pa nyid dang shin tu stong/ /gsum pa stong pa chen po ste/ /bzhi ba thams cad 
225a1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa yang/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur rab tu dbye/ /shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yi/ /rdzogs pa nye bar thob pa las/ /thams cad stong pa 'od gsal yin/ /rgyu yi go 'phang dag pa yang/ /rnam shes rim pa'i sbyor bas so/ /stong nyid
225a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum po rab sbyor las/ /go 'phang bla na med pa thob/ /ces gsungs so/ /de bzhin du dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang/ ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /gtso bor dpe byad brgyad cur ldan/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde can du/ /khu ba zhes bya rnam par gnas//
225a3(rgyud 'grel): de med pas na bde med 'gyur/ /nus pa med phyir bltos dang bcas/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bde ba las/ /de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po min/ /de nyid dngos med tshul yang min/ /zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs can dang/ /mchog tu bde ba gzugs
225a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa/ /de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes/ /rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod/ /rnam dag dam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa nyid/ /lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /bzhin dang kha dog gnas pa ni/ /skyes pa tsam
225a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis rnam par gnas/ /'on kyang bag chags phal bas so zhes gsungs so/ /gal te gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs kho na la/ gsum pa shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang gi chos kyi sku mtshon pa yin gyi/ /bdag byin gyis
225a6(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pas ma yin no zhe na/ de dag gis de ltar brtags pa de brtag nyid ma yin te/ rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de na rdo rje nor bu'i rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs pa'i dpes shes rab dang ye shes
225a7(rgyud 'grel): su brjod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes thogs nyid la chos kyi sku thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid bde blag tu rtogs par nas te/ 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pa yis/ /'od gsal ba nyid thob par 'gyur/ /de
225b1(rgyud 'grel): nas rdo rje bla ma yis/ thog mar bdag byin brlab pa bstan zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang gi rtogs pa'i don nyid tshig gis brjod par bya'o/ /de skad du yang slob ma'i mos pa yid kyis legs
225b2(rgyud 'grel): brtags nas/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i chogs dbang bskur te/ zab cing rgya che'i tshul la mos pa la/ /rin chen tshig gi dbang nyid sbyin par bya zhes gsungs so/ /gal te zab cing rgya che ba'i tshul la mos pa nyid du gang las shes she na/
225b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma las te/ de skad du yang/ du ba las ni me shes te/ /chu skyar las ni chu shel bzhin/ /blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /rigs ni mtshan ma dag las shes/ /gdong gi chu skyes rab dang zhing/ /dga' bas lus kyi sbu ldang
225b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /slob ma dam pa de kho na/ /mthong nas mkhas pas rjes su gzung zhes gsungs pas so/ /dpal ldan 'dus par ji ltar gsung nyid bzhin/ /dbang bzhi'i rim pa rnam par phye ba las/ /bdag gis bsod nams bsgrubs pa
225b5(rgyud 'grel): gang yod des/ /'gro kun rtag tu dbang don ldan par shog /ji ltar mkhas pa du ma dag gis mdzad pa yi/ /dbang gi don 'byed cho ga yod mod da lta na'ang/ /klu sgrub zhabs kyi padmo'i sbrang rtsi thob pas na/ /de yi dgongs pa 'dir
225b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bdag gis gsal bar spel/ /zung du 'jug pa gsal ba zhes bya ba dbang gi cho ga dkyil 'khor chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa'i mkhas pa chen po sgra gcan 'dzin dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
225b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa chen po bsod snyoms pa/ shAkya sh+rI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas dang/ shAkya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan bzang pos thob ste thos nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //'di la shlo ga phyed dang brgyad brgya'o//
226a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon chen po nag po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI gu hya sa mA ja maN+Da la no pa ka/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga oM
226a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin 'di yon tan gyi/ /rin chen 'byung gnas la btung nas/ /man ngag ji ltar brnyed pa bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bri bar bya/ /dang po re zhig slob dpon sngags kyi tshul rig
