226a3(rgyud 'grel): cing sems can gyi don la gcig tu gzhol ba/ sngags zlos pa dang ldan pa la slob mas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir lan gsum du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis slob ma'i sems
226a4(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i bgags bsal la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phreng ba'i sngags sam mtshan gyi sngags lan bdun bzlas pas bsrung par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i sngags
226a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bum phrag bzlas par byas la/ dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi ni khri phrag re re bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o/ /de ltar mi nus na chos dang skar ma bzang po la khrus byas la gos sar pa bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig
226a6(rgyud 'grel): rten dbang phyug gi spyan sngar maN+Dal byas nas mchod pa phul te/ oM mu ci la swAhA/ oM mo hA ni swAhA/ oM dan+ti li swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags khri phrag gcig bzlas la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nyal lo/ /de nas rmi lam
226a7(rgyud 'grel): dge ba dang sdig pa bltas te/ gal te dge pa mthong na dkyil 'khor bri'o/ /de yang ri la sogs pa nyams dga' zhing slob ma dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su song ste byang dang shar du gzhol ba'i sa'i cha brtags la lci ba'i
226b1(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal byas te/ dri zhim po'i chus bsang gtor byas la 'dud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags zlos shing mtho gang tsam du sa'i dong brkos la lci bas byugs te sngags de nyid bzlas pa'i chus dgang ngo/ /de nas yi ge gsum gyi sngags zlos shing
226b2(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs su gom pa brgyad phyin nas slar log nas lta'o/ /gal te chu skams par gyur na der mi bya ste gzhan du spo'o/ /ci ste gang bar gnas na ni dge ba'i mtshan ma yin no/ /de las bri bar gyur na ni der gnas te khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
226b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la gnod mdzes la bka' bsgo bas phyogs skyong rnams bkug ste gtor ma byin nas mngon par rtogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phur bas gdab po/ /de nas phur pa las byung ba'i 'od kyi rdo rje'i sa gzhi
226b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ steng du rdo rje'i dra ba dang/ phyogs mtshams su rdo rje'i ra ba dang/ phyi rol tu me lce'i phreng bas bskor ba byas la sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo phyag gnyis na gser gyi bum pa bsnams pa blos bkug la me tog la sogs pas
226b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod de /slob dpon gyis gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin pa yi/ /sa 'dir dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /zhes brjod de/ nam mkha' la yid kyi bteg
226b6(rgyud 'grel): ste bzhag go /de nas las byed pa bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgoms la de'i sngags bzlas pa'i chus bsang gtor byas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa pus nub com brkos nas gyo mo dang sol ba la sogs pa'i sa'i nang rnams bsal te/ dri zhim
226b7(rgyud 'grel): po dang bcas pa'i sa de nyid kyis dgang ngo/ /de skad du yang gsungs pa/ pus mo nub tsam brkos nas su/ /sa de nyid kyis dgang bar byas/ /gal te lhag par gyur na ni/ de na dngos grub yod par bshad/ ces pa'o/ /de nas mtshan nyid
227a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan par bcags te/ der dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'o/ /slob dpon gyis ni rigs sngags bzla bar bya'o/ /khad pa zin nas der slob dpon rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ /oM b+hu khaM zhes bya bas sa gzhi
227a2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i rang bzhin du byas la/ /oM hUM hUM hUM zhes bya bas sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la/ oM me de ni badzra b+ha ba badzra band+ha hUM zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te/ 'di ni sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu thogs pa'i
227a3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs bzhir bzhag la slob dpon rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa dbus su 'dug ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par byas la gos sar pa bgos shing me tog gi phreng ba dang cod
227a4(rgyud 'grel): pan la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma bzhis shar phyogs nas brtsams te/ rim bzhin du gsol ba gdab po/ /de la shar phyogs nas gsol ba gdab pa'i tshig ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
227a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /gnyis pa'i ni mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad rnam par spangs/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil
227a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /gsum pa'i ni zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las 'byung/ /ye shes spyod pas rnam spyod ba/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /bzhi pa'i ni/ sems can
227a7(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /de ltar gsol ba btab pa'i mthar langs te bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nam
227b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la bteg la bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bsgoms nas/ mig g.yas pa dang g.yon par ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/ rkang mthil du hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje gdengs? pa bltas la dbang ldan nas brtsams? hUM hUM
227b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing rdo rje 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi kun tu bskor la sa de na gnas pa'i bgegs rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /lus ngag sems pa gnas pa yis/ /bgegs kyi chogs kun nga la nyon/ /nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje
227b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /bka' yi 'khor lo sbyor ba yi/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba 'dis/ /sku gsum las byung dags par bya/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /tshal bar 'gas bar gdon mi za/ zhes bya ba 'dis bgegs rnams bskrang la slar yang sgrub thabs
227b4(rgyud 'grel): las 'byung ba bzhin du gnang mdzes la bka' bsgo bas bgegs rnams la phur bus gdab pa dang/ /sa gzhi dang ra ba la sogs pa bsgoms la/ slar yang sa'i lha mo/ bkug ste mchod pa byas nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir gsol
227b5(rgyud 'grel): ba gdab bar bya'o/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par ni/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi/ /ji ltar bdud kyi stobs bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal
227b6(rgyud 'grel): bar byas nas dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i char dri zhim po byugs te/ /me tog dri zhim pos gtor pa 'di ni sa gzung ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha so sor gnas gnas su bdud rtsi lngas maN+Dal
227b7(rgyud 'grel): tshom bu sum cu rtsa/ gnyis byas la nam mkha' la gnas ba'i lha'i 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ /so so'i gnas su bzhugs su gsol ba la me tog la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams kyis mchod de bdug spos kyis bdug cing dril bu dkrol
228a1(rgyud 'grel): nas bstod pa 'dis bstod par bya'o/ /mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mkha' chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /rdo rje dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag /rdo rje zhi
228a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog /ston po rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje dpag
228a3(rgyud 'grel): med rgyal po che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung//
228a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ces bya bas bstod la phyag byas te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'og nas 'byung ba 'di lha rnams la snyan gsan dbab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje che ge
228a5(rgyud 'grel): mo ca rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyed rnams la ni mchod pa dang/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba'i phyir/ /mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid kyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas bka' 
228a6(rgyud 'grel): drin mdzad par 'os/ /'gro ba'i 'khor lo don mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang/ /gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong pa'i lha gang yin/ /'byung po
228a7(rgyud 'grel): gang dag mthu chen dang/ /bstan la dga' ba'i sems can ni/ /gang su rdo rje'i mig ldan rnams/ /rdo rje can bdag che ge mos/ /che ge 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /yo byad ji ltar 'byor pa yis/ /'gro ba dag phyir bdag 'dri na/ /thugs
228b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes nye bar dgongs nas ni/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa yi/ tshogs pa kun la dkyil 'khor du/ /khyod kyis byin brlabs mdzad par 'os/ /zhes bya ba 'di lan gsum brjod de 'di ni lha sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi
228b2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo dang dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags kyang ci nus par bzlas la gshegs su gsol ba'i phyir slar yang mchod pa dang gtor ma phul la/ /dri'i maN+Dal la zhugs pa rnams yid kyi nam mkha' la btag ste/ /bkod nas rim pa 'dis dkyil
228b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor theg gdab bo/ /tshangs ba'i thig gnyis btab nas su/ /mtshams kyi thig gnyis bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi dang ni bskud pa bzhi/ /dkyil 'khor tshad bzhin gzhal te gdab/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad char du/ /tshangs skud gnyis kyi ngos su
228b4(rgyud 'grel): byang/ /sgo yi ngos su tshon rtsi'i sa/ /de phyed skud pa gnyis kyis bri/ /sgo yi bzhi char yang btab nas/ /sgo phyed gsum yang de nas gdab/ /mtshams su sgo yi thad du ni/ /lha yi snam bu'i thig gdab bya/ /ri mo lnga yis sa yi cha/ /sgo yi bzhi char
228b5(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya/ /kha khyer sgo yi phyed du ste/ /de yi phyed kyi rin chen sa/ /dra ba dang ni dra phyed gnas/ /kha khyer dang ni mnyam par bya/ /de phyed ba gam sa yin te/ 'di ni thig skud bri ba yin/ /so so'i gnas su thig bri ba/ /skye bo rang gis shes sla
228b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /gzhan du lta bar sla ba na/ /'dir ni spros te ma bshad do/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsams nas ni/ /mtshams su so sor bor ba la/ /pad+ma rdo rje phreng ba dag/ zlum por kun tu bskor bar bya/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor bskor ba'o/ /
228b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phreng ba de bzhin bya/ /sgo yi sum 'gyur twa ra Na/ /shes rab can gyis bri bya ste/ /snam bu bcu gcig phye ba la/ /ci ltar mdzes par brtag par bya/ /de nas ye shes kyi skud pa tshon rtsi lngas kha bsgyur zhing dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur dang ldan 
229a1(rgyud 'grel): pa snod dri zhim par bzhag ste 'bar ba'i lta bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi thig skud drangs te der bstimS naS bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas byungS te/ /yi ge gsum mngon par bzlas pas byin
229a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab po/ /de nas oM e hye hi b+ha ga ba na pra yats+tshe sha swa ta su traM sa tsakra su tra na ya swA hA hUM zhes bya bas nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor la thig skud bslar par bya'o/ /de na oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harma hUM/ oM a pa
229a3(rgyud 'grel): ? pa ra a nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harma hUM/ oM a n+yo n+ya a nu pra be she sarba d+harma hUM/ zhes bya pas slob ma bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgoms pa dang/ lhan cig tu skud pa sgril nas bdag dang slob ma gnyis ka yi ge dzdza gsum gsum bzlas pas bskul
229a4(rgyud 'grel): la g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur lte bar bzhag la skud pa bzung ste/ slob dpon nub sgor gnas la/ slob ma shar sgor gnas pa dang/ oM badzra sU tra sa ma ya mA ti kra ma hUM zhes brjod de gnam thig dang sa thig gdab bo/ /de yang sems can dus
229a5(rgyud 'grel): su ni/ /nam mkha' khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /thig skud sgra yis bskul nas su/ /de dag 'dir ni gshegs par mdzod/ /de nas skor phyogs kyis gshin rje'i phyogs su song ste byang phyogs na gnas pa'i slob ma de bzhin du thig
229a6(rgyud 'grel): gdab bo/ /de nas me'i mtshams su sod ste dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa dang/ /shar phyogs kyi thig gdab po/ /yang rlung mtshams su song ste bden bral gyi mtshams na gnas pa dang/ nub logs kyi thig gdab bo/ /de nas de nyid
229a7(rgyud 'grel): du bsgyur te dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa dang/ byang logs kyi thig gdab po/ /yang me'i mtshams su sod ste bden bral gyi mtshams na gnas pa dang lho ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ /de nyid du gnas nas rlung mtshams su gnas pa dang
229b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kyi thig gdab bo/ /bden bral gyi mtshams su song ste dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa dang/ mtshams kyi thig gnyis pa gdab po/ /de nas thig skud nyis 'gyur du byas te slob dpon dbus? su 'dug nas slob mas dbang ldan gyi mtshamS
229b2(rgyud 'grel): nas phyi nang gi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ /de ltar ye shes kyi thig btab nas bdag nyid khro zhing bsbyings? pa dang bcas pas smin ma bcum pa'i khro bo'i lta baS bltas te sgo phye la phyi rol tu byung ste/ oM A:mu:zhes bya bas ye shes kyi skud pa
229b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol lo/ /'di ni ye shes kyi thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog tu bcos pa'i tshon rtsi snga ma ltar snod bzang por bzhag la 'bar ba'i lta bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las tsho na? rtsi
229b4(rgyud 'grel): bkug ste/ so so'i kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du bstims la oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ zhes bya bas mngon par bsngags pas byin gyi brlab po/ /de nas oM badzra be ga zhes bya bas ye shes kyi skud pa yid kyis bteg ste/ tsho na rtsi rnams
229b5(rgyud 'grel): bzung la 'di skad cos brjod par bya'o/ /chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag /sems can khams ni rab sgrol ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /dkyil 'khor rang gi bri bar bya/ /de nas tshon rtsi khu tshur g.yon pas bzung ste/ dbang ldan
229b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi mtshams nas brtsams te ri mo rnams ma 'byar zhing drang la mtho ba g.yas bskor du bri'o/ /rim pa ni sngon po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu rnams te slob dpon rang gi de ltar bris la kham phor la sogs pas
229b7(rgyud 'grel): bkab ste/ rdo rje shugs gyis 'jug pa dang 'byung ba bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu gzhal gyi ci dga' bar bri'o/ /'di ni tshe? ni bri ba'i dam tshig go /de la mi bskyod pa gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni rdo rje phreng ba'i nang gi sa gzhi sngon bor byas la/ shar
230a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi char ni dkar bo'o/ /lhor ni ser po'o/ /nub ni dmar po'o/ /byang ni ljang gu'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang rdo rje'i gdan la rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po phyag rgya dang bcas pas bri'o
230a2(rgyud 'grel): shar du ni 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i pad+ma la 'khor lo dkar po'o/ /de bzhin du lhor ni rin po che la gnas pa'i rin po che'o/ /nub tu ni pad+ma la gnas pa'i pad+ma dmar po'o/ /byang du ni sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i rdo rje ljang gu'o/ /
230a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshams rnams su ni gdan de dag nyid la 'khor lo dang rdo rje pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so/ /rim pa gnyis par gdan de dag nyid la me mtshams la sogs par me long dang bi baM dang dri'i dung chos dang ro snod rnams/ /kha dog
230a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ /de'i snam bu'i shar phyogs kyi ngos gnyis su ni gdan de nyid la nA ga puShba dkar po dang 'khor lo dkar po'o/ /lhor ni rin po che ser po gnyis so/ /nub tu ni pad+ma dmar po gnyis so/ /byang du ni
230a5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri ljang gu gnyis so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhir ni pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la rdo rje tho ba sngon po dang/ /rdo rje dbyig pa dkar po dang/ sdong bu dang bcas pa'i pad+ma dmar po dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje ljang gu'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs
230a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshams su ni pad+ma dang nyi ma la ral bri sngon po dang/ rdo rje dang rdo rje sngon pos mtshan pa'i dbyig pa dang/ yang dbyig pa'o/ /steng 'og tu pad+ma dang nyi ma la rdo rje nag po dang sngon po'o/ /de nas bum pa mgrin pa ring zhing mchu 'phyang
230a7(rgyud 'grel): pa lto ba yangs pa rnams nas dang mon sran gre'u dang/ /'bras kya so ba dang/ til te 'bru lnga dang/ /'bi ha ti dang/ kan dkar deng/ a pa ra dzi ta dkar po dang/ ha sa dang/ ha sa de ba ste sman lnga dang/ /gser
230b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ? dngul dang byi ru dang/ mu tig dang mu men te rin po che lnga rnams de'i nang du blug la dri zhim po'i chus bkad ste/ snam bu sar pas mgrin pa bcings la shing los kha brgyan pa'i bum pa rim pa 'dis sta gon la gnas pa bya'o/ /bdag
230b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor la gnas nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po sa bon las bskyed la bum pa gzhan rnams su yang dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams so so'i sa bon las bskyed de ye shes kyi
230b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo spyan drangs nas gnyis su med par byas la/ mchod yon dang zhabs bkru dang zhal bsil la sogs pa phul la so so'i sngags yi ge gsum dang spel pa ci nus su bzlas so/ /gzhan yang skye bo thams cad la bsang gtor
230b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyis bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags yi ge gsum dang spel ba la lan mang du bzlas pa'i bum pa rtsa ba'i sgo drung du gzhag go/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni mdun logs su bzhag la/ lhag ma ni ci riD par bzhag ste bum
230b5(rgyud 'grel): pa sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de'i 'og tu slob ma me tog 'dzin cing phan pa don du gnyer ba bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan dga' bas dkyil 'khor kyi khang pa'i sgor? maN+Dal byas la/ slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod par
230b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// //sngags kyi dngos grub don gnyer gang/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya/ /bsod nams 'dod pa de las bzhag /gzhan dag 'jig rten pha rol gnyer/ /dad pa chen po ldan pa dag /'jig rten
230b7(rgyud 'grel): pha rol la dmigs nas/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor gzhug bya ste/ /'di yi 'bras bu gnyer mi bya/ /gal te 'di 'bras don gnyer na/ /'jig rten pha rol mi 'grub 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol la dmigs na/ /'bad pa med par 'di 'bras 'grubS//
231a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob ma rnams kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems pa'i tshul bstan pa/ mgon po
231a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum mchi ba bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni
231a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug par 'tshal/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i gtso bo la dmigs te/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin pas/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /dus gsum
231a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnam /gsang sngags rdo rje mthu yis ni/ /ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pa/ /shAkya seng stsogs mchog gis ni/ /drag po chen po bdud kyi sde/ /stobs chen dag kyang

231a6(rgyud 'grel): la rang gi shes rab kyi pad+mar zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bsgoms la phyung nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshaD/
231a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i dge la yi rang ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung/ zhes lan gsum brjod la/ /de nas slob ma rnams kyi mgo bor lag pa bzhag ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pas bsrungs te/ de
231b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi snying ga dang mgrin pa dang mgo bo rnams su rdo rje dang pad+ma dang 'khor lo bsams te/ de dag gi lte ba la hUM A:aoM zhes bya ba bsgoms te/ spyi bo? me tog mdun du spos dang mar me dang snying gar dri byin la so shing song bcu gnyis pa rtse
231b2(rgyud 'grel): mor me tog gi phreng ba btags la dri zhim pos byugs te bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags brjod la sbyin no/ /de rnams kyis kyang kha? shar ram byang du bltas te bros la lci pas maN+Dal ba'i ko btsam byugs te der bor ro/ /de la shar dang lho dang nub dang
231b3(rgyud 'grel): byang du bltas pa'i bye brag gis zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi snod yin par rim pa bzhin du bstan par bya'o/ /de nas sngags 'di bzlas pa'i chus kha bkru ba sbyin par bya ste/ oM h+ri bi shud+d+ha d+harmA sarba pA paM ni bi sho d+ha ya /sarba
231b4(rgyud 'grel): bi kalpan a pa na ya hUM zhes bya ba ni sngags so/ /de nas skud pa mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa la bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags bzlas pas dpung pa g.yas par bcings nas de nyid bzlas pa'i sku sha stan dang sngas kyi phyir lag pa g.yon par
231b5(rgyud 'grel): byin la chos nyan du gzhug par bya ste/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen pa/ /u dum 'ba ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon

231b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos/ /skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas nas ni/ /go 'phangs bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang gis spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu dri med na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung ba yi/ /ngan 'gro de yiS
232a1(rgyud 'grel): gcod par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring brnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal pa'i sras bcas pa'i/ /bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun//
232a2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen du/ /legs pa nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyod rnams 'di ni dang bas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs
232a3(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du 'gyur zhes brjod de/ bzhin bzang dag song la rmi lam ci byung ba nang par nga la smros shig ces bsgo nas khyad par gyi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /byin nas mgon po bdag la gsungs//
232a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid dang/ /slob dpon yongs su phrin las rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang/ /gsang ba'i sdom pa bla na med/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rtag tu bdag nyid slob dpon gyur zhes bya ste/ 'di ni slob ma sta?
232a5(rgyud 'grel): gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khad par zhugs te slob ma la sogs pa bsrungs pa'i phyir bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzla'o/ /nang par slob ma rnams bos la/ dge ba dang sdig pa'i mtshan ma rnams bltas te//

232a7(rgyud 'grel): mu:bzlas pas gshegs su gsol la gnas gtsang mar bzhag go /de nas mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bshams te mngon par 'du byas te bum pa rnams bsham pa'i gnas rnams su bzhag ste slob dpon bdag nyid sgo skyong
232b1(rgyud 'grel): gi sngags kyis lus khrus byas la gos sar pa bgos te/ tsan dan la sogs pas lus byugs nas me tog gi phreng ba dang dbu rgyan bcings te stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas dga' ba'i sgra de bzhin gsheD
232b2(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad spyan drangs te kha'i lam nas zhugs te zhu nas shes rab kyi pad+mar phab la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshul du spros nas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la bstims te/ arg+ha dang/ zhabs bkru dang/ zhal bsil dang/ bdug spos
232b3(rgyud 'grel): phul te/ dril bu bsil zhing/ mi bskyod pa zhes pa la sogs pas bstod par bya'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga dkyil 'khor du gtor te bdag nyid kyang myang ngo/ /sgrub pa'i grogs dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste bdag nyid phyir gyur nas phyogs skyong rnams la
232b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma rgya chen po sbyin par bya ste/ 'di ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /de nas slar yang dkyil 'khor du zhugs te/ dril bu bsil zhing dkyil 'khor la skor ba byas la bdag nyid dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba

232b7(rgyud 'grel): byung mtshan ma'i phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' i rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sgrubs shig /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog 
233a1(rgyud 'grel): tu bdag bsgrubs shig/ nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa ste/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes su chags/ /'dod pa chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis bsgrubs shig/ shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin
233a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag bsgrubs shig/ dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyems pa bdag po'i bdag/ sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa/ /sems can kun gyi
233a3(rgyud 'grel): snying la gnas/ /sems can kun gyi yab nyid de/ /'dod chags mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig gi glu blangs nas bden pa'i tshig 'di bsgrag par bya ste/ shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bden pa'i byin
233a4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs gang yin pa/ /bden pa de yis mgon khyod kyis/ /bdag gi 'dod pa skod byed shog /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las byung ba
233a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /de bzhin kho na las byung ba/ /bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor ni/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar sems can rnams/ /dri med thams cad mthong bar shog/ ces brjod la phyag byas te/ dril bu bsil lo/ /'di ni slob dpon 'jug
233a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas slob ma khrus byas shing gos sar pa bgos la bkug la/ /tshigs 'dis gsol ba 'debs su gzhug ste/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /mchod chen ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/ /bdag kyang bsgral ba'i don
233a7(rgyud 'grel): du ni/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje bdag la stsol zhes brjod nas/ /maN+Dal byed du bcug ste/ /yon dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas bgegs mthar byed kyis sngags bzlas pa'i chus bsang gtor byas la/ yi ge gsum bzlas pa'i snam bus gdeng yogs
233b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du gzhug ba'i phyir/ 'dod par dga' ba gang yin smos zhes dri'o/ /nges kyang bskal pa bzang po dga' o zhes smra'o/ /de'i rjes la A:kha bE ra hUM zhes bya bas me tog gi phreng ba byin la rdo rje snying gar bzhag ste/ oM badzra yo ga tsitha utpa ta?
233b2(rgyud 'grel): yA mi zhes bya bas byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ oM sur te sa ma s+thaM/ ho badzra sid+d+hi ya thA su khi zhes brjod la/ de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyur gyis gsang chen dam pa 'di de bzhin gshegs
233b3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar mi bya zhing dad? pa rnams la yang ma yin no zhes bsgo nas/ A:khaM bI ra hUM zhes bya bas yol ba'i nang du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ de ring khyod de bzhin gsheD
233b4(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs te/ gzhan yang khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan 'grub pa lta mos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par
233b5(rgyud 'grel): bya yis/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste/ khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas spyi bor rdo rje bzhag la 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje ste/ gal te tshul 'di su yang rung ba la smras na
233b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dis byod kyi/ mgo 'gems par byed do/ /zhes brjod la slar yang snying gar rdo rje bzhag ste/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi / /snying la de ring yang dag zhugs/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs zhes brjod
233b7(rgyud 'grel): nas mnol? bsgag par bya ste/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng na gnas pa'i pad+ma'i nang du song ba'i bdud rtsi lnga la/ oM badzra a mri to ka Tha zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas la/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das
234a1(rgyud 'grel): na bsregs par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'thung zhig ces brjod de blud la de ring phyin chad khyod kyi rdo rje sems dpa' nga yin gyis/ ngas de ring phan chad ding 'di gyis shig /
234a2(rgyud 'grel): ces bsgo ba rnams bu khyod ki bya dgos so/ /de la brnyas pa ma byed cig/ byas na yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar gyur ta re/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas bden pa'i byin gyis
234a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs brjod par bya ste/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bya/ /lha yi rigs kyi rig pa dag/ bsod nams ji bzhin de bzhin shog/ 'dis ni dngos grub gang 'grub dang/ /rigs ni
234a4(rgyud 'grel): gang gi snod du gyur/ /'di ni bsod nams ci yod las/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin shog/ ces pas bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs bya la/ /de nas phyag byas la mig tu ci zhig snang zhes dris la/ /de dkar po dang/ ser po
234a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sngon po'i kha dog rnams bstan pa las/ zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ dbang dang/ mngon spyod kyi las rnams so sor bstan par bya/ /de nas oM pra tIts+tsha badzra ho/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis slob mas dkyil 'khor du me tog
234a6(rgyud 'grel): phul te/ gang la bab pa de'i rigs so/ /ci lte lha gnyis kyi bar du lhung na gang la nye ba de'i rigs so/ /gang la te ri mo la ma bab na slar bskyar te dor ro/ /lan gsum du bskyar te dor yang ri mo la ma phog na ni de la dngos
234a7(rgyud 'grel): grub med do/ /rdo rjer ba'i phyi rol du lhung na yang de bzhin no/ /gal te gtso bo la phog na/ phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob ste/ me tog dor ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dbang nod pa'i phyir slob dpon la yon phul la byang chub rdo rje zhes
234b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i tshigs bcad kyis gsol ba btab ste phyag bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis kyang slob ma de dbang bskur ba'i phyir rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad tsam pa'i gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bris pa/ /de'i
234b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris te/ sgo dang mtshams rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ lha mo'i mtshan mas mtshan par bya'o/ /slob ma la khrus byas shing/ gos sar pa gos pa bzhag la shis pa'i cho ga byas te/ yungs
234b3(rgyud 'grel): kar la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gyis lan gnyis gnyis bskor te/ kham phor gyi me'i nang du blugs so/ /de ltar lan gsum du byas la/ de nas chu'i shis pa yang de ltar bya'o/ /de nas sngags
234b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bzlas pas bsrung ste/ nye ? reg byas la/ yang dri zhim po sngags bzlas pas byugs la/ sngags bzlas pa'i me tog gi phreng ba mgo la bcings te/ mar me bdun du bskor zhing bdug pos kyis kyang bdugs te/ shis pa'i
234b5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'o/ /de nas me tog gi phreng bas dbang bskur la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur bsgoms nas mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs te/ steng du bla re bres la hUM las byung ba'i gser gyi yu ba can gyi gdugs dkar po steng du bzung nas
234b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon phyogs su ba dan dang rgyal mtshan bres te dung dang/ zangs dung rnga bo che la sogs pa'i sgras nam mkha' gang bsam la dril bu bsil zhing khrus bya ste/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus
234b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI oM hUM/ dang po rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pas/ bkrus la de'i 'og tu gzhan gyis bkru'o/ de ltar phyi rol tu dbang
235a1(rgyud 'grel): bskur nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis mdza' yas pa'i phyogs nas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangs te/ de rnams kyi 'od zer las byung ba'i dbang bskur ba'i yo byad?
235a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bsgoms la/ bdag nyid kyis kyang /oM sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ rdo rje dbang bskur chen po sbyin zhes brjod
235a3(rgyud 'grel): do/ /mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyi chu'i dbang ngo/ /de nas gser la sogs pa las brdungs pa 'am de med na ras la sogs pa las byas pa 'ang rung ste/ sngar bstan pa'i tshigS bcad kyis slob ma'i spyi bor bcings la nam mkha' i
235a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rin chen 'byung ldan gyis gzugs kyis der thim ste byin gyis brlab po rin chen 'byung ldan gyis rang bzhin gyi dbang ma rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbang ngo/ /de'i 'og tu
235a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM las bskyed pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung ste/ /slob ma'i snying ga la sogs par gtugs la/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rdo rje'i dbang/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rab tu grub phyir rdo rjes zung?
235a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas slob ma'i lag pa g.yas par rdo rje sbyin te/ snang ba mdza' yas kyi rang bzhin rdo rje'i dbang ngo/ /de nas a las skyed pa'i dril bu lag pa g.yon par byin la/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ka bsnol te/ oM
235a7(rgyud 'grel): badzra ad+hi ba d+histwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badzra sa ma ya stI? zhes brjod de/ dam tshig rdo rje'i rang bzhin bdag po'i dbang do/ /de nas me long la/ oM a badzra satwa zhes bzlas la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstan par bya ste/ rdo rje sems
235b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' me long ltar/ /gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag gang/ /byang chub sems 'di shes par gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin gyi me long
235b2(rgyud 'grel): gi dbang ngo/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje dril bu slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la/ badzra satwa stwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badzra nA mA b+hi She ka ta kye dpal che ge mo zhes rigs mthun pa'i ming btags la/ /gang gang snang ba de dang de/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rang nyid gtso/ /gang
235b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir chos rnams rnam dag pas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rang bzhin yin/ zhes bsgrags te/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin gyi ming gi dbang ngo/ /de nas slar yang slob mas/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ rdo rje slob dpon dbang
235b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba/ /thugs rje can khyod bka' drin gyis/ /bdag la de ring stsal du gsol/ zhes gsol ba btab pa dang nam mkha' khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bsgoms la rdo rje che dang dril bu che/ /zung
235b5(rgyud 'grel): zhig rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs/ /de ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur/ /slob ma rnams ni bsdu bar gyis zhes pas slob ma bskul la/ dam tshig gsum po 'dzin du gzhug ste hUM gis rdo rje bsgoms la/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje
235b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i phyag na gnas/ /rtag tu khyod kyi kyang gzung ste/ /phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e sha stwaM d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi he zhes pa ste 'di slob ma rdo rje gzung la de kho na nyid
235b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di brjod de/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po thams cad bdag/ rdo rje snying po bdag po'i gtso/ /bcom ldan dpal dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /oM mahA badzra hUM/ de nas a las
236a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed ba'i dril bu/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /ces pa 'dir dril bu byin la/ /srid pa rang bzhin
236a2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i sems ldan pas/ /srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed/ /ces bya ba'i chos kyis dkrol bar bya ste/ oM badzra g+haN+Ta a zhes brjod do/ /de yang yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /dam tshig phyag rgya shes rab brjod gang gi lus
236a3(rgyud 'grel): kun brtan byed pa/ /de nas phyag rgya rab tu grags zhes bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pas bskyed la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor par bltas te/ me tog la sogs pas mchod cing kun tu bstod par byas te/ snyems pa dang
236a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas me tog cig slob ma la bsnun la/ /deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sras dang bcas pas rnam rol cing/ /rdo rje snyems pas rab sbyor gyis/ /dga' ston bde ba mchod par gyis/ /a ? sgegs dang bcas
236a5(rgyud 'grel): pas phreng ba 'phangs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /de ni bcom ldan 'bral mi 'gyur/ /phreng ba de ni rgyan yin no/ /oM lus can kun la dam chos kyis/ /khyod kyis glu ni blang bar bya/ /de yis bder gshegs dngos
236a6(rgyud 'grel): grub ni/ /myur du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /gi ? de nyid thal mo'i gar gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad chags par byos/ /sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phrin las kyis/ /gar mkhan tshul du bsgyur bar gyis/ /ho:rdzogs sangs
236a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la spos phul bas/ /brtul zhugs bzang po legs tshom gyis/ /lus can bder gshegs cha lugs su/ /ye shes kyis ni tshim par gyis/ /a:sangs rgyas rnams la me tog gtor/ /byang chub yan lag tshogs
236b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bas/ /mtshan dang dpe byang ldan pa yi/ /bder gshegs sku ni thob par gyis/ /b+h+ruM:chos kyi me ni legs sbar bas/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sems can ma rig dngos po la/ /ye shes sgron ma sbar par gyis/ pra/ rgyal ba rnams
236b2(rgyud 'grel): la dri phul la/ /tshul khrims de bzhin shes rab dang/ /rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yi/ /byang chub lus can rnams la bsgoms/ /g+ha:de'i 'og tu gser gyi thur ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te /ji ltar mig
236b3(rgyud 'grel): mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra nai tra a pa ha ra pa Ta laM h+rI zhes pas mig la byugs te dag par bya'o/ /de nas me long bstan te/
236b4(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa/ /de ltar chos 'di shes byas nas/ /sems can don na mi mnyam
236b5(rgyud 'grel): med byos/ /'on kyang skyob pa'i sras su skye/ /de nas a las bskyed pa'i dril bu byin te/ /thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam la mkha' yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du
236b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal zhes pas dkrol bar bya'o/ /yang ho:zhes bya bas mda' gzhu byin la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags par byos shig ces bsgo la/ /phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phang ba dang/ /steng dang 'og tu yang re re
236b7(rgyud 'grel): 'phen du gzhug go? /a A? badzra satwa zhes bya ba 'dis me long bstan la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' me long ltar gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid gtso zhes bya ba dang/ gang
237a1(rgyud 'grel): yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po byang chub kyi sems 'di nyid yin par shes par gyis shig/ ces brjod do/ /oM badzra he du zhes bya bas 'khor lo rkang pa'i bar du bcug la/ oM badzra b+hA Sha raM zhes bya
237a2(rgyud 'grel): bas lag pa g.yas su dung byin la/ /g.yon par yi ge a las gsang ba 'dus pa'i po ti byin la/ dril bu yang dkrol zhing/ deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa/ /tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /khyod kyis the tshom dogs med
237a3(rgyud 'grel): par/ /yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis su/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /dri med kun tu gang bar gyis/ /sngags kyi tshul gyi cho ga rnams/ /skye bo rnams la rtag tu shod/ /de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du gso? zhes? bya/ /rdo rje
237a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa de kun yang/ /khyod la rtag tu srung bar mdzad/ /de nas so so'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor byas la/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sems can ma lus thams cad la/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor
237a5(rgyud 'grel): lo rab tu bskor zhes bya ba dang/ chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi tshig bcug la tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba byin la bdag nyid langs te sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dmigs la g.yon pa snying gar
237a6(rgyud 'grel): chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas te/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgyar byas la rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas lung bstan to/ /'di ni khyod la ngas lung bstan/ /rdo rje slob dpon de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa shin tu dag pa
237a7(rgyud 'grel): na/ /srid pa'i dan 'gro rnams las bton/ /kye che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa b+hu rgyu ba swa:gang la 'di ltar lung bstan pa de la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnamS
237b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mgrin gcig tu byang chub chen por lung ston par mdzad de/ phyag rgya chen po dang sngags 'di'i mthu yin no zhes dang pa bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med de/ /de bas 'dod pa chags
237b2(rgyud 'grel): bral ba/ /byod kyi nam yang mi bya'o/ /mahA sa ma ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de nas slob ma'i spyi bor gdugs gzung la bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ gdugs dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo drung du sa la 'dug la/ /sngags rnams 'dzin par gyur pa
237b3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /de nas gdugs gzhan du gzhag la/ /slob ma'i snying la gdab pa'i tshig 'di dag brjod do/ /de ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyud rnams 'dzin gyur par/ /sangs rgyas byang chub
237b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /sems can kun la sems brtse bas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bri/ /khyod kyis nan tan bskyed nas su/ /sgrub pa po rnams sngags la sbyor/ /de nas slar yang bstod par
237b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /bcug pa dang ni mthong ba yis/ /de ring sdig las rnam grol nas/ /de ring khyed rnams dge bar gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /phyin chad 'chi ba yod min zhing/ /thug pa tshugs pa
237b6(rgyud 'grel): yod min pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /sdig pa shin tu dag pas na/ /srid pa'i sdig pa las 'das pa'o/ /byang chub sems ni yod mi spangs/ /rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya de/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid
237b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur the tshom med/ /dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bya/ /nam yang bor bar yang mi rung/ /mi shes pa 'am rmongs pa la/ /de ni bstan par mi bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu mi spangs te/ /slob dpon nam yang smad mi bya/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pa yin/
238a1(rgyud 'grel): rang ngag yongs su spangs nas su/ /dka' thub kyis ni ? mi bya/ /ji ltar bde ba bde bzung nas/ /'di ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /zhes bya bas dbugs dbyung ngo/ /slob mas kyang phyag byas te/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' 
238a2(rgyud 'grel): stsal pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi/ /zhes khas blang ngo/ /slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// //de'i rjes la slob ma yid du 'ong pa'i gnas dben par yol ba la sogs pas bres la gzugs la
238a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa dam tshig phan gyi bu mo rdo rje slob dpon la phul te/ /bza' dang bca' ba dang btung ba zhim po rnams kyis bla ma mnyes par byas la maN+Dal byas te/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsang ba'i dbang nod pa'i
238a4(rgyud 'grel): don du gsol ba gdab po/ /khyod kyi bka' gang gis bdag/ bdag dang gzhan don byed nus pa/ /yang dag gsang ba'i dbang bskur ni/ /snying rje gter gyi bdag la stsol zhes bya'o/ /de ltar gsol btab pa'i mthar bla mas slob ma la
238a5(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen po bskyed de sgrub thabs las 'byung ba'i rim pa bzhin bdag nyid dang shes rab gsung rdo rje'i gzugs su mngon par 'dus byas la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/ /de las byung ba'i bdud rtsi dang bdud rtsi lnga bsres la
238a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'dis slob ma'i khar sbyin no/ /ji ltar 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyis/ /byang chub sras la dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ni/ /sems gyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro/ /nges kyang a ho su kha zhes
238a7(rgyud 'grel): brjod de longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyun du gzhug go/ de nas de snang ba mdza' yas su dmigs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar bsgom mo/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// //
238b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'og tu khyed kyi bka' drin gang gis bdag /bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed pas/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ni/ /snying rjes gter gyis bdag la stsol/ zhes slob mas gsol ba btab pa dang/ /slob ma'i lag par shes rab kyi lag pa byin la/ /rdo
238b2(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' i gzugs su bsgoms te/ /gzung ma 'di ni yid 'ong ma/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnams bsten par gnang/ /'khor lo rim gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba dam pa myang bar gyis/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni tshang mi rgya/ /'gro ba gsum po 'di yis
238b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ de bas 'di dang bral bar ni/ /khyod kyi nam yang mi bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba/ /de la mchog gi dngos grub med/ /ces brjod la sbyin no/ /de nas shes rab kyis
238b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ /bshad dang gci ba bza' ba dang/ /sha dang? khu khrag de bzhin no/ /bu khyod ci dgar spro gyur tam/ /bud med rtag tu gus pa dang/ /bdag gi pad+mar 'o byed pa/ /bu khyod ci bzhed bden par smros/ /slob mas kyang 'di skad brjod
238b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ khu khrag la sogs bza' ba dang/ /bud med rnams la rtag gus pa'i/ /b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o byed pa/ /lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro zhes brjod pa dang/ /slar yang shes rab kyis 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ /e mang yi pad+ma 'di/ /bde ba kun
238b6(rgyud 'grel): dang yang dag ldan/ /blun po gang zhig 'da' byed pa/ /de la mchog gi dngos grub med/ /bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni/ /'di nyid du ni rtag tu gnas/ /badzra mok+Sha ho zhes bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu ji ltar bstan pa'i kad? nas snyoms par 'jug par byas la
238b7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i man ngag gis de'i skad cig ma mtshon par bya'o/ /byang chub sems phyung nas ro 'dzin gyis blang bar bya ste/ /'di ni shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// //dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta ba/ /ji bzhin du ni
239a1(rgyud 'grel): byas pa las/ /bsod nams gang zhig thob pa nges/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig/ //slob dpon nag po'i zhal snga nas bla ma'i man ngag la brten te mdzad pa'i dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil
239a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi cho ga/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po nag po'i zhal snga nas dang/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa rdzogs so// //rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa'i cho ga /'dus pa'i gtor ma'i? cho ga 'das pa'i rab
239a3(rgyud 'grel): tu gnas pa'i cho ga gsum slob dpon chen po nag po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra satwa pU dza bid+hi/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//
239a4(rgyud 'grel): ri bong 'dzin 'od ltar dkar reg bya rdo rje mas 'khyud sku/ /mnyam med yon tan gter gyur sangs rgyas lnga yi gtsor gyur pa/ /ma rig mun pa'i tshogs kun ma lus kun nas bcom pa yis/ /phyag na rdo rje nam mkha' i mthar thug ji
239a5(rgyud 'grel): srid rgyal gyur cig/ mdor bsdus rim las gsungs don rtogs dka' ba/ /byis pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje sems mchod cho ga nus pa bzhin/ /bla ma'i lung las cho ga bzhin bshad bya/ /'dir rdo rje sems
239a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mchod pa'i cho ga la dbang ba'i rnal 'byor pas dang por mal nas langs nas snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis bdag nyid dri ma med par byas la/ oM A:hUM badzra sa twa zhes bya ba rjes su
239a7(rgyud 'grel): dran pas sgo rnams sbyad ba la? sogs pa dam pa'i spyod pa rjes su bskyed bar bya ba rnams byas la/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsags nas mchod pa'i khang par zhugs la stan bde ba la gnas te rang gi lag mthil gnyis
239b1(rgyud 'grel): su a las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje 'bang? ba bsams la/ oM shud+d+ha d+harma tA sid+d+ha badzra hUM zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas lkog ma'i phyogs su h+rI:las byung ba'i pad+ma la hUM las gyur pa'i rdo rje bsams
239b2(rgyud 'grel): la badzri dzi hwa b+he hUM zhes bya ba byin gyis brlab te/ mchod yin gyi snod du me tog dang 'bru dang ldan pa'i chus bkang la/ oM A:big+h+naM krita hUM zhes bya ba lan bdun bzlas pa mdun du bzhag nas lag pa thal mo sbyar te rdo rje 'dzin pa blos dmigs
239b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ phyag 'tshal bstod cing phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyag 'tshal bstod de phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /gus pas khyod la bdag gsol 'debs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag bsgrubs shig ces brjod la/ /oM swa b+hA shu d+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM/
239b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bzlas nas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mngon du byas te/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod la/ oM A:hUM badzra satwa ma nus ra sa ma yi tiSh+Tha a sha stwaM d+hA ra ya mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hi? hUM zhes nas
239b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gcig pa sku mdog ston ka'i zla ba dangs pa ltar dkar zhing phyag na rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can zhi zhing sgeg ba'i nyams dang ldan pa rang gi btsun mos mgul ba nas 'khyung ba
239b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa bsgoms la/ de'i spyi bor ni oM mgrin par ni A:snying gar ni hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum dgod par bya'o/ /de nas oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM
239b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga ban bidya rA dza hUM hUM phaT ces bya ba dang/ phyogs bcur se gol gtogs pas phyogs skyong ba rnams gnod jos? kyis bkug la/ yang snying ga'i sa
240a1(rgyud 'grel): bon las spros pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phur bu sku stong khro bo'i gzugs can la 'og gi cha phur po'i dbyibs can rnams spros te gnod mdzes kyis bkug pa rnams kyi spyi po ra oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba du Sh+TAM phaT
240a2(rgyud 'grel): kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT /hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ra adz+nyA pa ti sarba pi kA ya bA ka ti ta badzra kA la ya hUM phaT ces bya bas mi g.yo bar byas la/ oM badzra mungka ra badzra kI la ya A ko Ti? ya hUM phaT ces bya bas rdo rje thob phyag na ?
240a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'i gnod mdzes kyis brdungs bar bya'o/ /de nas phur bu'i 'od 'bar ba las 'og tu rdo rje'i sa gzhi steng du rdo rje'i dra ba/ /phyogs kun tu rdo rje'i ra ba/ phyi rol ma? ri 'bar pas bskor bar bsams la/ hUM bzlas pa'i lcaM pa la
240a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang/ sngar bstan pa'i chus oM badzra re khe hUM zhes brjod cing mdun du maN+Dal bya'o/ /maN+Dal byug pa'i dus su maN+Dal gyi phan yon kyang bzlas par bya ste/ chu bcas lci ba sbyin pa re/ /skyang nul byas pa tshul khrims yin/
240a5(rgyud 'grel): grog ma sogs bsal bzod yin te/ bya ba spro bar brtson 'grus so/ /skad cig de sems rtse gtsig pa/ /bsam gtan yin te ri mo dag /snyoms pa shes rab yin par gsungs/ /maN+Dal byas pas pha rol phyin drug brnyes
240a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /lha mi khyad par can skye zla ltar gzi 'phags shing/ /nad kun las grol gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rgyal rigs 'bru dang gser sogs 'byor pas gang bar skyes/ /des na bde gshegs mchog gi
240a7(rgyud 'grel): khyim du lus las byas zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas lag pa bkrus te maN+Dal gyi dbus su lag pa bzhag la sa'i lha mo blos dmigs te gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang
240b1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par ni/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi/ /ji ltar bdud kyi stobs bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /oM me di ni badzri b+ha pa badzra ban d+ha hUM zhes bya
240b2(rgyud 'grel): pas byin gyis brlabs la yid kyis sam? lag pa'i me tog gi rim pa gsum dang ldan pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa bri'o/ /de nas rim pa dbus ma'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma rgyad kyi lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge hUM bri'o/ /shar gyi che'i
240b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar zla ba la oM lhor rin po che la swA/ nub tu pad+ma la A:byang du sna tshogs rdo rje la hA/ me'i mtshams la sogs pa rnams su mtshan de dag nyid dam zla ba la laM maM paM taM/ rim pa gnyis pa'i me mtshams la sogs par gdan de
240b4(rgyud 'grel): dag nyid roM shoM gaM roM/ rim pa gsum pa snam bu'i shar la sogs pa'i ngos gnyis gnyis su gdan de dag nyid meM thiM/ lhor oM aM/ nub tu oM hUM/ byang du oM saM ngo/ /sgo rnams dang mtshams su nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM bri'o/ /'og gi
240b5(rgyud 'grel): cha shar gyi sgo sngon duAng hUM/ steng gi cha nub kyi sgo sngon du yang nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM ngo/ /de ltar sa bon rnams bris nas bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags bzlas pa'i chus bsang gtor byas te/ yang bsang gtor lan gsum byas na
240b6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon rnams 'od 'bar pa dang bcas par bsgom mo/ /de nas oM badzra puShpe A:hUM zhes bya ba 'am/ yi ge 'bru gsum bzlas pas me tog byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /mchod pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ oM hUM badzra satwa puShpaM
240b7(rgyud 'grel): pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM aM dzi na dzaka? puShpa pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ oM swA ratna d+h+rika buShpi pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM A:a'a ro lik puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM A:a'a ro lika puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM hA pradz+nyA d+h+rika puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM laM mo ha rA ti puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM maM dwe Sha rA ti puShpaM 
241a1(rgyud 'grel): pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM paM rA ga ra ti puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM hI badzra rA ti puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ rim pa dang po'o/ /oM ruM ru pa badzra puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM sha shapda puShpaM pra tIts+tshA swAhA/ oM gaM ga? badzraM? puShpaM tIts+tsha swA hA/
241a2(rgyud 'grel): oM raM rA sa sa badzra puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM paM sparsha badzra puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ rim pa gnyis pa'o/ /oM mai mai tri ya puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM thli kI ti garba puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM oM badzra pA Ni puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM oM kha kharb+ha? puShpaM
241a3(rgyud 'grel): pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ oM oM lo ko shwa ra puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ oM hUM many+dzu g+ho Sha puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM oM sarba Ni ba ra ni bskaM? ba ni puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM si sa man+ta b+ha dra puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM hUM ya mAn+ta krita puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA
241a4(rgyud 'grel): hA/ oM hUM pradz+nyAn+ta krita puShpaM praM tAts+tsha swA hA/ oM hUM pad+man+ta krita puShpaM pri tAts+tsha swA hA/ oM hUM bi g+h+nAn+ta krita puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM hUM ya tsa la puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM hUM Tak+ki rA dza puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM hUM nI la daN+Da puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM
241a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM mahA ba la puShpaM? pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM hUM sum+bA rA dzA puShpaM tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM hUM uSh+ni Sha tsa kri warti puShpaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ rim pa gsum pa'o/ /de ltar thams cad la sbyar bar bya ste/ khyad par du gan d+ha pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ d+hU pa pra
241a6(rgyud 'grel): tIts+tsha swA ? pa pra? tIts+tsha swAhA/ ne 'i? dya pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar mchod nas skad cig tsam gyis ye shes gyi dkyil 'khor bkug ste/ oM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs
241a7(rgyud 'grel): la bstams te/ gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor legs par bltas la/ oM badzra satwa arg+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM badzra satwa pa tyaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM badzra satwa any+dza ma naM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ de la arg+haM dang zhal bsil ni snod
241b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis dbul lo/ /zhabs bkru ba ni khu tshur gyi sor mo dkrol ba rol pa bcas par dbul lo/ /yang zhal bsil me tog gaM lag pas kyang dbul lo/ /de nas yang snga ma ltar rim pa bzhin du mchod la bskor ba lan gsum bya ste/ arg+ha'i snod kyis
241b2(rgyud 'grel): chu las bsang gtor byas thal mo sbyar te/ dkon mchog gsum la bdag bskyabs mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyi bzung/ /zhes lan gsum brjod la phyag lan
241b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum bya ste/ bstod pa 'dis bstong par bya'o/ /mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag/ rdo rje zhi ba
241b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /dngos nyid dag pas gos pa med /gsang ma'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mi 'chi 'dod
241b5(rgyud 'grel): chags che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin brnyes pa/ /rdo rje gsung la phag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dag pa gdon mi za/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
241b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas bstod la/ /yi ge gsum po ci nus kyis mi g.yeng pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho zhes bya ba 'dis ye shes kyi 'khor lo rang gi lus la bsdus la rim pa 'dis sku
241b7(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs byin gyis brlab po/ /de la spyi por zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du oM dkar po bsgoms la dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi dngos/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje skur ni
242a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum kyis dngos/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje skur ni mdzad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gang yin/ /phung po
242a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga yis rab gang ba/ /sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis/ /bdag kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ de'i rjes la mgrin par pad+ma ma'i steng du A(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bsgoms la/ chos kyi gsung lam dpal
242a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi dngos/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje gsung du mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi dngos/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i
242a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /rdo rje gsung du mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin/ /gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs/ /bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra bar/ /chos 'dzin pa dang mtshungs par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ de nas snying
242a5(rgyud 'grel): gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hUM sngon po bsgoms la/ /rdo rje thugs 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi dngos/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs su bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo
242a6(rgyud 'grel): rje mi phyed gsum gyi dngos/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol/ /kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin/ /gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa/ /bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra bar/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs par
242a7(rgyud 'grel): shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ yang thams cad du lhag par bya ba byas la/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ zhes brjod do/ /de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs/
242b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ yig brgya pas brtan par bya ste/ oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha dri d+ho me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo? me pa wa/ sarba sid+d+hiM me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsi taM sh+ri yaM(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha
242b2(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bA na sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra mA me muny+dza badzrIM b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya sa twa A(rgyud 'grel): de nas arg+ha'i chus maN+Dal bsang gtor lan gsum byas te yang chu gtor la maN+Dal gyi thog tu lag pa bzhag ste/ khyed kyi sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes
242b3(rgyud 'grel): su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas su/ /slar yang dgongs par mdzad du gsol/ /mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol la/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa bsal te/ yang legs par byugs la me tog
242b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig phul te bzod par mdzod cig ces brjod la langs te ji ltar dga' bar bya'o/ /thun mtshams gzhan yang de ltar byas te zla ba gcig gaM lo phyed dam lo gcig tu cho ga nges rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byas nas ji ltar 'dod
242b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub kyis mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyud nas gsungs pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin byin gyis gtso/ /ye shes sku mchog rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /mchod pa'i cho ga bdag gis byas
242b6(rgyud 'grel): pa nges/ /phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang thob par shog/ rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon chen po nag po pa'i zhal snga nas bla ma'i man ngag las bzung ste mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar gyi
242b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhan po nag po pa'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas gyis bsgyur pa'o// //sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku/ /bla ma dam pa la btud de /de'i man ngag ji bzhin du/ /gtor ma'i
243a1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bri par bya/ /de la tshogs bsags pa dang/ las bsgrub pa bya ba dang/ bar du gcod pa rnams zhi par bya ba'i phyir gtor ma nar mar byed par 'dod pas srod kyis dus su sha lnga dang/ bdud rtsi lnga'i ril bu dang ldan
243a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gtor mas snod mdzes par bkang ste/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed la/ de nas stong pa nyid du mos par bya ste/ de'i 'og tu hUM zhes brjod pas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang/ ra ba dang/ dra ba dang phyi rol tu me lce 'bar ba dang/
243a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'khrigs par bsam zhing nang du rin po che'i khang pa nyams dga' ba bsam par bya'o/ /der bdag nyid skad cig tsam gyis lhag pa'i lhar bsgom ste rdo rje gsum pa/ ye shes sems dpa' dang/ cod pan gyi lha dran pas gsung bar
243a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje thal mo snying gar phye la gtor mar hUM A a'oM baM bsams te/ hUM chu ltar zhu bas kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang/ /a zhu bas dri phun sum tshogs pa dang/ oM zhu bas ro phun sum tshogs par bsam par bya'o/ /de
243a5(rgyud 'grel): nas oM gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste gnyis su med par byas la 'bru gsum brjod pas brtan par bya'o/ /de nas bdag gi snying ga'i 'od zer gyis sems can thams cad dam yi dags kyi tshogs bkug ste/ de dag gi
243a6(rgyud 'grel): snying ga dang spyi bor lha dang bla ma rigs kyi bdag po bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas nang du bkug la thams cad kyi lce la hUM las rdo rje bskyed/ /oM gyis nor bu bskyed/ oM a kA mo mu khaM sarba d+harmA naM Adya nutpan+na twAda oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes
243a7(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas nor bu 'od zer gyis ljags kyi lce'u chung drangs pa bzhin du so sor tham pas thams cad gnyis med kyi ye shes dang ldan par bsams te/ yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis kyang mchod par bya'o/ /de nas/ /
243b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin gyis phyag rgya dang bcas la/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /gsal zhing dag la brnyog ma med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /ngo bo gnyis med gnas med par/ /de ltar chos rnams shes rab?
243b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas chos bshad par bya'o/ /de nas oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ yul phyogs 'di la sogs pa'i sarba k+She tra pa la/ sarba rak+Sha sa/ yak+Sha unmand+ha?/ a
243b3(rgyud 'grel): pasmar/ sarba de ba/ sarba nA ga/ sarba yA ma/ sarba DA ki n+ya/ sarba sa twa/ sarba b+hu ta/ a ta ya/ i daM ba liM/ grih+Na grih+Na/ ma ma sarba sa pa ri wA ra na sarba satwa nany+dza/ sarba pA paM/ b+hya ti/ big+haM shAM tiM ku ru/ b+ha na d+ha na/ A yu a rok+Sha/ a ti buSh+Ti
243b4(rgyud 'grel): ku ru/ sarba pra ya rak+Sha ku ru swA hA/ sarba sid+d+hi ka ri/ shu pa tsit+ta ka ra zhes brjod la/ gzhan yang khyed rtsams kun la gsol ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ /gnas kyi dbang phyug skye por bcas/ /gdon nang la sogs zhi
243b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang/ /bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa dang/ /gzhan yang ci 'dod lhun grub shog ces 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab ste/ sems can thams cad sdig med cing/ /sems can thams cad bde gyur
243b6(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub byed pa'i/ /lam de nyid du zhugs nas kyang/ /rnal 'byor brtul zhugs gnas la ni/ da lta nyid du gnas par shog ces pas dge pa yongs su bsngos la// oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gshegs su gsol//
243b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag drin bla ma'i rgyud dang ni/ /blo dman na rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /bla ma dam pa'i man ngag bzhin/ gtor ma'i cho ga bris pa yin/ /dpal ldan gsang 'dus gtor ma 'dis/ /lam la gnas dang 'bras myong gis/ tshogs rdzogs
244a1(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir/ /slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa yin rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi kra ma/ bod skad du/ rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa/ rje btsun
244a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba yi //bdud rtsi'i ros ni nges gang ba'i/ /rdo rje 'dzin la rab btud nas/ /rab gnas cho ga bshad par bya/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis sngar gsungs
244a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /sna tshogs lung gis gzhung dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor chen por bkod sogs pa'i/ /rab gnas cho ga rgyas gsungs dang/ /rgyud rnams de dang de dag tu/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis rgyas gsungs dang/ /de bzhin grub pa'i slob dpon gyis//
244a4(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas gzhung dang mthun mdzad pa/ /de dag kun gyi gzhung bsdus te/ /nges pa'i tshig dang rnam dbye dang/ /cho ga'i rim pa gsum du bstan/ /de la nges pa'i tshig gis ni/ /pra kaM sha na na tiSh+Tha zhes pa ste mchog tu gyur pa
244a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ yun ring pas rab gnas zhes bya ste/ de la mchog tu gyur pa ni ye shes sems dpa' i bdag nyid du bsgrub pa la/ /yun ring ba ni 'khor ba ji srid du bzhugs pa la bya'o/ /rnam par dbye ba la gnyis te /gzhi
244a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam dbye ba dang/ sgrub thabs rnam par dbye ba'o/ /gzhi rnam par dbye ba ni gtsug lag khang dang/ mchod rten dang/ lha'i sku dang/ ras ris la sogs pa dang rta babs dang/ rdo ring dang/ shing ljon pa dang/ khron pa dang/
244a7(rgyud 'grel): chu mig la sogs pa sku'i bdag nyid du bya ba'i gzhi'o/ /bgrang phreng dang 'jig rten pa'i bstan bcos dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i glegs paM la sogs pa ni gsung gi bdag nyid du byas pa'i gzhi'o/ /rdo rje
244b1(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khor lo la sogs pa lha'i mtshan ma thams cad ni thugs kyi bdag nyid du bya ba'i gzhi'o/ /sgrubs thabs rnam par dbye ba ni/ gtsug lag khang la sogs pa sku'i gzhi yin pa de stong pa nyid du bsgoms la/ de las b+h+ruM ?
244b2(rgyud 'grel): las 'khor la/ /de las sku rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrubs la/ rab tu gnas pa bya'o/ /bgrang phreng dang glegs bam la sogs pa gsung gi gzhi ni stong pa nyid las gsung rdo rje chos su bsgrubs la rab tu gnas par
244b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /rdo rje la sogs pa thugs kyi gzhi ni thugs mi bskyod par bsgrubs la rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /cho ga'i rim pa bstan pa ni rgyas pa dang bsdus pa'o/ /de la rgyas pa ni rab gnas bya ba'i slob dpon yang ji lta bu zhe na/ de nyid
244b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu yi tshul rig cing/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos dag dang/ /dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i las la mkhas/ /sbyin sreg las dang rab gnas rig/ gsang sngags tshul gyis rim la gus/ /nyan thos spyod pa spong byed pa/ /mkhas pa zhing rig
244b5(rgyud 'grel): par ldan/ /khro ba chung zhing 'dod pa chung/ /nga rgyal spangs shing dbang po 'dul/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba srung byad cing/ /sngags dang bsam gtan las la brtson/ /ser sna ye ni dri ma spangs/ /dam pa'i rigs las skyes pa ste/ /sems
244b6(rgyud 'grel): can rnams la rjes brtse ba/ /nges ni rab gnas bya bar 'os/ /slob ma yang ji lta bu zhe na/ dad dang ldan zhing gtong la dga' / /bslab pa yi ni gnas tshul 'dzin/ /sgyu dang g.yo ni rnam par spangs/ /bla ma la gus rjes brtser
244b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /dge ba'i chos la rab tu btson?/ /dam pa de ni slob mar gzung/ /de nas rab gnas la sogs pa'i/ /dam pa'i sgrub pa la 'jug bya/ /de nas rab tu gnas pa'i sgrub pa la 'jug ste/ de yang bsnyen pa dang/ lhag par gnas pa dang/
245a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas pa'o/ /de la bsnyen pa bya ba la/ zla pa drug dang gza' bzhi dang/ rgyu skar bcu bzhi gang yin dang/ /tshes grangs bdun gyi grangs nyid la/ /rgyal ba la sogs rab gnas bya/ /de bas na dus de
245a2(rgyud 'grel): dag la bsnyen pa bya ste/ de yang yid du 'ong ba'i gnas/ /gtsug lag khang dang khang bzang la sogs pa zug rngu'i nyes pa spangs la dri gtsang khang du byas la/ bla re dang/ gdugs dang/ ba dan dang/ yol ba dang/ rgyal mtshan
245a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rnga yab la sogs pas brgyan la/ /maN+Dal dang mchod pa dang/ gtor ma gzhung bzhin byas te/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la mchod pa dang bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas zla ba 'am zla ba phyed la sogs par sngon du bsnyen
245a4(rgyud 'grel): pa bya'o/ /de nas rab gnas kyi dbang du dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas/ /sa'i cho ga sngon du song bas gzhung gang yin pa'i dkyil 'khor bya'o/ /de nas lhag par gnas pa byas te/ de la khrus sa'i stegs bu gru bzhi pa la spangs
245a5(rgyud 'grel): khru do ba so phag la sogs pa la legs par brtsigs pa/ rdo thal gyis dkar po byug go/ de nas rab gnas gang byed pa de phyogs gcig tu bzhugs la/ de'i 'og tu slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang/ bum pa lhag par gnas
245a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa dang gtor ma dang khrus kyi yo byad la sogs pa kun tshogs bshams la bdag nyid lha gang yin pa'i skur bsgoms la/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo yan chad gzhung bzhin du bsgoms te/ dang
245a7(rgyud 'grel): po rab gnas bya ba'i lha la khrus bya'o/ /de yang sku gzugs yin na zhal shar phyogs su bstan la ras la sogs pa'i na bza' ser po gsol te/ oM badzra bastra hUM zhes pas so/ /de nas hUM bzlas pa'i yungs kar dang/
245b1(rgyud 'grel): oM bzlas pa'i chu lag pa g.yas g.yon gyis lan gsum bskor te/ gnyis ka mer bor te shis pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas ba'i rnam lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA yA bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ zhes brjod cing durba'i pir
245b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsku'o/ /de nas til mar dri zhim pas bsgos pa 'khor ba'i snod du bzhag ste/ oM hUM traM h+ri khaM zhes brjod cing durba'i pir gyis khyab par byug go/ /de nas til mar bsal pa'i phyir shing shun dri zhim pa dang spyar ba'i chus bkru'o/ /de nas dkar
245b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum mngar gsum sbyar ba'i chur bkru'o/ /de nas skyu ru ra'i bdag chal gyis bkru'o/ /de nas bum pa'i chus dbang bskur zhing bkru ste/ rol mo'i sgra dang bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing bum pa'i chus bkru'o/ /de'i tshe nam mkha' la
245b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyi bum pas dbang bskur zhing bkru bar bsam mo/ /ji ltar bltam pa tsam gyis kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba/ /lha yi chu
245b5(rgyud 'grel): ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM swA hA zhes brjod cing bkru'o/ /de nas ras dmar pos sku la chags ba'i chu legs par phyi'i/ /'di ni khrus kyi cho ga'o/ /de nas tsan dan dang
245b6(rgyud 'grel): gur gum la sogs pa'i dris lha'i thugs byugs te/ badzra gan d+he a zhes pas so/ /de nas me tog dang spos dang mar me dang/ bshos rnams rang rang gi sngags kyis phul la/ rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pas chu la reg pas thugs ka dang/
245b7(rgyud 'grel): mgur dang spyi bo dang/ dpral bar nye reg bya'o/ /de nas pus mo g.yas pa sa la btsugs te/ lag pa g.yas pas spos phor thogs te/ g.yon bas dril bu gsil zhing/ lce hUM las rdo rjer bsam la/ /'di skad ces snyan gsan dbab cing gsol
246a1(rgyud 'grel): ba gdab bo/ /hUM bcom ldan rdo rje che ge mo/ /rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyod rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid kyis/ /rab gnas nang par
246a2(rgyud 'grel): bgyid par 'tshal/ /gus pos bdag dang 'di la ni/ /bka' drin dag ni mdzad par rigs/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /'jig rten mgon po brtse ba can/ /dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /gang gang gsang sngags lha rnams
246a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen rnams/ /bstan pa 'di la mngon dga' zhing/ /byang chub sems dpa' rten byung ba'i/ /rdo rje yi ni spyan ldan rnams/ /rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bdag/ rig pa'i rgyal po
246a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis ni/ /rab gnas dag ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /de bas bdag dang slob ma la/ /thugs brtser ldan pas byin brlabs mdzod/ /sa ma ya stwaM a haM/ de skad lan gsum du brjod do/ /snyan gsan phab cing gsol ba btab pas phyogs
246a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun gyis nam mkha' la byon te dgongs par bsam mo/ /de nas rab gnas bya ba'i gzhi de stong pa nyid du bsgoms la de cho ga'i rim pas gang yin pa der bskyed pa 'am/
246a6(rgyud 'grel): yang na yig 'bru tsam las skad cig tsam las bskyed la snying ga'i sa bon gyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la oM arg+haM pra tIts+tsha zhes pas yon chab dbul/ /oM ni ri khaM zhes pas zhabs bsil dbul//
246a7(rgyud 'grel): oM sarbba sho d+ha na hUM zhes pas zhabs bsil dbul lo/ /de nas me tog nas sgra brnyan gyi bar du dbul lo/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas dam tshig pa la bstims la/ yang mchod pa rnams rim par phul te/ lha gang yin pa de'i
246b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags ci nus kyis bzlas la/ /mthar yi ge brgya pa mu dang bcas pas gshegs su gsol te/ 'di ni sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas nang par dkyil 'khor raM stegs bu'i gnas der mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor ba thams cad bshams?
246b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ de nas bdag nyid lha gang yin par bsgoms te/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa yan chod byas la/ de nas bgegs bsrung pa'i 'khor lo bsgoms te/ gzhal yas khang sprul pa la sogs pa gnas skabs
246b3(rgyud 'grel): dang sbyar la bya/ /de nas gang rab gnas bya ba'i lha bskyed la/ de'i rjes la lag pa g.yas pa spos snod thogs la g.yon pa dril bu gsil? zhing bus mo g.yas pa sa la btsugs nas lce hUM las rdo rjer bsams te/ hUM bcom ldan zhes bya ba nas
246b4(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs mdzad ces brjod nas/ lha rnams bskul te/ sang ni zhes bya ba'i skabs su de ring zhes bya ba bcug la snyan gsan dbab po/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' snying ga'i sa bon gyis 'od zer gyis nam mkha' la spyan drang la yon chab la
246b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa mchod de/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): dgug gzhug byas te dbyer med par bstims la/ /sngar gyi khrus kyi cho ga khrus bya ste/ de yang sku gzugs la ni dngos su khrus byas la/ /ras ris dang glegs baM la sogs pa la ni me long gi gzugs brnyan
246b6(rgyud 'grel): la khrus bya'o/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na
246b7(rgyud 'grel): med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa de la yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i khrus 'di gsol lo/ /ri po lta bur mdzes pa yis/ /yon tan dam pa'i rgyan ldan pa/ /mchod gnas rin chen 'di dag la/ /bdag gis khrus ni gsol
247a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol bar bgyi/ /ma rig 'joms pa'i nyi ma ste/ /srid pa'i nang ni sel ba'i sman/ /dam chos rin chen 'di la ni/ /bdag gis khrus ni gsol bar gyi/ /bskal pa'i mdza' i dngos 'joms pa/ /'jigs byed me yi cha byad can//
247a2(rgyud 'grel): mgon po snying rje'i stobs ldan la/ /bdag gis khrus ni gsol bar bgyi/ /mchog tu tshim zhing skal bzang ba/ /dam pa'i bdud rtsi mdzes cha byad/ /che ge mo dpal rdo rje la/ /bdag gis khrus ni gsol bar bgyi/ /gdul bya'i sems can gang
247a3(rgyud 'grel): dag la/ /rgyal ba'i sprul sku mang po yi/ /cha byang lha yi rnam pa la/ /bdag gi khrus ni gsol bar bgyi/ /snying rje yis ni nges gang ba/ /rtag tu phen dang bde mdzad pa'i/ /mchog tu dul ba de dag la/ /bdag gi khrus ni gsol bar bgyi/
247a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan gnas dang mi slob ma'i dge 'dun gnas kyi sa/ /gtsug lag khang dang gnas gzhan la/ /bdag gi khrus ni gsol bar dgyi/ /de nas yon chab la sogs pas mchod la/ oM badzra b+ha ra Na wa pu Sha Ne swA hA zhes pas rgyan cing 'byor ba dbul lo//
247a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas gang yin pa'i bstod par bya'o/ /de nas 'di skad brjod do/ /gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten
247a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa de rgyu dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa gsung pa/ chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis rab gu gnas
247a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bgyi'o/ /gang bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rtogs shing mi dge ba bcu spangs pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ ma 'dres pa'i chos gsum dang/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang/ snying rje chen po
247b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa ma lus pa'i brlabs pa rgyas par byed pa'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes su rtogs bde bar gshegs pa gzhal du med pa'i yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag gis
247b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas par bgyi'o/ /gang bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa phung po lnga yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa/ cho 'phrul gsum dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa
247b3(rgyud 'grel): phyin ci ma log pa'i shes bya dang/ ye shes la dbang brnyes pas nyon mongs pa la sogs pa bdud bzhi spangs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag gis rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /gang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang/
247b4(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rgyan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa/ sku lta bas chog mi shes pa/ mthong na mi mthun pa med pa ste/ rigs so
247b5(rgyud 'grel): snor de'i sku gcig tu mthar thug pa thog pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnyen/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis rab tu gnas par bgyi'o/ /de nas gser gyi thur ma any+dza nas byugs spyan dbye ste/ oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu
247b6(rgyud 'grel): bi sho d+ha na badzra swA hA zhes bzlas shing dbye'o/ /de nas yang mchod pa'i khyad par kun gyis mchod de/ dang por bum pas dbang bskur zhing khrus chab gsol/ de nas me tog dbul te/ 'di ni mchog gi me tog ste/ /chu las skyes dang thang
247b7(rgyud 'grel): las skyes/ /mchog tu gus pas dbul bar gyi/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra pUShpe hUM/ 'di ni mchog gi bdug spos te/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba'i spos/ /mchog tu gus pas dbul bar bgyi/ ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol//
248a1(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra d+hu pe hUM/ mar me 'di ni phyogs kun tu/ /'bar te mun pa thams cad sel/ /mi shes rab rib sel ba'i phyir/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra dI pe hUM/ 'di ni mchog gi dri yin te/ /tsan dan gur gum
248a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa/ /mchog tu dad pas bdag dbul na/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ oM badzra gand+he hUM 'di ni mchog gi lha bshos te/ /kha dog dri dang ror ldan pa'i/ /bza' dang bca' bar yang dag ldan/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ oM
248a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra ne wi te hUM/ de nas 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod dbul te/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg ldan pa'i/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i zas mchog 'di/ /bdag gi dad pas dbul bar bgyi/ /ci bde bar ni ba zhes su gsol/ /oM badzra di bya an naM mA d+hi d+hya
248a4(rgyud 'grel): na pri Na Ne swAhA/ de nas rab gnas kyi gzhi gang yin pa'i gnas skabs dang sbyar la/ lha khang dang mchod rten la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad du sprul la b+h+ruM zhes pas lha khang dang mchod rten du gyur par byas la/ glegs ba
248a5(rgyud 'grel): la ni yum ma ma/ rdo rje chos su byas pa de a zhes pas yi ge'i rnam par gyur te/ yi ge de'i sgo nas 'khor ba'i mdza' i bar du 'gro ba'i don byed par bsam mo/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas shing g.yas pas/ rdo rje
248a6(rgyud 'grel): gzung ste sku la sogs pa'i dbu dang sked pa zhabs su lan gsum gsum bskor te/ sku'i sum cha'i tshad kyi stegs bu'i khri la ya yo med par ci mdzes su bzhugs te/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA zhes pas brtan par bzhugs
248a7(rgyud 'grel): su gsol lo/ /de nas gnas pa'i lha de dag byin tshe zhing bkra shis pa dang yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos skyong la gtor ma byin la gsol ba gdab khyad par du mahA kA la la gtor ma byin la/ de nas gzung ste khyod kyis
248b1(rgyud 'grel): nga'i bka' dran par gyis la/ gnas dang bcas pa 'di ji srid pa'i bar du srung zhing mgon dang skyabs mdzod cig bar dbang bskur zhing rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg tsA ru dang bcas pa bya'o/ /de nas bden pa'i byin brlabs brjod de//
248b2(rgyud 'grel): oM sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang/ rigs sngags dang/ gsang sngags dang/ gzungs sngags dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang/ rigs pa'i lha thams cad kyi bka' bden pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsam gyis mi
248b3(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'i bden pa dang/ /bden pa'i byin brlabs kyi bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi brten 'di zhes bya ba mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang bzlas pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas rab tu gnas par bya bas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung
248b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi ngo bo 'di dus 'di nas gzung nas 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du bdag dang/ yon bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi phyag gyi nas mchod pa'i rten/ /bsod nams bsag pa'i dpal mgon du gyur te/ /zhal dro byin che 'gro ba skyob
248b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthu sbyin dang ldan nas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad tshe dang stobs dang/ mdog dang/ bde ba dang/ longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug dang/ rigs dang/ gzugs dang dpal bzang po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ ngan 'gro las
248b6(rgyud 'grel): thar ste de bI go 'phangs thob par gyur cig/ longs spyod kyi mchog thob dang sems can thams cad kyi dpal mgon du gyur cig/ lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal dang/ yid mi bde ba las nges par grol bar gyur cig/ bsam pa thams cad
248b7(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs shing byang chub sems la mchog tu gzhol bar gyur cig/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang nga rgyal dang/ dregs pa dang phrag dog dang/ ser sna la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam par
249a1(rgyud 'grel): spangs par gyur cig/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob cing myur du mi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa'i go 'phang thob par gyur cig/ de nas bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa
249a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i mdo 'don zhing bskor ba byas la phyag bya'o/ /de phyin chad bsod nams kyi rten btsugs pa'o/ /de nas slob ma'i dge ba spel ba'i phyir slob dpon gyis yon blang bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis ji ltar gsol ba btab pa yi//
249a3(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin/ /brtse ba'i sems kyis yang dag byas/ /de bas ci 'byor pas chos kyis/ /de nas slob mas ma chags pa'i sems kyis ci 'byor pa bla ma la dbul zhing mchod pa byas te/ phyag byas la bskor
249a4(rgyud 'grel): ba bya'o/ /de ni cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'o/ /cho ga mdor sdus pa ni bsnyen pa sngon du sod bas lhag par gnas pa ma byas par nyi ma gcig la khrus la sogs pa kun rdzogs par snga ma ltar rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /rab gnas kyi
